Great quality and the sizing is probably right on. We got a size up and the wide, but unless your child really had wide feet, a regular fit would suffice. My daughter said, “Oh the inside is very soft on my feet.” So there’s that as well.

This product arrives in a beautiful Minnie Mouse tin.l bought that for my granddaughter.lt will teach her how to tell time.The Minnie Mouse watch is cute and pretty in pink.l know granddaughter will be happy to receive that on her birthday.

my niece loves it.well anything with Minnie Mouse but she's 2 so she doesn't really understand the concept of the watch like how it tell time. I recommend it for children under 3 or children who don't know the concept of a watch. because the watch doesn't work at all aka doesn't tell time or the arrows doesn't even move.

review_title: The watch broke after 1 day of wearing. The ...
review_body: The watch broke after 1 day of wearing. The plastic cover came off and then the minute hand. My daughter is 3. She did wear it throughout the one day the watch survived but I expected a little more durability

review_title: I love this watch she learns to tell time by clock ...
review_body: My eight year old granddaughter loves her Minnie Mouse watch.  I love this watch she learns to tell time by clock hands instead of numbers.
Very cute watch, but it doesn’t work well for little kids.  It got wet when my daughter was watching her hands and quit working after about a week.  It would be smart to make a kids watch waterproof.

review_title: Cutewatch I got my daughter to teach her time
review_body: Cute watch I got my daughter to teach her time. Not sure if it's the rubber on the band or if my daughter just fidgets with the band a lot, but it's fallen off a few times.
Super cute. But the numbers on the outside rub off easily.

review_title: Granddaughter loved it. Wears it everyday and it is helpful ...
review_body: Granddaughter loved it.  Wears it everyday and it is helpful in her learning to tell time.
I brought this watch for my daughter and she loves it. She really loves it because its pick. Her words not mine lol.

review_title: She loved it but she got it wet and water got ...
review_body: Ordered as a gift for my granddaughter. She loved it but she got it wet and water got inside the watch and it stopped working..Will not buy again..

review_title: Works as described (including being waterproof) but the band broke after 29 days.
review_body: Watch was easy to set up, I didn’t even bother to read the instructions. We gave it as a gift to our 8yr old daughter. She has had it on her wrist for 30 days now this summer. Swimming and playing hard and the watch itself has been working great. Unfortunately the band is starting to break but it looks to be a universal size/type that should be replaceable. I rate it 4 stars because the band broke in 29 days.

review_title: The digital watch for a gift
review_body: The watch I ordered is for an orphan in Kenya. The little girl will love it when I take it to her in July. This will make her day, week, month, and year. The watch is very attractive and will probably be worn around the clock. I am sure all her friends will notice the beautiful watch.
They love it

El reloj nos trajo instrucciones. Y encontré unas el inglés pero sn muy difíciles de seguir. Habla de botones A B C y D. Pero los botones no tienen esas letras. Por favor necesito urgente saber como oneroso a funcionar. Gracias
my baby loves it
This watch does so many things and has held up well.  Our grandson loves it!

review_title: Great watch and worth the price!
review_body: I got this for my 7 yr old daughter who is learning about time and always wants to know what time it is. She's ultra sensitive to textures but really likes how soft and comfy it is. It's waterproof, (great for hand washing) beeps each hour, and does the month and day. The only possible downside is that it's a bit scuffed on the top. But, I have an active daughter and think for the price it's totally worth it! My daughter loves it and wears it everyday!

review_title: Looks good. Quality not the best
review_body: This is a nice looking watch. My daughter loved the gift. Only downside the latch broke within two weeks so she stopped using because it would constantly get caught on anything she was using including clothes.

review_title: Can it review yet but looks nice.
review_body: I bought for my granddaughter for Christmas who is 7 years old.  Can it review yet but looks nice.
This broke the first day my daughter wore it. She was at school and said the band snapped off at some point in the day. She didn't know when or how it happened.
Nice and warm early season jacket. Not for really cold weather but perfect for fall or spring. This jacket is well made and pretty.

review_title: The five year old loves it
review_body: Ordered it for my five year old niece. It's somewhat large, but I'd rather buy something somewhat large than too small, especially for a growing five year old. She loves it because it's comfy on the inside.
What's not to love about a little girl in a Carhartt??
Love this jacket! Tuff kids jacket. Only wish it was available in darker colors. Light pink is really not a practical color when you live on a farm.

review_title: It keeps our little one nice and toasty
review_body: This jacket is so cute and warm that this is the 2nd year we have bought it. It keeps our little one nice and toasty. The only complaint I have is that the hood is a little loose and doesn't stay on well but we can deal with that!

Best jackets ever. My daughter loved the rich magenta pink and the fuzzy inside. I always buy one size up and it lasts for at least 2 years! This brand tends to run a little on the big size but we like it and purchase accordingly.
Fits nice and made to last. Only issue, STAINS EASY. Can't lean on anything or touch anything or there will be a stain/smudge. ....and it's for kids so.... -_-
Very big but daughter loves it!

review_title: Not too heavy and not too light
review_body: Down South our winters are not like up North so you need something that is "inbetweeen" . The puff jackets are too much , the hoodie types too little.  This one is just right! More colors please...
We were not so sure about spending this much money on jackets our kids would only fit for 1 winter.  But,  SOOOO GLAD we bought these.  Best quality jackets ever!  Work great and keep the girls warm!

This was a gift for my daughter when she learned how to tell time on a clock with hands.  She wasn't motivated until I order the watch and had it sitting on my desk.  We practiced telling time with a toy clock we have and then she took my test.  Two minutes to correctly tell the time on the toy clock (always at a 5 minute increment).  Any errors is a test failure and she could only take the test once per day.  this is the same test I did for my son about 5 years ago.  She nailed it the first time with about 45 seconds to spare!  She loves the pink and green watch.  She has been wearing it every day since she earned it.

My 7 y.o. daughter absolutely adores this watch. It helps her to tell time with "hour" and "minutes" written on the hands, and having the major minutes numbers in black and the hour numbers in blue. The starfish is the seconds hand which she absolutely loves and the wristband is stretchy so she doesn't ever have to undo it completely, just slide it on and off. It's kid friendly, and the warranty is great. Really glad we made this purchase.

review_title: Pretty little watch for our 4 year old...
review_body: Our little girl is loving her watch. She is four and fixing to be five. The adjustable band allows for a smaller wrist and definitely room for her to grow into.

I love the fit, style, ease of matching the minute and hour hands, but the way this watch is labeled is seriously challenging.  For the minutes, it labels 5-10-15-20-30 correctly, but once it gets past 30, instead of doing something logical for a kid like counting 35-40-45-50-55....it starts past 30 with (-25), (-20), (-15) etc like it's trying to teach them that 5:45 = "15 minutes until 6" etc.  It's been really hard for my daughter (who is learning to tell time) to differentiate past 30 minutes past the hour...she can understand everything up until then, but then says "it's 5:20 again!" (Actually 5:40) or "its 5:05 again!" (when it's 5:55).  I wish this watch was labeled easily for a new learner.

review_title: Wonderful, durable, pretty watch for a little girl to learn to tell time
review_body: I ordered this for my daughter LAST Christmas - and this Christmas it is still working. It has really been helpful in teaching her to tell time on an analog watch - and she loves using it & loves the look of it. Overall a great product & I highly recommend it! (it does occasionally "lose" a minute or two - I wouldn't use it for a precision time piece - but it is PERFECT for everyday use)

review_title: Cute, but careful with the band
review_body: My daughter thinks her new watch is lovely.  The butterfly going around to mark seconds is a fun change of pace.  Having the small numbers (5-55) has made it so that she can now tell us exactly how far into an hour it is.

review_title: My daughter liked it very much and she wears it and practices ...
review_body: My daughter liked it very much and she wears it and practices time with it often, which was the main purpose of buying it. That said, I find it difficult  to read the hours because they used a very light shade of green, the minutes increase on the right side of the watch and decrease on the other side, I would prefer that they kept increasing as 35,40..55, and so forth...I didn't noticed that from the picture. I also find annoying and distracting the little flower attached to the seconds hand. And it's a little noisy, this is the only detail my daughter complained about (she takes it off to sleep). It's really waterproof, we tried it in the pool and worked great, the strap dries easily and my daughter says it's comfortable. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.

review_title: The bands are adjustable and comfortable. I highly recommend this watch
review_body: This is the 8th Timex kids watch that I have purchased for my 8 kids.  They hold up forever.  I still have the one my oldest (now 22) used to wear.  Each of the kids learned to tell time on these durable and affordable analog watches.  The batteries are readily available at any jeweler or jewelry counter at most discount stores, although the batteries do seem to last for years.  The bands are adjustable and comfortable.  I highly recommend this watch.

I have mixed feelings about this watch.  But considering I have been unimpressed with Amazon's selection in watches (and shoes) lately, we decided to keep this.  Here's a breakdown of what I like and don't like about it.

review_title: Not the same quality as full size Timex
review_body: I have ordered several Timex Kids watches because I love the look and I expect them to last. But they never do. All have stopped working within a few months. I get the battery changed but the watches do not come back to life.

These are very lightweight which is nice. However, the color is misleading. I assumed by the pictures that these were a light blue, but they are actually more of a darker blue. My daughter has enough pink in her life so we will be keeping them, but I probably would've ordered purple had I known how dark these are.

These are the best lightweight, waterproof boots I have found for our boys. They are easy to put on themselves. We use them on rainy days and even in winter when it's not too cold. They are great for nature hikes and going into shallow streams. See the attached photo for these boots coming in from playing in muddy puddles. Good grooves grips on the soles. And my sons report no tripping over when wearing them even on rough terrain. One important note: make sure to wear socks. Our son gets sweaty feet from running around and his heels had a major blister from wearing these rubbers barefoot. We have progressive bought these boots from age 2 till now 5. Highly recommend these for toddlers to kids.

review_title: Great boots! MAKE THEM WEAR SOCKS WITH THEM!! But yes, great boots!
review_body: These are nearly perfect. But MAKE YOUR LITTLES WEAR SOCKS WITH THEM!

review_title: these rain boots aren't for us....
review_body: I opted for the Croc brand because of comfort, but these were less than desirable. Boots usually run big--these do not, so I would order a size up from what your little one is in, so they fit. They were difficult to get over my grand daughter's chubby little calf. She is 1.5 yrs & weighs about 24lbs (size 2T). The boots are going back & I won't be getting Croc's this time--I'll be sticking with something a little more traditional (maybe Western Chief). Also, even though they both are stamped 6C on the bottom, the right boot is NOTICEABLY larger than the left--by about half a size...We live in the Northwest & boots are a must for our rainy/mud season--hopefully we find a good pair soon.

review_title: Great Rain Boots (Fit True to Size)
review_body: My niece had a pair of pink rain boots that she loved so much - to the point that she wore them well past having outgrown them. She wore them rain or shine - indoors and out. Needless to say, it was going to be tough replacing them with just any old boot.

We love love love these - the ONLY reason I gave them stars instead of five is because - as others have mentioned - the leg hole is very narrow. Our little girl was about a year old when we bought these. She wore a size 4.5 shoe, so they were plenty long. But we knew we'd have trouble the first time we put them on her because the leg hole was just a little bit big. Not what you would expect for that size at all. She know actually wears a size 6 and it takes a lot of pulling to get them on. That said, these are wonderful rain and muck boots. just hose them off - inside and out - and they're clean again. They are so close to perfect, I'm willing to put up with the narrow leg opening and just buy a bigger size.
My niece had a pair of pink rain boots that she wore until her mom figured out that she was crunching her toes to fit into them. Rain or shine, she wanted to wear those boots.

I purchased these boots for my grandson as part of his Christmas gift. He loved them—and so did we, until they tore from the top and down the side. He is 2 1/2 so it’s not like he’s super rough with them. In fact, he hasn’t even had the opportunity to wear them that often. We expected a pair of Crocs to last. They fit him nice and we’re easy to put on & take off. Unfortunately, the quality just isn’t there and didn’t hold up to light wear & use.

Love Crocs rain boots .  These aren't the first pair I have purchased for my kids.  I love crocs over other boots because they have no lining to them -- but my kids will wear them without socks and be perfect comfortable.  Other boots with lining in them have the issue of getting soaked and smelly.  Or if you have back to back rainy days then the rain boots aren't dried from the previous day and you're stuck with wet boots and then wet socks.  These are very light weight for toddlers and sturdy enough for bigger kids.

review_title: I want to bronze these! So cute!
review_body: These are for my toddler girl.  They are easy to get on and off, a little bulky, but good golly--the pink ones are just SO cute!  I recommend socks with them--they seem like they would cause blisters without.  I'm pretty sure that they don't offer a  lot of tactile feeling when she has them on because they are so thick (especially the small ones), but they suit the need and I'm glad they have thick soles since she is constantly running around in fields and near streams where there are rocks, roots, and branches.  She runs around in them (much too fast for my comfort), managing to keep her feet spread apart enough not to trip over the boots and then she will stop and look down at them--I guess she must think they are cute too.  Because of the way that the shoes are molded it is hard for my 16 month old to put them on by herself (which is totally legit) and also difficult for her to pull them off by herself (yay!).
Well made.  My daughter is about an 8 now and I was nervous to get the 7-8 but it is not cut tightly and she can still fit a flannel or something underneath.
It's perfect for my daughter. I got the jacket slightly bigger than she is because I want her to grow into it. Very good material. She loves it.
My soon to be 2year old daughter looks adorable in this jacket. She loves it.

review_title: I wasn't impressed with any part of this - weird ...
review_body: I wasn't impressed with any part of this - weird fit, sleeves were huge, pockets were fake, fabric was meh...had to return them.
Great cute jacket. The sleeves are a bit too long for the fit, but that seems to be every jean jacket we tried on. It fits my 7-year-old great and she says it's comfy.
Perfect for my 9 year old, true to size and stylish but not stiff or uncomfortable. Perfect spring jacket that goes with everything at a great price

review_title: Jacket is nicely made with snap closures and small heart details
review_body: Purchased jacket as a gift. I hand painted several designs front and back with acrylic. Jacket is nicely made with snap closures and small heart details.
Looks great on my daughter

My 7 year old is a 7/8 and this fits her well. The arms are a bit long so I roll them just once, but that's good room to grow. I got the next size up first but it was way too big. Kept both because I know she'll just want another jean jacket when she out grows the smaller one.
I have three daughters and 2 of them had denim jackets like mine. My 3rd daughter was very excited to get a matching one. It Fits her perfectly and looks like it will last a long time.

review_title: Too big and fat for a kids hand
review_body: I got this for a 10-year old. It's a really fat watch - rather large for his small hands.
Grandson 10yrs received for Christmas and was excited to receive it.
My 8 year old son really loves this watch, so far no issues. It is a little difficult to figure out at first with so many features, but that is why I got it for him.

review_title: Nope...really cheap looking and feeling watch.
review_body: Really Cheap looking and feeling watch, even for my 8 year old.
My son loves his new watch, he thinks it's waterproof too but I told him now water will go near that watch. The style of watch makes he learn both ways of telling time, digital and analog.
Good size watch for my 6 yr old boy. Doesnt look big on his wrist

review_title: This watch is easy to read
review_body: I bought this watch for my son to teach him how to read a clock.  It has a digital time as well.  This watch is easy to read, easy to use and adjust, and looks great on.  I recommend this watch for its value.
didn't work but maybe a week.
Bought for our son and he loves it! He learned military time on his own from using it. He won't leave the house without it. And it's a plus that it is waterproof!

review_title: It was a replacement watch from another that we purchased that was just horrible!! We were very pleased
review_body: My son loves it and so do i!! It was a replacement watch from another that we purchased that was just horrible!! We were very pleased!

review_title: Cute Shoes, But Not for Fat Toddler Feet
review_body: Love these shoes! They were our little guys first pair of 'real' shoes, and so cute. They have a lot of grip on the bottom, but no so much that it gripped too much and he tripped (which has happened with other shoes). The velcro works great, and they are easy to clean - any mud brushes off, and they dried quickly after a puddle excursion. The only thing I haven't been thrilled with is that they got too tight quickly, but only because my little guy has fat feet - the length is still fine, his toes aren't touching the end of the shoe, but they are essentially too small for him now because I can't get the velcro over the top anymore. We've not had that issue with any other shoes in the same size/style, so that seems to be unique to Saucony. Bummer, because I would have liked to get another pair for this fall!

review_title: Do they have a toddler fit model?
review_body: My daughter has skinny feet (for a toddler) and the straps on these shoes didn't reach over the top of her feet. If they don't fit her, I can't imagine them fitting a child with chubby or wide feet.

My little one just turned 4 and this is her 3rd pair of Saucony sneakers. We love the fun colors they come in and they're comfortable too. Plus, the velcro strap is great for the kiddos who are starting to be more independent and want to put their shoes on by themselves. The only reason I deducted a star is because I wish the velcro strap was a little longer. For some odd reason, the strap never goes all the way across. It usually only reaches about half way across the foot. This has been the case with every pair. Other than that, they're great!

These sneakers are a cute shade of raspberry, a "pop" with her outfits. I did take a star off because #1 they're not exactly super flexible and #2 the strap doesn't go completely to the other side on one shoe but it does on the other. My daughter doesn't have chubby feet and maybe the shoes will stretch out with more use. She's worn them only a couple times so far. Her feet are currently just over size 5 and I bought the size 6.5 (mostly because they were cheaper than the size 6) and she doesn't seem to be tripping while walking/running. Hopefully I'll get more longevity with the bigger size. Overall, I would recommend these shoes.

Most of the sizing questions I had to guess at because my 16 month old was wearing the shoes, so I'm not sure if they were comfortable all day, if they had good arch support, etc.  He didn't cry when they were put on, he didn't fuss over wearing them, and he seemed to be able to walk/run well.  They held up through several "beatings" as my son is VERY hard on shoes, the quality seems sturdy, and they SEEM comfortable enough.  He has pretty wide feet and these seemed to fit him well, so I almost reviewed that they were somewhat wide, but really, they were perfect for him.  I haven't seen many kids his age with feet more narrow, so I'm thinking he's average - thus reporting these shoes as expected.

I have a very active toddler who runs, jumps, skips, twirls, climbs, dances... and she needs a shoe to do these things in that is comfortable, lightweight, supportive, and also cute! This is the perfect shoe! She can put them on herself thanks to the velcro. They are grippy enough on the bottom to safely climb on playground equipment, or walk on slick floors. They offer a lot of support and she can wear them all day without complaining. They also match a lot of her outfits. I will probably be buying these again in the next size when its time.

My 3.5 year old picked these out bc they're red.  He's pretty opinionated about anything that he wears - mind you, he rarely hesitates to put underwear on his head to get a reaction - and I was a little nervous about the velcro.  He loves these shoes, tho.  The 10.5 fit nearly perfectly, which in parent speak is never a good thing.  So those went back and thanks to Amazon's quick delivery the size 11's arrived 2 days later and will hopefully get us thru a few more months than the smaller size.

review_title: The velcro on these shoes is awesome. Other shoes that I've purchased for my son ...
review_body: The velcro on these shoes is awesome. Other shoes that I've purchased for my son give away after a little bit, but these shoes take a beating and hold up exceptionally well. My son is that kid that never stops moving. Constantly running and jumping everywhere. When I see pictures of him at daycare, he's just a blur because he's jumping NON STOP. Hoping to have an NBA player soon! But good shoes! Fantastic! My son loves them and always wants to put them on!

I've been wanting to buy these for a couple years now and I finally did when I couldn't find any good sales on my favorite kids' sneaker brand. Well, I now have a new favorite brand in Saucony. These shoes are super lightweight and flexible and look so adorable on. They are so easy for my 3 year old to put on himself. He measured a toddler 8.5, but I got a 9 and they fit well with a bit of room to grow. I highly recommend these sneakers.

review_title: Great quality sneaker, not quite a perfect fit
review_body: These are good quality sneakers, my son seems comfortable in them and always asks to wear his "blue shoes". They do run small, I'm glad I took note of the other reviews and ordered a size up. Despite being wide fit, the strap still does not reach all the way across when closed, however, at least he can get his foot in easily, which is often a problem with his chubby little feet!
My daughter had this exactly five weeks and the buckle broke off and the face is so scratched you can't read it. She was not rough with the watch at all. Very poor quality.

I purchased this for my nine year old.  She loves it.  The band is soft leather and she can put in on easily and take it off easily.  She chose the pink.  Timex is the best.  I think I had this exact watch only in grey when I was young.  This works well when she needs to be able to tell the time and there are no clocks around.  She has only had it for a few weeks.........so far so good.
The battery died after 2 months but the watch is still in good condition after daily wear. The numbers are easy to read. My 7 year old is learning to tell time and this watch is perfect for her.

review_title: Fits well on small wrists. Strap gets smelly.
review_body: I bought this watch - with pink strap - for my niece who is 9 years old. It is a very nice looking watch. She has skinny hands and it fits well. The indiglo back lighting is something she loves. I thought she would prefer a 5-minute numbering (like, 5, 10, 15 etc) that appears in some other watches. But she quickly learned to tell the time (multiplied or memorized, I don't know) on a glance. The numbers are readable. The only issue is the strap - it becomes smelly after it gets soaked in sweat once. She will not wear when she plays outside or on a hot day. To be fair, this is not a sports watch however I expected the kids watch should be a little more versatile , so I am taking one star off. If I could find a nice looking soft silicone strap, I would replace it.
Dainty, very pretty; yet also very easy to read.  I am so pleased.

review_title: First one lasted less than a year...but she likes it!
review_body: Bought this last year for a gift and 9 months later, the crystal is broken. Of course she loves it. So will buy again. But come on....if you are making them for a child, you would think the would "take a licking and keep on ticking". The seller said it was my problem. Bought it again and and 9 months later...it stopped. Looking for a different watch this time.

review_title: Real watch in a child size.
review_body: Watch is a gift for my daughter.
Granddaughter very happy with her watch.

a great little watch.  I'm a 50 odd year old woman, petite frame and I like my watches to fit loosely; this watch fits like a  regular ladies watch does, with two buckle holes to spare.  The dial is large enough for me to see it without my glasses and small enough to look feminine.  Indiglo is great, and all of this overshadows the fact that the band isn't genuine leather.  I agree with some of the other reviews, Amazon should change the description, however synthetic band or no, this watch is a great little watch and a good value.  It therefore deserves a five star rating.
for 8 year old granddaughter, perfect..
For 4 bulls you get what you pay for. Just a little happy like a gum ball gift for a quarter for a kid

review_title: My daughter has had this about 1 year. She's ...
review_body: My daughter has had this about 1 year.  She's closer to 6 years old and now has been choosing to wear it more often now.  It's decent quality for the price and fits her little wrist well.

This is exactly what I was looking for for my 5 year old granddaughter.  It's in her favorite colors and characters.  And with the digital time, will help her learn her numbers as well as keeping time.  Wonderful product!

I bought this watch for my 4 year old grand daughter who wanted a Frozen watch for her birthday. Even though she can't tell time she wears it all the time. She is tiny and it is small enough for her tiny wrist. It is well made
Bought it for a 6 year old and it's a little big for her tiny arms, but she loves it and it's helpful to teach her how to tell time.

review_title: It is a nice watch, looks exactly the same in person
review_body: It is a nice watch, looks exactly the same in person.  However, it is too big for my 5 year old's wrist.  She still wears it because she loves Frozen but I'll have to puncture a new hole myself so it will fit her right.  She is small for her age. It may fit other 5 year olds fine.

Bought this for my niece for Christmas.  She loves this watch!  Of course, she loves frozen and her favorite colors are pink and purple.  I see her wearing it all the time.  My only complaint is that it is too big for a 5 year old's wrist.  We had to poke out a new hole so that it fit her wrist and then the purple clasp things don't hold the strap in place very well (annoying for her).
Still going after three months of a seven year old wearing it constantly. She loves it.

review_title: She is a frozen fanatic and was thrilled to receive this beautiful watch. The display is perfect and the characters ...
review_body: I bought this watch last year for my daughter's 7th birthday. She is a frozen fanatic and was thrilled to receive this beautiful watch. The display is perfect and the characters are adorable! She still wears it a year later.

My daughter loved it! Easy to set the time, had to go way back in the memory of how to set it, but it wasnt that hard. The band was a little large for my 5 year old, but she is petite. Overall it was a great buy for the price.

review_title: I do love them because they are the correct color and are ...
review_body: I may be the only person who found these run huge - my daughter wears a size 11.5 sneaker and her tap shoes are also 11.5, I ordered the in 11, 12, and 13 and the 11's were an inch too big!!! So then I measured all three pairs to figure out the difference in sizing and the differences were discernible (for reference, the 11's measure around 7").  So anyway, I do love them because they are the correct color and are well constructed - I just need the right size!

review_title: These are great but runs too small
review_body: Read the reviews given here and I still went wrong.  I measured my daughter's feet with a tape measurer, and her feet are at 5 1/2 inches.  According to the sizing chart given by Amazon, that puts her shoe size at street size 7.  Some of the reviews here mentioned that these shoes are comparable to street sizes and is a true fit.  I went with those reviews and ordered a size 7 and it was too small.  However it seems like it almost fit, just needs to be a bit bigger, so I decided to go only half size up and ordered a 7 1/2.  It was still too small!

I have a TALL 2.5 year old with size 9 feet, but she's still got toddler feet, which can mean wide width and tall toe boxes - something not exactly popular in run 'o the mill ballet slippers. Rather than have to size up in another brand and have endless spare toe she can trip on, we found these in a wide width and they're FANTASTIC.

review_title: The shoes are great, but the sizing is definitely off
review_body: The shoes are great, but the sizing is definitely off. I read reviews to go up a size and go for wide, so I placed an order for a size 12.5 W. When I received them, they fit too loose on the sides and maybe a little too big. I reordered a 12.0 M. The shoe does have a lace to tighten up a bit, but it's still too loose. I can always save the first for later, or return if needed. Shipping was easy, and I have no complaints in terms of quality.

Daughter has danced since 3. She is 7. Always ordered and purchased one size bigger.ballet and tap shoes I have always gotten this brand and size larger. I ordered a pair in 2.5N she has very narrow feet but long toes. They came and they are huge on her like they look like they are made for wide feet very wide. We will keep and by recital I'm sure she will possibly fit in them. Off to purchase 1.5 .

review_title: Great shoes for the little ballerina!!!
review_body: I bought these shoes for my 5 1/2 year old. These were the shoes that were actually suggested by the dance school she attends. This is the 2nd pair we bought only because she grew out of the first pair. They hold up well, there were barely any marks on them. She wears them weekly to dance class and also wore them for the recital.  The string is able to be pulled to adjust the fit around the foot, however loose or snug you would like them to fit which is great so they don't gap when in use. They are suppose to fit snug. She wears a 10 in sneakers and the 9 1/2m in the capezio daisy ballet shoe is actually a tiny bit roomy but not too much since they are supposed to fit like a glove. There is a small name tag in each shoe so you can write your child's name. I would definitely recommend this product. My daughter has a high instep and these ballet shoes still fit her perfectly and are the same one's most of the kids in the class have.

My baby is an early walker and she needed something without a rubber sole. She loves these and being that they're leather they conform to your child's foot even when they grow a bit past their size. They stretch with them. They aren't stretchy though just after time they mold to the foot and so as they grow it grows with them. Sadly while they have held up great it's time to find rubber sole shoes for her but because of these they allowed her to walk around everywhere and become a walking master! And running and jumping and climbing lol. So these are great even not for ballet purposes.

I give it three because it is very cute. Apart from that my daughter complained alot about it hurting behind her foot. I thought she was just being her * complain about everything toddler self* until I realised that it was actually where as the fit is perfect when she uses it to dance there's alot of pressure added to the back of the feet. I think it's brought on by the way it's stitched in the back. Only used three times and I'll have to throw it away. Unless I can return it used 🤔

These are smaller than I expected. She usually wears  an 11 and I got a 12 but the back of each slipper left deep indents on my Granddaughter's heals. She only wore them for 30 minutes and now she doesn't want to wear them again. The front elastic is super long and had to tie them in a double knot so she wouldn't trip during ballet. I may be returning these.

review_title: I like that you can tighten them a little more with the adjustable strings on top of the shoe so that you can get a tighter fit
review_body: I have zero experience with ballet shoes. These shoes fit my 3 year old daughter very well and the sizing was just perfect. I like that you can tighten them a little more with the adjustable strings on top of the shoe so that you can get a tighter fit. I would definitely purchase these again.

review_title: Cute but Not practical to wear everyday
review_body: My daughter loves this watch, but she loves anything with Minnie Mouse. It is really comfortable and easy to wear for a 3 yr old. However when she washes her hands, the watch gets water in the face. She's worn it for a few days now and the plastic face has a few dents in it. She's not terribly rough with it, I'd hoped it would have held up better to child wear and tear.

review_title: Better for an older child as the buckle has two ...
review_body: Cute watch.  Better for an older child as the buckle has two loops to tuck the end of the band into that can simply fall off when not buckled.  My child lost both loops the first day.  She need Velcro.  Otherwise cute and worth the price.
Great color, works well! Fits my two year old great
Luv ml y mini mouse watch fits my 7.
I love this watch! Though I was sad when after only a small amount of time of my 6yr old wearing it that the white "seconds" numbers rubbed off! Other than that, great watch!
I got one of these for my grand-daughter and the crystal shattered. I replaced it with one exactly like it. Otherwise is ok.
Bought this watch for a present for my four year old niece, she seemed pleased with it!
Bezel, glass and face fell out of watch after two days.
Looks great and is handling our 5 year old just fine
DID NOT WORK AT ALL......DEFECTIVE...BLEW THE SURPRISE AS I WAS ON A STRICT TIME LINE FOR PARTY....VERY DISAPPOINTED...CHEAP!!

review_title: Well worth the price, classy appearance
review_body: It arrived promptly. My 11-year old granddaughter loved it. The hourly chime keeps coming back on after you turn it off. She's concerned it will do that in class. She may be accidentally resetting it while she's admiring the face. Lived the simplicity of directions for setup.

review_title: Easy to mess-up once programmed. Especially since it is for kids!
review_body: This watch is simple but not simple enough for my daughter to fix if she presses the wrong button.
nice bright light illumination, seems like it survives a day on the arm of a kid lol....

review_title: But adding in the several time screens and hard way to get the time/date set makes this not useful for a child and aggravating even for an adult
review_body: It’s a cute thought. But adding in the several time screens and hard way to get the time/date set makes this not useful for a child and aggravating even for an adult. Great concept if they would have stayed with one time screen and a stop watch. My daughter doesn’t even wear it, after I gave it to her the first day she said it was too complicated.

review_title: The purple band is fun and colorful
review_body: My 8 year old loves this watch. The purple band is fun and colorful. This has just the right number of features for her—she likes that it has the day of the week and the date and particularly enjoys changing the background color on the face of the watch.
great gift. great watch. perfect fit. long lasting battery.

review_title: It's great. It fits her hand
review_body: I bought this for my five-year-old. It's great. It fits her hand, and is clear and easy for her to see the numbers.

review_title: The color is her favorite. It is for her birthday
review_body: The watch is ideal for a little child learning to tell time. The color is her favorite. It is for her birthday. The numbers are easy to see and I look forward to future product reviews. Thank you

review_title: The other problem I have is that the buttons get pressed and bumped easily.
review_body: this watch is ok.  The strap is a silicone material and sticks to my wrist and gets sweaty.  The other problem I have is that the buttons get pressed and bumped easily.
This watch is great! Easy to use. My daughter loves it!
Absolutely love this jacket. It keeps my little princess warm and looks so cute. Would buy this over and over if I needed to.

Quality , size , and everything made this product to me a very satisfied customer.. I love Amazon, you fulfill all your commitments to me and when I need something I turn to Amazon first to make me a happy returning customer

It's a little big on my daughter, but I expected it to be larger so she can wear it for longer. She loves it! We live in North Dakota and so she needs a warm coat, this one is perfect without being super bulky
Bought This for my daughter she looks very cute in it and loves it Carhart is amazing

review_title: My daughter loves her coat. Not to mention the ...
review_body: My daughter loves her coat. Not to mention the Carhartt brand is really well made, so now she gets to match mommy and daddy!
Fabulous coat. Well made. runs a bit big.

I bought this for my almost 16 month old granddaughter. It does run a little large, but with the cuffed sleeves, it helps with the length in the arms. I tried it on her with just a short sleeved t-shirt, so with a sweater, sweat shirt, or a long sleeved shirt, that will take up some of the roominess. The hood is a little big and there is not a way to "secure" it around her head, but that's what hats and toboggans are for! The hood will just add extra warmth. :) The fleece lining is AWESOME! For the size comparison in the 2T and the 3T, and with it being 100% cotton, I opted for the 3T and she should be able to wear it next winter, too! She loved putting her little hands in the pockets! The first thing she did, was find a toy to put in one of the pockets. She loved it so much, that she didn't want to take it off! It's not too bulky and heavy, so it should do just fine in a car seat. Great coat for your little one!

review_title: It fits my friend Irene perfectly who is very very ...
review_body: It fits my friend Irene perfectly who is very very short and very very petite the size was womens medium. And she loves it.
Fit perfect and love the quality of Carhartt but with the look for a little girl.

review_title: It is so comfortable and warm for her
review_body: This fits my daughter perfectly. It is so comfortable and warm for her. I Would HIGHLY recommend it!

review_title: Thiswatch has been taken into a 3
review_body: I got this for my 7 year old after she learned to tell time and when I was teaching her how to be more responsible. There aren't very many quality watches for kids to pick from in a reasonable price range. I settled on this one because it's cute, the Timex name, the elastic strap, and the indiglo feature. This watch has been taken into a 3.5 foot pool for a couple of seconds, gotten wet in the shower for a short bit on 2 occasions, went through the wash cycle and dry cycle and it is still working with no problems! I was amazed! The seal has definitely been tested, although unintentionally, and it has stood up to our tests. I would recommend it if you need a good watch for the first time watch wearer. I do have 1 wish though. The watch needed to be sped up a couple of minutes every week, but it seemed to be more of a problem when we first got the watch. I'll keep an eye on its accuracy this week and will update this review accordingly.

This watch has a lot of great features for teaching time. And the elastic band is easy to adjust and snug enough to stay on during play but easy for my daughter to take off and put back on by herself when washing her hands, etc. My only regret is the minute numbers are too small to read easily, since the whole watch is sized to fit a little person. Not sure there's much they could do about that without making the watch too big. Note that this watch is designed to count how many minutes after the hour for the first 30 and then how many minutes before the next hour in the second half. If you prefer a more conventional watch that counts all the way from 0 to 60, Timex also offers that option. You just need to zoom in and carefully study the pictures of each watch.

It's OK.  The watch itself is great!  Easy to read, helpful for a child to learn how to tell time and the concept of 'how long is 10 minutes'.  The colors are bright and my grand daughter loves to wear it.  But....the band is worthless.  No matter how tight you pull it or how carefully you weave it through the little cinch loops, it does not hold.  20 minutes tops before everyone has to get on their hands and knees and look for it.  This is not rough play...this is a little 7 year old girl playing with her dolls inside the house.  Look for one with a real band that will buckle and actually fasten.

Love the elastic band feature so my daughter can slip it on and off easily.  This watch is a great learning watch, we wanted something with all the minute tick-marks and this watch was one of the few that had that feature at a good price and well-reviewed.  Very pretty for an everyday kids watch and not so frilly that she's gonna hate it with the next passing fad.

Lovely watch, able to fit a tiny wrist. My daughter really wanted this particular one because of the shade of pink. There's one thing I really dislike and didn't notice- the seconds doesn't go to 55, instead out counts 5,10,15,20,25,30.... then 25,20,15,10,5. Lovely concept  doing the PAST and TO, but not great when wanting to teach a 6 year old time with basic concepts. Just wish I had noticed before hand. Still a great watch.

This is really a cute watch for learning to tell time.  My granddaughter is 7 and I got this for her because it has all the necessary features for her to learn to tell time.  I originally bought her a digital watch but figures that it was better to learn on an analogue one.  The hour hand and the minute hands are clearly marked and even the 5-minute increments are marked.  I only wish they made this in a style for a little boy.  I bought the lizard

review_title: Strap broke within 3 uses. Timex will not replace
review_body: I purchased this watch for my daughter's sixth birthday. She wore it three times and the strap broke. There was a seam on the strap that just busted with very little wear and tear.

review_title: Better to get a watch with a larger dial and ...
review_body: Only took one star off for lack of any backlight feature.  Also the numbers are incredibly small, the outside minute markers are almost impossible to read.  Better to get a watch with a larger dial and bigger hour markers.

It's working, is the best thing I could say about this Timex watch, as a training tool, it's the best approach we could have taken. The Color arrangement is perfect for my daughter, she loves the looks and feel of the watch. The strait forward labeling on the arms is, readable and functional. My first watch was a Timex, so I was proud to give her this one.

review_title: Adorable, easy to read kids watch
review_body: This is a great analog watch for kids. It's comfortable, looks really cute, and is easy to read. The butterfly second-hand is a cute touch, and makes it look even more fun. The hands are color coded to match the colors of the hour and minute numbers, making it perfect for kids learning to read an analog clock. It's nicely sized, too, and doesn't look huge or bulky on small wrists. Overall, it's a really fun, adorable watch that works well and is easy to read. I recommend it!

Perfect quality for the price. It rains a lot in the east cost and my 3.5yo loves jumping in middle puddles (obviously). I couldn't stomach the idea of paying too much for the designer over priced pair everyone seems to own, but also didn't like the quality of the ones available at a lower price point.

review_title: Hands down BEST rain boots for toddlers!
review_body: I absolutely love these! This is the 3rd pair of rain boots I purchased for my 20 month old and they are the only ones I kept. They are the only ones my son can easily walk in. They are so lightweight, easy to get on and off, and they stay on my son's foot even though they are a size too big. They are also so easy to clean...just rinse them off and let them dry. I'm so happy I purchased them and would highly recommend...especially for really little kids who are still pretty new at walking. They are quite a bit more expensive than the other rain boots on the market, but they are worth every penny.

I needed a new pair of rain boots for my 7 year old son.  I wanted something he could easily slip on and off quickly and that were light weight.  Most rain boots sold in stores are so heavy and cumbersome and I knew his Croc sandles have always been his favorite since he was little, that these boots would be perfect.  They are super light weight with no thick sole.  They have super helpful handles that make pulling them on easy.  My boy prefers to run around the yard barefoot but with winter here I had to insist he wear shoes and these have been a good solution, I just need to make sure he wears socks with them otherwise they rub and hurt his feet.  I will definitely buy these again!

This is the third pair of crocs boots I have gotten for my boys and they are great! My boys love them and they are lightweight and just perfect! They definitely stand the test of time as my first pair has gone through two boys and are still holding on great!

review_title: These are great boots! Light enough for my toddler to run ...
review_body: These are great boots! Light enough for my toddler to run in, good traction,  and cleaning them off after they get muddy is simple. The handles make it easy to pull on, and obviously with no seams, there are no leaks and her feet stay dry. I'm very pleased with these, I just wish the pricing wasn't so drastically different for different colors, since I would have preferred the yellow ones, but they were almost twice the price!

We absolutely LOVE these boots! My daughter is not quite two and doesn't want to take them off! She loves that she can put them on herself like a big girl! We have had them for about two weeks now and NO BLISTERS! We live in Texas and it's already hot so her feet get a little sweaty in them but I rinse them out after each wear and they are good to go the morning. They are very lightweight and aren't bulky like the other rain boots I've looked at. My little one is on the thin side. She weighs 22lbs and is about 34" tall so I was not worried about her calves not fitting like some of the reviews I read. If your child has thicker legs, these probably would not be comfortable but they are perfect for us with room to spare! The pink color is so cute! She wears a size 5 in regular shoes so I ordered her a size 6 in these and (as I expected) they are roomy but not so big that she trips and stumbles in them. These are definitely worth the money!

review_title: I ordered a pair in blue and pink and they look absolutely adorable on my kids
review_body: These boots are so cute! I ordered a pair in cerulean blue and candy pink and they look absolutely adorable on my kids. They fit as expected and do a great job keeping little feet dry on rainy days. Be warned they are very stiff and would be hard to play in.

review_title: Super Cute, my Granddaughter loves her yellow boots
review_body: Super Cute, my Granddaughter loves her yellow boots. Jumping into puddles, kicking up and splashing around.  Great for me to just wipe out , they seem to get wet inside, but better then ruining her little shoes. Love the handles ,helps in putting them on. She is in size 6 I purchased a size 7 a little big but she needs to use socks because it is getting a little cold weather , plus her foot slides in easier. Life is grand with the little yellow boots.

review_title: Better than a traditional rain boot!
review_body: We are so excited for these rain boots! They are very light weight and easy for my toddler to walk in. We ordered one size up so they will last a bit and they stay on no problem. They hold up great when walking in the stream and even over small rocks. They are easy for my son to pull on and we do not have to worry about the straps breaking off like we do with regular rain boots. Best of all, his feet stayed dry! We will definitely buy Crocs rain boots from now on!

review_title: Great rain boot, order a size or two up
review_body: Really excellent for a rain boot. Sizes do run small due to narrow ankle. My daughter wears an 8, and I ordered a 10. She can get them on by herself easily, and there is some room to grow. No breathability, so her feet do sweat, but the best lightweight rain boot I have found and she loves to wear them. This is her second pair after growing out of the first (I ordered a 7 when she wore a 6 and it barely lasted the rainy season) and I intend to buy more as she grows!
Adorable. Perfect fit. XS fit my daughter who wears a 4t.

review_title: Perfect fit! Highly recommend over the stores denim jackets
review_body: I was looking for a denim jacket for 2.5 years old. In Stores, these are around ~$25 and when I saw on Amazon for $13 I thought to give it a try and surprisingly it is exactly what I needed and half of the price. It fits perfect though the sleeves are a bit longer. She usually folds the sleeves so it does not matter. Highly recommend it!
Order big because it seemed short in length and it was. Great jacket for the price.

review_title: Super cute, in my opinion it ran small for ...
review_body: Super cute, in my opinion it ran small for a 5t. My daughter was 4.5 when we got it and it was kinda tight.

review_title: Second one was perfect. I would say these jackets run small
review_body: First purchase was too small and had to be returned. Second one was perfect. I would say these jackets run small, so you may want to go one size up from your norm.

I bought this for small 6 year old who weighs 42 lbs. The sleeves are lil long but we roll them up 1-2. She will grow into just fine. The color is a great dark blue and the jacket washed well. Size/color combo was too good to pass.
The cutest little jean jacket! Bought as a gift and I believe it fits them well
Super cute on my 2yo for family maternity photos. Quality made, will wear a lot!

review_title: like other denim jackets but fits a bit big.
review_body: I got my little girl a 4T it fits like a 5. she's still growing into it and I bought it last spring.

We bought a children’s place Jean jacket for my daughter before this and we loved the quality so we wanted to buy again. This jacket met our expectations and then some! It has some stretch to it which is great for growing girls! Love it, it looks so cute!
Fast shipping! Great product!
Perfect kids watch. Fits my 7 year olds wrist perfect.
3yo wanted a watch like mine and Broncos (school) colors. Inexpensive toy from my perspective, and he gets to be like dad.
How do I contact the seller?  Can’t figure out how to program this thing!
Great watch. Way better quality the expected for the price. Would definitely buy again if needed
The straps don't last.

review_title: Nice-looking watch at a great price!
review_body: My grandson really liked this watch.
Exceeded expectations. Kid loves it!

Very disappointed in this watch.  I boght for my son and he loves it.  It says waterproof but it clearly isn’t, he wore it swimming and now it is all fogged up and he can’t see the screen.  I will be contacting Amazon about a refund or replacement.

This is the second watch we have bought for my son and it has stopped working properly within a few weeks.  Just after the return cut off, he told me it resets the time randomly, so he never knows if it is the right time.

these are our favorite sneakers for new walkers, toddlers and preschoolers. they fit well, wear well, hold up well, velcro is easy and come in a lot of color options. we just keep getting them in different sizes. this color was not my favorite we have gotten, much more sparkly silver than i was expecting, but other than that, they have been as good as all the other pairs we've purchased.

I've bought two pairs for my daughter. Her feet are not especially slender, and they aren't extra wide like my son's feet, so the strap fits over her foot fine. Also, she gets a lot of wear out of them and they fit her feet well. They aren't difficult to put on her feet, like some toddler shoes can be. The bottoms grip the ground well, but not too well. She usually picks these over her t-strap shoes. I'm about to purchase her third pair because she has finally outgrown her current pair, not because they are too worn, and she has been wearing this pair for several months, almost daily, including outside free play.

review_title: Sturdy and well-made shoe.  Holds its shape, even after a few months of solid use.
review_body: Wide and sturdy for my son who is still learning to put on shoes.  It holds its shape much better than other tennis shoes we've owned in the $20 range and the back of the shoe is still sturdy which makes it easy to put his feet in.  The velcro strap is well made and allows the shoe to easily be opened up when inserting the foot.

review_title: They are easy on and off
review_body: We have owned this same show 3 times over. As soon as my daughter out grows a pair, we buy another. They are easy on and off. They hold up well to a very rambunctious 3.5 year that plays on a mostly dirt playground at daycare. And they wash well in the washing machine on the gentle cycle. They really don't wear out. She just outgrows them. I would definitely get a darker color next time because the light purple does show wear and dirt a lot more quickly than the darker pink.

My 4 year old loves these shoes— he’s been wearing them for a couple years and basically won’t wear anything else. The first two pairs (blue and red) he wore until he outgrew them; the velcro never failed and only the rubber on the toe was deservingly beginning to give. Fantastic quality.

review_title: Why are so many defective in the box?!
review_body: These shoes are adorable. I bought them for my 3.5 year old and went with the suggestion to size up, however I shouldn’t have as the extra half-size ended up being too big. We’re going to keep them and just have some room to grow into.

These shoes are super cute! They run small compared to Striderite. My daughter wears a 4.5 in Striderite but I had to get a 5 for these shoes. My only complaint about these shoes is the the velacro doesn't close all the way when they are on. The strap is long enough that they stay closed but it looks like the shoes are too small

review_title: so I knew the quality would be good for my 4yr old
review_body: I had high hopes for these shoes.  I wear Sauconys regularly, so I knew the quality would be good for my 4yr old.  However, the Velcro on these shoes only went over half of his foot.  His feet aren't large and the length of the shoe fit perfectly.  On the upside, he said they were comfortable and he was able to put them on and take them off with no problems.  The quality is also a plus, and even though they don't Velcro all the way across, the Velcro lasted until he outgrew the shoes.

LOVE these shoes!! Son always gets complimented when he wears them. He’s 1.5 years old and didn’t have any trouble switch from Stride Rites to these. I did purchase a half a size larger since I wasn’t sure if the sizing. They didn’t seem too big. He’s had them for a few months now and they aren’t worn out...just a little dirty from playing in them.

review_title: The velcro strap needs to be pulled tight
review_body: These are super cute. The velcro strap needs to be pulled tight for it to wrap over completely. Luckily my son has narrow feet so it allows me to pull it over pretty tight but if his feet were any wider, I wouldn't be able to. The shoe would still be functional but it would look a little sloppy. I would probably still buy them though.
I like the clock part, and I would like the band also if it wasn't so darn STIFF!!

review_title: so I ordered another just like it. I like the watch
review_body: I had this same watch for about a year and it finally stopped working, so I ordered another just like it. I like the watch, but when my new one arrived, I was disappointed that it looked like it was a display. The little tag that gets pulled to make it start telling time wasn't there and the watch was already telling time. Who knows how long the battery will last! The light did not work in it, and the band was dirty. This really is a good watch if you can get one sent to you that is not a display model.
I love the watch.

review_title: I bought this at Christmas, it came in broken ...
review_body: I bought this at Christmas, it came in broken, the 2nd hand was stuck at 2 (it was not the battery, it wouldn't move). I returned the item, as my cost for a replacement. The band buckle on the strap broke the very first time she wore the watch.
Perfect watch for my elderly mother who has a wrist size smaller than a girls!
My daughter loves t!

Just a month after giving this to my daughter, it stopped.  I changed the battery, checked for any water damage.... it just stopped working.  My daughter is very disappointed.  I have always like Timex and was surprised that this was of such poor quality.
Excelent product.

Perfect watch for my granddaughter in first grade. Great quality. Very nice pink watch band. It is very easy for her to put on and take off. It has a second hand and it easy for her to learn to tell time.
Fits great easy to use

review_title: The watch is very cute and appropriate for a child that cannot tell time yet since it is digital My coworker's little girl loved
review_body: I ordered this for my co worker's little girl. It came on time. The watch is very cute and appropriate for a child that cannot tell time yet since it is digital
This watch is absolutely adorable!  I gave it to my daughter for Christmas and she loves having her Elsa and Anna watch. It keeps time beautifully and has been a great first watch for my 5-year-old.
Bought this as a casual gift for a friend's daughter. It looks so cheap that I decided not to give it even for a casual gift.

review_title: it doesn’t play music which my daughter would’ve loved. I’m disappointed but my daughter still likes
review_body: It’s cute but the description is wrong, it doesn’t play music which my daughter would’ve loved. I’m disappointed but my daughter still likes it

review_title: Nice watch for kids at an affordable price, a bit big for a 3-4 year old though.
review_body: We got 2 of these for my nieces birthday, and they loved it. The colors are nice as well as the quality and details of the art. I would recommend this product to others, but compare prices first as these products tend to be over priced.

review_title: Good purchase. I'm a happy grandma
review_body: I bought this as a gift for my 5 year old grandaughter. Of course she loved it. It's a nice sturdy watch. It's plasticy but  not as cheap as those  birthday favor watches I bought for her before. It was good for the price. I loved it

review_title: haven't had any of them long enough to comment on how long they will last but I can say that both little girls were very happy.
review_body: I ordered a ton of Disney Frozen items for Christmas for my two granddaughters, all were a big hit. haven't had any of them long enough to comment on how long they will last but I can say that both little girls were very happy.

review_title: Need a Gift that Never Gets Returned?
review_body: Such a wonderful gift!

Good quality.  Needed a few extra holes placed in the band for my 3 yr old niece to wear it, but after the holes were made it fits her perfectly and she loves havig her own watch “just like her mommy does”.  Thanks for the great gift!
One of my daughters favorite present for Christmas! It doesn't look cheaply made, tells the correct time, and the time is easy to read.

review_title: Not an accurate picture, but good shoe.
review_body: The only reason I took a star away from this rating was the fact that the black ones do NOT have the cute little daisy print on the inside. It's just a plain white material. I know that may seem a little picky, but if you are going to show the product, show it accurately, or note that it doesn't come with that design on the inside. That was actually one of the reasons I bought this one, outside of the price.

Capezio always offers a great quality product.  My only concern is that they do run a little tight as I had read in other reviews.  My daughter has wide feet though I did not have to purchase a wide width shoe.

I read reviews and ordered large. They are WAY to large. Took my daughter to a dance store to get the shoes instead. She wound up 1 size smaller then street size. The shoes were also constructed better then these. I asked the associate about the size variances that I noticed between colors. She mentioned it's not the colors, but where the shoes are manufactured that makes the size difference. Best advice... don't order these type of shoes online. It's worth the trip to get ones that fit the first time, for the same price.

All the reviews and sizing charts are so confusing. My daughter currently wears a size 13.5. According to Capezio's website, they suggested I order a 1.5 in this shoe. The shoe chart on Amazon was totally different (it said 12.5 was manufacturer size for US size. Being so confused by the contradictory reviews, I opted to order the suggested size from Capezio. They are way too big! Going to order a 13.5 and hope for the best! The shoe itself looks nice and my daughter loves the flower print inside.  BTW, ordered a pair of Bloch shoes in a size 1 and they are equally as big! Rating is only for confusing sizing issue. Will rate again after receiving correct size and daughter wearing them.

The cutest shoe ever! My 2 1/2  year old granddaughter has a lot of trouble with the fit of many regular shoes and ballet shoes because she has a very wide foot. These shoes fit perfectly. We bought her a wide...she loved them and was a hit at her Uncle's wedding. I will definitely buy her more pairs as she grows.

I like the shoes. They are good quality authentic ballet shoes. However, they are much smaller than a normal toddler shoe. Based on the reviews, I ordered the size my granddaughter wears in regular shoes. She literally could not get them on. I will now reorder in a larger size but I don’t know hou h larger to go. As these are just for dress-up it probably doesn’t matter if they are a little big. My advice to others is to order up.

I followed the sizing directions to a tee and they still were too small. I was dancer myself for over 20 years so I am very familiar with the sizing of dance shoes. These were way off when it comes to sizing. I had to send these back unfortunately and make a mad dash to Target to get a pair before classes started.

My daughter just grew out of her sz 7 stride rite shoes and we bought her some sz 8 street shoes  that are just a tad too big on her.  These sz 8 ballet shoes fit her just a bit snug, but they will do for now.  So I'd say they run about a full size small and to order up by one size.  They are good quality and my daughter loves them.

These ballet shoes are supposed to fit true to street shoe size, according to Capezio. I noticed a lot of other reviews on here said that the fit was consistent, but because I'm somewhat skeptical and because I wanted these to fit through the spring, I went ahead and ordered a half size up from my toddler's street shoe size. FWIW, she has just barely started wearing a 9 in regular shoes, so I went with a 9.5, thinking that would give a little extra room but they wouldn't be too big. Turns out they are pretty much exactly the size of her foot, so if she grows much over the course of her pre-ballet class, I'll have to buy a new pair. I know it seems like everyone ordering these is having a different result as far as fit, so who knows. I'm not returning mine because I don't want to bother with it, but I would have preferred a full size up for them to fit the way I hoped they would. Good luck!

My tiny, skinny little wisp of a girl was only able to wear this three times before the strap broke. I mention my girl is undersized to underscore the fact that this is a problem with the shoe, not the foot it.
Really like the Mackey mouse watch and the box it came in.my grandaughter will love it
After less than a month of use, battery is dead already. Was able to exchange it though so we’ll see how long the second one will last.
Loved it at first, but the outside numbers showing 5 minute increments, which is why I bought it, wore off within a week of her starting to wear it.  Cute watch, though.
Great gift for my grand daughter.  Love the packaging too !!
The winder fell off, could not be replaced.  Cute watch but useless.

review_title: Extremely nice looking for the price
review_body: Extremely nice looking for the price. However the words HOUR and MINUTE on the hands are extremely small. But a nice watch just the same.

My youngest grand daughter LOVED this!!!  And I was impressed with the quality also.  It is adorable for ages 5 to 8 I would say.. unless you have an older 'Minni-lover' ...it isn't an toy watch by any means. :)
Great Present
Poor quality watch, don't waste your time/money

review_title: Love it, and was really surprise for the prompt ...
review_body: Love it, and was really surprise for the prompt replacement, received one broken next day I had the new one that was great.
Daughter was looking for a digital watch to help with school. So far she really likes it. No issues. Very easy to program with the paper they sent with the watch.
Its not water proof. Stoped working after 1 weeks. Has water inside. What incnndo now?
My daughter loves this watch.
I'm 11 and bought this watch.  It's a really nice watch. I love how it changes colors. I can set timers, and it shows the date.  It's easy to set and use, and it comes with instructions.
very good

All my daughter wanted for Christmas was a purple watch. Nice kids watch. Most kids watches have a small digital display. This is definitely has more functions than we needed but unlike other reviews after about 5 minutes was able to figure out how to set the time and date and turn off the hourly chimes.

review_title: Perfect for our achool aged daughter
review_body: Perfect digital watch for our 8yr old to keep track of time at school
Not waterproof.Lasted 12 hours and one shower later its filled with water. I can't return it even though it says "free returns". My daughter is very disappointed.
Seems Good. Works well for my daughter
Great starter watch for kids.  Make sure to keep the instructions.  There are a lot of functions to program
Awesome jacket. Warm, cute, and super soft inside. My daughter loves it.

Excellent quality as you would expect from Carhartt. Perfect to keep my granddaughter warm during the winter months in Chicago. Would recommend to others and would purchase another size up when she outgrows this coat.
Great quality. Highly recommend. Bought in a size bigger for my daughter seeing how she grows so quick. Will last a few more winters.
Carhartt makes the best clothes. My toddler needed something warmer than her Carhartt hoodie now that it's almost winter. I got this coat two sizes up so she can wear it for a long time.
Love this jacket , kept my daughter very warm during the winter.. I will be buying another one this winter

Great coat. We love carhartt coats ourselves so we ordered this one for our daughter. Keeps her snug and warm. If you live in a colder area make sure you get another hat for under this coat. When the wind blows or she turn her head the hood part falls off. Problem solved with an extra hat.
Very heavy duty and a beautiful color!  My daughter loves it and it keeps her warm on cold days.
Thanks
great, warm and durable jacket!

review_title: Fits like a champ and my daughter absolutely loves to wear ...
review_body: Fits like a champ and my daughter absolutely loves to wear it. It's not to bulky and not to thin.

My daughter loves this. The watch is so cool with the starfish moving on the second hand, and the whole thing is the perfect size for a kid. Then there's the band. It's just right for kids! Adjustable, and elastic so it always fits and is super easy to put on and off.

This watch is perfect for my 4 year old preschooler who is learning to tell time. I have had no problems adjusting the watch to her small wrist. There may have been some design changes since some of the earlier reviews. I can get it tight and it stays on. It's cute and the numbers on the face are easy enough to read.

review_title: Not velcro as described - but love the strap as is
review_body: I bought this for my daughter for her fifth birthday. We have already started using it to teach her to tell time. I like that it has separate numbers for the minutes since she doesn't have the math skills yet to multiply by five. My only complaint I have is that the description is inaccurate: there is no velcro on the strap. However, I actually like the strap better the way it is than what was described.  The strap os a super stretchy elastic with a metal piece on the back that you use to adjust the length of the strap. I don't think my daughter would be able to adjust it very well herself, but we just set it to the right size for her, and the elastic band is nice and stretchy so she can just stretch it out to fit over her hand to take it on and off. Easy on and off was a huge buying factor for me because I didn't want to be have to help her with it every time.

review_title: I ordered thiswatch and the times hearts and butterflies and the my ...
review_body: I ordered this watch and the times hearts and butterflies and the my first timex watches for my 2 granddaughters and one grandson.  According to the descriptions all 3 watches were "indiglo" which was the reason for my order.  They were intrigued with my own Timex indiglo watch.  Well the other 2 were indiglo (you push a button and the background lights up - handy in the dark), but this one was not.  I just returned it and found the same watch that is definitely indiglo at Walmart.  Amazon is great about accepting items for return that are not as described.

review_title: I purchased thiswatch for my daughter to help her learn to tell ...
review_body: I purchased this watch for my daughter to help her learn to tell time and while I like that each thirty minute increment is divided into two different colors, she finds it very confusing that it goes from 30 minutes to 25. Not sure what the thought process was here but had I paid closer attention I would not have purchased it. Also, it is VERY small and the numbers are TINY.

review_title: Good...but a few things could be better...
review_body: The labeling on the hands has helped our 7 yo but I wish the numbering did not count down from the half hour. Also, the "boy scout belt" clip on the band is not easy for her to use. But in general she likes it and it has given her a reason to spend more time trying to tell time by analog display, which is the most important thing.

I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas so I can't comment yet on the longevity.  I thought it would be a good starter watch for her to learn to tell time since the schools no longer teach it.  Very cute.  I'm sure she'll love it.  I wish, however, that it had a normal watch band.

review_title: Helps Bring Class-work Into Real Life
review_body: I gave this to my daughter for her 7th birthday, as she was learning to tell time in school and I thought it was a great way for her to link the lesson to everyday life.  It's totally cute, comfy, and easy to use.  She LOVES telling time on it, and will often ask me how long until something (when is dinner going to be ready) just so she can watch the clock and check her watch and ride my back about it.  It has helped her become more aware of time, and time-keeping.  I particularly like that it's analog and not digital at all; I feel well-rounded kids can do both, kind of like being able to drive stick or automatic.  ;)  The band is stretchy and adjustable, and where my daughter is really thin it slips around her wrist a little, but it's not bad.  She's gotten it wet, lost it, left it outside, and it's still in great condition.  Par for the Timex "takes a lickin' and keeps on tickin'" course I guess.  Great product!  I can't wait to put a couple in my younger daughters' stockings for Christmas.

THIS WATCH TICKS REALLY FREAKIN' LOUD.  As in, can be heard over other ambient noises in a household setting.  My daughter complained it was keeping her awake at night, which I scoffed at, as she has either a portable fan-type heater or humidifier going in her bedroom every night.  But removing it to MY bedroom was a mistake, I had to get up at 2am to get it out of my room too. She isn't autistic or anything but she won't even wear it to school on days when she has to take tests because it distracts her too much.

The watch itself is OK so far.  We like the waterproof feature, and that it's indiglo.  I like the numbers for the minute hand, and I DO like the fact that they don't go up to 60, but rather after the half-past mark begin counting backwards so kids can actually learn what, "twenty to" "quarter to" etc. the hour means instead of only understanding how to read digital time.

LOVE these boots. I bought a pair for my 2 year old in the fall and they are by far the best rain boot we’ve owned. My favorite part is that there is no lining- the inside is the same material as the outside. So when they get completely muddy I wash them with soap and water and can dry them with a towel and they are ready to go! No waiting for the inside to dry out. The picture is after 6 months of almost daily wear (we live in the Pacific Northwest where it rains a lot!) and countless washings. They are awesome quality for the price. My older daughter just wore out her Hunter boots and so I bought her a pair of these. Half the price and just as good!
My son wore these twice before they ripped right down the side (see picture). I'm returning them and will purchase something different.

review_title: These are awesome! I love that it doesn’t have a lining
review_body: These are awesome! I love that it doesn’t have a lining. We live out in the country and wear boots outside everyday and are very hard of them and usually the lining in the boots comes out or they crack from being out in the heat too much. These have held up really well and still look new. Will definitely buy more!

review_title: I cannot recommend these highly enough
review_body: I love these boots! My 2 year old daughter could easily put them on and take them off all by herself.  They are lightweight and don't bother her or slow her down at all.

review_title: Bad product: no regular Crocs quality
review_body: Unfortunately, these seem to be made in a different factory from regular crocs. They are so flimsy that the first time my seven year old boy pulled them over his feet, the handles broke and also ripped the sides of the boots down around four inches.

I bought these for my three year old who loved them! He wore them for days and even asked to sleep and bathe in them, haha! My favorite part about them is how light weight they are... toddlers don't have the best coordination and some rainboots are quite heavy for their little legs. I can also report that after being used to splash in dirty rain water outside they were a breeze to clean. I ran them under hot bath water and added soap to wash them up and let them hang to dry. They were dry and ready to wear again the next day. Success!

review_title: Best pair of rain boots for young boys.
review_body: Second year in a row I have bought my son Croc rain boots. They are wide and easy to put on. They are also cozy which most rain boats are not. They are innately masculine which is difficult to find in rain boots for boys.  The thick handle also helps the little ones pull them on and they are a part of the boot so they don't rip off like some do.  Great boot, will buy again when he out grows this pair.  Love how I can throw them in the wash.  That helps as most little boys wear their rain boots to trudge through mud and creeks.

review_title: I would buy these again and again!
