review_body: My toddler adores these boots! She tries to wear them with everything. Super easy for her to put on and take off by herself. I would buy these for her over and over. Looked amazing in our puddle jumping photo shoot! Great color and lightweight too!

review_title: Lightweight and great fitting boots that we love
review_body: I purchased these for my kids because we already love crocs sandals and figured these would be a good fit. I bought my kids true sizes and they fit great. We love them and they are extremely lightweight and comfortable. They also love to play dress up in them and the range of bright solid colors are fun to match any raincoat. We got green and blue. The green is fun but the blue is especially nice. They are great unisex boots and will certainly last long enough to be handed down. I would get these again.

Lightweight, totally waterproof, fits my kid's feet well. Might fit a little smaller than his same-sized shoes, we did have to get thinner socks so he wouldn't have to go up a size in boots sooner than in shoes. Other rain boots that he had were really heavy, these are the best of the few different rainboots he's had in the last couple of years. Wish they weren't so expensive, but we like them so much that I'll keep buying them.
Great deal! So cute, and my three-year-old wants to wear it every day! Arrived quickly and in pristine condition. Love it
Well my daughter loves it and wears it with everything. Easy to clean, made to last, and fits great.

review_title: My daughter lost this exact jean jacket that we bought ...
review_body: My daughter lost this exact jean jacket that we bought from Childrens Place and this was the replacement; very stylish.
BUY THIS. It is so adorable and makes any outfit even cute. We get compliments all the time, people go crazy over how cute girls are in jean jackets.

The fit was perfect for my little one. If she was much taller in the torso it would have seemed a bit too short, though. The jacket arrived just in time for a wedding the following day. And the price was great, especially since I didn't have deal with going to a store at least 45 min away and then shopping with kids.

review_title: Nice, but would recommend buying 2 sizes up
review_body: Buy 2 sizes up of you want to have use it for longer time. Runs somewhat small.
Super cute!! Ordered a 5T for my almost 4yr old fits cute and she Will have room to grow. GREAT purchase.

review_title: Nice Jeans Jacket.........My daughter loving it.
review_body: I was bit hesitant to order it initially. My daughter is 2 years old, It just perfect fit to my daughter, she is loving it. Quality also good, worth buying it. It is inexpensive too. Just go for it.
Bought the jacket for my grandaughter, she looks absolutely adorable in it
Very nice and a must have for the fashionista toddlers LOL.
My 9 yr old loves this watch! He wanted both analog and digital and this fit the mold. Easy to set and easy to read. He uses the stopwatch tool often. Highly recommend for a busy 9 yr old!
My son loves this watch.
Though it is a couple of dollars more compared to similar products, it is a beautiful watch that kids love.
Way to big for a child
My 9 year old enjoyed the watch while it lasted. Quit working after 6 months of intermittent use.
I purchased this watch for my 13yo son. He really enjoys all of the features and says it is very comfortable to wear.

review_title: This was a beginners watch for our seven year old ...
review_body: This was a beginners watch for our seven year old. He loves it. Alarms work and helps him keep on track with school work and chores.

review_title: Well gave it to me step-son for his 11th birthday ...
review_body: Well gave it to me step-son for his 11th birthday. He states that it is hard to read. Part of the digital time was not working, you have to guess what the last number is?
cute watch for a boy
All ok

I love the shoe, I think the glitter makes the shoe very stiff though. And the tongue of the shoe slides while my daughter is wearing them. I would have liked to see the thicker tongue with his shoe. It's also easier for the toddler to grab and slide the shoe on. Overall I like it though, it definetly had that wow-glitter-fun-factor I was looking for!! I would buy this brand again but not the glittery style. Im keeping these pair because my daughter already saw them and there is no way she would let me return them! HA!

review_title: great shoe but sizing is off.
review_body: kiddo loves it... their favorite shoes currently.  very comfortable.  However, as noted by other reviewers, their sizing is off.  I needed to order a size 8 for my kiddo who currently wears 6.5 for most other shoes.  I did purposefully order an extra 1/2 size up to account for room to grow.  So probably need a full size up from other brands.

I have a 4 year old with autism who has a hard time with shoes.  First of all these are very easy to get on and off.  They are incredibly cute on and lightweight.  They are also very smooth on the inside without a lot of seams of scratchy places.  We will be buying more!

review_title: Not near as stylish in person as I thought they'd be....
review_body: These took on an odd shape as they came out of the box.  They are very bowed and large around the ankle area (where you insert your foot) and not even tightening the velcro strap can help that. It gives them the look of being a cheap shoe you'd find from Walmart in the early 90's.  The leather and soles are of course typical good Saucony quality, but they did not have a good shape to them like me and my husband's adult shoes. We will not be buying any more until they are regular lace-ups that I can try on him in the store (as I should have done first with these).  I saw some in our large local supermall (Woodland Hills, Tulsa) that looked good just at a glance, shaped much better than these. I should have spent the extra $15 on those.

My toddler loves them. I can tell because she always chooses to wear them over her other shoes. The velcro is strong enough that it stays closed, but easy enough for the kiddo to undo and take off herself (which is helpful, but tends to happen at inopportune times). The colors shown are accurate. I think I bought the 6.5. Once she outgrows it, I will buy another pair.

review_title: We bought this for a Christmas gift for our rough ...
review_body: We bought this for a Christmas gift for our rough and tumble, very active little grandson.  The shoes fit true to size and according to his parents, seem to be the only shoe out there that will hold up to all the activity this little guy will do in a day.  An added bonus is that they are very sharp looking too!

My son was born with bilateral clubfoot. He's been under the guidance of a medical team at Lurie Childrens hospital in Chicago since he was in utero, and now, every 3 months. Recently, he had custom Orthodics made by the Orthodics department. When I brought these shoes in for them to fit them to the orthodic, the medical doctors and orthotists were thrilled with what a quality show this is. To me, buying high quality shoes for myself and family is a no-brainer because we are only given one pair of feet. But the fact that the doctors were thrilled at the construction and awesome support of this shoe even without the inserts is something I want to share. This is our second pair of this shoe.

My 5yr old daughter loves it. She even gets complements from her classmates! I bought this becuase Ive owned a few pairs of  this brand and Ive never had any issues but lots of compliments. These colors go PERFECT with her school uniform. They got lots of other colors to choose from. The fit I would say is true to size.

review_title: These hold up well to an active 4-year-old
review_body: I bought these for my son, who is 4 and a half. He's normally pretty hard on shoes - I bought these and had them over-nighted after he all but destroyed his other ones!! He's had them for about a month now. They look great and seem to be holding up well with everyday wear, in spite of being owned by a very active boy.

Already on our second pair since he outgrew these cute little shoes.  These have such great stability for new walkers that the second we put them on our son he went from tottering to walking almost immediately  Our 1 year old had 20 pairs of shoes (yes we like shoes in this household) and these were by far his favorite.  He liked them so much that "shoe" was his very first word!!!.
Perfect gift !!!! Children today are so used to only seeing digital displays that this simple, basic skill of reading a standard (old-fashioned) watch is becoming extinct !!!!

review_title: Looks cute, but after only 4 months it has ...
review_body: Looks cute, but after only 4 months it has stopped keeping time. Hopefully it is only battery, but I would expect a new battery to last longer.

Needed to replace an old cheap pink watch and didn't realize how hard it would be to find a simple but good quality one.  This is perfect and extremely easy to read. Most women's watches have such tiny dials I can't read the time.  The band is very well made.  A really attractive inexpensive watch.

I've had the First Timex Watch for at least five years, so when it died after going through the wash and then salt spray from a kayak trip, I wanted the same model. This is just like the previous one except NO INDIGLO!!  I am sad about that as that was a nice feature, but I guess I can live without subtly checking the time in dark places. On my old watch I replaced the band about once a year but this pink one is long enough for my adult wrist.  The face is easy to read, and the pink second hand is a nice touch.  I hope this does as well.

review_title: OK But Won't Buy a Second One
review_body: This watch is average.  The face is easy to read and it fits my small (adult) wrist.  I found it difficult to set the time - pin was hard to pull out even by my husband.  Additionally, the band is cheaply made.  It already from only one wear is starting to show cracks in the leatherette.

Our 9-year old loves her watch!  At first, she said, "pink?" because she doesn't like to be TOO girly. But she LOVES the fit and look of it.  She's a size 7/8 in clothing, a little small for her age, but when she wears this watch on it's tightest hole, it fits perfectly.
Great first watch for our granddaughter. Easy to read.

review_title: Cute Timex for little girl to learn time
review_body: I bought this for my 6 year old granddaughter for kindergarten graduation gift. She loved it. Trying to learn how to tell time. And bought it because she needed a second hand to learn time instead if digital clock. She opened it at restaurant and put it on instantly. Feels proud of a big girl gift. I got one like this in 60's she younger. Cinderella watch. Still have mine to this day!! So when seeing hers it brought back memories.

Love this watch! As a female adult with small wrists, I wear it regularly because it fits great!. Loved its so much after I lost my first one; I ordered another to replace it. It keeps working through many hand washings and even harsh organic solvents in the chemistry lab. I have had watches that only last a month in the research lab setting, but this one stands the test of time (first one lasted over a year of regular wear before I lost it in the gym).

The top of my granddaughter's ( Who is nine years old) Christmas list was a watch, I purchased it from Amazon  and because  we had our family Christmas  early she opened it already and loved it...it looks great, fit perfect and I highly recommend it.
my daughter loves this watch
My daughter loves it, it's a simple digital watch nothing too crazy.
This was a gift for my niece Lizzie and she loved it.  If you are looking for a watch for a girl who loves Frozen, this is your perfect gift.  It is a wonderful first watch.

review_title: Bought it as a gift and the my niece loved it. great for gifting small girls and color ...
review_body: Bought it as a gift and the my niece loved it.  great for gifting small girls and color is as pretty as it looks in the picture
We had to return this.  It didn't work.Seemed like it had a faulty connection to the battery.
My granddaughter absolutely loved this watch.  I would recommend this seller to others.

review_title: My granddaughters loved these watches - I had to get multiple colors/versions ...
review_body: My granddaughters loved these watches - I had to get multiple colors/versions and the girls were very excited to receive them.

I ordered two of these for my daughters.  One is fine, the other doesn't work after a day of use.  These are cheap and I wouldn't waste your money.  Spend it on better quality.  Amazon was great in refunding me my money without sending them back, but 6 months later... neither of them work.
Broke the first time putting it on. Cheaply made strap. I was putting it on my daughter and was careful - but it fell apart. Wasted $10 because could not return. Very disappointed.
Excellent product in the correct time

review_title: Order your child’s street shoe size!
review_body: So I ordered this shoe a size up against my better judgement.  I figured since most reviews said they needed a bigger size.  Well that just isn’t so unless you are trying to get the slipper to fit well into the next dance year.  Ballet slippers are meant to fit like a glove.  You should order your child’s street shoe size.  I didn’t have time to return them so I headed to a dance store(40 minutes away) and the owner said the rule of thumb is to start with street shoe size and more often than not it is a great fit.  Sure enough my daughter wears a 13 and the 13 fit leaving her a little room to grow.
Edited- only negative on these is the color isn't a true pink.

review_title: Love that the width is adjustable via the tie
review_body: High-quality dance shoes. Love that the width is adjustable via the tie. Definitely size up one size. Took one star off for packaging - when I've purchased these in the past they arrived in the Capezio box (like you'd get them directly from a dance store), but this time they were just stuck in a plastic bag.

review_title: Great shoe. Not returnable... just FYI
review_body: Thanks to all the reviews we ordered a size up and they fit perfectly. WE love this item, but I wanted to share the info that even though it says that this item is eligible for free returns amazon told me they are NOT RETURNABLE. So just be aware of this. I ordered two sizes to make sure one fit and when I went to send it back and called customer support they said I could not return this item. I went back to review and it says nowhere that the item is not returnable. Additionally, I actually went through the order process again and it says "This item is eligible for free returns" So not an issue with the shoe or brand, but an issue nonetheless!

review_title: These are so small on my daughter and I purchased ...
review_body: These are so small on my daughter and I purchased a size bigger per reviews. When I went to return it, it said returns were not accepted! So now I have to buy these twice?!?

Sweet, quality shoes just like the Capezio I remember from my ballet days. However, I ordered these for my daughter's first ballet class, and I discovered that they ran very small. I bought her a 6.5 toddler size, and she typically wears size 6 (in things like Mary Janes and Saltwater sandals). I couldn't get it on her foot. So just order 1.5 sizes up (or more?) to achieve the right fit!

I wore Capezio back in the 60's. Not much has changed with the quality and fit however they seem wider than before. After reading the reviews we were concerned that the fit would be either too small or too large but we ordered her street shoe size and it fits just right. The Amazon seller has a good price HOWEVER be very careful about the shipping. It offers free but somehow I got charged 2 day for a ridiculous $26.45. I emailed the merchant and was told there was nothing they could do. Strangely the slippers arrived 10 days after purchase in a 2 day mailer- the unwanted shipping was promptly refunded. I would recommend the slippers and will buy again when my granddaughter outgrows these but will definitely keep a close watch on the shipping charges.

These slippers fit my daughter great, even though she has wide feet and a tall instep.  I followed the sizing instructions; she usually fits a size 3 and the 2.5W was a perfect fit.  They seem very high quality; I definitely recommend!
These shoes came dirty and used with another child's name written in each shoe. Absolutely disgusting.

review_title: Good news is that they will last a long time
review_body: Aren't as big as the other reviews stated. I ordered 1 size bigger for my 3.5 yr old and these slippers are big.Good news is that they will last a long time. I should have ordered a half size up. I think that would have been better. They still would have been a little big for growth but would have fit a bit better.
Perfect for little girls and can't beat the price.
A little bigger than I thought but my granddaughter still loved it.

review_title: The watch is better quality then I would expect at this price point
review_body: UPDATE:  The numbers on the bezel rubbed of just like others have commented.  Luckily our daughter is older and this is not an issue.
She loves it at 2 yrs old.  Wants it on wherever she goes. Feels special.
My granddaughter was happy with it so that's all that matters.
Watch is really pretty.  Very good for my six year old learning to read a clock. Different colors and words really help with the teaching.
Purchased for my 4 year old's bday.  She loves it and her big sister loves or so much she's adding it to her bday list!
So cute for the price.
Although we purchased this for our granddaughter for Christmas & haven't seen her response yet, we are pleased with it.

review_title: dont know if she'll like it.
review_body: For my grandniece, dont know if she'll like it.
Description as described. My 4 year old child loves her watch. Will purchase again
My 9 year old loves the watch.
Very pretty watch for my granddaughter. Easy to set up and use.

review_title: The watch was easy for my 9YO to use
review_body: The watch was easy for my 9YO to use, and she loved the features, but the strap buckle broke after three days and she nearly lost the watch.
Easy to use. Waterproof. My daughter loves it!

review_title: Looks great but a little big for a 5 year old
review_body: Gift for Christmas.  Looks great but a little big for a 5 year old.

My daughter loves this watch, which I am beyond thankful for because now we are actually on time to school. The vibration of the alarm wakes her up every time! And she loves being able to tell me what time it is, and how I am the one running late now not her.
great
Given for Easter but band broke within a month. :(
They look pretty solid but haven't given them to the kids yet.

Awesome jacket, quick delivery. My daughter loves it and looks so cute! The only thing is I wish the soft lining also lined the sleeves not just the hood and body of jacket. Regardless, it is a great jacket and I'm happy knowing my daughter will be warm this winter.
good product

review_title: but good quality and very cute and warm
review_body: Too small on hand openings, difficult to get on. Expensive jacket, but good quality and very cute and warm

My daughter is on the petite size, and this fits wonderfully (lots of layers underneath, we live in Minnesota). Amazing lining! I really love this jacket (matches her Carhartt bibs perfectly)! I do need to "spot treat" prior to washing, and thats fine! Excellent quality, exceeded my expectations! Will last forever!!
This jacket is $55 or more at stores. I bought it on Amazon for $18. It is warm, adorable and fits perfectly. The lining is very soft. Shipping was extremely fast.
i had purchased this for my 18 month old i got a 24 month so she can grow into it through winter. it is a nice heavyweight jacket great quality will be buying one for my 5 year old :)
Size was way to large, but well keep it for later...
My Granddaughter loved her new coat! It should keep her warm this year n next!
This jacket exceeds my expectations. My daughter was thrilled with the soft lining in the pockets.
Tough on the outside, snuggly on the inside. Great for fall weather in Chicago.

review_title: cute watch and great for learning time
review_body: I got this for my six year old as a way to reinforce the need to learn how to tell time. I was surprised with how large the watch seemed right out of the box but it is very easy to adjust the band to fit even the smallest wrist. The face is the perfect size for kids to see. The hands are labeled "minutes" and "hours" and of course the hours are marked around the face. The one complaint I have with the watch is that after you hit 30 on the minute labels, the minutes count down back down to zero so instead of saying "35 past the hour" they must read it as "25 til the next hour" -- not sure if this is the standard way of teaching time but we've had to adjust our thinking a little bit to help our 6 year old interpret the time after 30. Overall I am happy with the watch.

This is a cute watch for those beginning to learn to tell time.  My daughter loves the design.  It fits good on her small wrist (she is 7 and very slim).  The elastic feeds through a metal loop to allow for you to pull it tight, and she currently has it pulled tight enough that the elastic end has to be tucked under the entire length of the watch.  The band does get dirty very easily, but washes well too.  The only disappointment is that in the reviews there was a video of this watch and how the indiglo worked, but it doesn't actually have it.
I bought each of my kids one of these watches for Christmas. The strap is easy to adjust, and the watch face is easy to read. I took off a star because both watches arrived with dead batteries.

review_title: Lovely, well made and very useful for kids to learn
review_body: My daughter loves it! Cute, elastic band is comfortable and easy for her to put it on and tighten. I love the teacher part of it. Color coded, and with letters it makes teaching the time much easier. As other reviews said, zoom on the sphere to see how it looks, for this is not your typical watch. But that is the good part in my view.

I dont like how the minutes on the left half are labeled with minutes until the next hour instead of just the minute.  It was tricky explaining this to my daughter who is just learning how to tell what minute it is. Also,  maybe I'm old,  but it's almost too small to read.
My daughter loves it.But the battery stopped working after a few months.....I thought it would last at least a year.!!

Nice watch- perfect for kids and it's certainly helped my 6 year old tell the time. Not robust by any standards but should work well for our purpose. My gripe is they seem to sell older batches- the first I received did not keep time, presumably because the battery was weak. Thanks to the exchange policy I got a replacement which died after 3 months. Had the watch battery replaced for $10 in a local store but this was almost the price of the watch!

Santa put this watch in my 3rd grader's stocking and she immediately figured out how to tell time using a second hand. She spent the whole day on Christmas telling us what time it was! Now she can look at other clocks and also tell time. This is a handy little watch!

This was for my 3 year old and she loves it. I was a little disappointed that it doesn't have a clasp- only an elastic band that can be adjusted (not easily). The elastic band actually works well for my daughter because it's easy for her to put on and take off once I got it adjusted. The band colors and designs are not as clear/bright on the actual band but it's cute and she loves it. The face is plastic and we'll see about durability on a 3 year old.

This was a gift for my 7 yo niece, whom I was meeting for the very first time. She loved it. She wore the watch on the first day of her school and was very proud to show it off to her friends! I am not yet sure about it's durability, functionality or usability for a 7 year old kid, hence not giving it a full 5 stars. I will update this review in a few weeks after I know more from my niece or her mom.

My 2.5 year-old son loves these boots. He never wants to wear any other shoes. They are completely waterproof (although he does splash too hard and gets water in them anyway). They are easy for him to pull on and must be comfortable enough to wear on the wrong feet. :-) They are super easy to wash which was an unexpected bonus during potty training as they are really wide at the top and kept a lot of pee off of our carpet.

review_title: Runs big, but a great rain boot nonetheless
review_body: I had to exchange them for a smaller size even though I ordered based on the measurement chart. They were about 2 sizes too big. That being said, these are fantastic boots and exactly what I was looking for. Very low profile in the "heel" which is what drew me to these boots in the first place. I was surprised how hard it is to find rain boots without a lifted heal for young children! Each boot is made in one solid piece and no insert to be lost. They are wide at the toe like all Crocs fit, so they are perfect for layering socks but your child should still be able to pull them on and off independently. Very lightweight. Will definitely order again from this style if we need additional pairs.

These rain boots are super lightweight compared to other brands we've tried, but as other reviewers stated, they are really tight around the legs. My 2 year old is tall and skinny, and we can't really tuck his pants into them, even pegged!  If you had a girl who wore leggings, it would be no problem. In terms of shoe size, these fit the same as his Nikes. We are keeping them despite the tight fit on the legs because it's the only rain boots he can walk in comfortably!

My son is obsessed with the color yellow and these are bright yellow, fit great and seem durable.  I like that he (age 2) can put them on/ take them off.  I also like that the handles look durable and are built into the sides unlike the last pair we had that he broke the handles off of them as well as cracked the ankle area from wearing them so much and everywhere!  Hoping they'll hold up well for spring rainstorms, puddles, and lots of bending/jumping.

review_title: We love these so much we got more!
review_body: My 2 year old daughter loves these. They fit great and the quality is impressive. This is the 4th pair we have gotten because she loves them so much we keep getting the next size up as she grows. She always wears them with socks but we have never had issues with blisters or rubbing. They are easy to get on and off but don't slip off while walking. I highly recommend.

review_title: excellent waterproof well made comfy boot
review_body: Wow! what awesome boots! my son (3 yo) can put them on and off already and they are a little tighter at the calf so even though its a bit of a larger size than he wears they seem to work perfectly.  they wipe down clean with a rag and are totally waterproof! finally! a boot he can splash in the mud and muck and they won't crack or soak.  he even asks me to wipe them down so he can wear them inside.  he loves them!

Boots are adorable and well made. They run a little small so I would order a size or 2 up to make them easier to get those chubby little feet in them.  I ordered 2 pair for our twin granddaughters and they love them!  Their 18 mo. And can pull them on by themselves and want to wear them everywhere!!

These are darling, and fit a little big, just like most Crocs. This is a good feature though because they accommodate thicker socks and are easier to get on. My 18 month old can almost pull them on himself. He loves wearing them around the house and to school (ok, daycare) and thinks it's hilarious to splash in every puddle he sees. He can get himself and everyone around him soaking wet, but from the calf down is perfectly dry and warm.

After numerous pairs of rubber muck boots cracking after less than a year of use, I was looking for a muck boot that would last longer and not be super heavy or difficult to put on for my daughter. She has loved her pair and has been wearing them in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan this winter instead of her winter boots. We just got my 3 year old son a pair to replace his rubber boots that were all cracked. He thinks they're great and it's nice for him to be able to put his own boots on without help! My daughter's have worn well so far and I expect them to last for my son and our baby coming this spring when they're big enough to fit.

review_title: These are super light weight and are easy to put on and ...
review_body: A bit large on 5 yr old but it’s ok because it gives some room for growth. These are super light weight and are easy to put on and off and super easy to clean. Much better than the clunky, heavy rain boots with fabric lining on the inside that makes them a pain to clean and dry should they get dirty inside...which they do if used by a kid who plays outside in the dirt/mud. Daughter prefers these over her rubber boots because she can run and jump and move better in these.

review_title: Great quality, runs a little small, size up
review_body: I got a size 3T for my 1.5 year old. She is a little chunky but this size is only a little bit big on her. I would definitely size up! But besides that, super cute, good quality
Thank you so Much! My Granddaughter we so happy when she got it,I wanted to get her something special for receiving the honor roll at school. I'm so proud of her.the jacket
Bought this for eleven bucks so I'm not going to conplain too much. It's a good color, comfortable denim material. Good quality, pretty good fit. Just could be a little bit longer.

review_title: Perfect price for a Jean jacket that will fit her ...
review_body: Ordered 3T and it fit my long and lean 2.5 yr old perfectly with just a little length in the arms for her to grow a bit. Perfect price for a Jean jacket that will fit her for one season.
Great jacket for good price!! My daughters just turned 4 I got them both 4t fits great! True to size for sure! Great quality too! Highly recommend this!

review_title: My daughter is skinny for her age and size. ...
review_body: My daughter is skinny for her age and size. This jacket was almost tight on her. Won't work for us.
The small perfectly fit my skinny 6 year old who wears size 6. Picture was reflective of the actual jacket. I'm very happy with my purchase.
Cute jacket for her to wear this spring. It fit just as expected. Disappointed that it has no pockets though.

review_title: It was a great bargain. Great quality for the price
review_body: The material of the denim is not too light or too heavy.  It is of quality weight.
Disappointed. Button on arm was broken.
Great watch for my 9 year old, he loves it.  His wrists are small and it actually fits him!!
excellent
nice one
Very satisfied

review_title: nice watch for a kid too bad not clear instructions
review_body: wonderful product however the instructions are worthless
Buttons fell off within a few days.  Don't waste your money on this
Great watch for my 9 yr old until the face plate broke and wouldn’t snap back on.

review_title: Perfect size for his wrist and doesn’t look cheap
review_body: We gave this to our 6 year old as he said he was ready for a watch. Perfect size for his wrist and doesn’t look cheap. He loves it!
My 9yr old son LOVES his new watch!
This watch already does not work anymore after 3 months.  Replaced batter and no luck.  I would never buy this again.

This is our second pair of these shoes for our little boy.  The original ones were still in fairly good shape, but he just outgrew them.  In my experience, these shoes have held up much better than the Nike's we have gotten for him previously.  When he outgrows these, we will probably order another pair.

These are the best shoes for an active toddler. Not only do they look great, they also offer a nice cushion and design for more active toddlers. Most shoes have flat heals to toe while these are contoured for better ability to run and play. They are also very durable. They are also light compared to other shoes. My son outgrew his last pair and uses them all the time. They look almost brand new except the liner which is the only area that shoes wear. I will continue to purchase these as my son grows.

As other reviews noted.... Great looking shoe-fits well but definitely decided to go up an entire shoe size due to themrunning small. We maybe could have been ok with going up 1/2 a size but the full size was a safer bet and good for longer wear. My son is typically a 7.5 and we bought an ended up with an 8.5. Also the hook Velcro closure is great but sorta short to cover all the Velcro on the actual shoe

review_title: Other reviews said that these ran small and I'm so glad I ordered a size up because they definitely run ...
review_body: Bought these for my daughter. I didn't notice in the picture that they are sparkly, but they are sparkly and that thrills my daughter to no end.

review_title: ... daughter had these in the glitter purple version and loved them, so when it came to sizing up ...
review_body: My daughter had these in the glitter purple version and loved them, so when it came to sizing up she chose these again! Overall the shoe is very slightly narrow, but the only real issue is that the velcro strip doesn't close all the way across. The toe box seems adequately roomy, and my daughter is always telling me how comfortable these shoes are. They're well-made, have great support, and are fairly inexpensive (compared to, say, Pumas). I would absolutely recommend!

Ordered these for my very active 3 year old. I received these late September 30th. He wears these everyday it's now October 26. The front toe wrap on one of the shoes did come unglued but nothing a little superglue won't fix. I've washed twice (because of course 3 year olds have accidents) and the blue suede has kept its blue. I'm giving it 3 stars because I expected at least a couple months before something became unglued.

review_title: Looks great, fits a bit too snug.
review_body: This is a great looking, durable shoe, but beware, sizes run small! Definitely size up at least a half to one full size. If your kid has wide feet like mine does, it may not be the best option for an all day shoe, but the Velcro straps are adjustable and very sturdy. It will just start looking a little silly if you loosen them too much! I'd rate these higher if they were true to size and a little more flexible. The tread is nice, but not flexible enough to be a comfortable running shoe. My daughter uses these as her walking shoes.

I've been hesitant to pay more than $20 for a pair of shoes for my two-year old since he should only be in a pair for a hot second. However, after many attempts to find a pair of shoes that won't degrade during the short time he wears them AND a pair that fits and closes securely, I finally gave in and ordered these. I ordered a size 8 for my 2 year 4 month old son. They are a bit long in the toe, but narrow enough they hold on his feet well. They also close securely with the U-shaped hook-and-loop tab. He and I both love them. The bright color makes them easy to see, he can get them on and off on his own, and they are quality construction so I anticipate they will last the duration.

review_title: But my daughter loves them and finds them comfortable.
review_body: Really cute shoes but not as wide as expected. The last pair of Saucony's I got for my daughter were not the wide width and the top flap never reached all the way across the bottom velcro, so I thought I'd get the wide width next time. But it doesn't seem to make any difference. The flap still does not reach. But my daughter loves them and finds them comfortable.

review_title: adorable, good quality, but order up a size
review_body: i love these shoes for my daughter. they are good quality and adorable. the bottom has a lot of traction, she loves that she can climb up the slides at the park while wearing them. they run a whole size small though - she normally wears a 9 in carters shoes and she wears a 10 in these.

review_title: She was thrilled to have a big girl watch and enjoyed using the digital display to tell me what time ...
review_body: This was a Christmas gift for my four year old. She was thrilled to have a big girl watch and enjoyed using the digital display to tell me what time it was. It is well made and has held up to hours of rough play. I thought it was a little bit over priced but my child loved it.
So cute. My daughter loves it! We had to add an extra hole to make it tighter for the wrist width since her arms are so little.
My kiddo loves this item.
Nice looking watch, broke the first time worn. Don't waste your money!

review_title: Cheap as expected, band does not fit smaller wrists.
review_body: I bought this because it was cheap, so cannot complain about build quality.  Was disappointed by the band sizing -- I had to punch 3 additional holes in the band to fit my child.  Given the age group that adores Frozen, I would think small band sizing would have been a key part of the design.
my 4-year old daughter likes it, helps her to learn to read the time. after a few months still keeps good time and no problems so far.

review_title: she loved it at the time
review_body: purchased as a gift for my niece, she loved it at the time. But its been a few months and I havent seen her wear it even once since then. It was described well and price was great for watch. Just not used after purchase.
Three nieces and these watches meant instant hearing loss. They were ecstatic.

review_title: disney sofia watch has extra button lighting up the watch ...
review_body: disney sofia watch has extra button lighting up the watch case and came in a metal tin box. this is poorly made compared to sofia. also came in a cheap plastic package. already exchange to another one when it broke down in less than a week. 2nd one broke again...will return it this time.
Picture in back obscures the exceeding small LCDs to read the time.  But for a 5-year-old, it's OK.
My niece will love it bought it as a gift...

It was the perfect first watch for my nine year-old granddaughter. I have three granddaughters who all celebrating their ninth birthdays in a six-week period. The first was a hit; I'm certain the others will be as well.  The size and color were perfect for my little princess. The watch arrived on time and in perfect condition. We have come to know and recognize Timex for its functionality, durability and quality over the years. My very first watch was a Timex some fifty years ago; however, at that time, the only color available was black. I was pleased to present the updated color as a birthday gift.

review_title: A good price for her first watch and this one is ...
review_body: Granddaughter loves the watch.  The band is a bit stiff and her wrist is small so there is quite a bit of band outside the little loop.  A  good price for her first watch and this one is a little dressier so will be worn for church.

review_title: ... for myself a few days ago and I absolutely love it. I knew I wanted a watch with ...
review_body: I ordered this watch for myself a few days ago and I absolutely love it. I knew I wanted a watch with smaller face and band than most women's watches have. The face on this watch is less than an inch in diameter and the band fits my wrist comfortably with 4 holes to spare. I am 18, but have small wrists. It is a very cute and trendy color and doesn't look like a children's watch. I would recommend to people with smaller wrists who want something a little more dainty.
I bought this for my Granddaughter and she loves it. Perfect little watch.

review_title: NO INDIGLO! Does NOT light up like all previous versions.  Do NOT buy!
review_body: This was to replace an identical watch previously purchased on Amazon.  This one does NOT have the INDIGLO feature.  DO NOT BUY THIS WATCH!!  Since it was a gift I purchased it a few weeks early, then when we discovered it did not light up, I missed the 30 day window to return the watch by 4 days.
Fit my ten year old granddaughter perfectly. Very old school looking. She loved it.

I have and use this watch so when my granddaughter asked for one for her birthday, I ordered this one. It's actually sold as a "First Timex" probably only because the band is smaller than a regular adult size.  However, since I have smaller wrists, it suits me fine as well as my 12 yr. old granddaughter. It's an easy face to read and has the added benefit of having the "night light", which really does come in handy.  I highly recommend this Timex!
Very very cute! Dial is easy to read and the strap is easy to adjust. This is a bday gift for my 8 year old granddaughter and I’m sure she will love it.

review_title: Daughter loves it and is learning how to tell time
review_body: We received this watch within the timeframe indicated.  It appears as advertized and works well.  My daughter loves the way it looks and she can actually read the time by the timepieces's hands.  Her former watch was a Disney theme and had so much junk on the face it wasn't possible to read the watch with confidence.  We've had it for a couple of months now and she still loves it.  She likes the indiglo feature too.  I'm glad it is somewhat water resistant.  I'm hoping it will last at least a couple of years.

My 4-year-old currently wears a size 12M in New Balance, but she needed a size 13 & 1/2 N in these Capezio Ballet shoes.  The Narrow still seemed a bit wide when I first put them on her feet, but you can tighten the width of the shoes via the little bow strings.  Pull the strings until the slipper fits around the foot and then tie the bow into a double knot.  These ballet slippers are featured on my YouTube Channel:  "Back to School:  CUTEST Backpacks & Dance Shoes" on Shawna Who.

review_title: Great value! Fit is true to size!
review_body: My daughter hasn't actually danced in these yet, but I was so happy to find ballet slippers in a narrow width, since narrow kids shoes are very hard to find. I ordered six different sizes from 10-12.5, since the reviews were so mixed about the size, and we ended up with the size 11 Narrow. For us, the sizing is true to size, since my daughter is a size 11 in most other brands. Depending on the width of your child's foot, the sizing may be different for you, since we always have to have a snug fit because her feet are so skinny. Amazon offered free returns on these, so it was very helpful to be able to order multiple sizes and see what fit.

Ordered 8.5 but doesn't fit at all. I know they are supposed to be a snug fit, obviously, but when you can't even stretch it enough to fit there is something wrong with the size. I inquired about the sizing to see if was standard sizing and the response I got was "it's supposed to be a tight fit." No kidding. Tell me something I didn't already know.

My daughter shoe size is between 9,5 and 10, reading other people rewievs that they run small I got her two sizes to see which fits better 10,5 and 11,5 and I have to say that 11,5 was while to big even the size 10,5 was about 1/2 inch to big but her dance teacher said the 10,5 will work, so I can say they fit as the shoe size. The quality is really good i do love them and i see my daughter feels comfortable wearing them

I went to Capezio's site to see their sizing chart for this product, and it does say to order the shoes in normal street sizes. We just had my daughter's feet sized last weekend, so I felt confident ordering a size 12.5, as the shoe man told us she was between a 12 and a 12.5. When the shoes arrived, however, they were HUGE, at least a size too big. Thank goodness I have a Prime Membership so I was able to send them back for free, and the new shoes in a size 11.5 arrived in the mail two days later. These fit perfectly. I'm not sure what people are talking about with these being too small, but our experience was that they are about half size to a full size larger than street sizes.

Very nice quality ballet slippers. After reading the reviews, I ordered a larger size and they fit with a little room to grow which is exactly what I was looking for. My daughter is pushing a size 9 and barely in a 10. I ordered the 11s and it's perfect for her. Would recommend!

These ballet shoes fit well and are comfortable for my daughter. My only complaint, but it concerns almost all ballet shoes, is someone please figure out a way to keep them untying so frequently. My daughters ballet teacher is constantly getting requests during class from her 3 year old students to re-tie their ballet shoes for them. These are better than a pair we had in the past though.

Shoe is well made, good quality. My child wears a size 8 shoe, I ordered a 9M (regular width) & they fit perfect at this moment but she will probably grow out of them quickly so I suggest 1.5 sizes up from US shoe size if you want a little room to grow into them. Plus with the tie, you can tighten them if they are a little big. Also my child has wider feet. We generally go up a size because her foot is chunker so if this is true for your child, I suggest the wide width.

Good leather ballet shoe purchased for school program for the children to wear 'inside'. They're so snug we can't get the children to wear them long enough to stretch them out. They all complain that their feet hurt.

Shoe quality is good but I've had to exchange 3 of these to try and figure out size. The sizing chart is pretty ridiculous. I've just given up, returning the third one, and I'll buy them somewhere else.
kids love it
Granddaughter just love it!
Very nice, I buy it for my grand daughter
My daughter loves. She is learning to tell time

It is a pretty, sassy and delightful watch.  A child who has visited Disney World  or Disneyland would love this reminder of their magical moments during that visit.  I am a grown up and I wear this watch because it reminds me of the good times that I had at Disney.
nice

review_title: It was given as a gift and the child enjoyed it and liked it a lot
review_body: It was given as a gift and the child enjoyed it and liked it a lot. It came in a nice gift container and it looks very nice and of good quality material
Face glass cracked in half and paint chipping off within three days!
Gave this as a gift to someone. They liked it. It looks great in person.
My niece love it! It was a Valentine Present.

This is a really nice watch.  I bought two of them for twin 6 year old granddaughters.  The problem is, instructions are almost non existent.  No instructions came with the watches but I saw in an email from the seller a link for the instructions.  It said "page not found".  I then had to contact the seller to get instructions and when I finally got them, they were almost impossible to understand.  It has been a week now, and I still haven't figured out how to set them as what I'm seeing does not coincide with the watch.  If I could set them, I would have given them 5 stars but the watches serve no useful purpose now, as I had planned to teach them to tell time.
My 9-year-old granddaughter is very happy with it. Good quality.
A year later she still loves her watch.  She sets timers and keeps me on time.

review_title: Water proof.. she wares it in pool too..
review_body: My Kid loves it...
NOT WATERPROOF.  Watch filled with water in light water usage.  Watch is garbage!
Got it for 10 year old. watch is good but no manual found.

I'm giving this five stars because of the quality of the customer service.  The watch broke on the first day, and my little 5 year-old was so upset.  They quickly sent a replacement watch.  Super customer service.  In hindsight, I think it's a little too much watch for my 5 year-old, but for an older child, flashy and fun;-)

Bought for my daughter for her birthday. She is autistic and enjoys routines and time management. It fits her tiny wrist perfectly, and she loves the glowing face. The only complaint we've had is that it beeps hourly and we haven't been able to figure out how to make it stop without disabling the alarm as well. Overall though, a perfect product for what she needed it for
The grandkids love it.

review_title: Never thought I would buy Carhartt, but I did and would do it again!
review_body: Love that the jacket is longer than many and has fitted cuffs. My granddaughter likes the soft inside and the pockets. 3T was perfect for her even though she's a little on the small side.
Bought one for both of my girls.  They run a little big, but I would rather too big than too small.  They can wear them for a few years and I know they will last.  Good product for sure.
Excellent jacket!!!  Just a miniature version of my jacket with a hood.  I have always loved Carhartts.  This is a thick jacket that will block any wind.

review_title: The jacket fit just like I thought it would and she loves it
review_body: I ordered the jacket a size bigger than what my daughter is so that she would grow into it. The jacket fit just like I thought it would and she loves  it. The jacket also was shipped sooner than expected!
excellent quality great price
Adorable and fits perfectly. Warm and cozy, my 22 month old is in the 2T size, she loves it!
Great jacket

review_title: Very good quality and super cute
review_body: Very good quality and super cute! My daughter is wearing 18 month clothes but is about to switch to the next size. I ordered a 2T and it's very big on her. I'm hoping it will shrink a little when I wash it.
granddaughter loved this jacket, pink with soft lining and soft lining in pockets. very warm and cozy.  jacket does not run  large.
As advertised

Before I bought this watch, I was always arguing with my daughter that it was bedtime & she would never believe me.  (She's 3.)  Same "discussion" for lunch, dinner, bathtime, etc.  She does well with the time timer, where she can see the literal amount of time she has until the next activity, so I realized she might need something to make the concept of time more real to her.  So, I had the bright idea to buy her a watch and help her understand that when the little hand points to 8, it's bedtime.  Or 12 for lunchtime, etc.  And, guess what...it worked!  No more arguing for me.  the elastic is stretchy & comfortable for her.  She can wear it all day & all night if I let her.  It's durable & and a wonderful price for a first watch that's sure to get lost eventually.  The watch has a little green hand that says "hour" and a big purple hand that says "minutes".  This, of course, is useless to her since she can't read.  It also divides up the face in minutes 0-30 and 30-60 to help children understand "x minutes after" or "x minutes to."  But, as I said, we're not there yet.  Still, she loves her watch.  And now her 2 year old brother wants his own too.  It has made my life easier so I am happy to oblige.

My 3yr old daughter loves this watch. She sees that mommy wears one so she wanted one of her own. I was looking for a watch that was cute and not expensive, but also one that wouldn't break with her wearing it, and I def found that in this watch. She wears this watch every single day and since she is 3, it gets beat up. But not only does it still work, but the band is still in really good condition. She has had this watch for several months now and I can safely say it was well worth the money spent. The band is stretchy, very easily adjusted and is very secure and stays in place. I would highly recommend this watch to anyone looking for a watch for an active little girl.

This is a very nice watch, but it does have some disappointing feautres. The biggest problem is that the hash marks between the numbers and the small secondary numbers (i.e., 10, 25, 35 ...) are so small one can barely read them, so it'shard to tech my 5-yr old how to tell the time correctly, as far as a "teaching" watch goes. The second is that the wrist strap is elasticized, but has a cinch-tight metal loop mechanism that works on the underside, so it'shard for my 5-year old to tighten and loosen the strap properly - a more traditional buckle or other type of mechanism would work better. The third is that this watch has an INDIGLO feature, but it is much more dim than other TIMEX INDIGLO lights, and it's still hard to see the numbers when lit up - and the glo is purple, as are the numbers. My son has a sports ball version of this watch, which INDIGLOs in a bright yellow-green and really lights up and is easy to read. My little girl is disappointed in the dimness. However, the watch is nice and does what it says it will do.

This is such a great little watch - it's durable and lightweight, fun and easy for my 6 year old to put on her wrist. She loves that the second hand has little flowers on it that move when the hand moves. She has gotten it wet in the bath and it has been fine. She thinks it is awesome that she can push a button and it lights up at night. She feels good that she can tell me the time when I ask her and is learning what "quarter of 6" means, or "half past 3." I think these are valuable things to know that living in a digital age, we often overlook as being important for kids to learn. The only down side is that the face scratches easily. I wish Timex could make it more durable. I totally recommend this watch and am so happy we bought it. Her twin brother has the gecko/lizard version of this watch and it is fantastic as well.

review_title: She loves it and so do I
review_body: Super cute, but kind of small for my 9 yr old's wrist. Also, there's no 45 marking on the watch face, but two 15's, which was confusing to her and me when I told her to be in at 5:15 for dinner.  Other than that, it has made the days of yelling from my porch few and far between!

review_title: Fits well and my 5 year old finds it easy to read
review_body: Fits well and my 5 year old finds it easy to read. The only downside is she realizes when I am late now, and lets me know by how much.

After having bought the watch for my little one and observing her using it for a little over 3 months now, I feel comfortable writing this review. The watch simplified the teaching process for me as far as getting my child to know how to read a watch. The "To" and "Past" feature really helped. The size of the watch was also perfect for her small wrist and as another reviewer noted, the $10 replacement option provided by Timex was comforting. My only gripe with this watch is the strap that it ships with. I noticed that she has to be constantly adjusting the band in order to prevent the watch from falling off her wrist. I believe Joe, (other reviewer) also made mention of this.

review_title: Clock is great quality, watch can be too small.
review_body: I really like the clock that comes with this as it seems to be made really well but the watch that comes with the clock was too small for some kids to read and the velcro strap is too small/tight  for wearing. Also, I wished it came with more cards for practice so I wouldn't have to spend extra time making more cards.

I bought this watch for my 8 year old daughter about 2 months ago. She thinks that it is nice and pretty and likes how it displays the hours and minutes. She wanted me to give it a 4-star review because the wristband gets dirty very quickly. The shipping was fast and I feel like the price was appropriate.

review_title: cute but lags behind telling time
review_body: Very cute girls watch, I like the butterfly detail on the seconds hand so the butterfly goes around the watch. I returned and reordered because it does not keep the time, it gets behind more than 5min every day. The watch came with the battery running, hopefully that was the problem.

review_title: Holding up to everyday wearing and a rough boy!
review_body: Bought these to replace my 2yo sons worn out Western Cheif rain boots and I’m definitely happy with the purchase! He chose yellow (his favorite color) and they’re so bright and adorable. I bought a 10, he is wearing 9s and they fit with a little room to grow. I love that they are light and comfortable because they’re all that he wears. Seriously. They’re also tough and no insoles to be lost!! Which also makes them quick to dry out when he fills them up with water..... LOL. Overall I’m very satisfied and would (and probably will) buy again.

I could not imagine a better rain boot, honestly... These are not heavy like most toddler rain boots I found (those can be awkward for tots), are super easy for my 2.5 y/o to put on/off herself, the molded construction makes them highly effective and durable, and they are cute. They seem to fit pretty true to size, but i think they can be purchased a size up for longevity w/o being too large for a toddler to comfortably/safely walk around in.  My toddler wants to wear these all the time! I think these only cost me like $2 more than anything I found in stores, and I would have paid more for the difference in quality!

review_title: Too tight around the calf for baby legs
review_body: I have LOVED croc shoes for our kiddos and I was hoping these boots would get our 14 month old son through a winter in Washington State....however, they are REALLY difficult to get on his round baby feet/legs and are too tight around his calves (cannot tuck any pants inside the boots and the boots leave red constriction marks on his skin).  The toe to heel part fit fine, but the top/calf area is way to tight and it is struggle to get them on.  My son is pretty average sized for his age (he isn't huge or overly chubby) so I think these boots are poorly designed for baby legs.

review_title: Ordered the size 7 toddler & they fit just fine. I am contemplating ordering the size 8 though
review_body: My daughter was immediately excited about these boots. As other reviewers have said, they do run small. My daughter just recently started wearing size 6 shoes, she is 20 months old. Ordered the size 7 toddler & they fit just fine. I am contemplating ordering the size 8 though, so we can get more wear out of them. One problem: the "sea blue" appears kind of periwinkle in the photo on Amazon, and some reviews I read indicated that as well.  I was hopeful they would be. But I assure you, they are "royal blue" or "bright blue". I am not a person who needs their daughter to constantly wear pink, but they are a little too boy-ish blue for my hopes for her to wear them long term. I think I'll be ordering them in a size 8 in pink or yellow.

These are great boots! They fit as expected. And my kids both wear them. My 9yo son who I think has outgrown them finally and my now 6 yo is wearing them.  They are a sz 2 and she is like a 13 but seems fine wearing them and they are not too bulky for her. I would say these may run a tad to the small size so maybe sz up if your kid is in a half size or might outgrow them soon.

We bought a size up thanks to other reviews and they're perfect! I love that these are so lightweight  for my hazard prone 3yo. Cleaning them is a breeze too. She even had a potty training accident in them, filled them with pee...a good disinfectant and rinse, we were good to go again!

These are the CUTEST boots.  My daughter chose the yellow and I could not love them more.  Who would have thought that would be the case with boots from the company of the most popular ugly shoe on the market?!  My toddler has the other Croc rain boot style (without the handles) and I'm now considering getting her these instead.  They're easier to put on and more flexible, too.

My 2.5 yr old son has very wide feet from bottom to top.  As a result we have a lot of trouble finding shoes and especially boots that fit.  These fit him great and he loves that he can pull them on with the handles.  They aren't lined so I don't expect them to be super warm but they will be great for jumping in puddles.

review_title: I was worried seeing other reviews on these saying they were too tight & narrow as my son has extra wide feet but they fit him just fine! He’s not uncomfortable in them at all & ...
review_body: My son loves these shoes! I was worried seeing other reviews on these saying they were too tight & narrow as my son has extra wide feet but they fit him just fine! He’s not uncomfortable in them

review_title: Way too small through the ankle and calf.
review_body: Well, I learned that my 22 month old now knows how to say "Too tight!" The leg openings on these are TINY for chubby baby legs. If you have a taller, thinner kid (maybe a 3 year old?) maybe they'll work, but my tiny bigfoot could not get his feet into the narrow ankle opening, and when we did manage to get it on, it was super tight on his little calves. I even ordered a size up as recommended. NOPE.
looks good, very versatile!
Great quality jean jacket at a nice low price. My little one loved it
Brought this jacket for my daughter. She loves it!!!

It's a nice looking jacket, my daughter likes it a lot. I ordered a size up since most reviews suggested it and I'm glad I did. This jacket comes small so make sure you order a size bigger otherwise you may regret it. Overall it works and I recommend it.

I ordered this, paid the extra shipping and it arrived promptly!  I was thrilled with the quality and service.  The jacket is a great color and soft to the touch, so my Granddaughter loves it!  She wore it for a photo shoot and it was perfect!

review_title: Great quality and details on this jacket
review_body: Great quality and details on this jacket.  Lightweight and very comfortable for my daughter.  Love the little heart details on the buttons.
It fits true to size and it's really cute

This jacket is perfect. Bought it for my almost 3 year old. She is petite but based on a couple other reviews I ordered a 3T and I’m so glad I did. Sleeves are a tad long but I’d rather them slightly big than too small! Can’t go wrong with carters!

review_title: Guess they loved it as much as me
review_body: Had to order other someone stole my daughter jacket at school, smh 🤦‍♀️. Guess they loved it as much as me!

This jacket fits very true to size. My daughter normally wears a 6. I ordered a medium 7/8 so she could wear it a couple seasons. Since we knew it would be big on her, we rolled the sleeves up and it looks super cute.
Good. Wished it came in just analog to encourage his learning.
very cheap quality.  Broke within 2 days.  DOn't waste money.
Thank you!
We purchased these for our 7yr twin nephews to match their little cousins watch. They love it, wears it every day and they think they are grown little men!

review_title: We have had this for about 33 days and after ...
review_body: We have had this for about 33 days and after only two weeks it was definitely not waterproof as water was getting in the watch. Condensation and water continually gets inside the watch.
This is a great watch. Great size for kids and grownups alike. Exactly as pictured.

review_title: Good buy for a kid even an adult.
review_body: Several functions. Nice size. My nine year old loves it!
Watch stopped working properly soon after we got it. I need to return it.

review_title: My 12 year old son loves it! I bought ...
review_body: My 12 year old son loves it! I bought it for him for Christmas and it still works which is saying a lot for a product used by an active boy.
My son loves his watch! Perfect for a 7 year old.

review_title: Easy to put on & comfy! ...but tend to wear out relatively fast.
review_body: These are great shoes and were my son's favorite pair. He keeps asking me to get him another similar pair. They're easy for young kids (or disabled kids) to put on / take off and they're apparently very comfy too. They tend to wear out a bit faster than other shoes, but the price is right. I highly recommend these. We've purchased them twice now.

review_title: We’re on our 3rd pair... will continue to buy
review_body: I love this style of shoe for my son. They go on easily, fit well and stay on! (I’m a preschool teacher and so many styles of shoes frustratingly come off often)

I think this is the fourth or fifth time we've bought this brand and style for my boys and though I keep looking at others, we always come back to these. They can run around in them all day. They stay on, and last a long time. And my guys are rough on their shoes. By the time we need new ones, the velcro is coming loose, and the toes are totally scuffed, but the shoes have held together really well. The variety of colors also means my boys can find something they're happy with.

Great toddler shoes! My son is 2 and still really clumsy, so he needed shoes with good grips on the bottom. These are great and allow him to run and climb without falling! They are easy to get on/take off. They are a little big on him, but he has no issues walking/running in them.

review_title: Read the other reviews - these run VERY small
review_body: Wished I would have read the other reviews - the shoes are far too small, much smaller than a size 5 in a Stride Rite or Momo baby shoe - closer to a size 3.

review_title: from that I gather that they are comfortable. I cannot attest to the durability of this ...
review_body: My three year old son absolutely loves these shoes and doesn't want to take them off...from that I gather that they are comfortable.  I cannot attest to the durability of this pair of shoes as he hasn't worn them enough yet, however, his previous pair of Saucony Jazz sneakers held up very well!  He has worn them for almost a year and other than just a little bit of dirt they still look brand new, even after a couple of times through the washing machine! I would highly recommend these shoes...especially for the price and cuteness factor!

review_title: Don't Velcro quite as nicely as pictured
review_body: Very cute for my toddler. She has tall/fat feet, and at least they fit. Deducted a star because once on, the Velcro doesn't close as nicely as in the pictures. It's even worse with socks on, but I'd still recommend the shoes.

I bought these for my son because they were a great price on amazon in blue camo.  They were the first pair of shoes that my son wore every day when he learned to walk. He has a couple pairs of Jordans, which are harder to put on and some have laces, so we find these to be much more practical for every day use.  After wearing these for a few months, he's ready for the next size up.  Though these are in half sizes, so he probably could have been in the next half size up a month ago.  Now I will not hesitate to pay full price for these shoes if I can't find other size/color combinations on sale.

review_title: Very cute and happy with purchase
review_body: This is the first time I purchased this brand. I am normally a fan of stride rite shoes but it's been hard to find them for a decent price. I got these when Amazon had them 20% off and they were about $15 (a great deal)

these are our favorite sneakers for new walkers, toddlers and preschoolers. they fit well, wear well, hold up well, velcro is easy and come in a lot of color options. we just keep getting them in different sizes. this color is cute, very dark pink, liked the pop of blue.
Great granddaughter loved it!
Good watch for small child.  It's just a digital and very simple watch.  Sturdy straps and the kiddo loves frozen.
cheap
Packaged well. Looks just as advertised.

My daughter loves this Frozen watch, and because it's digital, she can actually use it to tell time (she's only 5). The band is made from thick plastic, which bothers my daughters skin if she wears it for too long (it rubs), but she's thrilled with it none the less.
When I received it it was broken...I couldn't set the time on it!

review_title: Poor quality-broken upon arrival and out of box
review_body: Both arrived out of box and one broken- we bought two! Not the quality we expect from Amazon... very disappointing.
Good Product.
My niece loved this. Great quality for the price.
Cheap like a 99cent store item.

review_title: Looks very good and no complains
review_body: So far, I have bought 3 of these for gifts. Looks very good and no complains..
My 12 year old granddaughter loves it.  She has small wrists and the band worked well for her.

I bought this for a little lady who is turning 7.  I wanted a sturdy but pretty watch for her and this Timex is perfect.  The dial is about dime size with each number clearly readable.  She is just learning how to tell time and needs all of the numbers visible.  The watch hands are bold black and it even has a second hand.  Band is pretty pink color and adjustable.  I think she will love it.

My daughter doesn't wear this every day so maybe that will help prolong it's life a bit.  I had read other reviews that didn't make it sound very durable.  It's pretty, cute, and girly.  The strap is a bit long though, I will say that.  Arrived on time.  Packaging could've been a little better, but it came undamaged.  Easy to read and she loves the light up feature.  Great first watch.  So far so good.

I bought this watch for my 7 year old girl to help her keep track of time. The watch is of great quality. Strap isn't real leather, but that doesn't matter because it is good quality. Easy for my girl to read and if you push the button it lights up.

I like this watch. Being a short woman with small hands and wrists, I was happy to find this product. I wish the strap or band was leather, but the price was inexpensive. I would pay more if the strap was made of leather, as the strap does not fit as well and turns to the side of my wrist. I readjust several times in a day. But again happy with price and quality of the watch itself.

Very good watch and I would definitely recommend it. As a woman with smaller wrists this kids' sized watch is not that much smaller than a regular women's watch. The size of this watch fit me perfectly and the face of the watch is a really good size as well. Another function that this watch has is that it also has a light up function when you press on the adjuster switch on the side (this function is great at night when you want to read the time but it is too dark out to read the time clearly).

review_title: No Battery Life. You are always having to buy new ones.
review_body: The battery dies within 6 months. I have bought 3 of these watches. The battery always dies within 6 months.

Cute watch! Definitely a beginner watch, fit my 8 year old nice nicely. It is a little rough at first and probably needs to be broken into or played with a bit before wearing. It is made with synthetic leather which is great for vegan kids. Nice present.

This was a gift for my 10 year old granddaughter and she loved it.  It was inexpensive but very pretty and pink.  She loves pink and I could not find anything like this in a local store so I went to Amazon and found just what I was looking for.

review_title: I ordered a 7 narrown hoping they would last a while and thinking it would have been better to order something too big than too small (my ...
review_body: they are really cute, but they are a little bit small. I ordered a 7 narrown hoping they would last a while and thinking it would have been better to order something too big than too small (my daughter wears a 6-6.5), but they fit perfectly right now.

Got this as the other half of the necessary footwear for my daughter's tap & ballet class. These slippers fit very well and stayed on throughout her instructional period, as well as the running around time before and after. She likes these well enough to wear during dress up and thus far they've held up well through everything. The construction is great, supple yet supportive. Will definitely be buying these again in a larger size as she grows.

I followed the suggested size for my toddler and ordered a size 8. They are very small. She wears a size 7 shoe. These were not eligible for return so I’m apparently out the money. Beware- you better order the perfect size or you’ll be stuck with shoes you cannot use.

review_title: Finding your fit can be tricky
review_body: I did order a half size bigger than my daughter normally wears to be sure it fit, but it was a bit too big. We decided to keep them to make sure they fit throughout the whole year. We have used this shoe since she was four and now she's eight and they are great shoes

You cannot beat the quality or price of Capezio. I will never buy another brand. I tried another brand to save a few dollars, and they fell apart within a few weeks. These arrived promptly and fit my six year old perfectly.

review_title: Order 1.5-2 sizes larger than street shoes
review_body: These are the best ballet shoes for kids. Two things:

Unfortunately, I bought these ballet shoes a bit too large for my daughter. Nonetheless, these ballet slippers are very flexible, somewhat breathable and made with strong material. There isn't much cushion inside the ballet shoes so they look and feel very flat. Cute little flower design inside the shoes for age appropriateness. The bottom of the shoe has a sort of gray fabric resistance and a loose-fitting strap across the top half of the foot. My daughter loves them better than the Hello Kitty shoes. I highly recommend.

review_title: Best thing about these ballet shoes is that they are ...
review_body: Best thing about these ballet shoes is that they are slip on.  My daughter is always the first to change her shoes because both her ballet and tap shoes are slip on.  They are also good quality too.

review_title: These are wonderful shoes! I followed the recommendations and ordered an ...
review_body: These are wonderful shoes!  I followed the recommendations and ordered an 8  for my 3 y.o who wears a size 7 street shoe, and a 12 for my 4.5 y.o. who wears a 10.5 street shoe. The 8 was a bit snug, not much room to grow ,and the 12 was perfect. I would go 1.5 sizes up if you want dance shoes to wear for the season. Fits just like a slipper, well made.

These are classic pink ballet shoes. My daughter wears a 10 in street shoes brands like Stride Rite and these fit great in a 10. She outgrew a 9.5 in her ballet shoes from another manufacturer reinforcing my assumption that these are true to size. In reading the reviews it appears that people buying smaller sizes (7,8) experienced the sizing issues but others with slightly older girls (4 and 5 year olds with bigger feet!) are finding them true to size. I bought an 11 just in case so I may return or keep in the hopes that she continues dancing. Great price and quick shipping.
Probably will not comfortably fit a small child's wrist.  Seven or eight years old would probably the minimum.
Our 3 year old loves this watch! Perfect for a kid.

review_title: My daughter has been asking for a watch for a long time so she can be like her daddy
review_body: Really cute! My daughter has been asking for a watch for a long time so she can be like her daddy. I know she'll love it!
came broken (hands wouldn't move) then the plate fell off!  my little girl still loves it because, Minnie Mouse
pretty good watch., got it for her birthday and love it.
A great first watch for little girls.  My four year old niece picked it out herself and loves it so much she insisted on sleeping with it the day it came in the mail.

I was looking for an inexpensive first watch, a learning watch, for my granddaughter's birthday. It appears to be good quality and comfortable for her to wear, and easy for her to read and understand.

review_title: I specifically liked that feature as it could help teach my niece ...
review_body: The numbers on the pink outer ring started wearing off on the first day and were completely gone by the second day. I specifically liked that feature as it could help teach my niece how to tell time!

I got this watch for my 7yo who already knows the basics of telling time.  It helps her to remember how to use the minute hand.  It is adorable and very comfortable for her to wear.  She has also learned to open and close the band without my help.
SHE LOVE IT.

review_title: Quality was better than I expected for what I paid
review_body: This was a gift for a family friend.  The watch was just what I was hoping for.  Quality was better than I expected for what I paid.
This watch worked great until my daughter went swimming with it.  It is definitely not waterproof.

review_title: there are better options out there find a different watch
review_body: Difficult to set. lasted a week and the clasp broke
This product got moisture inside within the first month.  It was supposed to be waterproof.
This 12 year old birthday girl loved this very much!!
My kids disliked them.  They had water leak after 1 month.

Ordered for my kid's trip to camp - thinking it was cheap but hey, she'll probably wear it a couple times and never again.  Received watch.  Took 1 hour to read the instructions and set the watch ("hardest watch to set I've ever seen" - husband).  This morning, changed the time.  So here I thought "hey no big deal, I'll return it and get a timex since it doesn't work and it has caused nothing but problems"... but no. No returns for this item.  So where I thought I was saving money, I was really just throwing money in the trash.  When I ordered the watch on my expensive Amazon Prime membership, it did not tell me at any point that it was not returnable (or I wouldn't have ordered).  I would not advise ordering this (unless I hated someone - then I would tell them to order it).
Ripped after x1 month of use.
Bought for granddaughter and she loves it.
Liked the color and quality.
It's ok. Just a bit disappointed at how light weight it is. I expected it to be the same quality as my son's carhartt, probably my fault. Fit was fine.

review_title: but with a growing kid that seems more like an advantage
review_body: Fit was slightly larger than expected, but with a growing kid that seems more like an advantage. I looked all over the place to find an actual coat (not sweater) in 6m size. This was basically all I found. I love their adult coats so I thought I'd give it a try. It didn't hurt that the amazon price was lower than in store either.
We were amazed at the quality of this jacket.  Every feature of an adult Carhartt jacket is included in this children's version.
What an awesome deal! Cute and warm. My daughter loved it
Seemed a little big, but that let us get more use out of it for our daughter

review_title: great quality. Runs just a tad bigger for size ...
review_body: So cute , great quality. Runs just a tad bigger for size indication but in our case we wanted room to grow. Love it !!

review_title: The only problem is this jacket is light pink and ...
review_body: The only problem is this jacket is light pink and it shows every stain and/or dirt your child may come in contact with.

review_title: Jacket was perfect fit for child
review_body: Jacket was perfect fit for child.  She is guaranteed to get at least two years out of it.  She loves the color.
very good
My granddaughter just loves her jacket. Fits well. Really warm. Fantastic for those cooler and/ or damp late fall/ early winter Maine days.

My daughter's lost both their watches. The band is not good for small children. My dad found one of their watches in the yard after running around playing. Suggest a latch that's adjustable. Loss of time and money. Also for children that are learning to tell time, the flower is in the way. Not a clear view of the minute hand.

review_title: Works great and holds up well
