Excellent product for the price. My daughter loves it.
My daughter has been asking for a watch and shows interest in telling time.

review_title: the fabric strap is quite comfortable, however
review_body: My daughter loves the watch; the fabric strap is quite comfortable, however, the buckle doesn't hold.  It is continually loosening & falling off.  Is there a catch that might be missing?  I noticed that the teeth on the buckle are straight.  I've had similar buckles which have bent teeth. That helps to keep the buckle in place.  This may be a manufacture flaw, perhaps.

review_title: Good (but not perfect) for a four-year-old
review_body: Our four-year-old likes to know what time it is and when things are going to happen, so we kept pointing out the hands on our kitchen clock, but she also wanted a reference when we were out of the house.  So we got this.  As a watch, it works quite well; she can read the numbers, and the butterfly going around (the second hand) is fun too.  The strap is actually too long for small wrists; tightening it was easy, but there's so much extra that she sometimes gets a little frustrated with it.  But I still think it was a better choice than any other kid's watch out there, and I'd buy it again.

I wanted an inexpensive watch for my 9 year old daughter and came across this one.  It looks nice and she loves it, but it is poor quality.  I was not expecting much for the price but it is barely a step above what one may find in a gumball machine.  She has had it only one week and I have had to reset the time several times and the band does not easily come off or adjust.  This watch will not last long but is a nice way to see how one's young child does with a watch before committing to a better one.  Hopefully it will last the few months until her birthday and I can replace it.  It can all be summed up by stating typical Chinese quality.

review_title: Great watch to learn to tell time
review_body: I bought this for my daughter who is learning to tell time.  The numbers are clear and learning to understand  the minutes is also clear.  After having this on for a couple of months now, I am proud to say she an tell time!!  I don't think I will ever buy her a digital watch because kids have it too easy with everything nowadays and sometimes its good to just use your brain and figure things out!

review_title: Great starter watch for kids, very comfortable.
review_body: My 9 yr old daughter loves this watch and wears it every day.  It is a soft band and adjustable.  If it's too long once it's tightened for a small wrist you can just cut off the extra and it doesn't fray at all..  It's been worn in the pool and still works fine.  The face has some scratches since it is plastic, but it's held up surprisingly well for a kids watch.

My daughter's wanted watches and we wanted them to be able to tell time on an analog clock....something that most teens and many adults we know do not know how to do. We love these and so do our girls!! I bought one for both my daughters for Christmas (age 6 and 9). Both can tell time with it like champs and I only had to explain how it worked once! The bands are comfortable and fully adjustable so they fit even my youngest securely! It is also soft enough that it doesn't bother my youngest daughter's eczema that is always an issue at her wrists :) My girls are excited still (5 months later) every time they get to tell somebody what time it is :) Everyone is very happy!

review_title: Great design for a kid's watch
review_body: This is by far the best kid's watch we have. It only has one dial (with no alarm) so the kids aren't always changing the time or accidentally turning on an alarm. The watch band is stretchy and adjustable so the kids can put the watch on and take it off all by themselves. The hour hand and the minute hand are clearly marked so it's easier for kids to tell the time. I would have given this 5 stars if the battery hadn't died in less than one month. The watch warranty does not cover the battery, so you need to factor that in to the cost.

review_title: it is easy to adjust and i love the elastic nature of ...
review_body: As lovely as this wristwatch is, i give it a 4 star because the numbering and the lettering is almost illegible. Its so tiny and hard to see. But overall the wristwatch was made well, it is easy to adjust and i love the elastic nature of the material which makes it easy to wear and take off. My daughter loved it and the packaging was nice.

The watch is a typically reliable Timex analog timepiece. The floral design is fairly appealing. I would have given that combination four stars if it weren't for the deficiencies with the band. First, the closing mechanism is the kind you find on some sports caps which require two hands for adjustments. This band requires that you take off the watch to change the size which is a hassle for anyone especially for children. That's bad enough but what makes it worse is that the closing mechanism is poorly made so it often doesn't lock properly. I would have returned this watch but didn't because my 8 year old lost it on the playground after taking it off for adjustments.

I think I'm going to have to return these. You can tell that they're good quality and will last. Unfortunately these were too tight around the ankles/lower calves for my 22 month old. I had even purchased a size up. He has pretty thick little legs, and after trying them on for only a few minutes he had pretty significant imprints around his lower legs and ankles. I could be wrong, but I don't think that's normal. He has wide, thick feet, but I actually think there was plenty of room for his foot. Just too tight around his legs.

Best thing I’ve bought my child! Normal rain boots were too heavy and this are so light and perfect for him to move in! He’s worn them through the winter and now in summer and wears them almost every day. Very durable and comfortable!

AWESOME. We had Hatleys before which were super cute but these are waaaaay better for half the price.  Lightweight so she doesn’t trip and they spray clean inside and out. Seem to run a bit small, my 2yo is size 6 so I bought 7s for the summer and they don’t have much room left so size up extra.

We've only had them a week, so I cannot speak to their longevity yet, but I expect they will last a long time judging from the feel of them. I will update if they prove to be anything less that I would expect.

These are a great bright grass green! The boots are very light, but the foam is insulative enough to use these straight into late fall. The soles are easily punctured by nails, so be warry of where they're worn if a soft sole won't be safe for the type of debris, etc...  These are our 3rd pair and worth the money.

review_title: ... my young toddler who is not shy about her love for these boots
review_body: I bought these for my young toddler who is not shy about her love for these boots. It helps that she's been into Dora lately, and Dora happens to have a boot-wearing monkey friend named Boots. The boots are narrower than average, but they DO.NOT.FALL.OFF!!! As a parent, I consider this a win. I know she finds them comfortable because she never wants to take them off, and they are extremely lightweight. I love how easy they are to clean (I throw them in the wash just like any other Crocs). I would definitely recommend!!!

review_title: They are super lightweight and easy to Get on
review_body: I bought these thinking they would be for those wet weather days to play in puddles. My daughter decided differently- it's basically the only shoes she will wear. They are cute and we get a ton of compliments (although I'd rather her be in sneakers). They are super lightweight and easy to

My son is 2 1/2 and he wears an 8 in Stride Rites but his left foot is half a size smaller than the right. I ordered up because I thought if they were a little big he could grow into them as well as reading about others who sized up. This was not he case for us so ended up ordering the size 8.

My tall/hefty 80lb 6 yr old boy who wears a size 3/4 in regular shoes can fit in these rain boots just fine with some toe wiggle room to spare. I was hesitant that his thicker legs would be a problem with the narrow opening, however it was not a problem at all. He loves his Croc boots and I do too.

review_title: it has descent fit n will b able to wear for a couple yr esp With the quality of Crocs is supposed to be good.
review_body: Very cute! since everybody was recommending one size up, i ordered two size up. But since the shin part is relatively narrow, it fits him well. Sole part is still so big, but it doesnt really have an arch shape, it has descent fit n will b able to wear for a couple yr esp With the quality of Crocs is supposed to be good.
Beautiful jacket, daughter was thrilled and loves it!
High quality. Soft. My daughter loves it!

review_title: My daughter is usually a size 6x but I bought a size 7/8 and I'm glad I did it fits like a 6x
review_body: Such a cute and well made jacket! My daughter is usually a size 6x but I bought a size 7/8 and I'm glad I did it fits like a 6x. Still the jacket is awesome and worth more than what I paid
SO adorable on my daughter and fit so well!
My daughter got this as a gift and loves it.. The fit was perfect and the little bit of stretch to the fabric adds to the comfort when wearing it.
It is okay. I bought a size up for my 7year and 5 year old kids so that they can wear it a little longer.
My daughter loves this jacket. It fits her perfectly and after 8 months we have had NO issues with this.
Really good quality and very cute especially for the price
My daughter loved it. Super cute and fits great.
Very good quality
My 7 year old Grandson loves it!!!  He wears it all the time!!

review_title: But loves having a watch like his dad
review_body: Bought it for my 4 year old grandson.  Needs to grow into it.  But loves having a watch like his dad.
My son loves it!
My 12 year old son loves this watch. Tested it in the water and it still works.
Affordable watch & quick international delivery. Easy instructions & set up for 10 y/o recipient
The time was't right and keep change to 12:00 all time
Cool watch- Good size for a 10 yr old boy. My son loves it!
It's a really nice watch...the face is just a bit big for my 6 year old.

review_title: A nice watch for the price
review_body: Button to stop watch/timer fell off after 3 days of wear.  A nice watch for the price, but was hoping it would last a little longer after the holiday.
Gave as a present.  Grandson was very pleaqsed with it.

I had bough these for my older child and they worked out so well I bought a pair for my younger child as well. They enjoy wearing them and will choose them over their crocs to go outside and run around. They seem to fit well and I'm happy with the width. They didn't fit loose so no worries about twisting an ankle or slipping off in the back. The one downside is the suede accents can get dull. But my kids are pretty rough on their footwear.

review_title: I was drawn to the adorable colors and the visual appeal
review_body: This is the second pair of Saucony Athletic shoes that we have purchased for our son.  Initially, I was drawn to the adorable colors and the visual appeal.  Beyond that however, these shoes hold up when being worn by a rugged toddler.  The soles are flexible enough for easy active movement.  The stitching holds together very well, and after months of wear, there is no indication that any holes or unraveling is occurring.  What we love the most however, is that these are very quick and easy to put on with the Velcro strap.  They provide a bit of independence and are good "training" shoes because they are so easy to manage, that kids are able to put them on all by themselves.  Win-win!

review_title: Perfect shoe for wide footed kids!!
review_body: This is the perfect shoe for boys with wide feet - this is the 2nd pair I have purchased for my two year old son.  The shoe is Sturdy and cute and my son is learning to take the shoe on and off with the velcro strap.  I will keep buying these as my kid grows for sure it is hard to find good wide kids shoes.

Love love these! We've had the hardest time trying to find a good pair of tennis shoes. 😕 Ordered half size up and theyre perfect for our super active 4 year old. She calls them her "super fast" shoes! I see what people are referring to regarding the velcro not going all the way across, but the velcro stays closed, so it doesn't bother us at all. Will order every time she grows out of them. Perfect shoe for playschool and activities that require a lot of walking/running. Love them!

review_title: Easy to adjust for maximum support and best fit
review_body: These are supportive shoes, I've been getting them for my narrow-footed daughter for several years.  Easy to adjust for maximum support and best fit.  She never trips in them, and they hold up well.  The suede gets filthy in the playground, so they will likely end up so dirty that you wouldn't want to re-use them, esp. in lighter colors.  This color combo is gorgeous.

review_title: Less flexible than I would like and not for wider feet
review_body: I think these shoes are very attractive and they are light so great for active kids that like to jump climb and play. However I am not impressed with the flexibility. I may need more time for my son to wear them in, but we have other shoes that are much more bendable than these. I especially like keens and Osh Kosh shoes for there flexible nature and velcro features.

These shoes are really cute. We get compliments on them all the time. The hot pink color in the picture is very accurate, they are vibrant and fun. I love that they don't have any goofy cartoon characters or garish logos on them.

review_title: Fun, lightweight sneakers with style. Needs more sizes.
review_body: These sneakers have great style and have held up well so far. Our son is really tough on his shoes (constantly dragging his feet!). He has an easy time putting them on and taking them off though they were a little stiff at first. They are nice and lightweight, which may help with the feet dragging! Like previous reviewers have said, the velcro strap could be a little longer. Wish they came in larger sizes! I ordered the little kid 12, but knew I wouldn't be able to size up.

review_title: Overall very disappointed but the style is cute and my son likes ...
review_body: The toe guard came off two days in use. In the 1.5 months of wear they have continued to fall apart. I didn't necessarily expect them to last forever but they are much more cheaply made then Saucony that I have purchased prior. Overall very disappointed but the style is cute and my son likes them - hence two stars instead of one.

review_title: my little girl is in love!!
review_body: my daughter loves these!! she got so mad at first when she had to take them off:)  also, my hubs thinks they're super cute too, which is so much fun.  They are super easy to take on and off.  logo is holding up.  and with the various colors, they match lots of things.  great for the playground and running around outside:)

I receive this watch battery dead, have to go to jewelry counter. Took 20 minutes to open it and replace battery and this is an experienced watch repair. Also cost me another $6.50 for battery. Very disappointed, but my nephew wanted it, I had no choice you do.
Daughter loves it, but it smells like toxic plastics. it has been over a week and still smells strongly!
Bought it as a birthday gift for my daughter. The buckle fell off as soon as we opened the package. Shoddy quality. Amazon has better quality kids watches for the same price..

review_title: I liked it because it is digital and she knows some ...
review_body: I got this for a little girl I babysit for her 4th birthday. I liked it because it is digital and she knows some numbers. She loved it and didn't take it off for about 2 weeks. However, it never actually had the right time and after countless attempts by her father and I, we gave up trying to set it. Maybe there were some directions we accidentally threw away...

Just got this for our daughter for Christmas and she loved it.  It literally died yesterday (three weeks later).  Not sure if it's the battery or if the watch is just junky.  Will update as I find out.

review_title: We bought this for our 4 yr old daughter so ...
review_body: We bought this for our 4 yr old daughter so she could start to tell time. She loves it. It was a tiny bit big on her but it seems to be in decent condition.
kid loved the watch; very sturdy and extremely cute
This is perfect for a little girl and it's very pretty
This was a gift for my 4 year old granddaughter.  She loves it, but is a little big for her little wrist; she has a very small bone structure.  Made extra hole to make it fit a little better.
Great gift for that little girl that loves Frozen.

review_title: This is an excellent first watch for that little girl in your life
review_body: This is an excellent first watch for that little girl in your life.  I have purchased this watch for all three of my granddaughters and all three love them.  The dial is easy to read and the band accommodates small to medium wrist sizes.  Best of all is the price.  If they lose it or break it, no big loss!

review_title: Brought for my granddaughter. She likes it. She ...
review_body: Brought for my granddaughter.  She likes it.  She is surprised that she can take baths in it and it still works.  I told her it is not for taking a bath.  She continues to take a bath without taking it off. Not sure how long it will hold up.  Oh well.  She is 8 years old and I will not buy her another until she is older.

After trying out a digital watch, we were frustrated because it was so difficult to change the time after Daylight Saving time.  I decided we wanted to get our little girl a tried and true Timex.  It is easy to read the time, very adjustable size wise and she thinks it is cool that it lights up in the dark when she presses the dial.  Great purchase and she was thrilled to find it in her Easter basket.

Cute watch for my 7 year old daughter. Received it only a week ago so we'll see how it holds up.  I am pretty bummed though that like others mentioned that it is not indiglo as the watch it self and description says it is!  I purchased the boys version of my first watch for my 6yr old son and his is indiglo.

This is the 2nd one of these I have bought.  The first was was still working but I got paint on it so I replaced it.  I know this is for kids but I bought it for myself and my kids are in their teens.  Works great, easy to read, has the green light to see at night and it is water resistant so I can even wash dishes in it.  For being a kids watch it fits fine.  I wear it on the 3rd hole.
Very cute! The only bad thing is that my daughter didn't want to keep it because the band was too rigid! Otherwise is perfect for a first watch!

review_title: Excellent Watch for a Sixty Year Old Female!
review_body: I LOVE MY WATCH!!!  I am a sixty year old petite female. I am not into bells and whistles. I just need a plain analog watch. After reading reviews i.e. the length of the watch band, I decided to order it.  It is PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS!!!!  Thank you!!!!

review_title: Great for an adult with a small wrist
review_body: I am an adult with a very small wrist.  I got the idea to get this watch by reading the other reviews.  I have had adult Timex watches before, and the bands are narrow and don't last.The band on this is sturdy and fits my tiny wrist.  If you are an adult with a tiny wrist, this watch is for you!

review_title: This time the battery was fine. We could not find the problem
review_body: I got this watch when I was 7 years old. I had it for three years before I lost it. I got a new one when I turned ten. I had it for two months and then it stopped working. I replaced the battery and then it worked again. After 2 weeks it stopped working again. This time the battery was fine. We could not find the problem. I am getting a new watch, but not this one.

review_title: This was a birthday gift for my 9 yr old ...
review_body: This was a birthday gift for my 9 yr old daughter. She picked it out since the one I bought her stopped working even with a new battery. She is a petite little 9 yr old and my only complaint is that it is a little big on her wrist. She could use one or two more holes. She doesn't complain about it and it will fit her years to come.

review_title: The best ballet shoe! Toddler loved and approved.
review_body: This is my second pair. I bought an 8.5 for my toddler because she outgrew the 7.5. They last well and she loves to wear them. Anything that a toddler loves to wear I say buy a dozen! She wears a 6.5 to 7.5m street shoe right now depending on the brand. I say this runs pretty consistent size wise. I would buy a half size to a whole size up from street shoe size. I got the 8.5m with room to grow because I know she'll wear them a lot and her foot grows so fast. She could wear an 8 perfectly but the 8.5 gives a little more room to grow just enough to last at least 6 months or more of wear which is great.

review_title: Based on the company suggestion, I bought a size ...
review_body: Based on the company suggestion, I bought a size up from my toddlers street shoe, which are slightly big, so when it was way too big, I thought, ok, and ordered down a size. Still huge! Now  I have ordered a size down, a 1/2 size below his actual measurements, so we'll see!!!

As this was my first experience buying children's dance shoes, I wasn't aware of how small they run. My daughter wears a size 9 shoe comfortably, so I bought a 9.5, thinking she would maybe have a bit of room to grow. When we got them in the mail, i couldn't even get them on her. After a little internet research, I found that these run VERY small. There is no mention of this in the listing, nor is there a conversion chart which would be incredibly helpful. The shoes looked well made, I am sure once I get the right size, they will be great!

review_title: The design is adorable and fits otherwise
review_body: The size is true, but not knowing if my daughter had a narrow or medium width, I ordered medium figuring that's what you'd get at most stores.  The length was the right size, but the sides gap.  We pulled her strings extra tight in the front to keep the sides from gapping.  The design is adorable and fits otherwise.  We'll order again next time, but we'll know to order a narrow instead.

I love these ballet shoes for my 3 year old but they do runny really small , I first ordered a size 10 w and they were really small ,so I reordered a size 11 wide and they fit great ..so far the shoe it self has proven to be sturdy . I like the fact that the string on she is actually for adjustment and not just for show. I would highly recommend these shoes and will be purchasing this brand always!!  Just keep in mind to at least order a size up.

review_title: Shoe is Fine, Sizing is NOT
review_body: The shoe itself is wonderful, excellent quality. The problem is with sizing, it is way, way too small--which I knew from other reviews so I ordered a size and a half too big and it was still too small. For the sizing to be that drastically off seems a bit ridiculous.

review_title: I ordered multiple sizes for my 3 year old's dance ...
review_body: I ordered multiple sizes for my 3 year old's dance class.  She's a 7 1/2 / 8 in a shoe so I ordered the 7 and the 8.  The 8 fits perfectly but no room to grow.  I am ordering the 9 so I have to compare and then make final decision which to keep.
These shoes fit as expected.  I ordered an 11 for my girl who is between a 10.5 and an 11.  There is a touch of extra room around the toes but the heel is secure.  The elastic string is helpful.

review_title: Beautiful in white but consider buy in 2 sizes more
review_body: The white ballerina shoes look adorable! I know it can be hard to clean but I wanted something different to the usual pink ballet. So, after reading the reviews about how small the shoes run I decided to buy 2 size more. My toddler wears size 7 (in Skechers and Champions brand's shoes just to give an example). I ordered size 9.5 M because I couldnt find size 9 at the time of my purchase...But they were PERFECT (after using the rubbing laces in front of the shoes. The laces are long so I cut them 1 inche just to prevent any future fall.
The ballet slippers are adorable.  My little granddaughter loves them. They do run small, though.  I ordered the same size as the shoes she wears and we could hardly get them on her.
My youngest daughter loves this watch!

review_title: Recipient liked it. Arrived on time
review_body: This item was as described. Purchased as a gift. Recipient liked it. Arrived on time. Would purchase from vendor again. Thanks!
Accurate and stylish childrens
My 7 yr. old daughter learned how to tell time on this within a week. She loves it! Just gotta remember to take it off when she showers.
Good product for the price

review_title: It looks really good but I haven't given it yet to my goddaughter ...
review_body: It looks really good but I haven't given it yet to my goddaughter because it's for x-ma's but it looks well built and it's cute
Pretty colors and numbers are very clear.
My girl enjoy the watch inmidiatly
I was satisfied.

Adorable and durable.  Excellent buy! The kids are happy and have a fun watch to wear at Disney.  I had to buy another watch because the first watch was not as durable as this one.  This is cute, fun, and it will last

review_title: Excellent value. But sizing is off
review_body: Very well made coat. Excellent value .But sizing is off. Granddaughter does wear a small, size 6. This small was a 7 /8. Way to big
Kids love it

review_title: Everything you expect from Carhart. It's a little big ...
review_body: Everything you expect from Carhart. It's a little big on my little one but leaves room for layers and still fits well enough she can play.
This is a wonderful jacket, we've had these in the past and just needed a larger size
Daughter absolutely loves this coat!!! Very soft and warm. Would definitely buy again. Temps already got down in the 20-30's in the mornings and is keeping her toasty on the way to school.

review_title: For Size 3T, the sleeve openings were so small ...
review_body: For Size 3T, the sleeve openings were so small that my petite Granddaughter could not push her hands through. Coat was returned.

Love these. Ordered one for my girls. They love them and they r pretty warm. Perfect for the southern winters. I got my 2 yr old a 3tt and got my 4 yr old a 4t. They both fit a little big as expected. :) Great jackets
Returned. After reading the reviews, I ordered it thinking it would be a warm jacket. Most definitely not Maine-warm! Might work for southern climates.
My daughter love it.. size is perfect!!
Great for my 3 year old, she gets to wear into next year..
Loved this! My kids can wear it comfortably on their wrist and they love that it lights up with different colors. Great way to teach them how to tell time!
Great purchase!

review_title: Nice watch, smaller face than expected
review_body: Nice watch, we all thought the watch face would be bigger, as it looks so in the picture. It's smaller that it appears but we still like the watch. My kids figured it out with no problem.

review_title: Perfect for my younger child who is practicing numbers
review_body: Perfect for my younger child who is practicing numbers, and likes to know the time in the dark.  Can be made to glow in various different colors, which is cool
Just as described, somewhat easy to set up
My twin grand daughters love them!

Adorable watch that my 13 year old daughter loves!  She spent her the first week it came swimming with it in the pool every day!  Waterproof is and accurate descriptive quality. 😉 we love the different illumination lights. My only issue...  If you are looking for one are the directions....  Usually I can set a watch without having to look at them, but this set up was a Lil odd.. Definitely not the norm. We have them stored now in a safe place for later reference sweet and if the battery dies. 😊 overall I would buy it again.

I bought this for my daughter's 10th birthday and she loves it! She had been asking for a purple digital watch and this definitely fit the description! Furthermore, I was pleasantly surprised to see how polished and high quality the watch was when I received it, especially since it was so inexpensive.
My 8 year old daughter was beyond estatic to receive this watch. The bright purple color is beautiful and she loves the timer and date settings.

Bought this as a birthday present for my 11-year old daughter.  She loves it and has been wearing it constantly.  The band is a little smaller than I expected, but it fits her well and seems to be very comfortable.  The push-button lighted dial face is a nice feature.  It seems to be well-made, and so far is keeping perfect time.  It wasn't clear to me from the product description, but there is a butterfly on the face that floats around clockwise and serves as the second hand - very cute, my daughter loves it, but if you need a more precise second hand, this is not the watch for you.

review_title: Like a spare metal part found in some garage
review_body: It's cute. And the band is stuffy and just stretchy enough. But the metal connector is cheap and ugly looking. Like a spare metal part found in some garage. I guess I expected a buckle. The second half of the watch face says "to" as in "20 minutes to 8 o'clock". My child isn't learning time that way, and it is confusing to have the minute numbers start at 25 again after the 30 (at 7 where 35 min. would normally be" The girls liked it otherwise, not worth returning for the price.

review_title: Cheap clasp but good if replaced
review_body: My daughter loves this watch. She's 5 and learning to tell time on an analog clock. The only problem is the clasp is cheap plastic and broke while putting it on one day. My local jewelry store put a metal clasp on there for free. I'll have to go back there to buy my daughter earnings for her birthday.

the cheap band wont even stay in it's adjustable latch. It's almost as if it was designed to be lost ( and then replaced). The numbers are too small to tell time without having to really examine the watch. I wouldn't recommend this watch to anyone. I bought this watch based on some good ratings. I wonder now if these people actually looked past the cute design to its functionality. I will be buying my girl a different watch but not from this retailer. I am getting increasingly annoyed at the junk that is sold here on amazon. It used to be a place to buy a quality product .....Not anymore

review_title: Surprisingly big hit with the girls
review_body: I'm the father of a 2 year old and got this for Christmas for her.  It looked cool in that it teaches you to tell time, but as for design I'm pretty clueless.  I would not have actually chosen this as a design, but my wife, my mother, and most importantly my daughter LOVED it, she wouldn't stop wearing it and playing with it.

review_title: Easy first watch! Great for a 3 year old.
review_body: The kid loves it. She can put it on herself and it's water resistant! There's a small butterfly for the seconds hand on ours.

review_title: Great watch for my 3rd grader in terms of telling ...
review_body: Great watch for my 3rd grader in terms of telling time and learning correct time telling from an analog clock. However, I do not like the fastening mechanism (loop through a metal piece). A bit difficult for tiny hands to do. If you loop it outwards it hides some of the gorgeous pattern. If you loop inward it is more difficult to do and it doesn't allow for a snug fit. A velcro type adjustable fastener would have been more appropriate.

review_title: the watch tells time however, the "teaching" value of ...
review_body: the watch tells time however, the "teaching" value of it is degraded significantly because the numbers are incredibly small and VERY hard to read. My 5 year old was really excited to get it and wear it but she couldn't read the numbers (because of how small they are rather than her inability to recognize time), so now the watch sits in a drawer.

Minutes are hard to read, even for my 7 year old with 20/20 vision. At half of the hour, the minutes go backward (30, 25, etc). I should have noticed that in the picture before ordering. This makes it a bit more confusing if you're just starting out to learn to tell time. Otherwise, the design is cute and the watch fits well.

My 9 year old daughter loves it, especially the indiglo. It is comfortable for her and everything is as advertised. My only complaint is the adjustment on the strap is a bit 'slippery' and when she puts it on it will slip to a slightly larger adjustment from time to time. My son has a similar band on his camo timex and it doesn't have this issue. Once the band gets a little wear to it like his, it won't be so slick and things will work out ok. Beyond that, it's a durable kid's watch. Better than anything else I've seen in stores that cost more. (I've tried them and they invariably break rather quickly)

review_title: These boots are adorable, but despite the "roomy" fit in the foot
review_body: These boots are adorable, but despite the "roomy" fit in the foot, the ankle portion of these boots is more constricted than I would like (in the size 6).  It makes it more difficult to get on and off, which is not a problem we've had with larger sizes.  They're still hands down the best rain boot for toddlers, as their handle really goes a long way to helping kids gain independence in dressing!

My 20-month-old is in love with these.  He wants to wear them on sunny days to play outside, and even asked if he could wear them in the bath once!  He really doesn't want to take them off, which is unusual considering it's normally a fight to get him into sneakers (and to keep them on).  I too love these boots because my son can get them muddy outside and I can easily wash them off for next use.  (Also, they're so adorable).  He is in between size 7 and 8 for sneakers, and the 8 in this boot seems to fit him perfectly.  I highly recommend.

review_title: Adorable and easy to put on!
review_body: These little Crocs boots are just as cute as the shoes. I own a pair of adult Croc rain boots, they are super comfortable and roomy on the inside and do not make your feet sweat. I only rated 4 starts because these aren't as roomy as the adult version. My daughter's socks are all sweaty when I take the boots off.

review_title: Extremely light weight and easy for him to get off and on
review_body: My son (3 years old) loves these boots. Extremely light weight and easy for him to get off and on. Boot doesn't come to high on his leg. Very pleased with product.

So far so good. My son loves them. They are not too narrow, and best of all, they didn't crack at the seam... as it's all one piece, no seams! So they are still waterproof which I'm happy about.  Note: his previous Thomas rain boots got cracks after about of month of wear, at a seam on both sides of the boot, so I had to get him new rain boots and am very very please with these Crocs rain boots!

review_title: These rain boots have worked out very well so far ...
review_body: These rain boots have worked out very well so far for my 4 year old. We don't get rain too much where we live so I can't speak to longevity just yet. Some rain boots we have tried in the past are so clunky and stiff which seems difficult to run and play around in. These are very light and bend well when my son walks. They are not lined on the inside with any soft fabric which I prefer as some boots we have had with fabric lining get very wet/muddy and takes forever to air dry. If he splashes so hard that water gets inside, they dry rather quickly.

review_title: The boots are made for messing
review_body: The boy loves his boots.  Splashes all around.  So maybe I should deduct a star because now he searches out all the puddles??  Oh - and not to mention the sand we have to deal with from school yard sandbox when he comes home.  So it's great as a kid's boot - terrible as a puddle/dirt/sand deterrent.  Yeowzers, what a mess!

I purchased these to replace the old pair of heavy rain boots that he finally wore the sole off of. These are super light weight and he loves them so much! He wears them all day since he's gotten them. They're his favorite pair of shoes and I love seeing how happy he is just running, jumping, and just simply playing in them. I also love that I can just simply rinse them off inside and out to clean them up.  Will order in the future when he grows out of these!

The color is really vibrant - I got yellow.  The yellow is true to image and my kiddo loves it.  They definitely keep her feet dry and with a pair of thick socks her feet are warm too.  The handles on either side mean that my little one can get these boots on without any help. Very durable too!

review_title: Great rain boot to keep your child's feet dry
review_body: Great rain boot to keep your child's feet dry. Rugged build so no worries about being dainty, so your child can run around and play hard without any worry of damaging the boots. A little difficult to get on and off, but nothing a little effort can't resolve. Overall, this is a go.
A little big but super cute
I always worry about the material but its good
Fit as expected but the arms were way to big.
fits as water and she can wear other things under it for extra warmth.

review_title: Good quality. My daughter loved it
review_body: Good quality.  My daughter loved it.
this fit my Granddaughter perfect she loved it!!
This jacket is adorable,  good quality,  good price.  Can't say enough how happy we are with the purchase...good, good...
Great quality, "dense" denim and was the perfect "back to school" item
Great denim jacket
I highly recommend this jean jacket. It is very well made and fits perfectly fon my 7 yr old grandaughter. She loves it!
Cheap.
My grandson likes the watch and the look of it. But the face ring keeps coming off and will not stay on.
The analogue arms stop working a week after my kid used it . And they block the digital clock view .. I do not recommend buying it
My son loves it, it works great, good quality, no complaints. Love it.
Bought this for my son and he loves it,  great watch
So far so good. Our Grandson loves it!
Lasted one day...my son took a bath wearing it and that was it. So disappointed.
Good
Son loves it
Dead on arrival

review_title: Glad I did as they fit great with some room ...
review_body: Just what I was looking for to replace my son's old Puma shoes. After reading reviews, I went ahead and ordered a size up from my son's normal shoe size (he wears a size 8 and I ordered a size 9). Glad I did as they fit great with some room to grow.

review_title: but he will constantly complain that the shoes are not comfortable. When I received these Saucony Jazz shoes
review_body: My 5 year old son is very picky with shoes.  If the shoe is too tight or anything on the inside that rubs against his socks, he will incessantly complain.  I am constantly admonishing him to hurry up and put his shoes on when we go out, but he will constantly complain that the shoes are not comfortable.  When I received these Saucony Jazz shoes, I don't hear him complain anymore.  He tells me they are very comfortable. Hence, I am very satisfy and a happy mom.  One less obstacle when getting him ready for school.

The shoes are really cute. I love the colors.  I think they would be best for a narrower foot because the velcro was hard to fasten across my son's foot, and they generally fit a little small on him.  I ended up returning them for those reasons, but I was happy with the quality and appearance of the shoe.

Good toddler shoes, the only complaint is that the velcro top clasp isn't long enough.  When our son has the shoes on, over half of the bottom "sticky" velcro is exposed, allowing his shoes to catch on rugs and pickup lint and other stuff.  He likes wearing the shoes though and they must be comfortable because he doesnt like to take them off.

review_title: I also tend to like silver glitter shoes because they match more
review_body: My 2.5yo likes these.  The silver glitter is subtle enough for an adult, but exciting enough for a kid.  I also tend to like silver glitter shoes because they match more.  These act very much as running shoes and def "look" that way.  So unlike some other shoes we wouldn't wear these with every-day style dresses.  I also am not personally a fan of Saucony (just no affiliation to the brand and feel it's old ppl's running shoes) but I couldn't find other shoes like this so we tried them and I'm pretty happy.

review_title: cute! so retro & hip! the baby loveed these tennies!
review_body: So so cute! I wear sauconys so I figured my little should too! Love the purple with lavender, love the velcro closure. These started to wear out around the ankle pretty fast. But tyre so darn cute! They're pretty much play shoes for outside around the house now, since they're no longer their perfect spotless stylin' self.

review_title: Well made, run about half size small
review_body: They are definitely a bit smaller than expected, but fit well. I'd say they run about half a size smaller. My daughter seems comfortable in them, despite them having less support than I would have expected from a Saucony shoe, and likes to run around in her "running shoes" like mommy and daddy. They're easy to take on and off. They seem well made and durable.Very cute too.

review_title: Perfect comfortable shoes for a 2 year old to run around in. Style and price are unmatched.
review_body: These were some great shoes for my 2 year old, he has a wide foot so I wanted something that would fit and the Saucony Jazz delivered, it has really good insole unlike others shoes, jordans, converse, etc. If you want your kids to have a comfortable shoe with some style this is it. I'll be buying again once he outgrows these.

review_title: Overall the quality and design are good.
review_body: Cute shoes - the design needs to be tweaked a bit - the velcro strap needs to be a bit longer - the strap does not go all the way across if the childs feet are in the shoe.  Overall the quality and design are good.

These are my favorite sneakers for my daughter. I've been ordering them for her each time she grows out of them for 2 1/2 years now. She is four and can easily get these on by herself. I'm so happy about the color selection and the simplicity of these. She puts them on and runs and jumps and really gives 'em hell, as they say. They hold up so well and are easy to wipe up or wash in the sink and let dry overnight. Comfortable, easy, cute and affordable. Can't beat it.

review_title: My 4 year old granddaughter loved it! She wore it to bed and hasn ...
review_body: My 4 year old granddaughter loved it! She wore it to bed and hasn 't taken it off! We can tell her when events are going to happen, like tennis at 3:00. She can then look at her watch and know when it is time to go! She is finally understanding what 10 minutes means! Great gift. Strap was a little big, but no big deal. Would totally recommend this.

review_title: Great watch for my 5 year old she loves it
review_body: Great watch for my 5 year old she loves it! She cant put it on herself but know she can tell what time it is no need to ask us!

review_title: Package arrived on time and in good condition.
review_body: Bought it for our 4 year old granddaughter. Had to punch an additional hole in wrist band,but,she likes it. Seems to be keeping time. Hoping she will learn her numbers as well as tell time. Package arrived on time and in good condition.

review_title: All the little girls are in love with frozen so I feel like all the products ...
review_body: I just wish they had smaller sizing. All the little girls are in love with frozen so I feel like all the products should be catering to all ages. Just too big for my almost four year old
Fit perfectly and my daughter loves it
A++ SHIPPER! ITEM VERY NICE

the item arrived in time; it's a nice decent size; the colors are just like in the picture; this is a gift for my niece; i'll post an update after she uses it for a while to see how it resists wear and tear

review_title: ... of these watches for my little nieces and they love it.
review_body: I bought 2 of these watches for my little nieces and they love it.
It was as cheap as it cost. Maybe even cheaper if that's possible.
This was a Christmas gift for my 6-year old granddaughter and she was very happy with it.  The only thing is the section for the time is somewhat smaller than I expected it to be.

review_title: it looks nice but have not used it yet
review_body: This is a Christmas gift for granddaughter, it looks nice but have not used it yet.

Simplicity is beautiful.  Bought this for my 7 yr old daughter who is starting to read time.  She loves it, wears it everyday now.  Strap fits her nicely as well without me having to drill an extra hole.  Fit and finish is excellent.  It's not very loud either.  Shipping and packaging from Amazon is as reliable as always.  Just an all around great buy!

review_title: It is a Toy. Not real watch !!!!
review_body: Actual Watches are too smaller than pictures and they overcharging for this toy size watch

I bought this watch for my daughter for Easter. She is almost 7 and has recently learned to tell time. I love the scale of the watch. It fits her arm just right. Not too large. Very girly, and she loves it!
I love this watch and so does my six year old. The band fits very nicely the watch is easy to read and the glow-in-the-dark feature is really cool. My daughter wears this every single day.
My 12 year daughter loves this watch. It's cute without being too much like so many other "girl's watches" are. Dependable and sturdy construction.

review_title: Timex Kids' T79081 My First Times Easy Reader Pink Leather Strap Watch
review_body: My nine year old granddaughter loves this watch!  It fits her small wrist perfectly.  It was impossible to find a child's watch in the stores.  This watch has a second hand and glows when you push a button.  It is great.  She would not part with it!  I truly recomend it to all little girls.  It is very much like a nurses watch and it is battery opperated.  JW  Dyer, IN
classic look and my 8 year old loves it! keeps pretty good time, rarely has to be reset.
This was a gift and the recipient loved it. Beautiful first watch.
A little loose on my 5 y.o. daughter's wrist but otherwise sized ok.  There is no light-up function.  Keeps good time.

These look great (be sure to use the bows to adjust the foot hole) but as the other reviews say, they do run small. My daughter is in a size 8, close to a size 9, so I ordered her a 9.5 and they fit just right right now, though I don’t see them still fitting in a few months.
I read the reviews to size up and I sized up 1 size and they are perfect with a little bit of room to grow.  They are high quality, a great color and perfect for the price. A good buy!!

review_title: They were a little bit big but once I tied the strings they fit great and she has room to grow a little
review_body: These shoes fit almost perfectly on my 7yr old. They were a little bit big but once I tied the strings they fit great and she has room to grow a little. The black looks great and the material is nice.

Will work fine for beginning dance for 4 yr old. I bought this to compare to bloch's slipper. The bottom sole is a bit wider especially in toe area so less chance of slipping but not sure how would affect an older dancer with more need to turn, balance, etc. The leather was equally good quality on both. I preferred the bloch inner footbed better as it's a softer suede like piece and the capezio is more like thin canvas. Capezio ran smaller than Bloch. The capezio has shorter toe length so may be better for shorter wider feet and bloch better for longer, more narrow feet. The elastic band is nicer on capezio because it has a soft backing. Both held securely for us.

review_title: Daughter loves them, true to size
review_body: These are perfect for my daughter who just turned 4.  She wears a 10 street shoe.  I ordered the 10 and it's perfect. My daughter wants to wear them everywhere, not just dance class. Good quality. Capezio of course. Absolutely recommend.

If the sizing were more accurate, I would love to order these shoes online.  However, there was so much conflicting information.  I ordered a size larger than what my daughter usually wears and they are very snug.  I am just hoping that they will stretch a little and that they'll last through this season.  Other than the sizing, I am happy with them.  The color is fine - not a bright pink but still pink.  They seem to be well made....I hope so.  Anyway, I guess I'll just buy her ballet shoes in a store from now on so that she can try them on.  It would be great if shoe companies could make shoe sizes consistent.

review_title: Great ballet shoes at a great price
review_body: I went to a dance wear store before, and they recommended Capezio for my daughter, since her feet were a bit on the wide side.  I asked to try Bloch anyway, and Bloch is definitely more narrow.  They are very soft.  These are true to size.  Get the same size as you would for street shoes.  They are a bit of a tanish pink, so if you want very pink, then you will be disappointed.  I actually like the color because it doesn't look as artificial. The ones I saw in Payless are the same hue. The pink ballet shoes I saw in Target are very pink but like the Payless ones are stiff.  They both cost more than than $14, which is what I am paying for this shoes.

review_title: I might need another pait for me:)
review_body: They look lovely and fit as expected.  I actually thought they would be a bit bigger, but they fit her feet perfectly:) I will definitely be repurchasing once she out grows them.

These seem like very well made ballet shoes. The reason for 4 stars is due to the sizing. My daughter wears a size 7 normally in toddler shoes and I ordered an 8 based on reviews, but immediately needed to return those and order an 8.5.
I ordered  these for my 5 year old.  The review said they run small so I ordered the bigger size and now they're to big. They are great quality and I'm going to order her actual size.
Love it what can I say I love carhartt
So cute!
Very satisfied
Fits perfect. Absolutely love it and so does my daughter!!
This was a gift for my grandaugher. She loves it!

review_title: This is a really cute jacket! We purposely bought ...
review_body: This is a really cute jacket! We purposely bought it a little big so that our daughter could wear it longer. She loves it!

Warm and durable! Would buy again.

review_title: I purchased this watch for my 8 year old. ...
review_body: I purchased this watch for my 8 year old. She loves it. She is learning to tell time and the long hand and short hand are different colors which is really helpful.
Returned, broke into several pieces first time worn. Returned it right away.

review_title: It was a gift to my sweet granddaughter.
review_body: It was a gift to my sweet granddaughter..I was so please she was happy with it..however the instructions were sent to me,she received it on a Sunday,she needed to wear it to school Monday..I was able to figure out..until Monday afternoon how to sent her the instructions..now she a happy camper

review_title: The watch is very well constructed and has a great look to it
review_body: The watch is very well constructed and has a great look to it. I couldn't figure out how to set it so I emailed the seller and received instructions within 2 hours. I am very pleased and my daughter loves the watch.
very satisfied

review_title: NOT waterproof ... wish it would have been advertised correctly
review_body: This has so many great functions and is a perfect size for my 8 year old. BUT it isn't waterproof as advertised in the listing. She went swimming and now it doesn't work. I just looked at the back of the watch and it says water resistant.... VERY different from waterproof. We are so disappointed.

review_title: The band is soft but sturdy and she and her friends love the rainbow led ...
review_body: I got this watch for my daughter for her 7th birthday and she absolutely loves it. The band is soft but sturdy and she and her friends love the rainbow led light. Just got another one for her best friend. The box instructions were not super clear but the seller emailed a PDF along with the purchase that was everything we needed. Great deal.
good product

review_title: Waited 2 weeks befor review - great for 9 y/o
review_body: This is a perfect watch for my nine year old. I convinced her to wear it for one week as she complained it was uncomfortable. After she got used to it she hasn't taken it off. She loves that its waterproof and wears it to take showers and time herself mouthwashing, teeth brushing, and holding her breath. Her alarm is set for the morning and she wakes up promptly. The price/quality ratio is great. The backlight can also be changed to multiple colors as well as flashing all colors (which is more fun for kids than practical for checking the time). Great product

review_title: Super cute watch - great as a gift for your kid
review_body: Very happy with this purchase. Bought this for my daughter's 3rd birthday and she loves it. The fit is a little loose, but that is perfect for her because she can take it on and off when she wants to. She loves showing it off to all her friends. Also, it is very cute that the little butterfly is the second hand and flies around the clock face.

review_title: Cute, bright and cheerful kids watch
review_body: I ordered this watch for my 2 year old daughter when she became obsessed with my watch, and trying to remove it from me! She loves this one, cute, bright and colourful, with the comfy elastic strap. The backlit watch face is a brilliant idea, of course the youngsters love anything that lights up, and its a pleasant luminous green that makes it easy to see in the dark. I've knocked one star off only because the strap adjustment is a bit fiddly. The child, like mine, will most likely need an adult to do it for them.

review_title: As a graduate of Sweet Briar College
review_body: As a graduate of Sweet Briar College, I was thrilled to find a watch in school colors. I wish it came in an adult size or with Indigo as a feature, but my daughter was happy to have it. It works just fine and fits her comfortably (she's 7). Once it was adjusted, she slides it off and on over her hand.

My 5 yr old really likes this watch and can now tell the time.  She can read the numbers!  I may switch the watch band to one that has velcro or a strap as the elastic sometimes does not stay at the exact size.  At the same time, she can slide it on and off with out issues.  My younger daughter has another but similar model and the elastic is perfect for her.

review_title: Good value & gives the practice and clues kids need.
review_body: the watch was exactly what we needed to help our 6 yo learn to tell time.  The color coding and the helper numbers (25 by the 7 etc) really helped her learn how to tell time - and it only took about an hour!  She loves wearing it and we get updates about every 5 minutes as to the time.
Great watch - my 5 year old loves it.  Seems to be well made and will survive a 5 yr old's daily abuse.  Super cute and was able to be sized down for my petite daughter

review_title: If you like to get your kid things that make other kids ...
review_body: My seven year old loves this watch and wears it all the time. A kid in her class got really jealous that she had her own watch. If you like to get your kid things that make other kids in class jealous, this might be the thing.

Bought this for my 7 year old niece and she is in love, love, love with it. She wasn't taking it off from her hand for 1 full month except she is in the shower. That's how much she loved it. It looks very pretty, girly type. Very easy to put on with the velcro feature, the light is great to see the time at night on bed. Planning to get another one for her since she recently told me the batter died off( after almost an year usage.) Very happy with the purchase!

review_title: I wanted an inexpensive watch for my clumsy young niece ...
review_body: I wanted an inexpensive watch for my clumsy young niece and this worked well for her. Something that i did not mind if it didn't last a year. She did leave it somewhere, but it worked well while she had it

review_title: My daughter is finally learning to tell time with an analog clock.
review_body: My daughter is finally learning to tell time with an analog clock. The pink hour hand matches the pink hours. The blue minute hand matches the blue minutes. Being water resistant is a huge plus. She gets compliments on her watch all the time. We've tried several kid's watches and we couldn't get her to wear any of them for any length of time because they bothered her wrist. This watch is very comfortable and she wears it all day. Thanks for the great product!

review_title: Now the only kind of rainboot I will ever buy
review_body: These are just about the perfect rain boot.  They don't leak at the seams like some boots because they don't have any seams.  They are super light weight so even when kids are little they don't trip over clompy soles.  The standard croc material is slightly insulating, just right for a rainy day.
I want to like these, but they are so narrow in the ankles, they cause rubbing and red marks on his ankle bones. They are super lightweight, don't fall off and very cute. Too bad...

Love that these boots, while clunky, are light weight. True to crocs style. My absolute favorite feature...no cloth lining! As a mom of three boys "rain boots" (aka: shoes that I don't care if you ruin and we wear them year round in the great NW, rain or shine) are I must, but get thrashed the first wearing because you simply can't clean out the inside. Not these Bettie's!! I have a serious case of OCD and love that I can just rinse these fast drying boots out if (ha ha...when!) mud and gunk gets down inside at the toes. I have a pair for all three boys and while price they have ready proved worth it!

review_title: Great, light-weight rain boots for a 2 year old
review_body: Great, light-weight rain boots for a 2 year old. My daughter wears a size 6 in Striderite shoes and since these are Crocs, I thought they would run a bit big so I ordered a size 6 to last her through the Southern California winter. The size 6 boots were so tight she couldn't put them on by herself and when I tried, it was quite a bit of effort. The shaft part is very narrow. So I exchanged it for a size 7 and she can now put them on herself and LOVES them. Unfortunately for her, there hasn't been much rain yet over here :-)

My daughter, 2.5yrs, LOVES her new boots! She won't wear anything else. She can put them on and take them off without my help, which I think is part of the big appeal. They're easy to clean, and lightweight so she can run around in them. I got the blue so that her little brother can eventually wear them. Although the picture shows them as a lavender blue, they are actually more of a "Thomas the Train" blue. I personally wouldn't be caught dead wearing Crocs sandals, but as far as toddler boots go, I think they're pretty cute!

We wanted a fall/winter rain and mud boot that our 2-year old could put on himself.  This boot fit the bill perfectly and has become his favorite footwear.  Unlike other similar boots, it is not rubber and heavy.  It travels well and -- because of the bright yellow available -- it is very visible on roads and such.  This boot does everything one could ask for such a piece of gear and we are very pleased with it.

The length of the boot itself is true to size, but the shaft on the calf is too narrow. I ordered up a size and my daughter can't get her foot in when shes wearing socks, and gets a blister on her ankle bone without socks. She wore them a few times, so it's too late to return.

review_title: Overall they are easy for our toddler to put on by himself and ...
review_body: Pros: Overall they are easy for our toddler to put on by himself and keep the outside moisture from getting in.  They are super easy to wash off because its all solid plastic.

These are the second pair that we have had for our son. He outgrew the old pair, which were hand-me-downs from a friend, our son wore them for over a year and they still look band new, minus some dirt. I love that they have handles on them so they are easy for him to put on by himself. We've tried a couple other pairs of rainboots in the past and they always seem to leak through the seam near the sole. With these his socks are always dry because they are made different, in that the sole and the boot are not separate pieces glued together. We will buy them again next year when he outdgrows these new ones!

My kiddo has fat feet, so I was having a hard time finding a rain boot she could easily pull on and off. These are the winners! Very light, easy on and off. Love them. She wears them around the house for fun (no surprise). Since they're not lined they do get sweaty piggies, though, so keep that in mind if they're being worn without socks.

review_title: Perfect fit.  Nice details--heart buttons, special stitching.
review_body: This jacket fit my granddaughter perfectly.  She loves it!!

review_body: My daughter loves this jacket!  Fits her great and good quality!

LOVE IT! Works so well with Dresses!

we received this item and 1 week later the strap broke off, however the company turned around and sent us new ones! Wonderful!
Is good for kids
Great product
Great watch!

review_title: The color is great and overall I’m happy with the shoes
review_body: My daughter loves these shoes. For me they are still stiff to make putting them on her a struggle but I assume they will become easier after they are more broken in. The color is great and overall I’m happy with the shoes. 4 stars simply because they do not open wide enough for my personal preference for a toddler shoe.

This is our second pair of Saucony for my toddler. His first pair were Saucondy Baby Ride 7. They held up to everything, including multiple washings. I decided to try the Jazz next. I can't say anything about how they hold up to washing yet but they fit great just like his last pair. They look amazing. Best of all, my son loves wearing them!

review_title: Falling apart in less than 2 months
review_body: I bought these shoes less than 2 months ago and they're already falling apart, see the picture. I'm extremely disappointed as they're on a somewhat active 3.5 year old who doesn't wear out sneakers like an older child. Looks like we will be replacing these soon with a very different brand. Also, we bought the wide version, which is not very wide. I was also not pleased with the overall fit.

review_title: These shoes are adorable. They're a little narrow and the Velcro doesn't ...
review_body: These shoes are adorable. They're a little narrow and the Velcro doesn't go all the way over which is annoying but they're still cute.  The blue and pink is closer to a purple/red ish color which I was really bummed about but I returned them for the grey and pink which are really cute.

These shoes are ADORABLE. But, as some others have mentioned, the soles are stiff and the shoes are narrow. I ordered a wide, and our child's old shoes (Carter's) are still wider. So if your child has even a slightly wide foot or you're not sure, order the wide. The fit otherwise is as expected. I'd say these are great, casual wear shoes. But your kid's definitely not going to win any races that require a more athletic shoe while wearing them. If your child needs a true athletic shoe, I'm not sure that these really fit the bill. Our child has been wearing them the last 3 weeks and so far they seem durable. Will update if that changes.

review_title: Great concept, not so great execution
review_body: The shoes are great in the sense that they are breathable, so no smelly feet for my son. Nice suede and textile materials, comfy shoes. The only issue is the fact that the closing tabs are way too short, so half the velcro stays uncovered and it doesn't look good, plus it attracts all kind ok pet hair and stuff. This is a design error or an attempt to save money on an inch of material, which is too bad for a great shoe.

review_title: They wear great for on-the-go toddlers and lasted between 6 to 8 ...
review_body: This is probably our 3rd or 4th pair of the Jazz sneakers - everytime he moves up a size, we order another pair! They wear great for on-the-go toddlers and lasted between 6 to 8 months with almost daily use!

The shoe fits. The strap however is way too short and doesn’t feet all the way around to the other end to Velcro it shut! My daughter has tiny feet and the strap is too short. How do you make a shoe with not proportional pieces?

They are certainly more sturdy than the shoes from Payless, and for about $10 more.  The only drawback is the shoes may not be wide enough because the velcro band does not go across all the way on the shoe.  Still she likes them and wears them everyday.

review_title: Great shoes for wider, bigger feet
review_body: I love these shoes. Our toddler has wide and somewhat fat feet and these shoes fit him very well. Lots of other tennis shoes are tight, but these are very roomy and easy to adjust tighter or skinnier. They take a beating, too, and have not worn out. He has been wearing them (alternating with one other pair) every day for several months now, and there are no holes or rips.
My 3 year old loves it.
Very comfortable easy to used kids loved
Thank you granddaughter loved it
Great!

review_title: I would recommend it! It has a big face
review_body: My daughter loves this!! It's really cute on my 5yo girl's wrist. She was thrilled. I would recommend it! It has a big face, so on a very tiny wrist, it may be too big.  But it looks great on her!
Beautiful

review_title: Display does not work and live internationally ( Caribbean) so ...
review_body: Display does not work and live internationally ( Caribbean) so it is way more expensive to return...stuck with a broken watch
my 5 yr old niece loved it
It's just a watch. However either it came dead or it needs the battery added (or I'm not doing something I'm supposed to be doing)
Great watch, my niece loves it!

Purchased this for my 7 year old. I wanted her to have something nice, easy to read, and without cartoon characters, or loud prints. This is perfect. Only just received it, but seems fairly durable. Color was true to what was depicted on my monitor. Very pleased with this purchase - will update if it doesn't hold up.
PHOTO FOOLED ME, AS MY GIRLS SAY IT LOOKS LIKE A CHEEP O

Warning! This watch has changed. I purchased this watch in March 2014. I have small wrists and thought this would fit better than an adult size. It does. Still have quite a bit of extra band though. I really like the watch that I received. It had the Indiglo light which I love. My cat chewed the band up. I ordered the same model assuming that it was the same. It is not. No Indiglo! That is a deal breaker for me. They have also taken out the water resistance which I would think would be a necessary thing for kids! Upon reading the information it does not say that it has Indiglo so my bad for not reading but I ordered the same model that purchased 7 months ago. I really loved my original purchase but very disappointed in the sneaky removal of features!

review_title: Given as a gift to my 10 yr old daughter ...
review_body: Given as a gift to my 10 yr old daughter. She loves it. She wanted a more grown up watch from the fabric bands and this fits the bill. She wears it daily and has had no issues with it over the last 9 months.

review_title: The metal clasp broke after 3months. 7yo daughter. ...
review_body: The metal clasp broke after 3months.  7yo daughter. she can still wear it but its not as secure. she puts the end strap through the 'leather' clasp and it stays on for now.
Not exactly what I expected. Doesn't light as I read on some reviews.
Comfortable and easy to wear. Kiddo says it wobbles around her wrist sometimes.

I bought this watch for my daughter's 6th birthday. She absolutely loves it. The only problem is that the strap broke. The pink strap is held by a spring piece. Somehow the spring piece came undone and the strap came off. This happened once before but luckily I found the spring and carefully put the watch and the strap back together. But when it happened again a few weeks ago we lost the spring. We'll have to take this to a watch shop who will hopefully have another kid's strap.
We bought this for our 13 year daughter. She really likes the style.

review_title: My six-year-old was very excited about this watch but within ...
review_body: My six-year-old was very excited about this watch but within a couple weeks, the face of the watch was totally scratched and had a big crack. My daughter is a fairly calm, gentle kid and I can't imagine she was banging her wrist around enough to destroy a watch made to be used by kids. Very disappointing. And, because I bought it a few weeks in advance of giving to her, we are now past our return window.

My only warning is that these shoes run ~1-2 sizes too small. I originally ordered a size 8 for my daughter who is a size 7.5 but they were super tight. I ordered 2 sizes larger which still gives her an inch or so to grow into them.

This are perfect ballet shoes for a young beginner dancer! My daughter loves how they feel. I would definitely buy 1/2 size to a size up because they do run small and narrow. We went with a 12 1/2 medium and she normal wears regular width 12. They fit perfectly.

review_title: Quality issue the very first week
review_body: I bought them for my 4-year old for a 2-week dance camp - not for heavy use. The first pair was too small (I ordered half size up from her usual, but they didn't fit at all). On the plus side, I was not charged for the return and the new pair in size 10 arrived quickly. When unpacking them I saw that the box looked different from the first one and they had some small issues (a bit of glue visible on the trim of one, slight discoloration around the ties of the other). But these were just cosmetic and I was running out of time for a second return so I sent her to class with them. Today is only the 5th day of use and the inside of the sole is coming off! It's probably a glue problem again, but it literally is tearing in several places, so we'll have to glue it ourselves if we want these shoes to hold for another week of camp.
This is our 3rd pair of these shoes. My daughter’s feet grow fast so we have to keep buying bigger sizes. They seem to be comfortable. She wears her older pair at home to “play dance”.

We ordered the 10.5 because the 10's my daughter has (different brand) have been misplaced.  The 10.5's were way too big.  I decided to try a 9 since the 10.5 was so big.  The 9's are too small.  I thought for sure the 9's would have fit her perfectly.  So I am going to send them back.  I am editing as we have found these to be different sizes.  Both say 9, bout putting them together one is slightly larger than the other.  I am going to replace with a local ballet shop.
Great ballet shoe they just run narrow. I loved the quality so ordered another pair in a W size. Its soft and the color is very nice too, it matches my daughters ballet clothes.
These are the best ballet shoes! They are the perfect shade of pink, are comfortable, and arrive quickly! Plus, they are a couple dollars cheaper than if you buy them from a dance store.

My 3-year-old daughter has been wearing Capezio ballet shoes for 2 years now and I think she's on her third size. They don't get heavy use because it's a weekly one hour class, but they seem to fit well and she has never complained about comfort.  The shoelaces are a pain for me to deal with as a dad who has never worn ballet slippers, but her teachers are pros with them. It's a well-constructed leather slipper with a nice suede-padded bottom that you are going to get 6 months of use out of if your kid is a toddler. Then you can donate them to the school or hand them down.

review_title: Fits VERY small. Otherwise quality seems good.
review_body: The quality seems great.

review_title: Perfect fit! Order regular shoe size!
review_body: I had to order these twice.  The first time I sized up, because so many reviews said they ran small.  Big mistake!  Luckily Amazon has an easy return/exchange system in place, and they shipped out the new ones asap.  As it states in the description, these ballet shoes run true to street size.  I'm not sure why so many others have had issues with them running small.  My daughter is wearing size 12 shoes, I bought size 12.5 in the capezio daisy ballet shoes to ensure they would last longer.  They were a little big, but we tightened the strings and they worked out fine. Thanks Amazon!
I love this coat for my daughter!  I thought the light color would be hard to keep clean but the canvas material is so easy to keep clean.  I love this jacket!
Awesome coat, great quality
Nice warm coat! Already recommended to a friend.
Warm, durable jacket. Love it.

review_title: My granddaughter looks absolutely adorable in this pink carhart jacket
review_body: My granddaughter looks absolutely adorable in this pink carhart jacket.  She loves it.  Very warm for our snowy cold winter.
Bough this for my granddaughter and she loves it.

as she grows, I will continue to buy a larger size :)

I purchased this as a gift. It's a very nice product. It was much nicer than I expected it to be. Has a great, solid feel to it. It also comes in a nice little tin.
My daughter loves it
