review_body: Beautiful watch but cardboard box packaging unsuitable as a gift.
So cute!! Fit my 5 year old daughter's wrist perfectly!! She loves the light up feature! Easy to set time and other features. Would buy again!
Great watch. My daughter loves it, especially the different colors that light up the face.
I loved it
Its nice and beautiful watch for kids.
Cute
Nice watch. Easy to use.

review_title: She loved it and is thrilled to tell you the time
review_body: Timex- just keeps on ticking. This was a Christmas gift for my youngest granddaughter, who...desperately wanted a wrist-watch...and in purple, yet. She loved it and is thrilled to tell you the time, even if you don't need to know. LOL. It's a great watch, and reasonably priced, for young people, who are not the most careful-minded individuals when wearing a wrist watch at play.

review_title: watch face is way too small for a teaching tool.
review_body: I bought this to teach my daughter analog time.  The online images look great.  The actual watch is SO SMALL with very difficult fonts to read.
It's been a year and this watch keeps on ticking! Easy to adjust the band and the time, fits my 7 year old perfectly and she is thrilled to have her own watch!
My daughter loves it, and it's great watch to learn to tell analog time, as all the numbers are clearly labeled.  Plus, it's water resistant which is good for little kids.

review_title: Cute, but falls short of expectations
review_body: This is a super cute watch and I wanted to love it...  But the elastic band gradually slips over the course of the day (it is just threaded through a piece of metal, not attached in any way) so I am constantly having to tighten it for my daughter (I finally stitched it--you can see the tiny yellow stitches in the pic--so she could still get it off but it wouldn't keep loosening and falling off), and the face must be very soft material because it's already badly scuffed from just a few weeks of normal kid-wear.  It also seems to be slowing down already, since a few days ago my daughter was complaining that the time was 20 minutes off--and we just got it for Christmas!
When I received the watch it was already running. Not very happy because there was no telling how long it was running before I got it. Hopefully I won't have to out a battery in it soon.

review_title: so I was sure this would be good for my younger daughter too
review_body: Within months of purchase, it started to slow down.  I thought it was the battery and replaced that, but did not help.  I had bought the same watch for my older daughter several years ago, and she used it for 18 months without any problems, so I was sure this would be good for my younger daughter too.  Sadly disappointed - they love the strap design and overall style.

review_title: the watchband is good for a young child
review_body: The idea is neat, the watchband is good for a young child, and it seemed to fit my daughter's wrist (which is on the small side for a 5-year-old).  However, as delivered from Timex the knob wouldn't pull out for time adjustment, and when I tried just a little too hard, it popped off and won't go back on.  Whoops.  I chalked it up to a lesson learned and bought a different brand for the second go around.

review_title: So easy for a beginner to tell time or learn how ...
review_body: Very cute looking clock, with minute and hour hands marked, also every minute marked. So easy for a beginner to tell time or learn how to tell time. My daughter loved it. But the clock keeps slowing down. It started within the first two weeks of purchase. I have not changed the battery since it is a brand new clock. A brand new clock should not slow down. That is why the two star rating.

review_title: Great little watch for girls and good price for the quality
review_body: had to buy something small and light-weight to send to Spain as a gift and bought 3 for my nieces there.....they are adorable. The girls loved them and are wearing them daily.

review_title: Best shoe purchase I’ve ever made!!!
review_body: The best purchase I have ever made. My daughter loves them. They are comfortable and she begs to wear them. Living in south Alabama I purchased them for rainy weather but was perfect for our many unexpected snowfalls this year. I will buy her a pair every year as her foot grows!

Bought the green in toddler size 9. They seem to run true to size and my 2 1/2 year old son loves them! They arrived in a timely fashion and from the moment he tried them on, he didn't want to take them off. They are light weight in comparison to other rain boots we've tried on and the color is nice. The handles also make it easy for him to put them on buy himself which is a bonus, and because they're integrated into the structure of the boot I'm not worried about them ripping off over time. His feet get super sweaty (to be expected of course) but so far I have no complaints. It hasn't rained since they arrived last week but it's in the forecast for tomorrow and I'm confident they'll work well. For now, they make excellent garden shoes because they're so easy to wash off!

4 months in these boots are holding up to some daily usage - in puddles - at the park - in the woods - in the snow even (bought some boot liners and they were ok for short periods). They've held up to serious wear without any leaks! I have three little boys and all of them have crocks this year. I'll update my review if they last to through spring - as it is I'm VERY happy with them and plan on buying crocks from now on. The colors are vibrant and fun, they are really easy to clean and dry. They're just great!

My daughter had a field trip in the rain scheduled, and after checking local stores and coming up empty handed, i bought these. The fit as expected. They look cute and I actually like them more than I anticipated. Easily cleaned since like traditional crocs they are unlined. Her feet stayed dry during her field trip and whenever she wears these boots.

review_title: Perfect fit for my 3.5 yr old
review_body: I bought this in size 11 blue color for my 3.5 yr old son and it fits great with a little room to grow. He wore it immediately inside the house and he walked around and played with no problem. I love how light it is compared to other rain boots, perhaps because it's made with plastic opposed to rubber but that doesn't bother me as long as it keeps his feet dry. He was able to put it on and off with ease by himself as well. I would definitely recommend this.

review_title: Cutest Little Boots For a Two Year Old
review_body: I love these boots we got for our two year old daughter. They look so cute on her it's ridiculous. The color is really vibrant, and fun for a little girls mud boots. Our daughter easily puts these on and takes them  off as needed which is great. She loves these boots so much I can simply tell her to get her boots on and she has it done in no time. It is such a relief when you're getting three children out the door, and they don't fuss about their boots. It's also nice that she can easily get them off, when we come back in the house and the muddy boots stay in the mud room.

review_title: Best water/mud boots for kids - they last forever
review_body: These boots are great. We have been through 3 pairs, and the pair that fit first is still in excellent shape and was just passed along to a third child! These boots seriously last forever. According to my daughter they are also quite comfortable. My son wears a similar pair (but blue) everyday.

review_title: Great boots for a great price.
review_body: Bought these boots for my son for a family vacation. Although it didn’t rain once, he still wore them anytime we were outside. We were camping in the woods so these kept out any bugs that may have crawled inside a regular shoe. He was able to walk/run normal and these didn’t seem to bother him at all.

review_title: Barely fits my 10-25% weight/height twins' legs, so I can only imagine kids with bigger legs couldn't fit into these
review_body: The other reviews are correct, Crocs did a TERRIBLE job scaling the legs of these boots for chubby toddler legs.  My girls are really petite still, one of them is only 10th percentile for weight and 25th percentile for height and these are VERY snug fitting on her legs and I bought them a size bigger than they wear!!  They LOVE them and want to wear them all the time, but I imagine they will be outgrowing them long before they are actually a true size 7 toddler (the size of the boots).  They really should improve these as they are sooo much better than most of the other rain boots that have the really heavy soles that most toddlers will struggle walking with.

review_title: These boots are sturdy but very lightweight
review_body: These boots are sturdy but very lightweight. We love the design of the handles that can be pulled on without breaking off like other brands. Downside is that they are short and don't cover the whole calf up to the knees. Toddlers don't just walk in puddles, they jump. This means water will get into the boots anyway unless you caution them every time. Perhaps better suited for older children.
Perfect for what we wanted it for.
This was exactly as pictured. Great quality, arrived on time and fits true to size
Super cute!

So cute with a dress
cute
Very nice fits perfect thanks
Every girl needs a jean jacket.  The dark color is nice to go with different dresses and outfits.

Granddaughter loves her new jacket.

review_title: I bought this watch for my son who is going ...
review_body: I bought this watch for my son who is going to a one week summer camping trip. he loves it, wear it every day since gotten it.

review_title: ... set the time to the current time but its cool other than that
review_body: You can barely set the time to the current time but its cool other than that.

my son loves it

IT WAS GREAT. I loved how it had a stop watch, and an alarm.
Great kid watch. My son loves his!!

review_title: Love the shoe but didn't fit my toddlers wide feet
review_body: This shoe was soooo cute, even in person, however my son has wide feet and this was not wide enough. Wish it came in wider sizes. The Velcro only reached the middle of his foot. It does not look right when the Velcro doesn't line up. I would think that this shoe would actually be too big for most toddler feet. We had a pair of Saucony that I ordered from Amazon before this pair and it came in "Wide width" and was fine. We ordered a gray pair of new balance in extra wide and it fits great. But I did like how these looked better!

review_title: Shoe fits fine. The only thing I don't like is the ...
review_body: Shoe fits fine.  The only thing I don't like is the double loop closure.  It a little difficult for 2 year hand to handle by themselves. Can't quite pull tight enough.  If it were 2 single loop closures I would have give the shoes a 5.  Still, overall this is a great shoe.

These sneakers seem to run a little on the small size, which was fine since I buy my kids' shoes on the big size anyway. These have lasted 5 months of energetic play, are easy for my 3-year-old to get on and off, flexible enough for his feet, and provide good traction in all weather. Plus, they come in a ton of color choices and are reasonably priced. I would buy these again if he wasn't insisting on lights.

These are great little shoes!!! I was having trouble finding shoes that fit my toddler correctly...as soon as I put these on, she was off and running and didn't want to take them off!! They are a little stiff, but I think they will loosen up as she wears them. I will buy these again when she needs a bigger size!
I love These Sauconys for my son. He is wearing a size 10.5 now but I bought it an 11.5 to be able to insert insoles. It was way too big even with the insert.

review_title: We have no problem with bad smell or moisture
review_body: My son loves these shoes! He had them first when he was 26 months old and since than these are the only ones he wants. We have them in all sizes and colors. He is 5 1/2 years old and we just bought size 12. My son is tall but has narrower feet. We live in south Florida and these are his year around sneakers. We have no problem with bad smell or moisture.

review_title: Great looking shoe, but they are no match for an active 3 year old.
review_body: These are a really fun shoe for kids. But they just don't hold up. Normally, I would say something like "For the price tho, who cares?" -- But we have hand me down big box store shoes that are out lasting them.

review_title: Good for unsteady toddlers and quick morning routines!
review_body: I gave a poor review for the little kids Volt shoe because it lacks a rubber sole.  Rubber soled shoes have better traction and last longer for everyday kids shoes.  These, however, are great.  The velcro secures quickly and solidly for out-the-door-quick routines and the rubber sole keeps unsteady toddlers confidently running about without the worry of slipping.  I would order these again.

Got these for the kiddo and didn't expect them to last long, but they're surprisingly durable. The suede (or fake suede not sure) gets dirty a bit easier than other materials, but if you really care I suspect that it can be washed.

review_title: The only brand and style we buy for our toddler
review_body: We really like the Saucony brand for our toddler. They are long lasting and true to size. This is the only brand/style we buy now, and we have a couple of pairs for when one pair is wet or left somewhere. We've had lots of colors (we basically buy the ones that are cheapest at the time of purchase), and all of them are lovely.

review_title: ... for my granddaughter for Christmas I think she will love
review_body: This is for my granddaughter for Christmas I think she will love it

review_title: Cute and girly satisfied but I wish it would have like a light ...

review_title: Seems made well enough for a watch for a young person
review_body: Bought this for our little granddaughter for Christmas, she loves the Frozen characters. Seems to be made well enough for a young person and a good buy.

review_title: I purchased this for my Great Niece, and she just loves it
review_body: I purchased this for my Great Niece, and she just loves it.  She wears the watch all the time.  The most important thing is, that she is starting to tell time.  Great purchase.

review_title: so not bad for the price
review_body: The plastic bits that hold the band in place are a little too loose, so that the watch is in danger of falling off. It was, however, very inexpensive, so not bad for the price.

best quality and good delivery timing thanks

Sweet little watch for a toddler or little girl.  Nice pink leather band, and just the right size for the little one that wants a watch like mommy and daddy.  Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas.  Can't wait.

review_title: It was a better quality than I hoped it would be
review_body: It was a better quality than I hoped it would be. Very smart looking, stylish and quality. I would recommend this for those looking for a very nice looking, not gimmicky watch for a child's first grown up watch. That is what I did for my 4 yr old and 7 yr old granddaughters.
Reviews say it lights up but not true.

review_title: Watch Band Doesn't Last a Month -  Cheap Quality
review_body: Watch band is terrible quality. In a month, the synthetic leather  is peeling and looks horrible. It isn't real leather. Disappointed at the terrible product timex is selling.
Bought this for a 7 year to learn to tell time. She loves it. Numbers are large and easy to read. Good little watch to help children learn to tell time.

The watch works well, the band is durable, and it looks good.  My 7 year-old daughter loved it!  Unfortunately, she lost it after a week.  I sent for the $10 replacement that Timex offers on their kids' watches and they mailed an identical watch within three weeks with no charge for shipping.  Good old Timex; gotta love 'em.

Very good watch for my 9 year old daughter!  Very easy to see numbers!  The strap is very durable and we have worn in during sweaty gym time to playing in the rain, and the quality of the strap is not compromised. There is no peeling or flaking off on the strap.  No discoloration either!

review_title: Great watch for a young girl!
review_body: This watch says in the listing it's 'genuine leather' but on the watch itself it says 'synthetic leather' which was a disappointing.  But, with that being said...it's a very cute, little watch for a young girl.  My almost 8 yr old loved it!  It fits her great!  She loves the Indiglo part of it as well.  Easy to read. Simple in design.  Perfect size.  Reasonable price.  Just wish it was real leather like stated!

review_title: This is the second one we bought exactly the same ...
review_body: This is the second one we bought exactly the same and in both cases the battery runs out very fast and it stops keeping time well after a few months. The first one we replaced the battery but the new battery only lasted a couple of weeks. So we tried again.
Purchased this product as a Christmas gift for my daughter. It is a beautiful first watch.

review_title: But these awesome ballet flats & SIZE UP!!!
review_body: Love these ballet flats!!! My daughter is in LOvE with these and wants to wear them everyday. I did read a lot of reviews on these before purchasing so I knew from others to SIZE UP!! My daughter normally wears between and 6 1/2-7 toddler and I ordered a size 8 and they fit great! I’ll be size up in a few months but for the great prices these are awesome! They are well-made as well. I will definitely purchase again!!

review_title: love the shoe, wide is WIDE
review_body: I love these dance shoes, but I tried a wide for my daughters wide feet and was shocked at how wide the wide was.  I have to buy wide tap shoes and I thought that maybe I should by wide ballet shoes as well.  It was an experiment gone wrong and I had to return the wide ones as no amount of pulling on the strings was going to make them fit.  The shoes themselves are great, I just bought them in regular width instead.  This is our second pair and they look great all year.  The leather is sturdy and when I almost bought the spotlights brand I stopped because I felt that the leather would get worn through.  I like the cute flower inside as well.
Sizing seems inconsistent. Ordered 8 and 81/2 and they were identical in length. Returned both for a 9 and they were huge. Kept the 9 and sinched them up. 4yo will grow into them eventually.

review_title: Finding ballet items is NOT easy without traveling downtown (and no one wants to do ...
review_body: Finding ballet items is NOT easy without traveling downtown (and no one wants to do that).

I am new to dancing, this is my daughter's first dance class. I read lots of reviews and ended up buying her a size 8 shoe for her 7.5 size feet. I also got a wide since she has really wide feet. They do not fit that well. They're way too big all around. They will definitely stay on her feet because of the strap so I think they'll work but I would imagine ballet shoes need to fit a little more snugly than these do. I think I should have bought a size 8 regular, the width seems to be biggest problem. Oh well. We'll see how it goes in her dance class.

My daughter is between a size 10-11. She has some shoes both sizes. I ordered up based on some other reviews. The size 11 was quite a bit too bit and much too wide. I've NEVER had a problem with shoes being too wide for this child. I used Prime, and easily returned the shoes. Second time around I went 10.5 Narrow. They fit great, snug with a little room to grow. In a perfect world, the original size would have worked. But, it's hard to buy shoes/clothes online and expect a perfect fit. Overall I'm very happy, Amazon Prime made the return hassle free.

review_title: but I boughter her normal shoe size and it fit her perfect. The string bow you can untie and pull ...
review_body: Okay these are ballet shoes so arch support... eh, but I boughter her normal shoe size and it fit her perfect. The string bow you can untie and pull to tighten the show if you child has a narrow foot also helps to keep it more on the foot of the child. My daughter loved her shoes and they lasted for her whole class that she took and still going strong. (she is rough on any kind of shoes). I highly recommend.

These work perfectly for my daughter's ballet class. I purchased a full size bigger than her shoe size, because I saw that someone said you should. Also she had tried her size in a different brand and it was too small. These fit close to actual regular shoe size, so my daughter's are a bit big. However, once they are tied up and tucked, she has no problems in them. Great ballet shoes and I recommend these for anyone looking to prepare their child for class.

Most people know you need to order up two sizes for ballet shoes. Even with that they ran just a teensy bit small. It wasn't enough to be an issue. The quality is great. This is the same brand our studio uses.

I've seen a lot of reviews complaining about size but we've used capezio daisy style for two years and have been pleased with their quality. Her first pair came from a dance store and was rather pricey, so this was a great alternative. As for sizing, I asked her dance teacher. She was 3 wearing a size 10 ballet shoe which she wore for 2 dance seasons. Her street shoe size was an 9, but when you tighten the strings it gives you a size down and gives you room to grow, plus it's leather so it will stretch as it softens. She's in an 11/12 street shoe now so we purchased an 11.5 ballet shoe and she has a thumb width and a good size of width. Once strings tightened they were perfect. Another option, like I saw others post, is to get them fitted at the store, but beware some dancewear stores will charge you a fitting fee if you do not purchase. My daughters dance teacher was spot on with her size. I will definitely be buying online again.
Good quality as always with Carhart.
We bought this for Christmas and it is so large. My daughter might fit it next year.

review_title: The only thing that could make this jacket better is thumb holes
review_body: The only thing that could make this jacket better is thumb holes. I love it for my daughter. It's cute, super soft and warm!
My little girl loves this coat, she is a 6 but it is a little big but she says it is super warm!!
Great quality, adorable, and very pleased with product
Just as stated.  This is going to make a great Christmas gift for my daughter. Thank you for the prompt shipment.
SUPER fast shipping. Love this jacket, perfect for Oklahoma winters. Great seller.
Great quality. Looks great.

review_title: but in a good roomy way
review_body: slightly larger...but in a good roomy way. Gives her opportunity to wear longer.
Love it!!! Not too still for a 1 year old...will purchase more as she grows!

Daughter loves her watch
Great gift for kids
It looked adorable and worked just fine.... For 2 days. Then the numbers on the outside face started to wear off just by slightly rubbing. Very low quality.
Awesome
It's cute and my daughter loved it but it never "tick-tocked" and never worked.  and at this price point, the hassle of returning it because it's so bad is really frustrating.
My daughter loves this watch!
Bought this for my 2 year old daughter- she is a big fan of Minnie Mouse. She absolutely loves this watch and regularly wears it.
I got this watch for my niece for her birthday. It was nicer than I thought. She loves it.

review_title: the watch time setter would not work, it broke ...
review_body: the watch time setter would not work, it broke trying to pull it out to set.  never worked for one second

I bought this from a memory of myself getting a Timex teaching watch many many years ago from my godmother. Since my daughter is learning time in school, I thought it was the perfect gift. She hasn't taken it off in 5 days. The light feature, which is blue, is great. She feels she can get up in the night & check the time. Its cute of her for now. Many have complained about the strap closure. SO FAR, it still remains on tight. I'll update this if that changes. All & all for the smile on her face & the price, it was a perfect gift.

My 4 year old showed an interest in reading a watch so I was looking for something that makes it easy to tell the hands apart, that's comfortable for a little one and something that doesn't break on the first fall. First off, it does all that. However, it stops there. The watch feels really cheap. I didn't expect a Rolex but this is something you get in a goodie bag at a kid's birthday. The time runs behind a couple of minutes after a day. It's unfortunate. This could have been a nice watch. Don't recommend.

My 10 year old daughter was in need of a watch.  She checks in every 30 minutes while playing and I wanted something affordable, but that would last and be durable while she's out playing.  She loves the butterflies on the wrist band and it's been a great little watch for her.  The band is Velcro and nice and comfortable on her wrist.

i bought this watch for my five year old granddaughter who wanted a specific kind of watch for christmas.  this one was perfect.  it was her favorite color.  she and i both liked the "to" and "past" features printed on the watch face.  also, the minute hand and the hour hand are both marked, which has been a big help to her in learning to tell time.  she wanted to actually learn to tell time and did not want a digital watch.  as it turns out, the watch is waterproof as well.  the elastic strap i adjustable and comfortable on her little wrist.  she loves her watch and it is just perfect for her.

review_title: Adorable but not a very good time teacher.
review_body: The watch is adorable. Perfect size for my 6 year old. No buckles to deal with just slip right on over the wrist. She hasn't lost it yet. My daughter is learning to tell the time. And she is pretty good at it.

review_title: Too bad -- it could have been perfect
review_body: Will be returning this one..........
this is my second timex kids watch.  I have a small wrist and they are comfortable.  I am not has happy with this one as the band adjustment does not stay in place.  I am considering sewing it.

review_title: I should have trusted the poor reviews. I find this to be more an ...
review_body: Did not work when it arrived. I wish I had tested it first as it was a gift for my granddaughter's birthday. I should have trusted the poor reviews. I find this to be more an Amazon issue as this one looked like it may have been returned. The watch itself is adorable. I bought this same watch through Target and it works perfectly and is adorable.

My daughter was really excited when she received this as a present, but the first time she put it on, the band already came off.  This continues to be a problem and I am will have to see about getting a different type of band because I do not want her to lose the watch.  It also looks a lot cheaper than it actually was, and the band actually makes the watch as cute as it is.  So if you want a watch for a child that needs to wear it to school etc, you may wish to consider buying something with a velcro band or they do not lose it right away.

I bought this watch for a 6 year old girl.  Her 7year old brother was getting a watch, so I knew she'd have an interest once she saw that.  It's a very cute watch and she loved it.  I loved the "girly" watch without any princess or licensed movie characters on it!

review_title: i haven't tried to put it under the water but it works great.
review_body: Wear it everyday, i haven't tried to put it under the water but it works great.
It's just as it was described.  My daughter loves it.
Great product! Very easy for my daughter. Neat design and cool features! Would definitely recommend!

I bought this for my daughter and she likes it. The light is a good amount in low-light situations without being blinding in a dark room. Overall, it is a solid kid's watch that can take some bumps and scrapes.
amazing price with product. cute face....

review_title: It's built to last and it looks great!!
review_body: The watch is exactly what my daughter was looking for!! It's built to last and it looks great!!
My granddaughter loved this watch, especially the color changing feature.
Purchased this for my nine years old Granddaughter.  Great quality.  Perfect for her as she wanted waterproof.

review_body: Got this for my daughter and she wears it everyday!  The functions are easy for her to use and the color is perfect
Great gift. Neice loved it.
Love it well made... slightly large with a little room to grow in!

I was looking for a jean jacket for my granddaughter.  I found this one at a great price.  Great quality and fit very well.
Great jacket...fit like it should.
Daughter Loves it.  Got it for her 10th birthday.  Seems to be good quality. So far so good
This was a gift sent directly to my granddaughter.  She loves it.
Well made and very cute.
Sent it back because it doesn't have any pockets. The chest pockets are fake. It was also pretty small and short.
Fit nice, will work nicely.
great material. did not fade after washing

Bought these last fall, and it's now been a yr. I bought these two sizes too big for my 4 yr old and he is just now ready for the next size up. He literally wore them every single day and the are holding up amazing, just dirty. They are lightweight and completely waterproof. He gets complemented every single day.
My 7 year old son loves this watch

We *love* these boots!  They're lightweight and easy to put on.  When we moved to WA state we got a pair for our 6yr old and 2yr old - the youngest loves them very much and is always wearing them.  She can put them on and take them off herself, she runs and walks with no problem.  We'll keep buying bigger sizes as needed.

review_title: Perfect for jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
review_body: Our 2.5 year old daughter LOVES these boots! She made us go make puddles with the hose in the driveway the moment she got them on her feet. They are true to size, but we do notice that her feet sweat a lot in them. She gets annoyed by that, but the problem is easily solved if she wears socks.

My boys have been begging to jump in puddles and I really didn't want them getting their regular shoes wet and I was worried about their feet getting to cold if they were bare footed. I went to 7 different stores and came up empty handed so I went on amazon and found these. I bought a size up like other reviews suggested and they are large on my boys but they will just be able to wear them longer. They said they are comfy and work great.

review_title: narrow topmakes it hard to pull on
review_body: When we were able to get them on, they were so cute and we got lots of compliments. But most of the time, we struggled to get my daughter’s feet past the top part because it’s so narrow. It’s a shame because they’re lightweight and the solid, bright colors were exactly what I was looking for.

review_title: Great, inexpensive boots.  We purchased a 2nd pair!
review_body: Ordered a yellow pair for my 7yr old daughter for Halloween (and the rain) and my 4yr old son fell in love with them.  Ended up ordering him a green pair too.  Great, light weight boots to wear in the rain, or to bed as my son prefers.  Very easy to take on and off.  True to size.  I recommend!

Was going to send back because appeared too snug on my 1 1/2 yr-old's chunky calves (he wears an 8 sneaker), but he wore them everyday around the house and refused to take them off. Eventually he ripped the tags off so we are keeping, Wish they were a 9.

review_title: My two year old son can easily put it on and take it off himself
review_body: My two year old son can easily put it on and take it off himself.  I love Crocs boots because they are so light and not as clunky as other rain boots when the kids have to walk or run while playing.  The color is slightly on the lighter blue side but this is not an issue with me.

These Croc rain boots are really great!  My 3 year old immediately loved the pink color, and she could easily pull them onto her feet.  We didn't wear them in the rain because the size 9 was way too big for her size 7.5 feet.  We ended up getting this boot in an 8, and they are perfect with a little room to grow.  These come in a variety of colors, and although my daughter initially loved the pink ones, I found some adorable yellow ones that I liked better.

As other reviews said, these are light for rain boots and allow for you to up size for growth. My son is currently in 7.5 sneakers and we bought a 9. They stay on, but I feel like there is room for growth which is nice. He loves these boots, doesn't want to take them off even when it is not raining or wet out.
Perfect gift for a child.

review_title: I love that it shows both the time digitally and analog ...
review_body: My 5 yo son LOVES this watch and hardly ever takes it off! I love that it shows both the time digitally and analog as well as the date and day. My son has already learned how to tell the time using it and loves to tell me what the time is every couple minutes :)
Terrible never works.
my son loves it very much! thanks.

review_title: Broke very Easy and Was Cheaply made
review_body: It was Okay...Broke very Easy and Was Cheaply made.....

review_title: Great and the kids love the watch
review_body: Great and the kids love the watch. Before I could get to one of my nephews. He had already tried out the waterproof by putting it under running water. I was disappointed that he did that before I warned him but the good part is it is waterproof and it is still working.
Ah

These look nice, fit perfectly on kids wrists. The face is a little more complicated than I thought it would be with the analog and digital for kids but it’s still neat. The directions aren’t great. The bands don’t look all that durable or comfortable. For the price point it’s not a bad deal and it seems like a good watch to start with.
Nice

review_title: ... old son loves these shoes and they look very cool! He's big for his age and has wide ...
review_body: My 3 year old son loves these shoes and they look very cool!  He's big for his age and has wide feet, making it difficult to find shoes that fit him correctly.  We got the 10M size and they are wide enough (there is a little bit of extra velcro where the strap doesn't make it all the way over), but think we will order a 10W next time.  He says they are very comfortable and there are no areas where the shoes rub him on his feet.  He calls them his "fast shoes" because they have great traction, are light weight, and make it easy for a toddler to be active.  Highly recommend!

my daughter normally wears Puma shoes and wore a size 4. i thought i'd order a size up so she could grow into them, and ordered a 5.5. when we got them, her foot couldnt even fit in the shoe! i sent them back and got a 6.5 and now her foot could go in, but the large velcro strap won't even come close to reaching the other side, so it looks funny.

review_title: Great shoes - my daughter puts them to the test and they rock!
review_body: Love these sneakers! My daughter is on her 4th or 5th pair - we recently changed color schemes, but we always by her the Jazz Hook & Loop. She so active that she needs the traction and these have been the best for her. Thank you!

We do love this style of shoes they fit well, my twins can put them on without help and they can run well in them, I was a lil disappointed in the color. We ordered the navy and what looked like burgundy but it was more of a red.

review_title: My kids are super hard in their shoes
review_body: This is the second pair I've bought for my son, and if his feet didn't grow so fast, he'd probably be able to use the first pair for quite some time. My kids are super hard in their shoes, and these Saucony sneakers withstand the harsh treatment, much to my delight. I've considered a four-star rating because the fit is a bit on the tight side, especially when slipping them on, but the durability out-stands the fit issue. I cannot recommend these enough if what you're looking for are shoes that'll last months of kiddie play.

he loves these and wants to wear them all of the time.  i went by other reviews that said these were 'wide' shoes & they really aren't if you have a child with a WIDE foot.  the straps dont close all the way across the top, so wide foot moms & dads beware. if you have a TRUE wide foot (kid that needs XW's in others) these will not fit or stretch to fit your child.  I still let him wear them bc he's in love with the green color but it urks me that the strap is like half across his foot, ha ha.  Doesn't bother him though so i just let him wear regardless :)

review_title: We have tried cheaper shoes from Target or Old Navy but they never seemed to be a good value and would look worn very quickly
review_body: These shoes were so worth the purchase! We have tried cheaper shoes from Target or Old Navy but they never seemed to be a good value and would look worn very quickly. My daughter even has a pair of TOMS she loves but started to look worn within a few uses. She wears these almost all day at daycare and plays hard in them and they stand up to it. Also, she just beamed when they came out of the package. She likes to wear them and sometimes asks to put them on when we are just around the house. The best thing about these is that my child has small feet, so finding shoes that will fit her that help her get traction as a new walker was difficult and these fit her perfectly with a little room for growth and have great soles for walking -- even on a playground with cedar chips.

I love these shoes.  I have bought versions of these for my daughter for years.  They are the only athletic shoes I'll buy for my kids.  They are super easy to get on and off (just one Velcro strap), are comfy (meaning she's never complained that they weren't), they hold up well (they'd grow out of them before anything even starts to fall apart),and have super cute colors! They are a little pricey, but well worth it for how much use we've gotten out of them.  LOVE THEM!!!

These are cute on, and my toddler will bring them to me, so it's a win! When it's time to size up, I'll be back. We got the gray with green and they're a lot of fun. It's nice to break away from the typical colors.

review_title: I feel like I have to smoosh my sons feet into them ...
review_body: These are ok. I feel like I have to smoosh my sons feet into them and I bought them a size bigger then he currently wears in other shoes. I do make him wear them with socks (which is why I bought the larger size...) but I still worry they his little toes are a little crunched up in there so he doesn't ever wear them long periods of time.
Gift for my great grand daughter.

review_title: A great gift for a five year old
review_body: Arrived as promised. A great gift for a five year old!

The battery was already dead when I bought it.  Apparently, the battery is an unusual size because I haven't been able to find a replacement locally.  My daughter loves it, but would like it a lot more if it worked.
great product
my 4 year old loves this. We had to make one more hole in the band but that was no big deal. It's flexible and doesn't cut into her wrist at all.

review_title: My daughter loves that this is Frozen, but after ...
review_body: My daughter loves that this is Frozen, but after just 2 months, the battery died.  Of course its a kind that is not sold in the store.

review_body: I like them but before I could put it on my daughter, it broke. We had to fix it which took 2 people and an hour. But she loves it so that is all that matters

Lattice for my 5 year old niece's birthday she really likes to watch

review_title: Watch is cute and perfect size as it is small
review_body: Just got this watch for a skills check for my doctorate of physical therapy program for vitals. Watch is cute and perfect size as it is small, but stopped working within 5 hours of getting the watch- before my exam! A little disappointed....

review_title: Great Little Watch, Can't go wrong with a TImex
review_body: I got this for my 9 year old grand-daughter for Christmas and she loves it!  Makes her feel like a grown up. She really wanted a watch and I wanted an old fashion watch for her with real numbers on the face, not a digital. Can not really tell what is the difference between this and any other Timex except that it is pink.  I kinda want one for myself.  Every minute (not much more then that), we know what time it is.  I am sure it will last a long time like all Timexs.

This watch is just the right size for a 7-year old girl making her lst Communion.  Many watches are too large for a 7-year old girl plus the leather strap has adjustment that can be made.  For the money, I think it's a great deal.  Timex watches in the past have been very reliable,  Time will tell.

I was looking for a first watch for my 8 year old.... and found this.  I read the reviews and decided to go for it.  Even though it was rather inexpensive, I liked the construction and simplicity of it.  My daughter loves it and has no problem telling time.  Everyone's happy.

review_title: Perfect for an adult with small wrists!
review_body: I am an adult with a very small 5-1/2" wrist. I was happy to find this children's size wristwatch without the usual cartoon or Disney characters.  The synthetic leather strap has 8 holes and I wear it on the 3rd smallest.  The holes are approximately 1/4 inch apart so I think it would comfortably fit up to a 6-1/4 inch wrist.

I bought this watch for my 7 year old daughter because she wanted a watch that lit up.  The watch arrived and the light didn't work. I requested an exchange.  The light on the second watch also didn't work.
My daughter was very happy to receive the watch, but it was losing significant time within a couple of weeks.  Moving on to a Casio, which hopefully has better quality control.
Great watch,as expected,great size forms 10ur.old daughter.She lives it.
Great buy. Nice starter watch for my pre-teen grand-daughter. She loves it.

review_title: Made a little girl very happy.
review_body: A present for a little girl in Nikolaev, UA. She asked her mom to put it on her wrist and after a few lessons she was proudly telling everyone what time it was for the whole day. I greatly enjoyed the experience.

Our dance instructor measured my daughter's feet. Of course she lost one slipper right away.. So I ordered the same size through Capezio. When it arrived it could have fit another foot in the toe of the shoe! That's how large it was. So I figured "okay, different company, maybe different fit" and ordered same shoe a WHOLE size smaller. Same thing. Actually nearly no difference between the two. They really need to advise people of their fit. Which foot measurement equals each shoe size. I'm paying to return their shoes which seems a bit unfair. Especially since a professional made very clear as to my childs ballet slipper size. And also, I have purchased from other companies that collaborate with our instructor.

Good quality ballet shoe and not much more expensive than the bargain ballet shoes.  Totally worth the small extra price.  I bought some ballet shoes from a bargain retailer and they were scratchy and uncomfortable and fit poorly, and were a continual problem, so I had to bite the bullet and buy the Capezios.  Much, much better!
These are adorable and well-made. I accidentally bought two sizes up a first, which were way too big. My daughter wears a 12 (sometimes an 11.5) and fits in a 13 in these. 👍🏼

review_title: my dilemma worked out like this: Instead of deducting my daughter's shoe size ...
review_body: So. I know that when it comes to ballet points and slippers it becomes a very puzzling choice in regard to the correct size to choose.

These are the standard shoes for ballerinas. Amazon prize is great. The pink is more flesh toned than other options found at super stores. Ballet shoes are meant to fit snug, so be sure to buy slightly large for your young daughter so you aren't purchasing a new pair each month. For the year my 3 year old has been in class, we have purchased two pair because she grows, not because they wear out.
My kid usually wears a size 4 in shoes. I had to size up to a 6.5 in these! (I first ordered the 6 which did fit snug, but wouldn't last her long so I traded for the 6.5.)

review_title: Great price for leather ballet shoes
review_body: Great price for leather ballet shoes. It fits as expected and my daughter says they are comfortable. We have had several other pairs of ballet shoes and always come back to Capezio Daisy!

review_title: Capezio's never disappoint - they are the same brand I wore when ...
review_body: My grandgirl has tiny feet for her age.  Finding ballet shoes that actually fit her feet was impossible in all the stores in our area.  I was very concerned about ordering these shoes online since there was no way to check the fit.  I went to the Capezio website, as others have suggested, and used their recommendations for size.  They fit perfectly!  Capezio's never disappoint - they are the same brand I wore when I was a little girl - anything that stays around that long has to be good!  :)

This review isn’t based on quality as my child has not worn them yet. They do seem very good quality though. I was totally unsure on what size to get based on reviews. My child wears an 11 in street shoes. I got a 12.5 n based on reviews and they were far too big. She has way too much growing room for them to be worn safely. I went ahead and ordered an 11.5 n and am hoping those will fit better.

review_title: ... purchased was a size 7 that fit my daughter fine (ran small but the reviews had said that)
review_body: The first pair I purchased was a size 7 that fit my daughter fine (ran small but the reviews had said that). So when she grew out of them, I bought a 9. When they were delivered, they were practically the same size as the 7...so I returned them and got size 10....which are HUGE. I will save them for her to grow into but something is very off with the sizing.
Great winter coat. My daughter loves it and says it is super snuggly!
Excellent jacket.
Very well made

review_title: My daughter is 3 and she love her coat
review_body: My daughter is 3 and she love her coat! I would buy again. Do not recommend putting in dryer, let it hang dry.
