review_title: This was perfect. I was able to wash it over and ...
review_body: This was perfect.  I was able to wash it over and over and it held up well. I was a little worried about the sizing but it seems to be true to size.
Great product!!
Me gusto mucho
Great quality
Fast shipping. Product as described.
It has very low quality. The face detached after few days, then hands and other things.

This is a nice looking watch. It also seems like it is might hold up well to ordinary wear by a little child. Unfortunately, mine arrived not working. It could have been a dead battery. I will never know because I was unable to open it using moderate force to check the battery, and I did not aim to break anything trying. ("Back in the day" just running a fingernail under the edge of the backplate seemed to be sufficient. Just saying...) The warranty information, from Accutime I believe, indicated that I could ship it to them for a battery replacement with a money order for more than $7 for return shipping. In other words, by the time I got done paying for shipping and return shipping, I could have bought the watch over again. Then who knows exactly when I would see the watch again? Surely not in the two weeks between now and Christmas. No thank you. Easiest to send it back to the source, Amazon. I will try looking for something like this in a brick and mortar store.
My 3 year old loves this watch and it has held up well. Would purchase again.
Amazon always comes through!
Best was that the recipient, a developmentally disabled young girl, loved it, put it on at once.  It is attractive and appears to be well constructed as well.
For a 2 year old.  Cute factor is off the charts.
Ok
Nice
This is an awesome watch. My granddaughter loves it and it's helping her with learning to tell time.

review_title: Minnie is her favorite. 4 years old
review_body: My cousin loves it. Minnie is her favorite. 4 years old, and already telling time.

This watch is cute, but not very durable. I didn't have really high expectations for the price, but the first time my daughter wore it to school she apparently fell against something and the watch face is ruined. Even at this low price point I'd expect a better, more durable plastic for the watch face.
Very happy with this watch.  Nice size for a 10yo.  The size is easy to adjust since the band is made of a stretch material.  Very pretty, would recommend it.

review_title: Amazing Quality and Value for kid's learning time!
review_body: Best watch I have found! I am giving this to my 6 yo for christmas. It was the only watch that was water resistant, has labeled hour and second hands, color highlighted half hour marks, easy to read second marks and flexible comfortable straps. The watch even comes with a lifetime warranty for defectiveness and loss. I couldn't ask for a better deal! All under $20, what a great learning to tell time device! She has been begging for a watch and I know we will get good use out of this watch and that it will truly last! Thank you Timex for creating a watch considering the adverse situations it may endure with our little ones!
Great! My daughter loves the teaching clock, watch, and the flash cards too! Arrived intact, clean, and looking like they’re indeed brand new! Very happy with this purchase!

I like the watch but the face is a little small.  My real problem with it, however, is the strap.  It is like a buckle without holes, but since my daughter's wrist is little, it keeps getting too loose and falling off of her wrist.  I actually can fit it easily on my wrist and wear it.  It might be better for a child around the age of 9 or 10, but I don't know if they would like it.  I think they would.

I got this for my 3 year old for Christmas to start learning how to tell the time. It stays on her wrist very well and she loves it! It's safe to wear in the bath and to swimming lessons which is important to me. She doesn't quite know how to use it yet, but i like that she is getting the idea. And it comes with a great warranty and the price was perfect!!

review_title: My 6 year old likes it. I wish the ...
review_body: My 6 year old likes it.  I wish the plastic on the watch was scratch resistance, there's a scratch on it that makes it difficult to see the numbers on the watch.

I bought this for my 7 year old who had pretty much learned to tell time, but this reinforced the non-digital aspect.  It was something pretty that could allow her to run down the street to her friend and be home on time: responsibility.

review_title: The winder stem came all the out
review_body: The watch is cute and will help my daughter who has dyslexia to learn time.  She is not confused by the "half past" but at 30 minutes after the hour, the minutes go back by five...to demonstrate the "until" side.  It will take some getting used to.  The only other issue is that the stem came all the way out when I tried to set it the first time. She liked it enough that I couldn't get it off of her to return...so we will have to see if we need to get another one if it doesn't function.

I got this for my daughter. She loves the colors and the soft wristband. She also really likes that the seconds are displayed by a butterfly. She specifically wanted an analog watch. She happily wears it all the time. We are very happy with this purchase.
Daughter loves it! The light is red not purple, I've read some other reviews that say it changes colors so I will have to look into that.
Timely shipment, grand kids were thrilled

Very cute watch - my daughter loves it! Nice and sturdy. The only negative is that it is a pain in the butt to set the time, date and alarm. Would be nice to have very clear instruction card - step by step. Otherwise, very happy.

It’s super cute. Large face. I was a bit disappointed at first because my daughter wanted the pink backlight. I came here to post a review on my disappointment but learned that you can change the color of the backlight by holding button “A” (top left) down for three seconds. She hasn’t had a chance to wear it yet but I will adjust my rating according over the next few days.
I bought this as a gift. She really liked it. It is working great.
What more do I need, my daughter, loves it. And it works properly, and the changing colors are really cool for a kid.
Great birthday present for granddaughter.
My daughter loves her new watch. Didn't even realize it had a stopwatch and alarm feature when we purchased. Bonus!

review_title: 10 year old birthday girl loves it
review_body: this was a gift for my 10 year old grand daughter's birthday.  She is thrilled with it - she and i chose it together from the amazon site after exploring many watches.  This has features she didn't know it would have (and neither did I) like a changing colored light and an alarm.  She hasn't taken it off in the week she has owned it and really loves it - hope it continues to serve her well.

review_title: Perfect fit and easy to program
review_body: My dd Ives her watch and love the fact that she's more responsible with her time!
Super cute and fit as expected.
Very cute jacket. Daughter used it right away.
Great jacket. Quality material, and very cute
My child loves it.
It fit just right it is a nice jean jacket
omg this jacket was cuter than I thought ..it fits perfectly ..my daughter was so happy with this jacket..it goes with alot of outfits...perfect ..and really pretty
great quality
Runs small but exchanged with no problem
Cute jacket!  Nice color, very stylish.  Christmas gift so I don't know about the fit yet!
Great quality and very cute.

review_title: After a month all lights quit working. Even though ...
review_body: So far it's a great little watch.
nice deliver

I'm giving this watch 3 stars because it seems like a great watch and we like the features. I got this for  my son for Christmas and it is very uncomfortable for him,  the metal adjuster seems to dig into his wrist.... this may not be a problem for most people however my son is very sensitive.

review_title: This watch is a great gift for kids
review_body: This watch is a great gift for kids, easy to use, it looks nice and high quality, excellent packaging.

My boys 8 and 9 yrs old were excited to receive these as gifts.  I didnt think they would in this age of technology but they truly enjoy their watches.  The watches are water resistant and they were excoted to wear them in the shower.

review_title: My son's favorite color is green and the second one is blue
review_body: I bought this watch and another watch for my two kids. My son's favorite color is green and the second one is blue. So he chose this one. This watch is very "stylish" for him and he loves it. My son is leaning the analog time -- which means that it is great to have both times on one watch. Overall good little watch for kids with a very reasonable price.
Bought this for my son, 15 yrs old, sets alarms and switches between military and standard time. Has had it and used it daily for 4 months with no issues. Great value and his favorite color is green.
This is a cool kid watch, I bought it as a birthday gift and I can see the joy on the kid's face. He immediately wore it and jumped into the swimming pool with it.
got it for my 7 year old and its a bit big for his arm other than that its great it does it all
This gift was well received by my 10 year old grandson.  He quickly mastered all the settings. Now he says he's ready for a Rolex!

Bought these for my 4 year old with ASD and sensory issues because he is extremely picky when it comes to shoes. Crocs are always my go-to brand when purchasing for him. He just got into a size 10 in shoes so I ordered both a 10 and an 11. The 10 fit just fine but I decided to keep the 11 as it would last longer. He walks just fine in them, not wobbling or walking out of them as he did with a brand that we tried previously. Not a lot of room to tuck pants but you can manage. Super light-weight and indeed waterproof. Everywhere we've been people have stopped us to ask where to get a pair for their kid. A lot were surprised that they were Crocs brand. They only thought crocs made clogs. I actually liked my sons boots so much that I bought myself the womens Crocs jaunt boots. They are super comfy.

These are amazing!! Bought for my almost-3-year-old and they are lightweight and comfortable. I originally bought the Kamik's and they were too small, so i returned and bought these.  He LOVES his original Croc's so this was an easy win for both of us.  He loves them, they're comfy, he can still run and play and they're affordable. PLUS he can put them on and take them off himself.

I really like these rain boots but anything below a 6 is a real tight squeeze. Size 7 and above seems much better. The foot bed is ok but the ankle portion is really tight. and pants don't really fit in the boot and must go over unless your child is wearing leggings. And their foot does get sweaty inside. But both my kids love their boots and will wear them all day long. I find them true to size but always order up a size or two to get more use out of them.

review_title: Ordered a size up and love!
review_body: Can't go wrong. Our daughter loves crocs, so the rainboots were a no brainer. They are super light and easy to put on. I'm really glad I ordered a size larger because as you can see in the picture, they are about the same size as her Target brand 6t boots.

They are easy to get on for a 2 year old.  However, they are only easy for us to get on without socks. FYI.  Socks make them hard to get on her at this age.  Her body temp keeps her feet warm enough in them though. When I take them off, her feet are warm.  She has wide feet too and these work.  We are happy with them!  And they are cute! Sizing is as expected.

review_title: These are hands down the BEST rainboots ever for little kids
review_body: These are hands down the BEST rainboots ever for little kids! They are light weight, washable inside and out, and are just so darn cute! We have been through several sizes of these boots by now and just keep buying them as they are outgrown. Unless the kids get old enough that they don't think they're cool any more, I am sure we'll just keep buying them around here. :)

I bought these as a back-up pair for my son to have at his preschool because we loved his first pair so much.  They are light weight (like all croc's are) and are very comfortable for his wide and high arched feet.  He puts them on himself and is excited to wear them.  They are very easy to rinse off when they get muddy.  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because his first blue pair is cuter.  The first pair has the nautical- looking white grommets, instead of handle pulls at the sides on this pair. He has had his first pair for maybe 9 months and they are still looking great, so I expect these boots will perform similarly well.  After reading the reviews about the problems with the other kinds and brands of boots (heavy, stiff, narrow fit, sole splits from the body of the boot, liner can't get wet, child refuses to wear them), I chose to spend a little more on these and I haven't regretted it for a moment!

review_title: Lightweight favorite for my 2 year old
review_body: My 2 year old loves his rain boots and will wear them all day at preschool. They are lightweight and seem easy to wear. With no liner, they are easy to clean when they get muddy puddle water inside.  We also have a pair for my 5 year old who likes them as well.

review_title: Kids have worn them several times and really enjoy how lightweight they are
review_body: We got them after a rainy, soaking day at the pumpkin patch, in preparation for the much anticipated "El Nino" winter in SoCal. Kids have worn them several times and really enjoy how lightweight they are. They are wide all around but that's the normal Crocs wear. Also got some Jibbitz to decorate their Crocs off ebay for dirt cheap. Ordered green and yellow Crocs about 2 sizes up to account for this socks/leggings/jeans/future feet growth. All the kids in my eldest daughter's class were touching them. Let's just say we don't get much rain, let alone the need for rainboots, in SD very often. Looking forward to a rainy, rainy winter. Cute as all heck!

These are absolutely darling.  Same soft Crock material, great vibrant pink color & they fit like a charm.  My 3 year old has a slinder foot so I was worried these would slip but they fit great. The Crock material is perfect for every food size, it has a give yet it hugs the foot.  My daughter wore these around the house for 3 days before it even rained.  They are still her favorite boots.  Great buy for any weather.  I will buy them again next year.

review_title: Love the red but it faded to rust pink after ...
review_body: Last forever. Except the color. Love the red but it faded to rust pink after the first wash. I know they aren't technically washable but I was hoping. Coming back to this over a year later-- this were passed on to a little friend and they are still going strong!  Aside from the color fading I'm impressed by how well these shoes held up!

I would love my daughter to dress in trendy, cool, Suri Cruise like clothes, but the truth is that she loves Hello Kitty, Barbie and PINK. She has flat feet that fall inwards so I also wanted to purchase ones that had good support. I knew that I would need to spend some money so was planning on getting Stride Rites but none of them were standing out to me. I chose the pink ones knowing that she'll actually wear them. And I was right! She loves them. Wears them whenever she's not sleeping. They are actually really cute and they look a little trendier than the Dora shoes she would have liked! And she's not complaining of sore legs every night. Perfect.

So cute and very well made! Great for any little kid that's runs around. BUT they are a bit narrow. I didn't think she had wide feet, but my daughter says they hurt when I try to strap them down and keeps rubbing her pinky toe. Really disappointed because it's $40 down the drain. If your little one has narrow feet, these will be perfect!

These are great shoes for a toddler! My 2 year old son has worn these almost everyday for the past 2 months and they still look great. Not in new condition of course, but they have held up really well.

review_title: good quality, easy to get on and off for ...
review_body: cute, good quality, easy to get on and off for a 5 year old who can't tie her shoes yet. My only issue is the Velcro strap doesn't pull all the way over to the side, as shown in the picture, I think the shoe is a little narrow so if your child has wide feet, I wouldn't recommend them.

Great quality shoe! Always buy this brand for all 3 of my boys. This particular style shoe is my favorite. My younger 2 boys are very picky about their shoes. They are 1 & 3 years old so it's all about comfort to them. It's clear these are comfortable bc they actually keep these on their feet. The fit is as expected. They hold up nicely for the money. And the bonus is they are cute!

Great quality shoes- much better than I expected. My daughter is 10 months old, 24lbs, and has somewhat chubby feet... we ordered a 4M and they fit well. I may look into ordering 4W next time since I can't pull the Velcro strap fully over her foot. It works and is snug on her foot but a wide might fit her chubby feet better. She's just staring to walk and balance- right away I noticed her balance was better ! Love these shoes!!

I have a 22 month old son who has being wearing Saucony shoes since he starting walking at 10 months old. We have tried a wide variety of other brands and none of them are as comfortable for him or stay on as well as these do. His previous pair he stomped in garden mud and played in the yard to the point that they looked "destroyed" but I threw them in the washer and you would've never known. These are even better in design as they are easier to wipe off and keep clean. He absolutely loves his red shoes, so we've bought them in different sizes as his feet grow! Highly recommend and will be buying more in the future.

review_title: Great shoes that fit as expected
review_body: Great shoes that fit as expected.  We bought the wide pair that seem to fit my son better.  The velcro makes it easy for little kids to get shoes on and off easily, especially when you are in a hurry.  I recommend these shoes for any busy parent.

We love these sneakers. My 18 month old asks to put them on all the time.  They fit as expected.  She doesn't have very wide or chubby feet though, so our main concern is just getting the right length and these are perfect.  So cute and practical.  This is our third pair, just growing into the next size!
Durable but battery died quickly after 2 weeks. I hope it is the battery. I CANT OPEN THE WATCH so I am going to take it to watch repair place.

review_title: Okay but not what i was looking for
review_body: This product was great at first, I bought it for my daughter. After about 1 hour of use, the time wouldn't go to the time you set it at. It kept setting it at 5:12. If you are really looking forward to setting the time, then I would not recommend this product.
my niece loves this.  nice gift at affordable price.
Frozen and little girls great mix. Works as it should and it's cute. Not much else to say.
Needs more holes to adjust to smaller wrist!

review_title: The watch is cute, but the band is clearly ...
review_body: The watch is cute, but the band is clearly NOT for children.  It fits me and we had to make two new holes to fit my granddaughters wrist.  I don't know why they make a kids watch with an adult band
They are very nice just as pictures , one is showing the digital numbers and the other one is blank not sure if battery has died. If paper is blocking battery is will update my review
Our daughter has been wanting a watch and this will go with her birthday present.  :)
Cute, but kind of cheap. It's a true children's watch and great for them to learn time on a digital face with the popular frozen sisters. Glad I got it for her to get used to a watch on her wrist.
Came with a dead battery - not worth paying to have a battery put into a $10 watch.  Returning to amazon.
Cute watch, works well for my daughter, easy to read. Would purchase again.

review_title: the quality seems better than the other watches I bought at Amazon which ...
review_body: For less $20, the quality seems better than the other watches I bought at Amazon which didn't last for more than several months. I guess it is from Timex a reputable company than some other unknown companies selling things here.

This was a Christmas gift for my grand-daughter. She wanted a watch and this was the perfect starter watch for her. She loved it. She has small wrists and with the numerous holes in the band, she was able to get it to fit just right.

review_title: Stopped working (battery died maybe) after 3 days.
review_body: It is as expected. Nice and neat. However it stopped working on the day 3. It might be the battery. I am going to take a risk and change the battery.
I bought this pink timex watch for my 6 year old daughter so she can start learning how to tell time. It is exactly as pictured with the easy numbers to read and soft leather watch band.
Since this is a Christmas gift, I cannot comment for the recipient. However I like it a lot - the color, the large simple dial, the size seem perfect.

This watch is so perfect and simple for a little girls first GROWN-UP looking watch. Gave it to my Grandaughter for her 7th birthday (all she wanted was a grown-up looking watch--NOT a kids watch!!) and you would have thought I gave her Diamonds by her response!! She is over the moon HAPPY!! Thank you TIMEX for the "Perfect FIRST REAL WATCH"!!
First watch my daughter didn't break within 2 weeks. Very cute, and now she can finally tell time without needing to think about it forever! lol
Its Looks Lovely
Really cute watch, but didn't last very long before it just stopped working. Very disappointed with this product since it was a gift for my daughter.

These shoes run small. My daughter wears a size 8 in athletic shoes, boots and dress shoes and she has extra room. I ordered a size 8 but she couldn’t even wedge her foot in! I ended up re-ordering a different brand and donated the shoes to her daycare for kids that need a pair for whatever reason.

They run very small. Order 2 sizes up. My 2.5 yr old wears size 7 and I ordered an 8 after reading reviews. The 8 was very small and tight, I'm trying now to exchange them for another size up but Amazon now says this item isn't eligible for a return!?
I looked and looked and returned so many of these different ballet shoes - and these were FINALLY the ones that fit my daughter - very cute and professional

Excellent quality. These were tight at first, and she complained, but they stretched to fit comfortably. Now they fit the way they are supposed to. And they are on her feet every morning  Her dance teacher told us to pull the strings to the tension we wanted, tie them in a knot and cut them off.  Glad she told us. We had been fiddling with the strings, tying them in bows, like in the picture. Very distracting during class.
My daughter & I both used Capezio items when we danced. Now my granddaughter has started and I am so glad that Capezio had continued to be a product that we can depend on.
These were perfect! They came exactly as pictured and the reviews helped me find the perfect fit.....sizing up 1.5 sizes was just right for us!!

These do NOT correspond with street shoe sizes. No way. My daughter is 3 and wears a size 7/7.5, so I ordered and 8.5 thinking that if anything the would be too big, but they are about an inch too small. I couldn't squeeze her foot into them if I forced it! When ordering these I would definitely make sure to order at least one, probably 1.5 or even 2 sizes bigger than street shoes. They are sized extremely small! On the bright side, they are adorable and seem like quality ballet shoes! I will definitely order them again and attempt to find the right size!

This is the 2nd pair that I bought as the first pair my grand daughter out grew very fast. I ordered the same shoe but larger because the quality is very very nice! Will order again when she outgrows these.
Due to reviews....I ordered a size up for my 5 year old daughter. She has just started wearing a size 10, we ordered an 11M.

review_title: perfect if you get the right size.
review_body: I  Seems the trick to like these slippers is to get lucky with sizing.  My daughter measures an 11.5 street shoe and we buy her a 12 for growing room.  I bought a size 13 in the Capezio Daisy and it fits her great!  She normally does not wear a narrow so I ordered a M.  It needs to be cinched up quite a bit so I probably could have ordered a N but the slipper still fits well.  Overall very happy with this purchase.  Please follow the advice of others and go up a size or a bit more if you're in between like us!

Does the job. My daughter is 5 and this is a great first watch. I absolutly love how the hands say "Hour" and "Minute" on them along with the 5 counts next to each number. Great for teaching how to read a "big girl" watch

This is a GREAT watch.  Lasted a long time and was never taken off.  I did have to sew the strap down so it didn't keep coming off, but it was worth it.  It's stretchy so it didn't mean she couldn't take it off.  It is water resistant, but eventually it did gain condensation.  But I got a good year out it and served it's purpose perfectly!  I want to buy her another one, but she's getting older and wants an "older" watch!

review_title: This is the perfect watch for early learners
review_body: This is the perfect watch for early learners. My daughter was struggling with telling time but having a watch on her arm and Mom and Dad asking for the time continuously really helped. The numbers are easy to read and the minutes listed were very helpful in the beginning. The band it stretchy elastic and adjustable, much more comfortable than plastic bands.

Purchased this watch for a 20 year old who needs a small sized and light weight watch for surfing. She had a similar one since childhood that still worked but the plastic watchcase cracked. It's cute, inexpensive and water resistant.

I put in the search bar watches for 11 year old girls and this came up. Not what I expected at all. It is very small it would fit a 4 year old. I want to return it but since it was a gift the original package was thrown out.
The first one we got ran slow (5 min every 24 hrs) but after exchanging it the new one seems to be running fine.

review_title: Got this for my 5 year old daughter 7 months ...
review_body: Got this for my 5 year old daughter 7 months ago.  It is helping her with telling time and it is durable. Only a 4 star because about every 2 weeks I have to reset it because it lags behind by about 15 minutes. For us it's no big deal because she can still learn to tell time with it.

review_title: Watch scratches easily, and the band could have been made more ...
review_body: Watch scratches easily, and the band could have been made more kid friendly.

review_title: My granddaughter loves this watch. She is learning to ...
review_body: My granddaughter loves this watch.  She is learning to tell time so an analogue watch is a must (not a digital).  I bought another light pink Timex watch for church and the Hearts and Butterflies for other occasions.  This watch adjusts to any wrist size.

review_title: Cute, but not a new learner friendly.
review_body: Very cute but I did not like the "To" and "Past" style, It was confusing for my 6 year old. Also the numbers are too small.
so cute!
My daughter loves this jacket. Its perfect for the cooler days of Florida.
as described
Great price for this CP jacket
My niece loves it!
These jackets are so cute! They make my girls look so fashionable.
My daughter is loving her denim jacket.
Great little jacket for my daughter.
Fit perfect
Great look and fits great.
My daughter love the watch and it's arrived on time
On 9 year old wishlist for Christmas!

review_title: Would definitely recommend for young kids
review_body: My 8 y/ o loves it. She's been telling time ever since she put it on. The lights flash different colors. The only downside is,it doesn't latch tight enough for small wrists.
my girl loves it very much. thanks.

review_title: Only glows purple when button is pressed
review_body: It does not glow purple all the time. It has a grey background and black numbers most of the time.
My daughter loved it

review_title: Very durable band. My 7 year old wears this ...
review_body: Very durable band. My 7 year old wears this almost daily, and there are no scratches on the face. She has worn the watch a couple times in the shower and we've had no problems with water. Would buy again!
Thanks!!
Thanks. My daughter loves it. It is always on her wrist even when taking a shower.
beautiful
Good

review_title: I bought this as a birthday gift for my eight- ...
review_body: I bought this as a birthday gift for my eight- year-old grandson. He's thrilled with the watch, which was appropriately priced considering his age, and he has figured out how to play with all the "bells and whistles" on the watch, without my having to read through the tiny print on the instructions. I wanted him to be able to read an analog watch - and this fits the bill!
Great watch for my child. Wonderful style for the price. My child's friends are now all ordering the same watch!

I ordered two of these for my boys. They love their watches. The alarm/chime functions are a bit of a mystery to them, but it's not too hard to figure out. One thing I think is weird is that the analog and digital times are set separately.

Easy to set up my son didn't even need my help...great look not  bulky at all its looks perfect on his arm...my 9 year old son loves it...bought one in the past and hands came loose hope it doesn't happen this time coz my son really loves thus watch.

review_title: ... 9th birthday and went swimming and it still works great!
review_body: My son got this for his 9th birthday and went swimming and it still works great!
Very happy with this purchase.  My daughter loves the watch and all its functions.  The overall design and quality is very good.  She is 8 yrs old and it fits perfectly on her wrist.  Thanks.

review_title: It is not user friendly and I do not recommend the watch
review_body: There are no instructions on how to set this.  I did find a YouTube video about setting it.  However, somehow the time got changed on the watch.  Now I have to find the YouTube video again, to set it.  It is not user friendly and I do not recommend the watch.  I am already looking for a replacement watch.
My son is on the track team and loves this watch and all its features
Kid likes it. Has been better with being on time since he got it.

review_title: Would buy again in a minute.
review_body: Adorable, seamless, waterproof, comfortable...what more do you want from a rain boot? My daughter is OBSESSED with these, she's 4 and these boots have become the default "fun shoes" for her. I have to fight to get her in anything else lol. She loves them and I love that they keep her feet dry and are SUPER easy to clean mud from.

review_title: My 7 year old sleeps in these.
review_body: My 7 year old loves these and the color. We originally bought them for her Pikachu Halloween costume,  but she wears them all the time. A little slick on carpet, but the boots come with a warning about stairs.

review_title: These have been my favorite boots for my boys since my oldest was first ...
review_body: These have been my favorite boots for my boys since my oldest was first able to wear them 6 years ago. We live on wooded property where there are snakes, and it’s difficult to keep ants at bay. Super light-weight, and easy to clean (not much a Mr. Clean magic eraser won’t get off)

I read other reviews that and they are right on.  The books are light weight.  They are durable.  My 6-year old daughter likes these boots better than sandals and I can't get them off her feet.  She wears a kids size 12, but I bought a 2.  There is plenty of length, so she can wear extra socks.  But, the boots don't fall off.  They are great.  She can run and play all day in them, without any problem.  I highly recommend these boots.
We bought this show for our daughter.  She loves it when it came in.

We have tried SO MANY BOOTS because we live on a farm and my kids seem to bust through them like crazy.  Once we found crocs, we have used them for the last two years with no issues!  No cracks, no holes, no leaks....a couple pair have even managed to get passed down with no issues what-so-ever!  They are light and fit well, but more importantly they actually hold up!
"Cerulean Blue" boots are purple.  Don't know if they were mislabeled or if they don't know the difference between blue and purple.  Purple isn't even an option for color that I saw.

review_title: This rain boots are great. They aren’t as cute as some of the ...
review_body: This rain boots are great. They aren’t as cute as some of the printed ones, and I don’t love that “crocs” is molded huge across the side. But they are so light weight, which is a huge plus for a toddler. Other rain boots were just too heavy to be practical.

These boots hold up so well, and they are adorable! The ankle shaft is small enough that I kind of have to work my 2 year-old’s feet in there, but he is able to get them on himself, and they stay on his feet well when he is walking.
They are sooo pretty! Look cute and fit perfect
Perfect!

Almost perfect. Only thing is grass, hay, twigs.. Stick to the inside lining of the coat. Other than that it isn't too bulky, is comfortable, and warm. The obvious carhartt durability. It does run pretty big.
fast shipping great jacket
It's a great and very durable jacket!
Bought for my Granddaughter.  Very warm and cozy.
Love it!
This jacket is will match Mommy's perfectly.

review_title: Got a little big so we can get two yes ...
review_body: Got a little big so we can get two yes out of it not sure it will be big enough next tho

review_title: Adorable and a 3T fit perfect for my 19month old ...
review_body: Adorable and a 3T fit perfect for my 19month old granddaughter.  Will still fit good come fall time too it appears.

Bought for my granddaughter fit great and she says it is AWSOME!!!!!!!  She loved the furry inside to the pockets cause it kept her hands warm. Wanted to wear in the house just didn't want to take it off.

review_title: 4 months and still good! My kid is outside in mud and jumping ...
review_body: 4 months and still good! My kid is outside in mud and jumping in puddles and such daily yet the shows show little wear and tear. They have been sink washed a dozen times. Just bought the next size up for when these are too small. They stay on his feet, no rubbing or blisters, good soles, light shoes.

I'm not a huge fan of the allover glitter but my 4 year old daughter loves these shoes!  (Just to clarify, the glitter doesn't come off all over the place which is why I normally hate glitter.)  They're easy to put on and take off.  They do run a 1/2 size small.  My daughter normally wears a 10 but based on other reviews, I ordered a 10.5.

review_title: They have been very comfortable for him and easy to break in
review_body: Lost my son's tennis shoes while on vacation, so we ordered these.  They have been very comfortable for him and easy to break in.  He runs around like crazy on the playground and they are holding up great!  Super cute, too, which is a plus!
I purchased these for my 4 year old to wear to Pre-K. They fit great, are easy to put on. They seem pretty durable even for everyday wear. Would buy these again!

review_title: Even though I ordered the Wide version, these were ...
review_body: Even though I ordered the Wide version, these were still too tight/small on my son. I have ordered from this brand for myself and have found that the brand seems to run small and narrow, so consider sizing up.

review_title: Fit like a stiff narrow block.
review_body: Very cute shoes, but entirely too small for my semi-wide foot toddler. We ordered and 8.5W and they were too small to get his foot in without him howling in protest and me feeling like I was fitting him with a medieval torture device. We returned without issue.

review_title: I really like these. I think the Saucony however might have ...
review_body: I really like these. I think the Saucony however might have a too small toe box for my kid right now. Versus say a keen. She wore a few vvariations on this until about size 8 and now I have had to go to something that's wider up front. Othewrise, they're great looking shoes and show no wear.
We love these shoes.  They fit my son's foot well.

My little one loves wearing these and will bring them to me if she doesn't have them on.  She wears them to day care and there is no redness or blistering.  I haven't had her wear them without socks though.  She still sometimes crawls and I haven't noticed any rubbing or wear on the toes like I would expect.  She has worn them for several months now.

I've purchased three pairs of these in the past year for my two kids.  Great shoe - cute - fits well - love that they're Velcro and esp. that they're the kind with two straps without having to DO two straps.  Kids love them.  Only problem is that they don't hold up really well...they're dinged and loose within a few months at which point they just look like old sneakers.  Still, I'll keep buying them until the kids have their own opinions about footwear b/c they're comfy (never had a problem with blisters or ankle-cutting - which was a problem for us with Keens toddler shoes) and good-looking.
she loved it!
Times change to easily
Doesn't look like the picture at all
Bad product.  The time keeps changing every time I fix it.  The band is so cheap--it broke immediately after I bought it.  Bad!!!
sure she will like it ...It is so detailed  and  just beautiful  great for a 6 year old...
Pretty cheap but my kid loves it regardless

review_title: My two year old loves her new Frozen watch- then ...
review_body: My two year old loves her new Frozen watch- then again she loves all things Frozen. Now all we have to do is get her to call out the numbers so she can tell time.
Love it

review_title: but she loves it and it's pretty durable. She has washed he hands
review_body: It's a little big for my daughter's wrist, but she loves it and it's pretty durable.  She has washed he hands, got it a bit wet and it still works.
delivered exactly what I wanted fast!
great watch, i have bought two because the battery dies eventually on the first one. comfortable and professional looking. i wear it for work. good for small wrist because its for kids.
Stopped working within 2 weeks without any external damage.

Nice watch especially for a young person.  I purchased for an adult after calling Timex.  I needed to make sure the band would fit an adult woman and it does with one hole to spare.  The watch met all the specificiations of the recipient.  Pink, leather band, face easy to read in sunlight, water resistent and even has indiglo.  For the price, it was a good buy.  Should last quite a while.

review_title: Slightly smaller face but still Indiglo
review_body: As an adult I don't like the larger-faced watches that are Indiglo. This one is slightly smaller, and to me that is much nicer, and it is Indiglo. I have another metal watchband that I will put on it instead of the pink band. I am happy with it.

I have had several "easy readers" over the years--they fit my small wrist and have a comfortable leather strap, are easy to see, and, until now, keep perfect time.  This one loses a couple of minutes a day and constantly has to be reset.  I am about to embark on an effort with Amazon or Timex to exchange this one.  Sum: I have liked the watch in the past and hope to like it again.

review_title: Granddaughter loved it! She is 6 and it fit her ...
review_body: Granddaughter loved it! She is 6 and it fit her arm just fine. (was worried it would not); adjusts well.

review_title: Tried two of them -- both broken.
review_body: Cute, but stopped working after one day on first purchase, after two weeks on second purchase.  Bummer.

review_title: This "leather" strap  is not leather like it states, it's simulated leather. Not a good deal! Band is way too stiff !
review_body: The strap is not leather. It says "simulated leather" and it is very stiff and uncomfortable! I bought this for a gift and it was not wanted!

review_title: yet beautifulwatch. My daughter loves it
review_body: This is a simple, yet beautiful watch. My daughter loves it!

7 year old got it for her birthday and has had it on non-stop for a week and we have not had any problems.  One of the nicest first watches i have seen.  this watch has an indiglo light on it and it is water resistant good idea for kids. no problems with seller.

Bought a size up based on what other reviews advised. My daughter wears a size 9, so I ordered a size 10. I tried them on her the moment they came in the mail, and they were too big. I tightened the elastics as tight as they would go, and the slippers were still too big. I am able to return them (I have no idea why the other reviewers couldn't). I will modify my review when I receive the slippers in her true size.
Order 2 sizes bigger! My daughter wears a (6t M). Had to reorder 2 more times to get the right size. We ended up with (8t M). Luckily, the quality is great and Amazon is very accommodating.

review_title: ... comments all warned that these shoes do not fit like street shoes so I was prepared but even trying ...
review_body: The comments all warned that these shoes do not fit like street shoes so I was prepared but even trying to compensate they were still a little small.  Since my little "dancer" isn't really doing anything major and I don't see her making it more than just a hobby I think they are great for the price.  The seems all appear to be well don't and the drawstring bow is great.

review_title: Wrong size shoe, right size box
review_body: We love these ballet shoes.  My daughter uses them.eveey year for ballet. However this is my 1st time ordering them Amazon and we ordered a 12M, the box said 12M when o opened the shoes and looked inside they were a 11.5M.  If I would of gotten the correct size it would of been 5 stars.

I was nervous to buy these sight unseen but the reviewers were right, buy up a size.  I was pleased to find a wide width for my daughter's wide feet and the fit great and are comdortable.  Very pleased for her introductory ballet class.

So I read many of the reviews here that cover the sizing confusion. I ordered a size too large and well, they are a size too large! I am now ordering a second pair so that my daughter will have well fitting ballet shoes in time for class on Monday.  Moral of the story, sometimes it helps to read reviews and sometimes it does not.

This ballet shoe is same as picture. It’s very good, outstanding. My daughter ballet teacher recommend for us to by this brand. So we did. Packaging was very good. Fast delivery. No problem at all. I highly recommend to other moms. Pricing not bad at all. Fits perfect you can also tie on the top.

review_title: they are very cute and the quality seems great too. BUT
review_body: they are very cute and the quality seems great too.

This was the 1st Capezio I bought for my 7 yr old. The material, color and workmanship are all very nice, better than most of the previous ballet shoes she has. I read many reviews before I purchased and I decided to go with one and a half size larger due to experiences from other reviewers but it turned out that they are exactly 1- 1/2 sizes too big. However I did make a right decision to buy it Narrow because its "Narrow" is equal to "Medium" of regular shoes. I'll keep this Capezio for later use. I'll buy Capezio again for quality and price despite the size and width is hit or miss.
Made well. Nice shade of pink.  The little bow tie actually gathers the edges and the bow isn't too long like some other brands.

review_title: This watch is WONDERFUL and holds upwell
review_body: This watch is WONDERFUL and holds upwell. I recommend it for anyone who wants their children to become confident in being able to tell time. In our house it was becoming a struggle to get our 9 year old to tell time so we got her this and all of the sudden she can look at a clock and figure it out! This watch played a huge part in that and gave her confidence.

review_title: Gets really dirty and scratches easily
review_body: Gets really dirty and scratches easily. I also don't like that it it uses starts counting minutes until the next hour after 6. So next to 7 it says 25, meaning 25 minutes until the next hour. It constantly confuses my daughter. I wish they'd put the 35, 40, etc, so it's less confusing.

I have had several Timex's over the years and they've all held up.  Timex watches usually outlast the bands they come with!  We bought this for our daughter who was learning to tell time in First grade.  All in all it's a good watch and she likes the look of it.  The only complaint we have is that the numbers for the seconds are really small, making it hard to read them. In a perfect world, those numbers would be a bit larger.  All in all, a great watch for a young one learning to tell time.

review_title: Easy to read Easy to wear
review_body: Wonderful! 8 year old girl loved it! Perfect watch to help teach reading a clock. Matches everything girly.  Easy on and off with great stretch band!

The face is easy to read, the colors are vibrant, it lights up quite brightly, and has a comfy wristband.  The only downside is that the clasp is a bit tricky for younger kids to use.  The band is stretchy enough that if a parent gets the clasp right, the child shouldn't need to mess with it to get it on and off. However, if you have a kid that just likes to mess around with it anyway . . . it could be a little problematic.

I got this for my daughter's 4th birthday. Being a ballerina at heart, she immediately took to wearing it, and became curious on how to read it. In just two days she was reading the time to me. Though I know she still has a long way to go to fully understand the concept of time and the relationship between seconds, minutes and hours, I would say this watch did its job in helping her to  learn how to read time. I highly recommend it.

review_title: Much better then I expected, excellent value for the price
review_body: I bought this for my niece who just turned 8 years old she doesn't like Hello Kitty and many of the girl watches are themed with that character.  She is small for her age and I was concerned that the band might not adjust small enough, but I was wrong, we adjusted the band to fit her perfectly but the fact that the band stretches makes it easy for her to put it on and remove it herself.  The color and the design was exactly as shown in the photo and she loved that it was ballet shoes.  Of all the gifts that she received for her birthday this was one of her absolute faves and I told her that she doesn't have to worry about getting it wet.  When I shared the cost with my family, they were shocked at the quality, I would compare the time piece to a $50 watch.  Highly recommend!

I've ordered a digital version of this watch for my son (green camo band) and it lasted over 3 years. I love the elastic band. Very sturdy and perfect for tiny wrists like my kids have. Since we had such a great experience with the last one, I decided to get this for my daughter. I opted not to get digital since she is in first grade and still learning how to tell time. Within a couple days the watch face was terribly scratched up just from normal everyday use. Very disappointed. It makes it really hard to even read the watch.

I buy a new Timex kid's watch whenever one stops working or the band wears out. It is hard to change the battery and you can't just replace the band.  I love the fact that the stretchy wrist band makes it easy to take off before I wash my hands. And the watch is so inexpensive it doesn't matter if I lose it.

I have a small wrist and it is difficult to find adult watch bands that fit.  The stretch band on this watch is perfect.  Washable as well as expandable but can be tightened to stay in place on my wrist.  In my 60's so love the Indiglo and easy to read watch face. Everyone needs a little whimsy in their life so it might as well be your watch.

review_title: Nothing spectacular about this product. A jean jacket is ...
review_body: Nothing spectacular about this product. A jean jacket is a jean jacket. I've never had an issue with items made/sold by The Children's Place.

review_title: Excellent jacket. Fit my 5 year old perfectly
review_body: Excellent jacket. Fit my 5 year old perfectly. I ordered size SMALL for my almost 6 year old girl and it fit her right with some room to grow. It comes with snap buttons in the front and 2 pockets. Very soft and comfortable to wear.
Got it for my niece and it fits perfectly
Daughter Loves it
It just didn't fix my 10 year old. The design was great.

review_title: Nice jacket! The granddaughter will get lots of wear ...
review_body: Nice jacket!  The granddaughter will get lots of wear out of this jacket!
Great quality.
My 10 year old granddaughter wanted a denim jacket that wasn't too heavy. This one is perfect. She loves it and the price was great.
Very nice jacket
Very cute but runs a bit small through the back and arms.

review_title: It is a nice watch for kid but it beeps every hour and ...
review_body: It is a nice watch for kid but it beeps every hour and there is no way to turn it off. My kid can't wear it to school or have it in her room at night because of the beep.

I let my daughter pick her watch and she chose this kids watch. Saw that it had 4 star review so bought the watch. My daughter was every excited that it finally came in. Open the watch and it was not on,  thought i need to turn it on somehow but realize it is just not working. Such a waste of money...

Super cute watch for 8yr old. A little tricky to set up, took longer than I thought and had read in reviews before. Haven’t tried in water scenario yet, though it does say waterproof. My 8yr old loves that it beeps every hour (set up this way) so she knows when to begin/end her chores, homework, etc.

The watch came on time and in good condition.  It was easy to set the time and date.  The second hand feature is an excellent addition. The band fit perfectly on my granddaughter wrist.  Overall this was a good buy at a very good price.
Very nice watch my kid loves it, and one important thing... superb seller attention. definitely good choce.

review_title: Looks great, and my daughter loves it
review_body: Looks great, and my daughter loves it, but it's super easy to accidentally set an alarm in the middle of the night...
This is a very nice watch! My granddaughter loved it!

It feels good on my wrist, & I'm a small adult. I love the jelly feel. I had to read the instructions carefully to set all the functions, but it's ready for gifting now. The different color lights for night-time are vibrant and cool. It came in a little cardboard box for easy access.
My grad daughter loved it. Thanks.
Immediately broke
This is prefect for a small child. My daughter is 3 and it fits her wrist perfectly.

review_title: I ordered thiswatch for my niece
review_body: I ordered this watch for my niece, she loves it and it's an excellent watch for learning to tell time.....!!
My Dter loves it!!
I like it very much , easy for kids learning to read watch for the first time. And the band is thick not freaky material
Daughter loves it!!!

review_title: Rubber strap broke within a week of use. Buckle ...
review_body: Rubber strap broke within a week of use. Buckle pulled right out of the strap end and can't be repaired. Go for something with a canvas band instead.
A Christmas gift for our Granddaughter, love that it shows the hour hand and minute hand and has them labeled.
Super cute and great value for the money

My daughter wore her watch to school twice and the minute numbers are already coming off. Very disappointed with this watch. I passed up many other watches because they did not have the minute numbers. Had I known this would have happened I definitely would not have bought this watch.
My granddaughter loves this watch!

review_title: My son received this for his birthday. He loves ...
review_body: My son received this for his birthday. He loves it and uses it everyday! He likes that it is waterproof and he uses the alarm too
My son loves this watch! It’s bern to Boy Scout camp, been in the mud, rain, messy kids room, beach,.... and it still works! Great watch for the price!
Purchased this for my grandson.  He loves it.
Incredible vendor
Looks good, works well
Son loves this watch. Settings are a little tricky getting started.
grandson will not take it off works perfect
Son loves the watch!! HE's 9

review_title: excellent quality, great material and very well madel
review_body: The product came before I expected, excellent quality, great material and very well madel, good decision to buy this one.
Son is happy.

Great rain boots, my toddler loves them! They seem to be pretty sturdy but at the same time they are quite light, which seems like the perfect combination for toddler footwear. Very happy with my purchase!

My daughter loves these--she's at the stage where she wants to be able to dress herself and these are not too challenging to get on and off. They DO require some help sometimes as the ankle point is a little narrow and sweaty feet get stuck. But for the most part they are perfect.

My son is currently in a five shoe. Bought these in a six and while I can get them on him at first within a week I ripped the hand hold off one trying to get it on his foot. Ordering a seven and hoping it works because these are super cute!

Lightweight, easy to pull on and off by herself and cleaning them is just rinsing them in the shower. She wears them both with and without socks to go to the beach, tramp through scrub and wade in swampy bits. Occasionally a leaf or twig will get down the back, but can be shaken out. She has never liked wearing shoes and goes barefoot 90% of the time even on roads, so that she'll wear these boots happily AND they're light enough to carry along for a park trip, is great.

review_title: Size 11 is one size above my kid's size but it feels like the shoes are fitting just right
review_body: Not sure what happened here, but I got two left boots and will have to address this with customer service. Size 11 is one size above my kid's size but it feels like the shoes are fitting just right. Knowing that you should have at least an inch extra for them to grow means that I could have gone for two sizes higher. Prefer to buy in store for this reason yet not many options to do so.

review_title: Chunky legs? Order next size up.
review_body: I like how light weight they are for our newly walking 15 month old.  We got his true size toddler 6 but the shafts were too narrow for his chunky legs. We returned them for size seven which are too big in the foot but fit his leg.  He  weighs 28 pounds and is 31 1/4" tall. I wish crocks would put a little elastic give along the back of the rim of the boot then they would be 5 star.
I have had these rain boots for a year. I got a size 8 when my daughter was around a 6.5-7. A year later, she is still wearing them.

review_title: Soooo cute and love that they are rubber on the inside so you ...
review_body: Soooo cute and love that they are rubber on the inside so you can just wash them out and let them dry. My son often gets mud on the inside as well as outside so that is a huge advantage. They are a little tough to get on and off without socks on but don't seem to rub once on.

review_title: Easy to clean, great for playing
review_body: I've been buying these for years and I'm so sad my daughter is about to size out of them. She uses these as her "play shoes." She can get them as dirty as she pleases, and they clean up super easily. My daughter has a very high arch, and she does find them difficult to pull on off, but I think that may just be her feet. These can even double as snow boots if you live in the south and get mostly sludge :).

I bought these for my daughter as she had outgrown her previous size Crocs rain boots. So far these are getting just as much love as her pink ones did. I love that these boots are one continuous piece of material so there is no seam from the sole to the boot. I was having issues with other brands not being watertight from the glue on the sole. Crocs has solved this problem! The previous pair is still in great condition after a year and a half of rainy day use, they were passed on to a friend. If your looking for great quality and long lasting boots I would totally recommend these!
Very well made baby coat.
Came real fast. Perfect.

review_title: My daughter loves that it is like her daddy's coat (it is black😉)
review_body: Very cute. My daughter loves that it is like her daddy's coat (it is black😉). It can be a little difficult to get off of arms but overall is a cute, warm coat.
Bought as Christmas gift my daughter loves it cause its like mine and my wife's coat pkus she stays warm in even very cold weather
Great jacket and great price
Cute

review_title: Not what we thought we where getting may be part ...
review_body: Not what we thought we where getting may be part our fault jut not understanding the web sit details

This jacket took longer than expected to ship...about 2 wks and then took another 1 wk to arrive. It looks the same as the picture and my daughter loves it. I thought that it would be a little thicker like the Carhartt jackets that I have but it is not as thick as I thought it would be. It is warm enough for cold weather but not warm enough for "snowing" weather. Overall, it is of good quality, just like all Carhartt items are.
My daughter melted
The colour is good，my child like it.But the style of the clothes is not good. I am a little disappointed，the next time I will not buy the same style clothes.

Great shoes for my active preschooler! These were a great price and fit just right with plenty of room to grow for my four-year old. Great quality from Saucony, and the navy/red colors go with pretty much everything and they are gender neutral so I can re-use these shoes for our son when he's old enough. I would highly recommend these shoes!

Purchased them for my son to wear for school during his gym days and they fit great, with no issues and the Velcro comes in really handy since he doesn't know how to tie his shoe yet since he's two years old. They stay on his feet with no issues and he's able to play and run around with no issues. really great buy!

My son LOVES these shoes. He had a blue pair, and when he outgrew it, I got him these plus a pair of red ones. Seems like both this and the red one are a bit narrow, so the velcro doesn't close all the way. But it doesn't matter - they're very comfortable and my son wears them all day long and doesn't want to take them off at night.

Cute little shoes. High quality and the velcro is great for little fingers. My son loves them. They seem to be super sturdy; if they last as long as I thunk they will, then we will grab another pair when he grows out of these. They look like he will grow out of then before he manages to destroy them, so that's a huge plus un my book!

review_title: Cute & comfortable, pretty colors- but I maybe should've bought an ...
review_body: Cute & comfortable, pretty colors- but I maybe should've bought an 8.5 instead of a 9 toddler. I guess its better too big for a bit than too small though. For a size 9 it is probably smaller than average/other brands- my child's normal size is a size 8 toddler right now for reference, and I bought the size 9 b/c of the reviews stating these ran small.
Super cute shoes! These are made well and have really taken a beaten. You would have no idea however. The only thing I

review_title: Fashionable sneaker great for toddler daily wear!
review_body: Purchased this shoe as a daily wear gym shoe for my 3-year-old son.  He wears them comfortably all day without complaint.  I ordered this shoe in my son's usual size and it fits as expected.  The hook and loop Velcro closure makes this shoe easy to get on and off.  They're a vibrant blue suede, so maybe not an every day wear for someone with more subtle fashion appeal. We love them!

review_title: We like everything about these shoes except it is very hard ...
review_body: We like everything about these shoes except it is very hard to clean sand from the inside. The liner inside does not come off and sand goes underneath it. So even after a lot of shaking and attempts to get the sand out, some remains inside.

review_title: I couldn't be happier with the purchase
review_body: I wouldn't have considered buying shoes online for a toddler if so many of the local kids' stores hadn't gone out of business, and options being limited. Despite this, I couldn't be happier with the purchase: this shoe is a high quality product with an attractive 'grown up' design, and fits well. the scotch fastens tightly, so no shoes will go missing , I hope!

My son really likes how these shoes feel. Neither of us likes how poor they traction is.  On wet sidewalks these have no sticking power, and that's a problem in Western Washington.  We gave up on them after a few hard falls and he's wearing his very awesome Columbia snow boots instead.
This watch is too big for a child.  Also the plastic band is very inflexible and doesn't go around a small wrist well.  Cute graphics, but make a kid watch kid sized, please.
Granddaughter loved it!

review_title: The watch looks nice, its the exact thing that is shown in ...
review_body: The watch looks nice,its the exact thing that is shown in the picture. My daughter loves it,she can't wait to wear it.
Absolutely love this watch.  Packaged perfectly.  My Gdaughter is gonna love it.  Thank you for such a good quality item.

review_title: My grand daughter loved her watch
review_body: My grand daughter loved her watch. It is the year of Elsa right? What little girl wouldn't like it, plus it was her 1st watch.
Excellent product and good service

review_title: great quality! Only downfall was that it looked pink ...
review_body: Cute watch, great quality! Only downfall was that it looked pink in the picture but when it came it was purple. Still great buy!
Great little starter watch for a little girl and it's well constructed
Nice, simple watch. 4 year old loves it. It came with some rough plastic edges- not high quality, but definately appropriately priced and as expected.

review_title: It's alil big for a child's wrist but other than ...
review_body: It's alil big for a child's wrist but other than that it seems ok.my daughter really likes it and it came with the time already set up

I read the positive reviews and ordered it for my daughter.  The watch arrived, but within one day of wear, it stopped working.  We had the battery changed (which cost $12) and then it stopped working again a couple of days after that.  Obviously got unlucky.  Amazon were great, they actually replaced the watch, but if I'm honest it has clouded my view of the watch and despite the Timex one year guarantee (will replace within one year for $10, only a fraction less than to buy new) I won't be replacing it with another of this brand.  Seems you get hooked into an expensive merry-go-round if things go wrong.

review_title: my first timex is a great gift!! real leather band too!
review_body: my first timex kids watch is a great gift for kids learning to tell time.  came in no damages fast delivery (gotta love that) and the way it is advertised is what you get.  love the large print numbers.  great watch!!! band is real leather too!!!

My daughter no longer wears this watch because the fake leather started to cause allergic reactions and rashes once the top coating wore off.  So, stay away from this product if your kiddo's skin is sensitive.

review_title: Since I'm a watch love and never without a wristwatch
review_body: First analog watch for our 9 year old granddaughter. Since I'm a watch love and never without a wristwatch, the grandkids associate me with watches. Maybe this will be the start of her own love of watches. TRADITION :)
Very small watch
Smaller than I expected but my preteen granddaughter loves it.
Beautiful little watch for a child.  Looks elegant and tough at the same time.  Hope she likes it this Xmas.
Perfect Christmas gift for my 7 year old granddaughter who was learning to tell time at school. Nice soft, girly pink. A classic and you can't go wrong with Timex.

review_title: Good watch. Timely Service by seller. But child didn't like it.
review_body: It was a gift for my 7 y/o granddaughter who is learning to tell time. While she liked the idea of the watch, she says she can't  wear it because the band is stiff and hurts her wrist. It is a good watch. But if my granddaughter can't use it, it thus becomes a poor choice for her. And a bad investment for me.

Bought this as a present for a young lady that helped me raking some fall leaves right after school in freezing weather, but never gave up.  Had to be to a  4-H meeting and kept asking me what time it was, so thought it was time she had her own time piece.  She loved it!

review_title: Cute little ballet shoe. Hard to judge sizes without ...
review_body: Cute little ballet shoe. Hard to judge sizes without trying them on. Little one wears about 12.5 in street shoes so went with a 13. Just a wee bit big but tightening the bow should help with that.

These are great. They may run a touch small, but that worked out for me. My 2 year old can still fit in size 5 and still has a little room to grow into a 6 in most shoes. I ordered a 6 and they fit perfectly. I originally ordered a cheapy shoe in a size 6 and they were literally massive. (Probably like 9s or 10s. Worth the money to have a shoe that fits! Now my toddler can do "ballet." (Aka run around like a maniac in cute outfits.)

review_title: Beautiful shoes, very comfortable on my daughters feet
review_body: I was mislead by the other reviews. A lot of buyers said it runs small. I went to Capezio website and saw they advised to order one size up so I did. But it turned out to be too big. So I returned it and got another pair of regular street size. It works well. Beautiful shoes, very comfortable on my daughters feet.

The size is fine but one shoe looks used!!!  One was all wrinkled when I opened them but seeing as how I need them for tomorrow I’m stuck with them.  I’m not sure why a damaged/used looking shoe would be sent with a perfect shoe.  A complete waste of money as the one shoe looks horrible!

review_title: The shoe itself looks wonderful however I found that the sizing is somewhat small
review_body: The shoe itself looks wonderful however I found that the sizing is somewhat small.
These are perfect for a little ballerina. They fit well, but I would order a size up to make sure the child will grow into it.

review_title: Good shoes. Runs a bit small.
review_body: These were a little off on the sizing chart, therefore a little snug on my daughters foot. She wears a toddler size 8 shoe and we went with toddler 8.5M in these. I went ahead and got her the Bloch leather equivalent in size 8M at a local dance store (just because we didn't have time to order another pair) and they fit better with just the tiniest amount to grow. Good shoes otherwise.

This is the second pair of these ballet shoes I have ordered for my little ballerina. The old ones were too small and I ordered the same pair in a larger size. These ballet shoes are good quality and a fair price compared to what I could find locally. The leather part on the bottom of her old ones did lose a string or two but she wears them to walk into ballet (over pavement and rocks) so that could be the issue. Overall they lasted her until she outgrew them. I will purchase again when her new ones get too small. Definitely recommend!

review_title: I will say I absolutely love the floral print lining of the interior of the ...
review_body: These arrived much smaller than anticipated, however I was able to get my younger daughter to wear them for a brief period, despite them being a purchase for my older daughter. I will say I absolutely love the floral print lining of the interior of the shoe, I am keeping them as a memento and find them beautiful for a keepsake or shadowbox.

review_title: Ballet slipper runs a little small but I was able ...
review_body: Ballet slipper runs a little small but I was able to return the shoe and reorder. The refund came back fast. The ballet slippers have been holding up for the pat 3 months with no tears or rips.

review_title: My daughter is very happy with her watch
review_body: My daughter is very happy with her watch.  It is holding up through the riggors of childhood just fine, unlike the last one we bought her (Red Balloon brand).  I will be sticking with this brand from now on for my younger children, even if the pattern designs are not exactly what they would like.  The quality makes up for that!

review_title: Great to Learn to Tell Time
review_body: I bought two of these for my 8 year old twin daughters. They are learning to tell time and I thought this would be a fashionable way to help them along. The watch faces scratches easily (one scratched the first day) and the clasp to fasten it seems a bit odd for a child product but overall this is a great purchase for the price.

review_title: Perfect for girl learning to tell time
review_body: The watch is durable holding up to the test of an active girl.  She loves the cheery purple color with pink flowers and especially how the face lights up with the indiglo light.  It fits her small wrist, but has elastic band for easy on and off.  Love how the small hand & big hand has 'hours' and 'minutes' on it to help teach clock reading, but the style is something she can grow with... until eventually lost.  Liked it so much, bought another to replace the lost one.

I gave this watch to one of my younger granddaughters as a gift. She loved the butterfly moving around as the second hand. The colorful butterflies on the band were a hit as well. The watch is sturdy, the band is a bit large, but it has room for her to grow into. So far so good. She is only four but I felt that she was ready for this watch. Time will tell !

review_title: Very pleased; this watch is easy to read and has ...
review_body: Very pleased; this watch is easy to read and has a  slim and comfortable band. My seven year old is very petite and this looks and feels natural on her.

review_title: Helped my 3rd grader get the hang of telling time
review_body: Bought the purple floral watch for my 9 yr old. She was having a hard time with time telling, she really likes that the 30+/- are different colors, and that the hands are labeled. The elastic band is soft and adjustable (plastic bands made her sweaty & itchy, metal ones either pinched or stained her skin).

review_title: Disappointed. The watch already doesn't work and we've only ...
review_body: Disappointed.  The watch already doesn't work and we've only had it a month.  The idea is good (learning to tell time) - but quality is not.  The band also has a flimsy way of securing around my daughter's wrist.  She was so excited to get it for her birthday...and sadly it was definitely a bad gift idea.  Its doesn't have the traditional "buckle" type of strap, instead the elastic band is put through a metal piece that doesn't hold it well.  Would have thought a Timex would hold up better...they used to advertise their longevity, but now I know why they don't do that anymore.

Water resistance has also been a nice feature in a child's watch. She is constantly telling me the time and wants another one with different band.

review_title: Blisters!!!  But I fixed the problem easily.
review_body: Our 6 y/o boy got blisters today just from wearing them to get to school. He had long socks on.  Blisters where on those inner ankle bones that protrude on both sides.  So the boots are made too narrow around the ankle, where the ankle round bones protrude out.  I was able to re-shape that part of the boots by warming up the rubber above stove flame (lowest setting, hold boot far above), while pressing with three fingers from inside outward, then pressing outward even harder while cooling the area off under cold running water.  It might be safer to heat them up using a hair drier on hot setting and hold it close to the boot, then push the problematic area outward.  See the "after" images.  Good luck!

review_title: We ordered these in Sea Blue. The color is ...
review_body: We ordered these in Sea Blue. The color is very different than the photo. The photo is more of a light periwinkle, the actual boots are a darker more basic blue color. Still ok, just not what I was expecting. As for the quality of the boot, we still have to try them out!

review_title: Lightweight and easy for toddler to put on
review_body: These are much lighter than traditional rubber rain boots, and therefore much easier for a toddler to run around in. They are roomy from the top to bottom of the footbed, meaning kids can wear warm socks, too. They run larger than Oshkosh shoes, but are fine with socks. The handles make them a breeze for our independent three year old to manage by herself. Highly recommend!

review_title: Our best pair of rain boots yet!
review_body: These are the only rain boots I will buy for my kids as long as they carry their shoe sizes. My son has worn his yellow pair most days of the week for almost 6 months and the wear on them is minimal. They are lightweight, have good arch support, and are seamless...so no separation at the seams like we've seen with other rain boots. The price point makes these boots a GREAT deal.

My 6 year old love to wear these even when there is no rain. He doesn't complain about them..so I can only guess that they are comfortable...plus he loves the color. But I love the fact that the loops are built tough. He has had a couple other boots with the thin loops and they always broke. These feel like they will last forever. I just wish they can grow along with his foot size. I am sure someone else will benefit from these once he out grows them.

These are great! My child can run in them without the fear of tripping and falling from the weight of standard rain boots . I mean it still happens, she’s 3, but she is a lot more confident jumping in puddles without her boots weighing her down

review_title: Just what we needed! We can be outdoors now.
review_body: My daughter has allergies to grass and if she comes in contact with it, she breaks out. Once we started to use these, we could enjoy our backyard more often because she didn't flare. She loves the color and can put them on easily. Second pair we get!

My 2 year old loves theses. He can put them on himself and they keep his feet dry.  They will make your kids feet smell if you don't have them wear socks. I buy a size up so that he can wear socks with them. They hold up really well. This is our second pair. I had to buy a bigger size. He wore the first pair for 6 months.

My almost 2 year old has tiny feet. Her Nike and sketchers sneakers are size 6. I ordered these in size 6 and they fit her perfect. They are so light weight that she can move and jump around easily, unlike regular rubber rain boots. The pink is cute and looks adorable.

review_title: Cute & Lightweight. Listen to reviews & size up
review_body: Cute, very lightweight. Royal blue is vibrant. My son says they are very comfortable. Followed reviews to size up 1 and they fit perfectly!

The inside collects strings hay sticks leaves so its hard to wash bc I have to actually pick all the debris out of the coat, where with the adult coats you can throw them in the washer and dryer the girls coats have to be washed a little differently as to not ruin the inside lining.

I can't speak for durability as of yet but they seem of good quality and inexpensive enough that if thye only last the year I would be Ok with that.

These fit great once they are on my 2 year old, but getting them on is a struggle. The tongue doesn't lift up very much because it's blocked by the velcro, even if the strap is pulled all the way out. So it's hard to fit fat little feet in there. I'm sure that this would be less of an issue in larger size or if the kids were putting them on themselves.

These are adorable shoes and my toddler loves to bring them to me.  They don't seem like they would be as comfortable as her last pair of shoes (new balance) but I'm hoping they will soften up more as she continues to wear them.  She doesn't act like they bother her though....they just seem pretty stiff.

review_title: These are my favorite brand of shoes for my almost 3 year old
review_body: These are my favorite brand of shoes for my almost 3 year old. We've been buying them repeatedly on Amazon every time he goes up a size. Watch for the price to drop and buy when they're cheap. Often they'll be about $35 or so, but you can get them for $20 if you watch and wait for the right time. Cute shoes, easy to put on; my kid likes them.

I got these in a 5.5 for my 18mnth old (she is a little big for her age). She has a bit of a chubby foot still so shoes can sometimes dig into her....not these! I got them on comfortably and she just took off....ran around the house enjoying her new sneakers. They have enough room that she can grow into them a bit but they are still super comfortable for her to wear now. I read some reviews about these shoes being stiff and was a bit concerned but I must say I don't see it...and neither does my daughter. They are super light weight and have a nice cushion to them. Will likely come back once she grows out of them for the next size up.
Our favorite tennis shoes. This is at least the 4th size we have purchased. The easiest to get on of any shoes we have bought! My son’s favorite for comfort.

Love this shoe, has become my go to indoor shoe and sneaker out for indoor activities.  Was worried no support for ankle but pleasantly surprised.  I always buy a size a bit bigger and will prob stick with this brand for next shoe size.  I was buying a $55 child's shoe which was amazing, but $55!!

These were adorable and the length seemed fine but I guess my toddler has fat feet (depth-wise) because the velcro was not long enough to secure around the top of his foot.  I was only able to connect to about a cm of velcro.  Sad, because, like I said, these were pretty freakin' cute otherwise and the length seemed fine.

review_body: Fourth size of these shoes we've ordered for our toddler. Easy for little ones to get on and off on their own, and very stylish with fun colors.  Will keep buying until she sizes out of the line.

Our favorite sneaker for all kids in our household! Little ones can get them in and off easily and they last forever!! They grow out of these sneakers before they begin to wear out at all. Awesome price, awesome product. Don't ever change Saucony!
