review_title: The shoes are cute and very nicely made however
review_body: The shoes are cute and  very nicely made however, they run super small. My daughter is pretty petite, just turned 2 and normally wears a size 5(ex. Converse) so I ordered a regular size 6. They were tiny!!! I'd recommend ordering 2 sizes up. The 7 fit great.

review_title: Dont overcompensate too much on size!
review_body: I freaked out a little bit by the other reviews.  My son is size 8, but most of his shoes are too small.  He is just on the edge of 9, so after reading reviews I ordered a size 10 dance shoe.  It fits, but is rather loose.  Luckily he can grow into them and is a brand new dancer, so it isn't a big deal.  They should be tight and the leather will relax and stretch a bit.

Though the majority of reviews highlighted the shoe as not being true to side, from my experience I would have to disagree, and confirm that they run same as street size.  To better elucidate my daughter wears a size 8.5 M, and this was the exact size which I ordered and they fitted perfectly. My advice would be to get your child measured. Also we parents have the tendency to buy shoes with an allowance, however when it comes to ballet shoes they must fit tight and in the case of my daughter though I would take a 9 if I want allowance, I stuck to her exact size 8.5 which aforementioned fitted.

review_title: Just a little smaller cut than I expected
review_body: Made well. Perfect color. Cute ballet shoe.  Just a little smaller cut than I expected for a toddler size 6.  Fits more like a 5 1/2.

review_title: I am going to keep them because we need them ...
review_body: I am going to keep them because we need them, but they are a little too wide for her feet. Usually, ballet shoes that I have bought it the past are more narrow.

WOW - read the size stuff, so I ordered a size bigger than my daughter usually wears. She's a small 4 year old and wears size 8.  Ordered 9.  They were TINY!  I'm thinking two to three sizes up?  This is sort of ridiculous.

These were easy to order and arrived when expected.  They run extremely small though....way smaller than I remember ballet shoes ever being.  I ordered a size larger than my daughter wears but she can't fit them.  Perhaps it would be helpful in the description to mention how to size them better for ordering.  (I.e. order three sizes above street shoe size) Needless to say the toddler was heartbroken she can't wear them
The ballet slipper was fine, but it was way too small for my toddler. I would suggest sizing up at least 2 sizes.
Absolutely adorable! I purchased for my 6 year old granddaughter entry into 1st grade. She is a quick learner. She LOVED it, and, has already learned how to tell time the first day!

I bought this same watch in May. It stopped working. Tried a new battery with no success. I purchased an entirely new watch hoping the first was a lemon. Others have saidctje same thing in their reviews. Of I find the new watch to be problem free I will come back and modify my rating.

review_title: Nice watch, strap gets dirty easily
review_body: I bought this watch to help my daughter learn how to tell time.  This face is easy to read and the design on the strap is a beautiful pink ballerina shoe.  In the short time she has had it, I've noticed a lot of scratches on the face. The strap is elastic and has a metal ring clasp at the end.  To adjust the watch you will have to pull the end through the metal ring.  My daughter was unable to do this with ease.  I had to assist her.  Also the strap gets dirty quickly.

review_title: Great Watch for our 5 year old.
review_body: We ordered this watch back in October for my daughters 5th birthday and we could not be more pleased with it. It is perfect for our little one who is learning to tell time. The hour had is blue & the hour numbers are also blue. The minute hand is pink & the minutes are in pink as well. Our favorite part of the watch is that the minutes are 5-55 unlike some of the others that have "15 after" or "15 till".

review_title: A Great Gift for a Grand Daughter!!!!!
review_body: Our grand-daughter loves butterflies, and the colors pink and purple.  So to encourage her to learn to tell time we told her we would buy this watch when she could tell time.  Well that was it.  In a day or two the deal was done...and she loves the watch.

review_title: Great watch for my 6 year old learning to tell time
review_body: The reason it gets 4 instead of 5 stars is that the second half (right side) of the watch counts down from 30, instead of up to 60.  It is just a little bit different than the way she is learning to read time, but it is cute, adjusts to her small wrist well, easy to read, and she loves the indiglo.  So, the weirdness of the numbering has just given us something to talk about when it comes to telling time.  Teachable moment, I guess.

We gave this to our five year old for Christmas. Love the style, colors and size, but within even just these few weeks the band is already looking tatty. The watch we received does not have Velcro on the band, so the "tail" end on the inner part of the clasp curls slightly at the end and just flops about. My daughter doesn't seem bothered and I don't have too high expectations at this price, but I would have expected a little more longevity.
Ordered for my 7yr old. Hour and minute written on needles really help. Strap is stretchable. Design is cute. Price is awesome. Love it!

review_body: I bought this watch for my daughter to help her deal practically with time. It looks very good and the Indiglo is a good addition.

I bought this for our granddaughter for a "before Christmas present" while we were visiting.  We live in another state and don't see her at Christmas.  We left before she received it but our daughter said she hasn't taken it off since she got it.  Since it's a Timex it should last and be able to withstand a busy seven year old's activities,  Our daughter didn't want a digital watch as she wanted our granddaughter to learn to tell time the old fashioned way.  Our granddaughter loves pink and ballet so this watch is perfect for her.

review_title: Works well after setup but needs more in depth directions
review_body: I bought this watch for my 9 yr old daughter and a blue version for my 6 yr old son. So far it seems to work fine but it's not the most user friendly watch. I didn't find the directions very helpful beyond setting the time. I had to fiddle with it to turn off the alarm that was accidentally set for 2am while we tried to figure out what all the buttons did. It also took quite a bit playing around to figure out how to switch it from military time to regular time since neither of my kids were familiar with using military time. For the price I can't really complain though. Gets the job done once it's set up.

review_body: The watch is very cute and my 4 year old daughter loves wearing it as she learns to tell time.  The numbers are easy to read and the band fits comfortably around her wrist.  However as the description states, it is NOT water resistant!  My daughter is very careful with it and always takes it off before taking a bath and going to bed.  Just from normal hand washing, not submerging them in water, jumping in a pool or washing dishes, the watch has constant condensation and fog caught inside.  Its a children's watch, it should be able to handle a splash or two!

review_body: I'm twelve and this is my favorite watch I've ever had, considering the price. Some other people have been saying their's broke apart, but I've been wearing mine for about a week, plus went swimming with it and it doesn't show any sign of wear. Great buy and would recommend for boys!

review_title: These our perfect for our mud magnet children
review_body: These our perfect for our mud magnet children. They wipe off easily. Make sure your kids wear socks underneath. My son refused and got several blisters from all the rubbing. I don't mind that they are rubber inside though, because it makes them much easier to clean.

Love these boots! My daughter has a pair last year that lasted through the fall and spring and we loved them so much we bought the next size up for this year. Lightweight, easy to get on and off, easy to clean (even after playing in mud), and stylish! This time we got the bright pink ones, so cute. My little one is ETREMELY active and is very hard on shoes but her crocs never wear out.

review_title: No lining which is great for us because they dry quick and go right ...
review_body: Couldn't survive a day on the farm without these! Toddler is only 1 and can put these on himself. Wears them everyday in all weather and they hold up well. No lining which is great for us because they dry quick and go right back on after jumping in puddles. Adorable!

These boots are a little hard to get on and off but they are sooo durable. Regular rubber boots get cracks in them in just a few weeks since they are used daily but these lasted over a year until he grew out of them!

review_title: Run small, but are a nice boot
review_body: Pros: extremely lightweight, toddler can easily pull them on himself, durable croc material

Was so pleased when we received these boots.  Everything I've read in all the other positive reviews is completely true.  They are lightweight they are extremely comfortable they are durable and she wears them all the time.  Will definitely be ordering the next size up and on...I want a pair in my size. I will say the are a tiny bit smaller than I was expecting (maybe half a size) I ordered a size up from what she currently wears in shoes and they fit perfectly.  I think if I was to order another size up from this it would've been too big.  I am not familiar with crocs sizing so I would imagine that they coincide with other crocs sandals and shoes

My son loves these and is absolutely obsessed with them. He's used to being barefoot or wearing mocs,but he got used to these quickly. He always gets compliments. Great quality and I love that they're just plain and adorable without tacky colors or characters on them.

review_title: but the length of the foot of the boot seems perfect so I'm not sure
review_body: I'm thinking of returning these because my son, who has VERY narrow ankles keeps coming home with bleeding ankle bones, even when wearing with socks.  I could tell as soon as I got these out of the box that the ankle area was incredibly narrow.  I have a friend whose son got an earlier design of this same boot and it fit him perfectly and he does not have narrow ankles.  She suggested that perhaps I got a size too small for my son, but the length of the foot of the boot seems perfect so I'm not sure...  I have noticed with other crocs that we've purchased that they do run a bit small.

LOVE these boots. At first, my son was apprehensive since he had never worn boots before, but now he loves them. He was a late walker at 19 months old. He got these at 21 months and has had no trouble in them. The are lightweight so he can still run and "jump" in muddy puddles. Will definitely buy another pair when he grows out of these.

review_title: ... handles help to get on and off the shoes easily. Love the color and it’s so lightweight
review_body: The handles help to get on and off the shoes easily. Love the color and it’s so lightweight. My son loves wearing it for garden works. Easy to clean, just spray mud off the whole boots inside and outside and air dry fast.

My son wears these every day, He's two and seems to be comfortable in them. The velcro makes it easy for him to "help" putting his shoes on. Makes things so much easier when you are in a hurry as well. They don't have a slippery bottom, so no slipping when the ground is wet. They are not clunky and he is able to run in them without​ tripping.

our son looks cool in these throw back saucony shoes!  good fit and soft.  maybe not super structurally solid like new balance but cost about 10-15 less so we'll let them go till they fall apart which will probably be after he needs a larger size anyway!

review_title: Stylish and comfortable for an active toddler
review_body: Purchased these for our two-year old toddler. Not only are they stylish and seem comfortable for our active boy, but he can't easily get them off (a good thing right now since he has a tendency to throw his shoes when he has tantrums in the car). The sizing was as expected. Best of all, they seem to be holding up so much better then the Stride Rite sneakers we had bought for him in the past.
Love these shoes. So easy to put on and clean. I just keep buying them again and again in bigger sizes as my son grows. He calls them his “fast shoes” cause he thinks he can run fast in Themis

review_title: Great pair of shoes and they hold up well!
review_body: Our second pair! Our daughter loves these shoes and they hold up really well. She out grew her old ones before they wore out and she wore them pretty much every day for a year. They are also super easy for her to slip on strap the velcro. Will buy again in a year or so.

"My daughter loves these shoes.  They seemed to run about a 1/2 size small.  So far they are holding up great and she tears through shoes some only lasting a week, these Saucony's making it over a month really says something about their quality. "

The sneakers are adorable. They fit wonderfully. Our daughter as a wider foot and these shoes are great for her and she loves them too. They are durable and have held up better than other brands we have bought. We get lots of compliments. Dad may have to get a pair of his own Saucony Jazz to match.

review_title: They are somewhat expensive for children's shoes so I'm disappointed they won't work for us
review_body: My daughter wears a size 7 shoe. I ordered a size 7.5 so they would fit longer, and also because her feet are wide. I can barely close the strap on the top. And I'm not sure that ordering an even larger size would've made much of a difference. They are somewhat expensive for children's shoes so I'm disappointed they won't work for us. I do think they are a good shoe, just not for a child with wide feet. I did not see that info in the reviews, so hopefully this helps someone else.

review_title: Cool shoes, he sole is a bit hard
review_body: I love the look of these shoes, I would love them more if the sole was a bit more flexible. I know the have the lite version of these shoes but I'm not sure they have the same combination of colors. I usually look for comfort rather than style, specially for kids.

review_title: I love these sneakers for my little one but he complains ...
review_body: I love these sneakers for my little one but he complains it's to tight the width. Scared to get larger width because he does not  have wide feet.

review_body: I about this for my child. She really liked it. Made well. Service was good.

review_title: This watch loses about an hour every week. Kind ...
review_body: This watch loses about an hour every week. Kind of difficult to teach a child how to tell time when the watch is wrong.

review_title: I love my pink kids' Timex watch. Works great for me!
review_body: I chose this children's watch to wear because my wrists are so small, and this one fits and doesn't slide around all the time, getting caught on everything... This is my work watch. I always buy Timex when it's time for a new one. They last for years, used daily. Love the pink color, too...

review_title: LOVE This. Perfect for my Small Adult wrist
review_body: LOVE This.  Perfect for my Small Adult wrist, blends into skin so goes w/ most everything.

Got this for my daughter who's 8 years old and it fits perfect. The case is solid, thought it would be cheap looking but to my surprise it's not. She only had it for a few days so too early to give 5 stars until couple of months down the road.
The watch is a classic Timex piece and was exactly as advertised.  Looks great and my daughter loves it.  Would recommend this watch to friends and family.
Excellent quality and fits as expected. I got wide and it seemed it was too wide but as they danced and foot swelled, I was happy with my decision.

Love Capezio products.  These ballet shoes were perfect and the price was good.  I was just sad that my older daughter's size wasn’t available.  We ended up buying a cheaper brand- which was terrible.

The shoes are high-quality, well-made, and perfect from a quality standpoint. Unfortunately, for me, I listened to many reviews and went one size up from street shoes.  In our case, this turned out to not be a great call.  Half-size up MAY have worked, but I doubt it.  I think it's hit or miss - if you REALLY needed shoes for your little ballerina you'd probably be going to your local store that specializes in these types of shoes.  (Not that I previously worked in the theatre or anything...)  Fortunately, these were just something we were trying to get for our three-year-old's weekly "dance" class.  (Non-essential...just something to complete the outfit.)  The best part is that she'll grow into them!!!  Now I know why so many reviews are based on sizing.  Our munchkin still loves them...

review_title: Street size fit my daughter perfectly. Very well made ...
review_body: Street size fit my daughter perfectly. Very well made for price. Will buy this brand again when she outgrows this pair of shoes

We bought this because it was required by my daughter's ballet teacher and I found a good price on Amazon.  I had originally ordered a size larger than her shoe size, because most ballet shoes run small.  This one runs true to size, so now we have a pair of size 1 waiting for next year!

review_title: Purchased for my 2 year old grand daughter, according ...
review_body: Purchased for my 2 year old grand daughter, according to her shoe size. Too small, nearly impossible to pass her foot through the very tight strap, which seems to be attached much too far to the back of the shoe. Also, the overall quality/feel seemed cheap.. Returned them.

review_title: Fit Great but Strings Come Loose
review_body: Easy to put on and not too tight. The strings come untied pretty easily during dance class though, so I would secure those before putting on.

review_title: This item arrived on time and was as described except ...
review_body: This item arrived on time and was as described except way to small. It seemed to me 3 to 4 times smaller than what I thought I ordered so I had to return it. It was my first attempt at buying ballet slippers though, so now I've learned this is an item I need to do in person.
Fit great and good quality as always.  This is the second pair for each of my girls. Their feet grow too fast to know how long they last. Dancer recommended.

The shoes were great and they looked adorable but my girl wears a toddler 8 or 9 and I ordered a 10 and while if she was using them for a recital they would have fit great but for weekly classes she would have grown out of them before she actually learned to dance
If you look closely, the second half of the minute counts down from 30 instead of going 30 - 35 - 40 - 45 etc.  My 4 year old was reading time until 30 but just got confused after that.
The watch is sturdy, and the band is soft and comfortable! fits even tiny wrists as it adjusts easily in size!
Our 4.5 year old granddaughter loves this watch.  Thank you for selling it to us!
adjustable wrist size and comfortable for a 7 year old. watch face is a good size. I love that it has both hours and minutes on the face to make learning to tell time easier.

review_title: Two out of Three Lasted a While
review_body: We're 2 for 3 with these Timex Kids analogs. Priced right for the youth set, my daughter's with butterflies is still working, the frog one took a year of brutality from my 5 year old, his replacement was broken in a few days which was greatly disappointing. But they are great as a teaching tool. Watch for the glow of the light under the bedsheets after lights out. The kids really liked that part.

This watch is very nice.  The perfect size for my six-year-old's wrist.  Unlike other children's watches, the face is made of plastic.  That's a good thing considering the safety issues involved in having a glass-faced watch...  My daughter has worn this watch every day since we gave it to her for a Valentine's present.  It has made her very enthusiastic about learning to tell time.

review_title: Extra hidden markings are very helpful
review_body: The extra time indications around the edge are really helpful.  Within an hour, my six year old can tell time without a problem.  She loves it.

review_title: Cute watch but band is flimsy and unravels
review_body: Very cute watch face but the band is fabric, flimsy and unravels in back. I am so disappointed.

review_title: Very cute and great for learning
review_body: Great for kids who are learning to tell time. Daughter spent at least five minutes watching the butterfly seconds hand go round. She was fascinated enough to work through the frustration of learning how to tell time.

Purchased this for my 6 year old. She loves hearts and butterflies so this was perfect for her.  The indiglo makes it even better.  We bought a camo one for her 3 year old brother and he loves that one, too.  She learned how to tell time on paper and I quiz her with a clock.  But this really is helping her along with how fast she can tell time on her own.  I had no problem adjusting it the first time she wore it.  With the stretch band it is very easy for her to put on and off.  It does say water resistant up to 99 feet, but I have her take it off when bathing or swimming anyway.
Really cute. Great quality.

review_title: ... small for a 4 year old and it fit perfect. she loves it

good quality great price

review_title: The birthday girl loved it and my son says she wears it to ...

She loves it because it matches her purple eye glass frames-well co-ordinated.
daughter says she likes it

9 yr old daughter has been wearing this watch for about 2 months. She wears it outside and plays pretty hard and it has held up well. The clear resin cover popped off at some point, so that was disappointing, but it still works fine and it was pretty cheap so I didn't expect much. She loves the multi color light up feature. Don't lose the directions, this watch has many features but most are difficult to figure out.
My daughter loves it
Really cute for the pre teen without being to childish. Bought for a Christmas gift.

COOL watch due to the LED light. My kid loves it. He discovered the rainbow color combination and excited to show to his friend.

review_body: My 8 year old daughter got this for Christmas and she LOVES it! Some of the settings are hard for her to figure out so she has had an alarm go off without realizing she set it. No e the less, she wears it every day and loves it.

review_title: My kids loved the look of the watch
review_body: Bought these watches in February, but saved them for Easter. My kids loved the look of the watch, but the buttons on the side do not work and I can't adjust the time.  Unfortunately, I missed the return window so we are stuck with broken watches.

A little larger compared to other kids shoes. But that's fine as daughter will be able to wear them for a whole year! Daughter loves them and is wearing them around the house;) a must have for spring weather

review_title: Birthday Gift For My Three Year Old Granddaughter
review_body: My granddaughter and her mother both like the Crocs boots better than anything that she received for her birthday. Every day since she received them, which was on March 22nd, she has woken up and thought she needs to go get her boots on first thing, she loves them that much. They are easy to wash and clean and everyday she has been out jumping in puddles or walking in mud. We live in Idaho! They look strong and durable enough and because of the color, I believe that her little brother will be able to wear them as well. Very satisfied with these adorable boots.

review_title: Too tight to tuck in pants
review_body: I like that the ankle has a tighter fit, so the boots stay on better. But this means it's hard to talk to pants into the boots. They are lightweight and easy to put in. The blue is a lot darker than in the product photo, but that's not a problem with me.

I really like these rain boots for my son, but he seems to need them in at least one size larger than his shoe size in order to get his foot into the boot.  The ankles are just really narrow and it makes them kind of tough to get on and off.

These boots are true to size. They are easy for my toodler to independently slip on. They are made of the traditional Crocs material, making them very durable. My son outgrew them long before they became worn. We enjoyed them so much that we bought them in the next size up.

Great packaging, great product. I ordered the next size up because I read comments that they run small, completely false. My son wears an 8 and I ordered a 9 and they are a full size bigger on him (unlike people were saying they run small). Its  not a big deal they are big, because he will still wear them. But just know they ARE true to size!

They are a bit bigger than most of his shoes, but I think it is due to the fact there is really no lining and the bump toe leaves a lot of room.  I was shocked at how light weight they are.  Totally not clunky at all.  I think that is why my fussy toddler likes them.  He doesn't like anything that feels heavy or restrictive at all.  Definitely keeps him dry, but have to use thick socks to keep his toes warm. Would not suggest for a cold climate, but good for PNW weather where it gets wet but not too terribly cold.

review_title: These are the best rain boots for kids by far
review_body: These are the best rain boots for kids by far. They are easy to wash, and the handles allow my two year old to put these on by herself without any trouble. She loves them too! She wants to wear them everyday. You can just rinse these out in the sink if mud gets on or in them. I will continue buying these for my kids as they grow.

Both my kids have these boots. My boy wears a roomy 7 so I bought these in 7, and I wish I had bought an 8 (or 9) because the 7 is pretty hard to put on with thicker socks and most likely won't fit next spring. He has chunky feet, but nothing rare for a 2 year old. He is average weight and height. My girl wears a roomy 9.5 and for some reason I got an 11, and even though they are pretty big on her, she can wear them with thicker sock, and she loves them. She can walk with them no problem even them being huge. They are cute and easy to keep clean. No lining.

I bought these rain boots for my almost 2 year old son. I really like they are lightweight, and there is a lot of room for his foot to move around. They are easy on and off. I can tuck the pants in or slide it  over the boot easily. They have reflective crocs logo on the heel of the boot. He uses them in the backyard when the grass is still wet outside or on a rainy days. The blue color is very pretty and subtle to wear with most of his clothes. I recommend these for every toddler. They are very lightweight so they can wear them in warmer weather as well.

I bought a side 7/8 for my daughter when she was 7 in the color purple. It was really adorable. She however didn't like it at first because it's soo bulky and poofy, I don't think it made her feel good when she went to school. Once it got really really cold she did like it a lot and wore it much more. It only fit her 1 season, same with my sons size 8 but the 10/12 looks like it's going to last a few years!
wonderful coat!
this was not the same quality as a similar carhartt that I bought three years ago, it was much thinner, overall though it is a nice coat, just not a cold winter time coat

review_title: The jacket is very nice. A little big for our little Sweetheart
review_body: The jacket is very nice. A little big for our little Sweetheart, but I am sure she will grow into it soon!
Love it.

HAPPY PARENT!! Bought this for my 3yr old daughter, along with some insulated Carhartt overalls. Its been -30 here in Healy, Alaska for the last 2 weeks (I would say that's ideal testing conditions) and to be honest, I couldn't be happier. This jacket is amazing, Fits great, the Sherpa lining is soft and warm. The cuffs around the wrists are my favorite par, perfect for holding gloves on or to slide her hand inside for quick warmth. Carharrt has delivered an amazing product and exceeded my expectations once again. Thanks for keeping my girl warm!
Love it, just wish Carhartt wouldn't make their jackets so wide in the bottom and and short lengthwise.
Great quality like you expect from carheartt
Fits perfect!
My daughter loves this pink winter jacket, and she said it is very warm.

review_title: A Great Purchase and Definitely Worth It!
review_body: I bought these shoes for my almost four-year-old and we are loving them. It took him a few days to get the hang of keeping the tongue of the shoe out of the way while he slipped his foot in, but now that he's got it he can get his shoes on all by himself. Such a relief for this mama who's due with another one in just a few weeks!

review_title: These sneakers are beautifully made. Sturdy with excellent traction
review_body: These sneakers are beautifully made. Sturdy with excellent traction. They encourage toddlers to be self sufficient because of the velcroe straps. Easy to get on and off. They are partially suede so I recommend treating them to prevent staining. I sadly did not think to do that and they have dirt caked on them. I would by them again.

We ordered these as a birthday gift for our now 2 year old daughter, and I have to say, these are adorable, functional, and well suited to our happy-go-lucky, active toddler's lifestyle.  We have had them almost 3 months now, and while there is a little bit of water damage from the rain on the suede portion of the shoe, they are still in great shape! The colors did not run regardless of the weather, and the velcro shows no signs of tearing off.
Way too small. At least 1 to 3 sizes smaller than others. We’re used to imperfect fits but these are unusable. I would say order at least 2 - 3 sizes up.

I've purchased the this sneaker before and I like the different color options they offer. Fits well and it's easy for a toddler to get on and off by themselves. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the exterior material can get pretty dirty and a little hard to clean. I suppose it depends on what your kid does. My little girl likes to play outside, plant, etc. so dirt can get imbedded if you don't mind trying to clean it off/out. All in all, I like them.

These are the shoes I put on my daughter when I know she has a day of running, jumping, walking and dirt!  She never complains about these hurting her feet and I never see blisters.  I wash them in the clothes washer when they get too dirty.  The Saucony logo wore off the back after one use and wash.

My son hates shoes, and I think partly because most we've tried don't fit! I bought a 5.5 with the hopes that they'd be a little roomy. They go on and seem less tight then any other pair we've tried, but they are a little less roomy than I'd hoped. My son is 14 months, but in the 88% for height, so needs a little bigger shoe then some.
Easy to put on and our son can walk easily in them as he is still a beginner walker. Will continue to buy these in each size up.
Stride rite size 7 vs. saucony size 7.5. Same size. Plus i don't like the quality. I rather pay $15 more for stride rite shoes

review_title: THESE ARE THE PERFECT TODDLER SHOES
review_body: THESE ARE THE PERFECT TODDLER SHOES!  Grippy soles great for going up slides and all that bad stuff, soft around the ankles, easy to put on.  The main cool thing is that the straps have that U shape that prevents them from coming out and causing my child to cry at me that they need me to put the straps back in their tiny holes.
I had to replace the battery immediately. The little girll who received it, was thrilled. I think it is hard to set.
My granddaughter loved this watch.  It is perfect color and characters for a 4 year old who wants a watch.
Nice size watch and love the Anna and Elsa on it! Perfect size numbers for little ones to learn the time, and love how it sparkles!
Good quality watch. I got it for my niece. Then again, it good be a lump of coal and my niece would love it so long as it had Frozen on it somewhere.
Bought it for my 4 year old niece. She loves it
Bought for my 6yo granddaughter.  SHE LOVES IT!!!
This was a surprise birthday gift for my seven year old granddaughter. And, as one would expect, she loved it!!
Beatifull,
This was cheaply packaged. The digital display was dysfunctional when it first arrived, but they quickly replaced it. My final product was cute and as expected for a child watch.
Fell apart within a week.  Don't waste your money...
Love this watch. I have small wrists and this is perfect. Does not look like a kids' watch, works great  (love the night light), and you can't beat the price!
Another beautiful little watch.  Perfect for a little girl's first watch.
This watch is fine for the price but I orderd it for myself and I am a fine boned woman with a very small wrist and I do not think the band was designed for a small child,lots of excess length.

review_title: Took no licking but wouldn't start ticking!
review_body: Doesn't work.  Hasn't worked since it was opened on Christmas morning.
It was a gift; the recipient loved it.
Good product!

review_title: My 9 year old daughter loved thiswatch and it fits her wrist perfectly
review_body: My 9 year old daughter loved this watch and it fits her wrist perfectly.

I can't rate the watch for how well it holds up since we've only had it a couple of weeks, but my daughter loves it.  It looks very "grown up" on her, plus it's her favorite color.  She also really likes the indiglo feature.  It's easy enough to set the time that I think she'll be able to do it herself after I showed her once.  The band and face both feel like quality products too.  We've gone through several watches with cheap plastic bands that broke, but I expect this will hold up much better.  Overall, it seems to be a great product at a great price.  Oh, and Timex offers a $10 replacement guarantee if a kid loses their watch--not a big savings over buying a new one, but given how many watches my kids have lost over the years, it might come in handy.
Christmas gift for my grand.
Just wish it had a light on

The reviews I had read lead me to believe these ran small, so I originally purchased a size up for my 4 year old that wears a 9.5 T shoe.  I sold those to another girl in her class and purchased her shoe size, ad they fit perfectly.  They had a little more nude color than the other shoes o had purchased, so I bought tights with a more nude pink color. These shoes are really well constructed and look adorable. :)

review_title: Quality is perfect as I expected
review_body: I got a size 9W for my daughter who use 8 1/2 at the moment and this are so tight. She only could been using it for a few weeks or so. Quality is perfect as I expected.

review_title: Fits true to size, good quality
review_body: My toddler is wearing size 7 wide sneakers right now and has been for a few months, I initially bought these in a size 8W, but ended up going down to a 7 1/2 W. They can be snugged up with the drawstrings, and I'm hopeful that she will be able to wear them for a couple of terms of ballet classes. The quality is good, it is nice to see that Capezio dance slippers are as well made as they were when I was a child.
We ordered pink. They're not pink. They're tan. And they don't even offer tan so it's the color of the material they are using.

review_title: They are cute and great quality though
review_body: This was my third pair I bought having to go up 3 sizes.... Buy at least a size and a half up! They are cute and great quality though.

review_title: Just what I was looking for
review_body: Love these shoes! So much better than the ones I bought from Target which were stiff and uncomfortable looking. I’ll definitely be buying these again.

review_title: First pair, so not much to compare...
review_body: I love that there is a place in these for me to write my daughter's name.  That helps me know which are hers.  Also, they are super cute pink and the inside is a cute flower lining.  The others I have seen at the studio are not as cute as my daughter's.  I am not sure though on how long they will last/quality.  They look great, and my daughter isn't complaining, but I don't have much experience in this area to go off of.  They did fit her.  I was very nervous based on some of the reviews I read, but they fit perfectly.  Sizing was accurate in my book.  She is currently wearing a nine in toddler shoes, and I bought her a size nine in these which are perfect.

review_title: When she first put on the ballet shoes the length was fine. (We purchased one size larger than her street ...
review_body: I didn't realize when I purchased these shoes that my daughter must have somewhat of a narrow foot. When she first put on the ballet shoes the length was fine. (We purchased one size larger than her street shoes.) However, the shoes were a little wide for her foot. We are keeping them though. We tightened them with the laces and I think they will be fine for the time being. The shoe itself is well made.
Very nice, very much the "real deal" ballet shoe for a reasonable price. My daughter has short chubby toddler feet and the wide fit her wel.

Very nice dance shoe.  Runs small for sure.  My daughter wears a 9, but she hasn't fully grown into it yet.  So I ordered a 9.5 and there is very little room to grow.  It's fine since I don't want her dancing in a too large of a shoe but definitely go up in size.

review_title: The watch was a great fit for my 9 year old
review_body: The watch was a great fit for my 9 year old. It really got her paying attention to time, and learning how to read it better. The only negative I would say is that for a kids watch, it scuffs very easily. She no longer wears it because it is hard to read. I think there is a warranty with the TIMEX brand, but have yet to go forward with that yet.
Fits daughter comfortably, does not make wrist sweaty, easy to read, adorable.

This just arrived, I live in Jamaica so things have to come to me through and aero account so I get my orders a little delayed. This looks even better in person. The little second hand butterfly is lovely. It's waterproof, I don't think I saw that until after it came and it's an indigo watch so it lights up for telling time in the dark, my seven year old loves that. She can read it easily and just loves it. I will buy another when my other daughter learns to read time as well.

My 9 year old daughter is pretty rough and tumble.  She loves it.  The band is adjustable and stretchy, so she can fix it just the way she wants it.  You can also replace the bands if needed.  The clock face is easy to read and the butterfly second hands are cute.  All in all, we really like it.

review_title: Cute but the wristband is too loose
review_body: I looked for a long time for a 'starter' watch for my daughter.  I thought this was the best of what I could find.  First the pros:  the numbers are large, the second hand is a butterfly, and it lights up.  Cons:  the wrist band is adjustable which really means that it is never tight enough and slides around a lot.  I was hoping she would want to wear it every day, but she really doesn't like that it's not secure on her wrist.

review_title: Make sure it's working before you give it to someone
review_body: This item is junk! I gave it as a gift and the recipient said it is broken. The mom will try to have the battery replaced. I am so embarrassed! Can't return the item as it's a gift.
Watch face got scratched so bad you can't see the numbers after worn to school one day. Band is cheaply made and not easily adjustable.
We bought this watch for my daughter to learn to tell time. She is struggling to make sense of it.

review_title: I love the watch band on this watch
review_body: I love the watch band on this watch. It is elastic and fits a child's wrist really well, but the watch itself wouldn't keep time.  We replaced the batter (of course) and it still lost about 30 minutes each day.  Eventually my daughter stopped wearing it because it wasn't worth having it.

This Timex watch stopped working for my daughter months ago.  I finally replaced the battery and that didn't even do the trick.  I am very surprised because I own a handful of Timex watch that just don't stop.  I would have thought the same from Timex on a kids watch.  Don't waste your money.
Love it, cute and soft
Very adorable!
Granddaughter loves it!
My daughter loves this jacket. It fits well and has a little stretch. Really cute!
Fits wonderfully! My granddaughter loved this jacket!
Got it for my daughter, fits like I expected, not too snug, nor excessively large. Sleeves were just a bit long, but she can grow into that
SHE LOVES IT.
its great.
As advertised
This fit perfect
My daughter likes it.
Me and my Husband brought 2 of theses watches for our daughters to help remind them to go potty . So far it's been working like a charm!
We got so many compliments in this watch we ordered another one as a gift for a friend on the swim team! No problem setting the time, no problems so far with the waterproofing.

review_body: This is a nice watch. My niece likes it, however it proved to be a bit technical to set it on time.

It's sort of a nice watch.  My 7 year old likes it, so I guess that's all that matters.  It's one step up from the cheap watches you see being sold for kids at drug stores.  The strap is made of a silicone-like plastic which is very soft to the touch.  My one gripe is it took awhile to set up and get the correct date and time but that could be on me because I'm not exactly Einstein when it comes to stuff like this.  I included a picture of the instructions just in case anyone lost theirs and needs to see a copy.  You will be so up a creek if you lose the instructions and need to make any adjustments.
Granddaughter is thrilled with this watch!
Great kids watch for the price.  No issues and niece loved it for her birthday.
Love this watch! I got it for my 6 year old and she loves it. It fits her wrist well, has a light and timer which she thinks is cool. Good quality, rugged and cute. Great buy for the price!

review_title: Excellent watch and great customer service!
review_body: The backlight on the watch didn't function when we received the watch. The watch was returned and we received another watch very quickly. This seller had great communication and great customer service. My son loves the watch and it works great!

review_title: My 10 year old was happy with the look and fit and took some time ...
review_body: We were very excited to receive this watch. My 10 year old was happy with the look and fit and took some time to figure out how it works. However after a few days he realized it has been stopping and restarting causing it to loose the correct time. He has only been wearing it a week. Seems too early to be the battery. Very disappointed!
Perfect for my 7 year old.  Loves it.

We received a defective watch which was unfortunate however the seller was very quick to resolve the issue and worked with us to make sure everything was satisfactory. My son loves the watch and all the functions.

Unfortunately these did not work for my 3 year old. Things to know before you buy:

review_title: These have been great for my son
review_body: These have been great for my son.  Most rain boots crack and fall apart.  We have had these for about 2 years now and they are still together.  He is getting ready to size out and I plan on buying him another larger pair.

Can only give four stars for right now as my daughter has not worn these yet (we are still dealing with snow- no rain yet!), but the overall style and quality is what you would expect from Crocs.  Very lightweight, super easy for my three year old to put on and she loves running around the house with them on which leads me to believe they are comfortable!

review_title: Exactly what I was looking for, super light weight
review_body: Super lightweight and easy for my 2 year olds to put on themselves!  Will be buying the next size when they grow out of them.  My girls wear around a 5/6, so I bought 7s which gives them room to grow plus I can add thick socks for colder winter puddles and they stay perfectly dry (our Montana "fall" and "spring" - frozen puddles that melt during the day and freeze at night!).

Our daughter loves these, this is her 2nd pair as she outgrew her first. She likes to put them on and take them off herself. The only problem I've seen is since they're completely waterproof (which is good) her feet sweat a lot (not so good) since they can't breathe and are sometimes hard to take back off.
The shoes were for my niece and she loves it! They are cute and fit a little loose but that's not a bad thing at her age since she can wear thick socks now for warmth and have them for a long time :)

My favorite thing about these is the weight. Most rain boots are clunkers but these are very light weight with easy pull on handles. I ordered 2 sizes up (size 2 little boy) because I wanted 2 years out of them, they were bigger than expected but my son still loves them and wears them with no issues (might get to wear them 3 years!) I also ordered my daughters 2 sizes up (size 7 toddler) and they were not as big as expected. (????) they fit her fine but may not get 2 years out of hers. Overall a great rain boot but sizing is a bit tricky. Colors are true and great!
i don't know why i have bought these i know that one sweats in crocs but wow these are pretty bad. that sad my child loves wearing them from the color to the fit something is working for her.

These are fantastic water proof galoshes! They are so good, we have two pairs for our three year-old (one for home and one for school)! They are not cold- proof, so not ideal for snow (even with wool socks), but have kept our little one's feet dry for hours as he splashes through the deepest mud puddles. They have held up through excessive wear and tear for six months now- we are VERY impressed. As soon as he outgrows these, we will definitely buy again.

review_title: Crocs are the best rain boot!!
review_body: I spent years looking for a decent kids boot that would crack or rip in a few short months.  We have been through so many pairs of boots it's crazy.  My kids are hard on boots, they wear them around the farm all the time and most just do not hold up.  But this is our third pair of crocs and I'm happy to report that they have never cracked or fallen apart.  They are wearing well and will be able to be passed down to the next sibling.  I'm so glad to have found something that works and I only wish they came in bigger sizes!
Love coat. Great quality. Will save for next year.
Excellent coat for a great price!
Daughter loved it
Lighter than expected but satisfied

review_title: I love this little pink coat!
review_body: This coat is just perfect.  It looks soo good on my 18 mo old granddaughter.  She loves putting it on.
Great quality and fit.
Totally worth the cost!
Awesome Jacket! Pink fleece inside on the body and hood and quilted in the arms! Would order this jacket again.
Cute warm jacket
High quality, great shoes. My boy loved them. Well built, durable, and looked comfortable. What more could you want for your toddler?

review_title: and I'm so pleased with how well they hold up
review_body: This is the second pair of Saucony Baby Jazz we've gotten, and I'm so pleased with how well they hold up! I'm a convert from buying pair after pair of shoes from discount stores -- these Sauconys hold up until my son is ready to go up to the next size. (Now, I won't claim that they're still a pristine blue at that point, but they're still supporting his feet, and that's what matters.)

My daughter loved these shoes.  They run on the wide side, especially in the heel, and are almost too big for her, but they work fine with thicker socks.  My biggest complaint is that the insoles come out really easily, usually in the first day or two of wear.  This is problematic for us because she is in daycare and taking her shoes on and off during the day.  We have had these shoes a week and she already lost one insole and refuses to wear them without it.  We won't buy these again.

These shoes fit fine and appear to be of solid construction. My daughter likes them. However, the big negative is how tightly the tongue is attached to the body of the shoe. I'm sure the idea is to keep it from getting pushed down when kids are putting the shoes on. In reality, it makes it so my daughter can't get these on by herself. Her previous shoes had a tongue that would pull far away from the shoe and she had no issues. Even when I'm helping her, getting these things on can be a pain.

review_title: Sizing is small compared to stride rite
review_body: Good shoes, but I should have read the reviews first. I was used to buying stride rite, and Saucony is about one size smaller. I ordered 8 1/2 since my kid was using 7 1/2 stride rite, and they seem like the same size. So sadly they don't fit my kids anymore. You can see on the picture the gray to the left is a stride rite 7.5M  and the blue on the right is an 8.5 Saucony

review_title: Our go-to shoes for our son!
review_body: These are our go-to shoes for our 3 year old son. He loves how they fit and I love how easy they are for him to put on and off by himself. We just keep ordering the next size up as he grows!
Really cute shoes, but they were too tight over the top of my daughter’s feet. She couldn’t get the Velcro straps over her foot.

These might be my favorite pair of shoes my 2.5 year old daughter has ever owned. They hold up well, have good velcro, are practical, and she likes them. After a couple of months, they are still going quite strong. I'll likely purchase the next size when we are ready.

review_title: I recommend Sizing up a 1/2 size than your usual size
review_body: This runs reallly small. Bought a 10.5 and it was the same size as (if not a little smaller than) my son’s size 10 Plae. So I sized up to 11.5 thinking he could use the room but now they are way too big. So... buying an 11. Anyway, I recommend Sizing up a 1/2 size than your usual size.

My grand-daughter had these shoes already and when asked what she wanted for shoes in a larger size she picked the ones she had before.  I guess that speaks volumes since it comes from a three year old.

review_title: my granddaughter did like it until we try to set the time
review_body: This watch is cute, my granddaughter did like it until we try to set the time. Impossible to do.It's on a shelf.

This was a gift for my niece. She is learning to tell time, so digital was perfect for this years gift.

review_body: My daughter dug it. Its Frozen so it could pretty much be a napkin and she would love it.

Bought this watch for my 9 yr old granddaughter on her 10th birthday. She loves, loves, loves it! Sturdy watch, still serving her well after several months now. Her favorite feature is the indiglo/light.
Nice little watch. Fit well on my seven year old granddaughter.

review_title: Order 1 to 1.5 size bigger than current shoe size
review_body: Pleased with this purchase. Daughter wears 11 shoe and I ordered 12.5 and it fits with a little room to grow. Thanks to the other helpful reviews I ordered the correct size the first time.

I love these shoes. Unfortunately they arrived several days late (I don't think it was amazon's fault, but they refunded my money and were very helpful) and I ended up running to a store to get a different pair so she'd have shoes for her first class. I don't like the other pair nearly as much as these ones. So, so nice. Especially for the price.

The shoe fit as expected. The draw string on the front is adjustable to the width of the foot so it does fit. They are not all day shoes because they are for ballet. I would only let her wear them to class, not out to a store or a birthday party, although she tries! Excellent Quality as well. Neutral color allows them to match any of her leotards or tutu's.
Good quality and good price, but they definitely run small like other reviews state. Definitely order up! I will have to order a new pair very soon as they are already too small on my toddler.

review_title: Order a half a size up.
review_body: They are really cute, and look just like picture.  I had to return them because I ordered a size 7.5 since my original pair was 7 for my daughter.  Well the 7.5 was the same size as a 7.  So make sure to order about a half a size up.

Pretty good quality.  Based on other reviews, I expected to be one size smaller than street shoe size so I ordered up.  My three year old normally wears a 9 in shoes so I ordered a 10, and it's too wide.  Luckily the drawstring pulls them right enough until she grows into them.  They're very flexible.  Overall, I'm satisfied because I saved money compared to what they would be at the dance store.

review_title: Great for a flower girl, size up like everyone says!
review_body: Absolutely perfect for our toddler to be a flower girl at a friend's wedding!  Listen to the reviews and size up.  My daughter wears a 6-7 size toddler shoe and I ordered an 8 to be safe. They were perfect leaving a little bit of room and not tight at all.

review_title: Nice shoe, runs a tad small
review_body: These shoes just arrived. I ordered an 8 after looking at dancedepot.com, which said this style runs true to size, and measuring my daughter's feet with a tape measure, against their measurement chart. The 8 JUST fits her. I know toddler shoe sizes run all over the place, but my daughter wears a 7 or 7.5 in street shoes with room to wiggle her toes, so I would say that these run a tad small. Luckily I have a younger daughter who will inherit these lovely shoes when her older sister outgrows them (which I am guessing will be in the next few months). I will order a larger size for my older girl, as I'm very happy with the quality of the shoe overall.

review_title: These shoes are exactly what my daughter's dance school asked ...
review_body: These shoes are exactly what my daughter's dance school asked for, they get 5 stars because of quality, but the sizing is way off. My daughter normally wears 8-8.5 (children/toddler sz) and when I read other reviews order a size up.  I ordered a 9 and they were way too small.  We went to a dance shop and she had to get a size 11.
Beautiful, very well made slipper but too small for my granddaughter but never fear gave it to my other granddaughter who will wear in the future!
My daughter loves it. I love that she is learning time telling language. Half past quarter till etc!  She gets it. She is 8 and loves tell time.

This watch is great and fun for kids. My niece enjoys telling time from it, and wears it all the time - except to bathe. The wrist band is a little long and sort of wraps around to the face of the watch, but I suppose this can be easily rectified by snipping it a bit, however we tucked it under the band - just in case she puts on some weight during the watch's lifetime. All in all its a nice starter watch to learn analog time telling. The blue light that lights up the face is adorable.

review_title: Hard to see numbers on the face of the watch.
review_body: Poor quality watch starp, it has an odd rubber smell and the face is so small my 5 year old can't see the numbers well.

review_title: 8yo wears it every day even if she can't tell time just yet.
review_body: This is super cute. My 8yo daughter was so proud to get this watch.  Yes, the numbers are kind of small, but she doesn't seem to mind.  I found that the wrist-strap is kind of difficult to affix, but she has gotten into the habit of just slipping it off and one with out adjusting it.  The instructions included in the package to teach a kid to tell time are also written in teeny tiny writing, so they weren't very helpful to her.

review_title: The beautiful picture is so small she has to work two ...
review_body: Meh, it's advertised as a time teacher but Moonlight wasn't motivated to learn how to tell time. The beautiful picture is so small she has to work two times to count the time and to see the picture. It ended up in her toy box after only a fortnight. And it only lasted that long because the strap kind of resembled a bracelet.

review_title: I bought this for my daughter to help her learn ...
review_body: I bought this for my daughter to help her learn to tell time.  The numbers are EXTREMELY small.  The glass is already quite scratched, and hasn't held up well...this makes it even harder to read.  I would try to find something different.

review_title: bought another because I liked the watch so much and this one was running ...
review_body: Luv this watch, but came with dead battery, took to jewelry store and it fell all apart, bought another because I liked the watch so much and this one was running yay!!!

this watch is adorable but when i received it i had to replace the battery, shouldn't it come in working condition?

review_title: Second hand quit working after 2 months.  Manufacturer sent a new one.
review_body: The second hand does not work.  We have had the watch for 2 months.  My son purchased this watch with his own money and was super proud of it.  Now the second hand does not move.  Disappointed.

review_title: So far it's been working great for my 7 year old boy with ADHD
review_body: So far it's been working great for my 7 year old boy with ADHD.  We got it with the sole purpose of setting the timer to remind him to take his medicine at school.  He likes it so far.  I didn't really like the instructions it came with.  They are a bit lacking but I figured it out.  I wish there was a way to shut off the beep it makes every hour to tell you the time.  It confuses my son who thinks that the alarm is going off.
Doesn't work. I've reset the time, following the exact directions in the booklet, multiple times. It just resets after a few mins. Completely useless.

This is a really good watch for the price! I got it for my grandson's 11th birthday and he loves it! He had no trouble following the included directions for setting up the different functions and hasn't even taken it off to shower. It fits well and he has a bit of room for growth. The only reason I am giving it 4 stars is because of the color being much different than shown. The color is very dull and not at all bright as pictured. More of a dull medium green than a bright lime green. My grandson loves it though so I am happy!
My son loves this watch.

review_title: my son loves the other cool features that appear to work well
review_body: The analog second hand has issues as it rounds the 50-second mark. It's almost as if the gearing is slipping because the hand doesn't want to progress around the face any further. Otherwise, my son loves the other cool features that appear to work well.
works well, i like the style, but instructions were confusing
My son loved it

review_title: Loved the watch.. while it lasted. Ours was not water resistant.
review_body: We all loved the watch and my son was obsessed with it the two weeks he had it. He wore it just about every day. The one star is for false advertisement. It is not water resistant.He went swimming with it once and it got foggy and didn't work. No, he did not push any keys. I put the watch in a rice bag for over a week and it ticks now, but it is still foggy and does not show any digital. He can barely read the time so he doesn't want to wear it. :(

These a re cute. I got my 7 yr old a side 3 (for room to grow)  he loves them. They will definitely last longer than one season. Which is what he needs. Living on the oregon coast it is wet. And we go through so many pairs of rubber boots for him.  I'm so glad I found these!!

I love these boots for my daughter. She just outgrew the size 7 so the size 8 seemed a little big for one size up but she loves them anyway.  They are not too big that she can't run in them.  These are literally the best rain boots.  So easy to

review_title: Easy to clean and put on!
review_body: My grandson loves these and the handles help him put them on by himself.  My daughter loves them since they don't have the cotton liner inside, she can rinse them out if needed and they are ready the next morning.  I am sure I will be buying more of these as he outgrows them.

review_title: I really like these, they are lightweight and the colour is ...
review_body: I really like these, they are lightweight and the colour is lovely but I just couldn't get the right size. I bought two different pairs to try and make it work but they just had way too much space around the foot.

I had high hopes for these, but was disappointed when they arrived. They were tight, and incredibly difficult to get on. We returned these for the Lone Cone children's waterproof rubber rainboots - MUCH better.
I purchased these over summer for my 4 year old to wear. Well, it’s finally rainy season and the boots don’t fit. I even sized up! Way too small.

My 4 year old adores these boots! He can take them on and off by himself. They fit true to size (size 12). They are comfortable, easy to clean, durable, and really cute! He reports that they are hard to run fast in, but that's likely to be true of any rain boots. A great buy!

review_title: Great, solid boots, but the leg opening is very small!
review_body: These are excellent boots! They are super durable and water proof with no seams for leaks. They are very light and sturdy as well. My son loved them and and they were comfortable to wak in with a nice soft sole.

I love these boots. They are very cute, and they are wide enough for my son’s extra wide feet! But, they are pretty narrow around the calf, which pulls all of his pants up and bunches them at the top of the boot. Not very practical for keeping his little legs warm. And probably not very comfortable for him either.
Room to grow/very cute/loves to splash!!!
Love the jacket. It's softer than the regular adult jackets. I wish it had been available in the purple. Purple was sold out.

review_title: Coat is great just a little long in the sleeves
review_body: Wonderful quality of carhartt but soft and cute! My daughter loves it. Carahartt like dad but girly. Only problem gets dirty easy
Great jacket. Needed it a little large so she can grow into it and wear it for awhile.
Just what my daughter needed to have a coat like daddy's sleeves were a tad long but not a big deal at all

review_title: The Sleeves are a little short but other than that good quality
review_body: I would recommend this jacket for any active female or male if that is what color you like or swing that way. lol
I love this the price was good, and as usual I needed for a birthday, got it right in time
Good stuff

daughter loves how it feels and even inside of the pockets. the other colors dont have this comfort level like the pink one. now she has no excuses for not helping us gather wood and work in the cold.
This jacket is so cute durable material on the outside good for playing hard outside and a very warm cozy lining.  Washable . Love it. Also there is a inside pocket for treasures.

review_title: Made good and she will stay warm all winter
review_body: Ordered a size  3 for  my  2 year old grand daughter and she will be able to wear it next year too. Made good and she will stay warm all winter.

review_title: Adorable sneaker. Didn't realize the silver was shimmery
review_body: Adorable sneaker. Didn't realize the silver was shimmery. It was a bonus for me! My daughter hasn't complained. They appear comfortable. A tad bigger than expected but she will grow into them!

review_title: Excellent shoe for nonstop little ones
review_body: I bought a different style of Saucony for my little boy when he was 2 1/2 years old. It took 6 months of little boy toughness before he finally outgrew them and there was no question I would look for another pair. These fit the bill in almost every way.

I got the grey/orange ones and the box says girls. I got it for my boy. I didn't see a gender on the page. But I guess it doesn't matter because apparently the sizing isn't different for boys and girls. But they were too small and I ordered a 1/2 size up. And I got the blue ones for my younger son which said "boy" and ordered a 1/2 size up and they fit perfectly. So I ordered two shoes 1/2 size up. One fit, and one didn't. I guess I am saying the sizing is not consistent.

review_title: Very easy to get on and off
review_body: These are soft on the inside so I don't feel like I'm scraping my son's heel the way I do when he wears his boat shoes or canvas sneakers.  The velcro is very easy to use, as well.  My partner has a hard time with tying laces, so this shoe makes it easy for him to dress our son, as well.

This is the second time we have bought this brand. They hold up great.  He grew out of the last pair just as he was rubbing a hole in the toe, which took 9-10 months.  And he wore those shoes everyday.  They are very narrow, though. He is four and I'm not sure they would've fit his feet was he was a chubby 2 year old.

These shoes were adorable, I just wish they fit as good as they looked.  The fabric was hard and would not bend.  I bought a size up for my daughter.  I was able to get one on her foot.  She wore it for a few minutes while I tried on a different shoe on her other foot.  When I took this shoe off, the tops of her foot were a deep purple.  Almost resembling a bruise.  These had to go!

review_title: Run a bit small and narrow
review_body: Love these shoes. My kid puts them through the ringer, and they really keep up, so worth the price. But buy a full size up. I've bought 3 pairs that were half a size up from my kids current size, and had to return them because they run quite small and narrow (which is why I give the 4 stars). But the return and replace was easy.
These shoes were SUPER narrow, I have never had to purchase wide shoes for my son but these were ridiculously narrow.

It's cute shoes but sizing is misleading, too small compared to other brands or in general toddlers shoes. My kid wears normal toddler sneakers, Asics, I purchased a size bigger but still fits very tight, the velcros barely touch each other, since we used it outside, I can't return them.

The syling of the product is really nice. They are cute. However, the are a snug fit and quite stiff at first. We debated on whether to send them back or not, simply because they are stiff. Hopefully after a prolonged period of wear, that will work itself out.
Our girl loves scooting around on this scooter. She uses it all the time.
Adorable little girls' watch.  The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it's too big for my 4 year old's wrist - we had to make an extra hole.  Overall cute and easy-to-set watch.

review_title: My daughter hate it then and there because it was not working
review_body: it arrived on time but then the watch has a low battery. My daughter hate it then and there because it was not working!

review_body: I have always bought Timex watches and was tickled "pink" that they offered this one! I bought it for my grand-daughter's 8th birthday. It is easy to read and the pink is a baby pink which is subtle and feminine! I love this watch! Perfect!
Cute kids watch!

I ordered this watch for my grandaughter, 8 years old, she was so pleased with it.  She called my and read the warranty information to me.  She then asked me if I knew it lit up at night.  I did not! I then ordered the dark blue strapped one for my grandson, there is a back order for this color and he is so disappointed that he does not have his yet.. we are waiting..
I got this for an 11 year old girl, she loved it. Looks really nice and it is a great first watch, it doesn't look cheap made.

I bought this for my grand daughter and she loves it. It's a Timex so I don't have to worry about it getting damaged because every Timex I've ever owned held up to far more than normal wear and tear...
The only thing I wish it had was a break away wristband for safety.

review_title: I took really good care of it by trying to avoid water and ...
review_body: Bought it for Nursing school because it looks small and decent..It was 24$ when I bought it plus shipping, hoping it would last me at least my first year of nursing school. I took really good care of it by trying to avoid water and stuff, but it only lasted 4 months. It broke on me during clinicals. Would not recommend to anyone who wants something that last longer than a few months.
Large, easy-to-read numbers, delicate pink colour - not too bright, strap a bit long but easy to add another hole.  My granddaughter LOVED it.
This is the second one I bought for my granddaughter, she love her first one until a friend broke it. Happy girl again.
Birthday gift for in Jan.  Watch looks very nice and not cheap looking

My daughter is a petite 6 year old with narrow feet. She wears an 11 1/2 street shoe with room at the toes (feet measured right at 11 in store). I ordered these in an 11.5 N with the following results:

review_title: Seriously Large for a Ballet Shoe
review_body: These look nicely made, but the sizing is roughly street shoe sizing, as other reviewers have noted. You could say this means "they run true to size," but that's highly misleading, as ballet shoes normally run a size or so small. To repeat: they run true to *street* size, not normal ballet shoe size--at least in size 2.5. So, just be aware of that as you order or you'll be like me, shelving these shoes for a year before using them. (Luckily, girls grow, as the shoes are really not worth the time and postage to return.)
Order 1-2 sizes up!! My daughter wears a 9 and I had to return them for a 10.5M and they fit perfectly with just enough room to grow!
We had these shoes in a 9.5N and they fit my daughter's narrow foot perfectly. I ordered up to a size 10 as her feet are growing, and the footbed is SIGNIFICANTLY wider.
Fit great as expected.  I've been using capezio since I was a baby.  Always a reliable brand for dance stuff.

Before I ordered these shoes I was worried over choosing the correct size. The reviews were very up and down on what was the best size to order. I ended up ordering my daughter her street size 9.5 and one size up 10.5 to be sure that one would fit. I also ordered the Ms because my daughter has normal sized feet. Ns are always too narrow. I also measured her foot to make sure that the shoe sizing chart in inches matched with her normal size, before ordering.

These are great ballet shoes...just know that they run small. I had to return the size my granddaughter normally wears and get the next size up in wide to make sure they fit. That said  they are cute as they can be and she loves them.

Know that dance shoes are sized differently than street shoes.  My daughter was recently measured as a size 11.  We bought 11.5 in street shoes and a size 12 in these ballet shoes and they fit just right. Shoes are well made and the flower fabric inside is a cute detail for kids.

review_title: Quality is good and the shoes will last a while - so ...
review_body: These shoes fit true to size for us. My daughter wears a size 11 shoe and I purchased these a size up based on comments - they work but are a bit larger than I would have preferred (thankfully kids grow fast). The shoe is a bit wider than I would have expected also, I purchased the medium width and it was a bit lose on the sides for my fairly medium sized kid. Quality is good and the shoes will last a while - so well worth the purchase.

I bought these for my daughter but I wasn't sure what size to get her. I bought a little larger thinking she could grow into it, but it was way too big. I bought the size she wears now and they fit perfectly. I will keep these for her to grow into. They're cute and fit as expected. My daughter says they're comfortable.

review_title: Not an Indiglo watch - Not as described!
review_body: This is the SECOND TImex watch I have ordered from Amazon with the expectation that it would have Indiglo as clearly advertised. It does not! The photo for this item even shows the word "Indiglo" on the front!!! Very frustrating and surely disappointing for my sweet daughter who I have been trying to buy her first special watch for. She really wanted one that lights up. Poor advertising and poor switch on Timex's part because they obviously used to sell this watch with the indiglo function. Older reviews say it has it. Cute watch otherwise.  :(

review_title: the watch face makes it easy to tell time
review_body: I have this watch myself, and my daughter loves it, so I bought her one.  She was so excited...the watch face makes it easy to tell time, and the colors are bright and fun.  The only negative thing I can say (thus the lowered rating) is the watch band was VERY short.  She is a very petite 10 year old, and cannot wear it on her wrist!

Timex warranty is void if not bought through timex retailer,  so our watch has no warranty. Other than that, it's a great watch!! My child loves it and actually wants to tell me the time (every 10 minutes lol).

Be aware, the version that showed up for us did not have the Indiglo feature, so that was very disappointing to our seven year old who was looking forward to that as one of the best parts of the watch. I have now learned the importance of sorting the reviews to show the most recent first as the lack of Indiglo was stated in multiple recent reviews and I would not have ordered had I seen those reviews first.

review_title: Great watch, not a good strap
review_body: Kids like it, but the strap is a annoyance. The longer part comes out and irritates my daughter. As a first watch, she is happy to wear it but given the nuisance of the strap, wouldn't buy again. If you can switch the strap to something else, it would be a good buy.

review_title: ... for my 7yr old daughter and the band gets dirty easily and looks washed out after stretching a few ...
review_body: Bought this for my 7yr old daughter and the band gets dirty easily and looks washed out after stretching a few times to take off or put on.

I bought this for my 7 yr old granddaughter. I was surprised to find that the numbers on the outer edge(5,10,15,etc.)are very small. She seems to be able to see them. Maybe it's just my aging eyesight😊 Took another reviewer's advice and put a couple stitches in the band to hold it in place in case the clasp loosens up as reported by others. So far so good. My granddaughter loves it.

review_title: The elastic band is great. No help needed to put on
review_body: The elastic band is great. No help needed to put on. However the time has to be adjusted almost every day. It keeps losing 2-3 minutes.
Strap's a little long for a 5 year old, but the watch works. Yes, the minute numbers between are tiny, but how else would they fit? It's a pretty watch & band, helps with learning to tell time.

Just gave this super cute watch to my 7 y.o. Niece for her birthday. She loved it. The Velcro wristband is perfect. The coordinated colors of the hour and minute-hands to the colors of the numbers on the watch face is also super helpful to a new learner. Just a great watch overall.
Love this jacket for my daughter. Very stylish!!
Daughter wears it daily
True to size, great quality, very cute!
Perfect amd exactly as described. Cutest addition to my daughters wardrobe. The jacket is made very well and seems that it will last awhile.
good

review_body: Bought this purely as a toy watch for our toddler. For that it will be great. Build is okay, but functionality is confusing. There is nothing to tell you what the buttons do or what features they access.

My daughter's watch fell apart the first time she wore it. The end piece is held to the band with a pin; the best we can figure, the fitting wasn't snug and the end piece simply fell off from the pin. She wasn't even doing anything strenuous; she was walking in the yard.

She already has two scratches and she has only worn it for a week. For those reasons I'm rating this purchase two out of five stars.

I love it!

review_body: Seems ok.  Looks pretty cool, but started coming apart not long after my son started wearing it.  However, it was fixable and he still likes it.  For the price though, hard to beat.

I highly recommend this product .  It is exactly as pictured and described. Looks very nice on my grandsons arm and he loves it and so do I.
