review_title: Great watch for outdoor loving active boy!
review_body: This is a great watch for my 10 year old boy who is very active outdoors. He sometimes forgets to take it off and has taken a dip in the beach, swimming pool, backyard water puddles, bath water several times. The watch is holding up great despite all of those factors. I would recommend this watch for active kids!
Bought this watch for my son, he likes it very much. Price is reasonable for this kind of watch.

review_title: Nice looking child's sport watch, but ... (PLEASE READ EDIT)
review_body: I purchased this watch as a gift for my grandson. I found it harder than I thought it would be to find a watch that didn't look like a toy (power ranger or such) that would still fit a smaller wrist. This has a 40mm head, with attached plastic band that will fit smaller wrists (at least it fit a 10 yr old). I looks nice, seems pretty well built (time will tell) and is easy to set. It is water resistant but states not to press the buttons while under water. I like that it is both analog (uses hands) and digital. I'm not sure schools teach telling analog time anymore. The digital display is hard to read when the minute hand is between 5 and 7 as it covers the display. The three stars are because, it feels cheap (even though I did pay $14.99) and the watch had a price tag for 198 yen which is $1.75 and the watch was slipped into a loose fitting plastic bag.

review_title: I like how light these are
review_body: I like how light these are. I only wish they were taller (took one star off for that reason). When my daughter plays in puddles, she needs taller boots than these.
These rain boots are perfect for kids. Super easy to clean since it’s all one piece. Easy for kids to pull on by themselves. This is our second pair.
They run true to size if you buy the Phibians from Stride Rite.  Very cute and easy for my little girl to put on by herself thanks to the handles!

review_title: My daughter had a pair of these previously and refused ...
review_body: My daughter had a pair of these previously and refused to wear anything else. So when she outgrew those we got here these as a replacement. Unfortunately the leg holes are much too tight, they don't seem to be any bigger than the smaller pair we had before. It is a struggle getting these boots on and off and my daughter doesn't want to wear them.

My son loves running in them. They look comfortable and his feet stay warm and dry. They are very light, which I think is another reason he doesnt complain and would wear them all day. We bought other brand rain boots in the past, eg Bogs, which are quite a bit more expensive, but he refused to wear them.
Great rain boots. My 2yr old toddler loves them and wants to wear them even when it's not raining. We bought classic yellow... so cute! We get complaints. They do run slightly on the smaller side.
What are great rain boots for a toddler!

review_title: Easy for the kids to slip on and play when ...
review_body: These are an every day item for us. Easy for the kids to slip on and play when it's wet outside. We couple them with fuzzy socks to use as snow boots as well. Since they are all once piece of rubber their feet always stay nice and dry and no insole to fall out.

I live in southeast AK and rain boots are a must!  My kids live in boots most of the year and are very hard on their boots. These seem durable and might last longer then the praised Xtra-tuffs that my kids blow through.  My daughter, who wears size 8 clothes got size 3 in yellow (lots of room for growth) she says they are really comfortable!  Bonus: they were a lot cuter on her then I expected!

Perfect boots for playing in the mud and water. I bought these boots because our backyard was a mud pit because my husband was building a shop. These boots were the answer to my frustration of muddy, heavy boots. These boots are light weight and can be thrown in the washer. Mom win!
I like it but it's not as warm as expected or at least not for below 30-degree weather without a heavy sweater for outside play.

Very comfortable for my son and does not slide around on his foot making it safe to romp around the playground with his full 4 yo force! Highly recommend.

review_title: Saycony is a great brand-- light weight
review_body: Saycony is a great brand-- light weight, cute, and durable but this dealer sent me a used shoe. It had grass stains on the front of the shoe and could tell the sole of the shoe was cleaned instead of it being brand new.
Positives:

review_title: ... a couple years because they fit well and are super cute -- I like for them to wear something ...
review_body: Been buying Saucony for my boys for a couple years because they fit well and are super cute -- I like for them to wear something a little different than the usual Nike. My son with narrow/average feet can wear them longer than my younger son, who has wider/thicker feet, but they hold up well for both...even when they use their toes as brakes for their bikes!

I bought these for my 2 year old daughter who would otherwise be colored pink from head to toe.  I love these shoes.  They are easy to slip on and a great shoe for  an active child.  Not flat like most child shoes, follows the way we step, rolling from heel to toe.  Fabulous color that fits her unique stand out personality.  Also the color is neutral and therefore can be passed to the next one.  Haven't gotten that bug yet!  Anywho, love the shoe.  May have to get her a second pair for her 3rd birthday!

I love these little shoes and so does my 3 year old. He is able to put them on and take them off without my assistance, which is a huge plus. The quality is good and the price is on point. We use these shoes mostly for outside play.

LOVE THESE.....finally a shoe that fits my growing baby boy.  Priced just right (for my sizes) and very cute/stylish too! I will be ordering this shoe for him again (might mix up the color, but love the shoe and fit)!!

So at first my toddler said these shoes hurt and they seemed stiff but after awhile she got brave and started wearing them and now (after a month of breaking them in) she prefers them to her Adidas. They are quality shoes and look like they will hold up long after she outgrows them. And SO cute!

My son loved these shoes!  They were his "every day" shoe for preschool.  He wore them daily on the playground and they cleaned up easily, too!  Win Win.  I will likely buy him another pair, as they shoes I have purchased recently have not lasted nearly as long.
My granddaughter loves these sneakers and enjoys running in them.  She likes to play with the velcro though.
This is a nice little watch for a 5 year old.  She wears it all the time.
My daughter is going to love getting this in her stocking!!

review_title: Great ballet shoe for my beginner ballerina!
review_body: Loved these ballet shoes. They were perfect for my 1st time dancer, molded over her feet and she was able to point her toes and bend her feet. They are very nice and professional.

review_title: Great shoes! Run small so go up in size.
review_body: Great shoes that fit well. However, they run small so go up by a half to a whole size.
Ran waaay smaller than expected. Luckily we only needed them for a few days. Great product, just go a little bigger than you would think.

review_title: Fits true to size. I first bought a size ...
review_body: Fits true to size. I first bought a size up (based on reviews) and had to return it for the right size. FYI These are soft ballet slippers, not padded point shoes.

review_title: So far so good. Adorable - soft and comfortable
review_body: So far so good. Adorable - soft and comfortable. They fit nicely although in my opinion they run a size and a half small.

review_title: Sizing is off from traditional ballet shoes
review_body: The shoes themselves are great quality and I love the tab inside to write your dancers name in them but I feel like the sizing is more traditional of regular street shoes and not ballet shoes.  Anyone who has bought ballet shoes before, knows that you always buy them 2 sizes larger than street shoe size.  My daughter wears 9 in street shoes, her last pair of ballet shoes were a 10 and I know that they usually run narrow so I ordered an 11W, they were 3X bigger than a size 12 on her!  Great shoes, but order based off regular shoe size.

I buy these for both my daughters (8 and 5) for their ballet class.  They report they are comfortable, and they like them a lot.  They are pretty durable, at least at a couple hours a week use.  The little elastic tie around the top surface though is a bit annoying as it comes untied, and my younger one cannot tie it by herself.
The ballet slippers arrived quickly and were exactly as described. The straps are a bit snug, but I guess I’d rather that than having them fall off! Overall, very happy with this purchase
Well made. Fit well.  they where purchased to be slightly big and they are just that.  Not too big to dance in though.

review_title: Cute shoe, looking forward to daughter wearing it in the future.
review_body: I bought this shoe and the Bloch pink bunnyhop slipper in the same size at the same time - this shoe was a little bit bigger, and that's fine (my daughter will wear it in the future); right now, if she puts it on, it gaps a bit, and i hope that's just indicative of how it's a bit big. I would also recommend this for boys - because the inside is basic, no little pink bunnies, etc. Very happy with it, just won't use it for a couple more months.

review_title: After many tries, I found the winner...
review_body: This was bought for my daughter, I bought other watches for another 2 kids... next time I'll be wiser and ONLY BUY THIS!! the band is adjustable even for little wrists, not irritating to the skin, great great buy, I'd buy again!

review_title: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!
review_body: For my 7 yr old 2nd grade niece and she will lose her mind over it:) It has everything I want it to have for her to learn how to read a clock. The hands are labeled (hours and minutes), the interior face shows the standard display of 1-12, but the outside ring counts from 1-60. Then, to top it off, the "seconds" hand is the cutest pair of ballet slippers and, did I mention she's 7? Of course she wants to be a ballerina:)
Nice watch for a young girl.  My daughter wears it nearly every day.

She said she liked wearing it and a few minutes later became upset saying her watch was broken. Sure enough, it was. The stem had fallen out. It had been set that morning by her grandfather who did not detect a problem at that time. Needless to say the granddaughter is sad.

The watch turned "on" long enough for me to replace backing, and it died again. Very disappointing. Amazon refund watch, so that was good news, but my daughter was left sad without her gift.

review_title: Good Quality at a Great Price
review_body: We bought this watch for our daughter's 9th birthday.  At first, just from looking at the picture online, I was thinking it would be more like a toy watch that she'd wear once and forget about it.  When it arrived, I was surprisingly mistaken.  This is a pretty neat watch for a child.  My older daughter, who is 13, was trying to keep "borrowing" it from her little sister.  The band isn't cheap like I originally thought and the reading of the time really stands out.  You can also change the background color - which is pretty sweet.

Looked like such a great watch.  However, band is VERY cheap.  Broke after no time at all.  Didn't come with any paperwork, so had to google for ANY instructions.  A very hard watch to set and turn on/off chimes or alarm.  I do NOT recommend this watch.

review_title: I'm disappointed in a product that references "kids" in the title ...
review_body: This watch fit my 4 year old perfectly however as most young children do, she pushed the button which switches the colors too many times and now it is broken.  Took her all of 4 hours before that happened.  I'm disappointed in a product that references "kids" in the title has such a poor tolerance on the buttons.
Average kids watch.  Like the different color lights.

review_title: Chimes on the hour every hour!
review_body: Cute looking watch but it keeps chiming every hour quite loudly! I did try to turn it off per instructions but it keeps going so my daughter won't wear it:(

Not a child proof watch as I had hoped. Extremely to simple for the child to push buttons and change settings i.e. Messing up the time, but the most annoying is the ability to inadvertently and randomly set the alarm (usually for the wee hours of the morning) and to turn on the hourly chime. Very annoying! Strap is of inferior quality, I've had to put it back together twice now.

My wife purchased this watch for my grandson, some time ago.  It was to compliment a few more items for his birthday.  Few months pass and I fly down for a visit and was happy to see him wearing the watch and asked how he liked it  and he told me never takes it off unless he has to go to gym class.  I asked if he has banged it up a little, since he plays soccer and skateboards and he said he had but it works well.  His little buddies ask where he got it and most kids are into the look of the G-Shock watch but I am not sure about that G-suck price though.  Hat's off to my wife for making a great decision and hat's off to Viliysun for making a watch that can keep up with an active kid.
First watch i received was not working.  Made a complaint.  The response was quick and i am very pleased with the new watches i received. My son loves them.

review_title: He has a pretty small frame so I was concerned it was going ...
review_body: I bought this for my 9 year old son... He has a pretty small frame so I was concerned it was going to look way to big on his arm. It didn't, it was PERFECT! He has the look of a "mans" watch in a little boy size. This will fit him for several years.
Grandson loves the watch.  He took off his other Christmas watch to put this one on.  It was easily set up by my daughter.

Nice watch.I got it for my grandson and it fits his wrist okay. The only thing i don't like about it is when the hands cover the digital display you can't read the numbers good.The display has a light on it and he likes to use it in the dark.Very easy to set the time and other features.
Update: they contacted me and sent us a new watch. We received a refund from Amazon as well as a new watch. My son's been wearing it for a week or so. So far so good.
We had issues with the watch but the retailer gave us a full refund. Thanks!

review_title: I bought this watch for my son, he wears ...
review_body: I bought this watch for my son, he wears it daily. Today, in just 7 months, the watch band broke, watch fallen from his wrist. I wouldn't expect this to happen so soon with just normal wear.

These where super cute but way to tight for my sons foot! He keeps taking his older brother boots because we these are to tight to slip his foot through! I like them but these are meant for someone with a slim foot.
These boots are the cutest. They are lightweight and so easy to put on my 18 month old. I even sized up for growth and he can still manage to wear them now.
Cute, light and the material is not hard, very practical rather than getting Hunter boots.  I’m buying the next size different color for next year. I recommend this rainboots.

My 16 month old wears a size 6.5 in shoes but I ordered a size 8 in these boots for room to grow and hopefully use another season or two.  He moves around in them just fine now without tripping or falling.  We use them in the backyard for playtime as it's often wet and subject to doggie landmines.  These are much easier to clean than his other shoes.  The leg opening is wide enough to tuck in his pants and keep them from getting wet as well.  Perfect boots for getting wet and dirty.

review_title: Great puddle jumping boot for little ones!
review_body: I already love Crocs so this purchase was a no brained. They were for my 3 year old granddaughter (she loves regular Crocs). She loves to jump in puddles so these boots were perfect for her. They are easy for her to put on and take off all by herself!  Super easy to clean-just run under the faucet!

We bought these for my 3 year old son and we all like them a lot.  They are cute, quite sturdy, and have a wide foot bed.  The best features, I think, are: 1) the deep tread on the bottom (always good for an adventurous boy who climbs trees and runs on slick pavement in the rain) and 2) that they are seamless so the potential for leaks is minimal (unless you poke a hole in them).  We've used cheapy Target brand boots before that have a sealed seam along the back leg and it ends up peeling off every season because my kiddo wears his boots constantly.  Highly recommended.
super light weight.. the color was as expected. My son loved these and wanted to wear them even though its not raining. He cant wait for it to rain so he can wear them. I would recommend ..
These are very light weight!  My 5 yr old where's a 1.5 shoe and the size 3 croc rainboot fits easy on & off with some room to grow! Have worn a few times for puddle splashing & mud puddles!

review_title: The spot where the handle attaches to the boot isn't exactly sturdy. I am super disappointed because we love EVERY ...
review_body: We're about 2 months into owning these boots and they tore! The spot where the handle attaches to the boot isn't exactly sturdy. I am super disappointed because we love EVERY aspect of these boots except that fact that they didn't last. The tear is spreading and half way down the boot at this point so rain doesn't stay out of the boot anymore. These boots are almost twice as much as other boots so I was hoping they'd be sturdy and last a rainy season. We are going to buy them again because the good outweighs the bad. But I'm REALLY hoping this isn't something that happens again.

review_title: Croc sky blue toddler rainboot review
review_body: I ordered sky blue hoping they would be more blue than shown; they are much more blue than the picture looks, with a slight purple cast.
We choose this jacket for the good quality!! The weather is cold in Oaklahoma so we wanted our granddaughter to have a Carharrt jacket!! We are happy it was available!!!
This is a great quality jacket. Great price. Super cute . Love it.
Every girl should own a Carhartt!  Perfect coat!
Great bought it for my granddaughter she loves the pink.

review_title: It runs on the small size
review_body: I really like this jacket as does my daughter but it is a more fitted style then the boys/mens.  It fit her just no room for growth.
It runs to large
Love the coat
This coat is amazing!!! My daughter loves it too!
My granddaughter is so adorable in this coat.....gets comments everywhere we go!
My little niece absolutely loved it!!! :)

Good quality shoes at a decent price. We bought these for our two year old boy and they've held up very nicely. With them being Velcro, putting them on and taking them off has been super easy. They seem to fit as expected.

review_title: Great shoes but were slightly smaller for a size 7 ...
review_body: Great shoes but were slightly smaller for a size 7 than her other shoes. So I got their size 8 and they are slightly big for her but work great
We are on my son’s fourth or fifth pair of Saucony sneakers, because he loves them! They fit well, hold up great, and are affordable. When he outgrows his current pair, we’ll be back for new ones!

Shoes are too cute.  Fits as expected.  Hard to ask a 3 year old how comfortable shoes are or about the arch support, but she wears them without complaining all day, so guess that's about as good of a recommendation you can expect from a toddler.

These shoes fit really well on my 13 month old daughter. She has wide feet and a high instep so I bought a size up and they fit very well. They're also pretty lightweight which is making it easier for her to walk in them. I also bought an adult pair in a similar color because these are my favorite sneakers of all time.

review_title: not too flashy and seem pretty rugged. These are his go-to every day shoes ...
review_body: This is the second pair of these I have bought for my son. They are cute, not too flashy and seem pretty rugged. These are his go-to every day shoes and the first pair (that don't fit him anymore) are still in great shape.

review_title: Velcro won't close all the way.
review_body: I love this sneaker for my kiddo.  He's got a bit of wide feet, though, and the velcro only pulls to halfway over.  I don't see how the velcro would fit on any kid, though.  Otherwise, great.

review_title: I love the way these shoes look but the velcro strap ...
review_body: I love the way these shoes look but the velcro strap only comes to the midline of the shoe. They still velcro but don't love the look as much. I also like that they are light

review_title: Stylish sneakers for the little one
review_body: Great sneakers for the little one. We bought this for a 14 month years old (ordered size 5.5, which is still a tad large but perfectly fine to wear). The velcro straps hold in place very well. The shoes look stylish, are of good manufacturing quality. Recommended.
Cute and comfortable, my son used them for everything, would not take them off, I would recommend these, they are affordable and do not disappoint.
I loved this watch, I was just disappointed that it didn't light up like another shopkins watch that I purchased, but it is a nice looking watch.
girls will love these, delivered very quickly
She likes the watch.
My daughter likes it.

review_title: Can fit a 5 year old if you add a hole or two.
review_body: Had to make additional holes for my 5 year olds wrist. works great with that easy adjustment.
It fell apart the same day my daughter opened and have fixed it twice. Poor quality.
daughter loves it cute watch if I could just get her to tell time it be all good
good watch
Cheaply made, scrappy watch, but it thrilled my little girl. Sometimes that's all you need.
Kids loved this product

review_title: Small enough to fit small boned women
review_body: This is the second Timex girls' watch that I have purchased.  I love it because you can actually make the band tight enough so that it doesn't slop around, the way so many women's watch bands do.
Very nice. Just like I was a kid.
My 10 year old grandaughter loved it
This Timex Children's watch is purchased for Christmas for my granddaughter.  Her second favorite color is pink and I know that she is going to like this watch.
on time and as described

I purchased this watch for a stylish elderly lady when I discovered all other watchbands were too large for her tiny wrist.  It's a perfect fit!  She loves the easy-to-read bold face, indiglo lighting, cute pink band, and I loved the amazingly low price for such quality!!!
It's just okay for little kids with thin arms. However, the strap was synthetic, which was different from the webside claimed.

review_title: loved by our 7 year old daughter
review_body: Simple, loved by our 7 year old daughter. The glow-light feature is so nice for night, and one of her favorite things about it!
I like the watch.  Got it for my 9 yr old daughter.  Seems durable and that it will last for quite a few years.
Don't be fooled by this being a watch for kids.  It fits adults too.  It is the cheapest water resistant out there.  This is the second of these watches I have purchased.

I bought the 11 based on other reviews. My daughter wears a street shoe size 10 toddler. The 11 is too big but we will just tighten the elastic band and let her grow into them. Pretty beigey pink color, nice thick strap.

review_title: Seems a little on the low budget side..
review_body: Not like the ones we've used in the past as fair as quality but they will do..
Great little shoes except they run very small. Im hoping the next size up fits

review_title: happy girl---- but the shoes STINK!
review_body: Not as soft of leather as I hoped.  Wide is plenty wide, we actually had to pull the cord tighter, and my daughter has really wide feet.

review_title: Was worried about size but it turned out okay
review_body: I was very apprehensive about buying these after reading all of the reviews, but decided to take a chance because they were such a great price.  I ordered half a size up (8M instead of 7.5M)to play it safe.  I debated about ordering them in wide because my daughter's feet tend to be wide but surprisingly enough, I'm glad I didn't because they seemed loose on the sides so I had to tighten them with the string.  They do fit, and maybe I could have even gone with her street shoe size, but they're not loose enough to warrant exchanging.  The only thing that I took a star off for is that the string doesn't seem to tie very tightly so I wonder if that's going to get annoying.
I read the reviews that said they run a little large.  I think they don't run as large as people say they do.  Maybe select a 1/2 size down rather than a full size down.  Otherwise, they are great!

review_title: My precious son (4 year olds) is the only male ...
review_body: My precious son (4 year olds) is the only male ballet dancer in his whole company. He is so proud of his ballet shoes. He wears these with white socks and black pants.
Product is great quality but runs VERY small. We had to size up a full shoe size and they don't allow returns (and it doesn't state that anywhere). Extremely frustrating.
Typical ballet shoe however not true to size. Runs very small. My toddler wears a size 6 and I got a size 7 and couldn't even get them on. No refunds allowed. ;(

review_title: It was exactly as advertised, however it does run ...
review_body: It was exactly as advertised, however it does run a bit smaller than expected. My granddaughter wears a size 8 toddler shoe, but the ballet slipper size 8 toddler is a bit small, especially when she puts her tights on. So for future orders, I will order the next size larger!

review_title: perfect for those leaning to tell time
review_body: I excepted terrible elastic bands based off other reviews and planned to sew them to size but they are awesome and don't slip at all.

review_title: Plastic face scratched too easily for us
review_body: My daughter loved the watch.  However the face is plastic and scratched too easily.  She wore it for two days and then did not want to wear it again because the face was all scratched up.  Ended up buying a kids watch at the local big box and putting this watch band on it.

review_title: Perfect teaching tool for little people
review_body: Perfect for my 6 year old Granddaughter.  She's just learning to tell time and I didn't want her to take the easy way out with the digital display.  Timex has always been a favorite....you know what they say.....it takes a lickin and keeps on ticken.

review_title: I love this watch, but my 4 year old is not interested.
review_body: I got this watch for my four year old because I want her to learn to tell time and she is always stealing my digital watch. Unfortunately she won't even wear it. She opened it at Christmas and immediately put it to the side. I am still giving it four stars because it looks like a good, well made watch. It looks just like its picture. I just wish the numbers and hands were a little bigger since it is supposed to be a learning watch.

review_title: She is getting better every day at knowing how to read the time
review_body: She LOVES telling time with her ballerina watch.  She is doing so well and the learning portion is definitely kicking in.  She is getting better every day at knowing how to read the time.

Great for my younger daughter. The band stretches, and you can size it so it does not fall off. She accidentally wore it in the shower once, its still working. Great way to get kids to learn how to tell time on an analog watch.

Meh! It was cute when I got it but then realized that once you adjust the strap it didn't secure the adjustment we'll. You have to keep adjusting beacase the strap slips...other than that it serves it purpose.

review_title: she loved it! Adjustable elastic band that can be easily ...
review_body: For this for my 7 year old... she loved it! Adjustable elastic band that can be easily set to fit.. sporty and cool!

This watch is great.  My 6 year old finds it easy to tell time on, and the strap is easy to adjust and very comfortable.  The only thing I didn't like is that I thought it had the minutes printed all around, but it has them up to 30, with the word "Past" and then up to 30 with the word "To", which I did not notice in the picture and is annoying as it's easier to teach kids to tell time as just hour and minutes, without getting into the other 3 ways there are to tell people what time it is.

review_title: IT WAS VERY NICE AND THE YOUNG GIRL I GAVE IT TO WAS ...
review_body: IT WAS VERY NICE AND THE YOUNG GIRL I GAVE IT TO WAS VERY PLEASED.  She was learning to tell time and it was very good for her.  This was her first watch she has ever had.  I was very pleased to give it to her and her Mom was very thankful too.
This Children’s Place jacket fits great at a reasonable price!
Great quality- awesome price!! Love it!
Soft and adorable for my 20 month old.
Fit perfectly, by 4 year old is thin, but on the tall side. A really cute Jean jacket.
Granddaughter thrilled. Fit well, lost a button that couldn't be reattached. Have to get a metal button kit
Size was spot on Great quality
Love it
very good. fit as expected.

review_title: My daughter looks great in her new jean jacket
review_body: My daughter looks great in her new jean jacket! She absolutely loves it. I also love how it's snaps for buttons instead of actual buttons.
love it
The wrist part is not very durable

review_title: A good watch for my seven-year-old
review_body: A good watch for my seven-year-old, and reasonably priced. The piece that holds the strap broke after about three months. Now we just secure it with a small hairband. It's cheap enough that I would purchase it again though.

First bought this from Daiso (Japanese Dollar Store) for $1.50 for my 7 year old but some of the functions didn't work (i.e. turning off the chimes as it needs to be off during school time) so we threw it away ( didn't worth returning ). Since my kid liked the color, I bought it again from Amazon for $13.00 (11 times the price!) but now in addition to chimes, the chronograph doesn't work. There are different brands of this same exact watch  but they all being manufactured in the same factory!
Decent watch for the price but alarm went South quickly and would randomly go off.

Out of the box this product never worked... my daughter was so excited to get a watch for Christmas. She is 4 and learning how to tell time and was excited to have her own watch. Unfortunately out of the box the watch never worked. Product is saying ineligible to return or replace. So just a Christmas present gone down the drain.

Just received today and it doesn't work. Thought maybe it didn't come with the battery, took off the back and there was a battery in it but it won't turn on. Disappointed. Just noticed that this item isn't available to return, feeling robbed now..
Nice
Junk. Half of the numbers are blown. Very cheap look and feel.
UPDATED: One of the buttons just popped out a month after receiving it, which seems to be 2 weeks longer than some other reviewers.

Great features to the watch, but it runs fast!  I fix the time every week, and within a week, it's 10-12 minutes fast.  That's frustrating when you actually want your child to use the watch the keep track of time.
Cute watch and holds up well.
My stepdaughter loved the watch
Very impressive. Size and shape gorgeous
Good watch
My granddaughter will love her first watch.
Great for my 5 yr old granddaughter just learning to tell time
Bought it as a present for my niece. Very nice looking and the rubber band is soft.
Good watch fit my 4 year old with room to grow
Granddaughter loved it
Very disappointed, o opened the top and saw the watch was broken. I'm waiting for a replacement .
in the description says that it can get wet and it is not true.
Hard to program and didn't come with instructions
Arrived broken, decided to go with a new watch altogether

review_title: Purchased two and both were broken
review_body: We bought two of these watches for my 6 year old twins. The seconds hand was broken on both watches.  Regretting this purchase.
Kid loved it, but died first time in the water. Fortunately, Amazon was great about returns.
The band ripped after 2 weeks of purchase, not durable at all, the buyer contacted me to send me a new item.  Appreciate the gesture
Bad quality. I bought 3 this watch’s and 2 of them don’t work. Don’t spend your money!!!

My son saved up his money to purchase this watch. It was great at first. It fit fine. It looked good on him. He had a problem setting both the analog and digital. That was the first issue. Then, after only a couple of months, it stopped keeping time. Less than six months and we have to replace the battery? It's just not worth it. He was so disappointed.

review_title: Poorly made - hand spontaneously got loose
review_body: After only a few months of owning this watch one of the hands is loose and twirls freely around and around. Bad product.

Purchased this for my 9 year old son.  It was delivered on August 11th.  He started wearing it when school started on August 16th and it broke by August 25th.  See attached picture.  He heard something hit the floor and when he looked, it was the little part off of the watch.  He liked all of the functions, that it lit up and that it was analog plus digital.  It was a nice watch until it broke.

I bought a pair of Hello Kitty rain boots for my 3 year old daughter from Target but she could barely walk in it as they were too chunky. So I hunted on Amazon and found these awesome boots. My daughter put them out and dragged me out of the house for a long walk. She was happily jumping on the grass and in puddles. These boots are lightweight and provide good support for the feet. I ordered a size bigger as recommended by other reviewers. In fact, I think 2 sizes bigger would be better as the boots were really fitting. These boots were also easy to wash. Perfect for her weekly farm sessions at school.

I bought this for my 2 year old and he loves it.  It seems like the shoes is a little snug for its size because the ankle part is narrow (especially if your little one has chubby legs).  I would recommend going up a size.  I also have to put socks on my son for him to want to wear it because the the bottom is not smooth and my son didn't like how it feel without socks.  Other than that, it's easy for a 2 year old to put on, the color is cute and it feels very durable.  It also isn't heavy at all, which I was a little worried at first because of how heavy it "looks", but my son was able to jump in the puddles just fine.  I think the slightly fitting ankle also helped kept it on when he jump/run around in puddles.

review_title: I'm giving 3 stars because I didn't get the product ...
review_body: I'm giving 3 stars because I didn't get the product pictured. They replaced my order with another blue boot, the regular crocs boot, without the figures on the side. It was a real bummer because I have boy/girl twins and I had found a product in both pink and blue, with the same design. I did not return because we had a messy backyard and they were very needed when they arrived.

review_title: These are very cute and light. But I ordered ...
review_body: These are very cute and light. But I ordered them for myself and my three kids. Three of us can't wear them because they rub our ankles.

review_title: These are fantastic. Not insulated but they're not meant to be ...
review_body: These are fantastic.  Not insulated but they're not meant to be cold weather boots.  My son loves them and wants to wear them everywhere we go - he gets a ton of compliments on them!

The boot is really pretty just as I thought it would. My daughter wears a 12 or 12.5 usually in shoes so I got a 13 to give a bit of growing room. It was maybe 2 sizes big. I decided to go to a store and try on boots and get her a right size for her. We will probably buy these in the future.

I have many Crocs, and if you own one pair, you know exactly the fit and quality to expect. My 5 year old is going into an 11, so I ordered a 10, Crocs always run a full size big. She loves them, can go out all day and I don't hear any complaints of feet hurting, and she can get them on and off herself. If you're ordering the blue, not sure about the other colors, but look at the color on the Crocs website to see a more accurate depiction of what you'll be getting. The picture on amazon is lighter than the actual color.

review_title: I almost feel like the dip that goes over the foot does not ...
review_body: For some reason Crocs in general have not fit my 1 year old's extra chubby feet. I almost feel like the dip that goes over the foot does not allow enough space for a chubby foot to slide in. Same problem with traditional crocs in size 3/4.  I was very sad i had to return these boots (size 6C). But they work great for my 5 year old (size 13 big kid).

review_title: I love this! My girl loves this
review_body: I love this!  My girl loves this.  Am I the only one finding Crocs running a bit smaller?  She has small feet and wears size 5 in all other shoes and even those are big for her.  This somehow fits her (I ordered size 6).

review_title: I give it 3 stars due to the fact that ...
review_body: I give it 3 stars due to the fact that they do not look blue, but rather purple.  I don't mind too much, but they are my son's and look a little odd.  If you want blue, don't get blue as it is not blue.
Great jacket and daughter loves it!!
Great fit and super warm!
My daughter loves the jacket but it showed up the day AFTER Christmas.  It's hard to explain to a little girl why she received a picture instead of the real thing.
I really do like this jacket but it's definitely a little snug u can see I attached a picture to this review

review_title: This review deserves ZERO star I am amound 6 other customers/ family members all different states and address amazon deserves 0
review_body: Didn't fit, for as popular as the hot pink women's carhartt is should be more sizes then having to choose a youth and hope it fits. Very disappointed considering our family pics didn't come out as good due to 4 of the women's pink jackets.

review_title: the color is awesome but looks like it would stain easy
review_body: I order this jacket expect it to be small but it was true to size. My little girls is 2years old but on the chubby side. so I buy a little bigger but it was really big on her will save it for next year. the color is awesome but looks like it would stain easy. I have to spray scotch guard on it to protect it. but its heavy duty material. Next year she will wear it.

Love this jacket for my daughter she is six but wears a size 10 in normal clothes I ordered a little bigger for extra room to grow and it's perfect. I could not believe the quality for the price. It's perfect for our Florida winters in the 50s while we are outdoors.
Great warm coat. Bought it for my granddaughter for when she visits the farm. Perfect for chores and a run into town. Love it!!!

review_title: It's super cute and just like regular carhartt it's super comfy ...
review_body: I ordered a size up so that my step daughter can wear this an extra year.  It's super cute and just like regular carhartt it's super comfy and warm.
A Christmas gift for my grand daughter!  Her momma loves it!

My son has wide feet, apparently. I bought several pairs of sneakers and these were the only one that fit! I went a size up, as well. The velcro still doesn't completely close although I bought a wide pair, but they are comfortable on my son and are his go-to shoes. Super cute colors too! I would buy them again when he outgrows this pair.

My 2 year old really likes these sneakers. She loves the color and the fact that she can get them on herself. I like that they hold up well to constant abuse. However, the length of the Velcro closure is off.  Her feet are long but fairly thin and the closure only comes about half way across the top of her foot. If you're child has slightly chubby feet, I can't see how you'd be able to close them.

review_title: Love the shoes, but too small!
review_body: I like that the shoes are lightweight and have a velcro strap.  They are cute and my 2 year-olds love them because they can put them on by themselves and run in them.  However, I bought up a half size so they would have a little growing room, but they don't have much. The size 7.5 fits like a 7 in any other shoe, so they seem to run a little bit small. I'm not hassling with sending them back, but I'll know next time.
We love these! First pair lasted us almost an entire year of daycare! The quality is outstanding, colors are fun and bright and my 4 year old needs no help getting them on. #momwin
Cute shoes, kid likes them, ordered Wide but still not really wide enough, had to stretch them out

review_title: felt like it had been a return
review_body: Did not feel well made; however, I believe I did not get a new product, felt like it had been a return. I did not like the combination of the orange with the grey camouflage; the orange was brighter than expected; looked better in the picture. I returned them without any issues. That said, it seems that they would have been comfortable shoes, and the price was very affordable.

Look great, easy to put on, but not as pliable as regular running shoes. I have these for my 3 year old. He wears a size 9, but I heard these run small, so I got a 10 and they fit great. I don't send him to school with these though because I don't feel they are pliable enough for the rough and tough school/playground activities they do at school. He wears these when he goes on outings with us. For school, I got him the Saucony BLAZE running shoes which are the best running shoes he has had thus far

review_title: My 2 year old daughter loves these shoes. We ...
review_body: My 2 year old daughter loves these shoes. We bought the gray color because of the price and she wears them often to preschool.

review_title: Great shoes for my active 3 year old boy
review_body: Great shoes for my active 3 year old boy. Only complaint is that his feet aren't particularly wide and the velcro on the M width does not close all the way. Otherwise he loves them and they are cute - I would spray them before wear.

Saucony Jazz are the go-to sneakers for my shoe-ista Toddler.  He is incredibly picky about his footwear and if he could he would wear these every.single.day.  This is our 2nd Pair of the Saucony Jazz sneaker. We had a blue pair until the aforementioned toddler surpassed big foot in the feet to body percentage ratio and yet again moved up a half size.
Beautiful, excellent quality. recommended 100%
Fantastic product, as promised!!!
The watch arrive without batteries, and couldn't be used by my daughter
My daughter loved it. She can't tell time but loves the fact it's "Frozen".

review_title: Should be a great gift. This is a little bigger of a ...

my 4 years princes  love it
nice watch.

review_title: The darling little granddaughter simply loved her watch
review_body: Yep!  The darling little granddaughter simply loved her watch!!
Good cheap watch, now my daughter comes home on time, half the time...
My 8 year old daughter loves this watch and the size is perfect for her. However, it is NOT indigo, as the questions answered indicate.

review_title: ... taught to tell time except digital This is a perfect way to teach her I highly recommend
review_body: My granddaughter was never taught to tell time except digital This is a perfect way to teach her I highly recommend it

review_title: Watch itself is perfect for my six year old
review_body: Watch itself is perfect for my six year old. The Timex box was beat all to heck and not suitable for a gift presentation, but the watch is great.
the best in the world all the kids ask me the time !!!!!!!!!

review_title: Worked only for a few months.
review_body: This watch did not last long. My daughter barely used it before the battery went off. Replaced the battery but still it won't work. I had to get my daughter a new watch.
This is a Christmas gift for my niece. She has not gotten it yet.
Great first time watch. Simple, practical and pretty.

review_title: It looked great in the box
review_body: I ordered this watch as a Christmas present for daughter--her first watch.  It looked great in the box, but when she opened it on Christmas day, we discovered the battery was dead and there is no night light on it like other ones that look identical.
My daughter loves her watch and it works just as it should. Color matches photo as well.

review_title: Band is very stiff and not as nice as past Timex purchases I have made
review_body: Had higher expectations for this watch. Band is very stiff and not as nice as past Timex purchases I have made.

Capezio makes quality ballet shoes with cute prints inside. That was one of the reason why I picked them over Bloch. I want fun/dainty flowers for my baby girl! The other reason is the price. I normally buy ahead when I see the price drop to $12-$13. Even if my daughter does not attend ballet religiously, it's still a very comfy/easy to wear shoes inside the house and out. Very easy to slip on for a quick run to store or playdate.
Our daughter did not want to take these off!  Super comfy and super cute!
The capezio is the best brand for dance shoes. They fit as expected and last throughout the year! Deff would recommend this brand and shoe for any ballerina!

The delivery here was excellent, the shoe itself was fine; however, the feedback I read here I applied to my ordering process and it did not play out for my daughter at all, and she is a petite little girl. I had to return the shoe twice b/c too small. Ended up going to a local danceshop and found out she needed a size and half bigger than her actual shoe size, which also gives her a little wiggle room. Go to a local store if you have one, otherwise you'll be a bit disappointed like me that the shoe doesn't fit.

This product is a difficult one to buy without trying it on because of sizing. My daughter wears a 10.5 or 11. She tried on ballet shoes at her dance studio and they were too tight so we opted to try this brand. I ordered her a size 1  because that was the size that fit of the ones she tried on. The 1 of this brand was way too big. Thankfully with Amazon Prime I have free returns, so I promptly ordered an 11.5 W. That seems to be a close enough fit for my daughter, though a 12 W may have been better with a little more room to grow.

review_title: NOT eligible for returns - BUY ELSEWHERE, Don’t buy Calezio on Amazon
review_body: DO NOT BUY THIS ON AMAZON. You can NOT return if it doesn’t fit. What a waste of money. I not happy about this. Amazon needs to make it much more clear when you can’t return an item. I have just flushed money down the toilet

review_title: They run true to size in my opinion
review_body: I purchased these Capezio Daisy ballet shoes a whole size larger than my daughter's shoes size as per the other reviews that suggested to size up, however I don't believe that they run small. They are way too big for my daughter but I will keep them bc they are very good quality and also priced well. She will grow into them.

I got these ballet shoes for my daughters and was very pleased with them.  They are made of a light pink, soft leather that comes with a sting for tightening the shoe on the foot.  I would recommend sizing up a size, in order to get more wear out of the shoes. The shoes were wrapped and packaged well, of excellent quality and arrived very quickly from the vendor.  I would definitely order these again and use this vendor.

review_title: They are nice shoes and well made
review_body: I ordered size 11 (my daughter wears a 10 shoes, but the reviews suggested to order a whole size up). These are too big and too wide. I should have only ordered a half size up from her usual street shoe size. They are nice shoes and well made.
My 4 year old wears this with her black ballet dress when she pretends to be the black swan. She loves it. Fits just right
Easy to read for learning to tell time and has an elastic fabric band! Gift for my 8 yr old granddtr!

Very nice little watch for my 10 year old granddaughter.  She has a little trouble with the concept of time, so I like that it shows the 5 minute increments above the actual hours, helping her to learn to tell time more effectively.
My 5 yr old Granddaughter screamed , "This is what I asked for!" when she opened her birthday gift!

review_title: Cute, reasonably priced watch for preteen girls!
review_body: This is such a cute watch with fun detail on the face.  Our 9 year old granddaughter loves it & wears it often!

review_title: Bummed that the battery was dead when received, other then that okay.
review_body: Received quickly, watch is cute. Only complaint was the battery was dead when we received it. Loads of fun taking out & putting those tiny screws on the back to replace it.
Just as expected. Gift recipient was thrilled.
Was super cheap. But I’m sad that Timex stopped making kids analog indiglo watches...

review_title: I like the fact that it teaches the "old time" clock ...
review_body: 6 year old grand daughter loves it and wears it every day! I like the fact that it teaches the "old time" clock face.

review_title: my 4yo loved it, she now just knows the time by ...
review_body: my 4yo loved it, she now just knows the time by the hour hand, teaching her about the minute hand as she gets older, but i think this is perfect for her age.

review_title: I have been buying this style ofwatch for years
review_body: I have been buying this style of watch for years. The buckle design in the past had strong teeth that held the strap in place. The way they make them now causes the strap to pull apart when you stretch it over your hand.  After awhile the elastic loosens up  so it is easier to keep it buckled. Easy on, easy off, easy to read.

review_title: This watch is very difficult to work. It was ...
review_body: This watch is very difficult to work.  It was stuck on military time and I had to take it into a watch repair shop to get it on the right time, even the watch repair shop said " Don't ask me how I got it but, finally it happened"  Would not buy it again

review_title: You cannot disable the hour chime. You can disable ...
review_body: You cannot disable the hour chime. You can disable the alarm, but not the chime. Further, this item did not contain setting instruction, although setting it was logical.
Purchased as pics showed pink backlight. Received and it has standard green. Nothing in instructions says it can be changed. Disappointed.

This watch was great until the second day my daughter wore it and the glass lens fell off.  It was nowhere to be found so now she can't wear it since there is no protection for the numbers display.  Very disappointed in the product quality.

review_title: Fits my daughter fine. Too many buttons and settings
review_body: Very cute looking watch. Fits my daughter fine. Too many buttons and settings.

review_title: Nice watch, but poor customer service
review_body: We like the watch itself, however, customer service after the purchase has been extremely poor.  We either did not get an instruction manual or it got thrown away with the wrapping paper.  I have sent emails to CoFuo and Skmei asking how to turn off the hourly chime and requesting a pdf of the instruction manual, and I have not gotten a response.  After pushing a bunch of buttons, my husband got the chime to go off, but he has not idea how he did it.
My granddaughter will love it.
The item was not working from the minute I opened the box.  I received a broken watch.
My daughter wore this watch for 1 day & fell apart 3 times. I would not recommend this product
Horrible. Beeps constantly and difficult to change the time. Would return this piece of crap if I could. Only 1 star because it wouldn’t let me post without it.

review_title: Good quality for a great price
review_body: Very cute. Good quality for a great price.
Very nice jacket!
Great price and it fit perfectly. Shipping was also just a few days.
Super cute
great kid fit
Very good
I LIKED THE PRICE BEST BUT THE FIT WAS NOT GOOD.
Love it
My granddaughter loved it!  This was a birthday present and she was so excited to get it.
I bought many watches and glass type are dropped after one day of normal use. Too bad
v.good quality
The numbers rubbed off and the glass fell out after 1 hour.
Band a bit hard. Bought it for my daughter hard to put on.
My daughter sleep in her watch most night.
Came to the house with a broken latch could not put on child's wrist.

review_title: The glass came out after first use by my 4 ...
review_body: The glass came out after first use by my 4 year old. After inspecting the glass it I realized that it was glued on.
Cute...Granddaughter loved it!
Nice girl's watch!
Perfect !

I ordered this for my 11 year old daughter.  Her choice.  While it is described as a kid's watch, it is actually a full adult size watch.  Only the wrist band is short enough to call it a kid's watch.  I think it's bulky, but my daughter still loved it.  Unfortunately, the second hand was broken right out of the box.  It came loose and just dangled there.  We returned it for a replacement.  That new watch worked fine for only two weeks.  The second hand again fell off it's mount.  With the exact same thing happening twice in a row, this is clearly a manufacturing defect.  I would recommend shopping for a different manufacturer.

I'm sure the watch works just fine but the face is pretty big and thick. I would not say this is a kids watch. Maybe for a teenager. The measurements are in the description so it's on me that I didn't get my ruler out to see how big it actually would be. I gave it 4 stars because it said kids watch and I don't think that is an accurate enough description.

This is an updated review!  The seller was very quick to reach out and supply a replacement, which I kindly tried to turned down since I had item a refund.... but they insisted they wanted my son to have it and try again, which was very generous.  We were cautioned not to press buttons when in water, which could have been the issue the first time.  I honestly don’t know.  The second watch held up much better, and did go into the shower without incident.  It remains big for a child’s wrist, but looks quite nice.  My son even got a few compliments on his ‘fancy watch’.  I applaud the sellers diligence and commitment to the customer - which is worth 10 stars in my book.

We've tried two of these watches, and both had same issue: Seconds hand were loose, and easily knocked off when watch was shaken, i.e. when my kid played basketball, or other sports, which delivered slight shock to the watch!
Disappointed!  Wristband broke the first week of wearing it.  Look for something different as this one is not worth it.
Broke button. Had to return the same day.
The minute needle is loose and keeps spinning when you move the hand around. The strap broke on day 3. Not sure if I got a faulty product.

The first watch arrived with the second hand not working. Returned it for a replacement and within a month the second hand on the replacement stopped working. Wouldn't recommend except as a lesson to kids about buying crap.
Have my grandson as a present. The hands broke about an hour after he got it.
Stopped working in less than a week.

review_title: These don't have the fabric liner like most rain boots
review_body: Worth the money!! These don't have the fabric liner like most rain boots, and my kid love to splash in deep puddles, and then their boots are wet for days - not with these! Just wipe dry, so easy!

review_title: Could be great BUT for the design flaw
review_body: There are very good things and very bad things about these boots.  First the good: They are light, fit wide in the foot and seem very durable.  The bad: The ankle is very tight.  After wearing the boots a few times and having a very hard time (she actually started crying from pain) putting them on, my daughter just refused to put them on. IMO, this is a huge design flaw.  If they widened up the ankle, these would be the perfect rain boots.

These are great. They are light, comfortable, and the best part-- you can squirt them off with a hose when they're muddy. No liner, they don't stink and they dry quickly! My kids are 6 and 2 and LOVE these for rain, mud, etc. I love them more because they are super easy to clean.

review_title: These are perfect for my 3 year old boy who loves to ...
review_body: These are perfect for my 3 year old boy who loves to jump on puddles! He does not like to wear shoes but he loves these!

review_title: perfect fit for small ankled preschooler and adorable!
review_body: I shopped around a quite a bit before buying this for my son. He has small ankles and other rainboots he tried on would slip off as he tried to walk. Very annoying. These fit great for him and seems very comfortable. When I bought these (7M) he was wearing 7.5 size shoes now he wears 8.5 and still fit him fine. The handles help my son put those on very easily!!  He loves his rainboots and wants to wear them all the time!! Wherever we go we get a lot of compliments cuz they are so cute on!

Out here in the Pac NW we wear a lot of rain boots.  These were recommended to me by a very good friend and I am so glad I went with them.  I just ordered our second pair (as toddlers grow fast) in 6 months.  They hold up well and will definitely be able to be handed down.  They are lightweight and don't impede walking/running.  My two year old wears them almost everyday are are by far her favorite shoes.  The biggest plus is the little ones and can get them on by themselves!

review_title: The best thing about these boots is that there's no liner ...
review_body: The best thing about these boots is that there's no liner to eventually fall out or get creased. They can be rinsed out and dried in no time. They don't have flimsy straps that are going to break off either! Plus, they're cute!
Definitely order a size up. My son is a 9.5 toddler and he has big feet the 10 is perfect. They are narrow But he loves them!! So far so good and they are light weight so its easy for him to walk.

review_title: Great quality but order a few sizes up!
review_body: These are great! My toddler loves them, actually insisted on wearing them from the moment they arrived. Only issue is that they def run small - my daughter is a solid size 8 in most shoes, I got these boots in a 10, and they fit but there isn’t a ton of room to spare.

review_title: They are an appealing bright green and easy for her put on and take off
review_body: Bought these for my 5 year old in the gender neutral green, with hopes to use it with my little boy too once she's outgrown. They are an appealing bright green and easy for her put on and take off. Typical quality product from Crocs.  Aesthetically it could do without the prominent Crocs logo across the side  would be my only feedback for making it nicer looking :)
True to size and fits good. Sturdy but not so heavy that's its restricting.
Great quality, soft inside, pretty shade pink
Great quality, soft inside, pretty shade pink
Perfect gift for my 4 year old daughter
Looks and feels just like an adult Carhartt jacket.  Same Carhartt quality.  It's for my grand daughter and I love it.
Cute
LOVE this jacket.

review_title: They seemed to be sturdy and well constructed
review_body: They seemed to be sturdy and well constructed. They were too small but it was probably my fault, because we realized after that no size 7s were fitting on my son's feet! Anyways, the drawback seems to be that the sturdiness of the material doesn't allow for the shoe to be easily put on a chubby toddler foot. Even if they did fit, they were difficult to maneuver. Maybe go a size up, but we ended up with a different brand.

review_title: Adorable shoes, fit as expected, perfect for 2 year old
review_body: These shoes are so stinkin' cute!  I have a 2 year old that has super small feet and it's really hard to find her shoes that fit her with good support for her little feet.  Barely any shoes come in a size 4.5, which is what she needed.  5's are too big on her and the 4's were tight with socks on.  She can wear these with thick socks (or thin socks) and they fit her comfortably.
After wearing for less than 4 hours the letters on back peeled off. Disappointed because the shoes are so cute!

These are a life-saver for my son, who usually kicks off his shoes, has them fall off while walking through parking lots, etc, and constantly wants to be barefoot. They're adorable, stay on very well, go on easily, and seem very comfortable. I will be buying them in every size till my son outgrows this style of shoe! Thank you, Saucony!

My 4yr old daughter is petite framed with narrow feet so we often have an issue of shoes being too wide for her. She was wearing an 8 but filling them out pretty good so we went with an 8 1/2 (toddlers/little kid) and they fit her great! Not too wide for her, though I think a normal width foot would absolutely fit comfortably (I think they are too narrow for a wide foot). She needs to break them in still but she is comfortable running in them. The best part? She loves that she has her own pair of Saucony shoes just like her Dad (well, his arent blue and purple but her wears the same brand for running)

This is my son's second pair (to alternate with the other pair). These shoes tend to stretch out once they've been worn for a while, but they can be adjusted by tightening the strap on top. My son loves these because he can put them on easily by himself.
Love these for my son. They seem super comfy and he's happy to run around all day in them! Perfect for preschool with no annoying strings. Bold, bright color and easy to clean. Will reorder.

Sturdy little shoes for an active little boy.  Very cute and retro.  Fit is just as expected from Saucony and they are holding up well to the usual running, jumping, climbing, etc.  A great brand for kids that doesn't cost a fortune.

review_title: just doesn't look as nice. Still love them
review_body: Fits perfectly, except the Velcro (had same problem on previous pair of saucony's), Velcro doesn't quite fit all the way across, but a bigger size would be way too big for kiddo. Still says shut, and on, just doesn't look as nice. Still love them, and will continue buying them in bigger sizes as kiddo grows! :)

I didn't notice anything on the amazon page, but when the shoes arrived they were listed as girls on the box. I got the gray and orange color and it is just fine for boys or girls. The shoes seem comfy and my 2 year old can get them on and off by himself (the first of his shoes for this to work so far). They seem to run pretty true to size, for comparison my toddle also wears keens in size 9 which are a little big and has some other circo and cherokee brand shoes that are size 8. I'm very happy with them, especially for the price.

review_title: ... 5 and learning to tell time so it's working great for her
review_body: My granddaughter is 5 and learning to tell time so it's working great for her.

review_title: I ended up getting 2 of these for granddaughters for ...
review_body: I ended up getting 2 of these for granddaughters for christmas. Kind of cheeply made but ok for the money.
Little girl loved it
I got this watch for a little girl that loves Frozen and she loves it.
Kids loved.
Just beautiful...got 3 of these as presents for girls under 10 this Christmas and they adore it!
This fell apart within hours.

review_title: I love it. The watch is a Christmas gift but ...
review_body: I love it.  The watch is a Christmas gift but I'm sure it will be a big hit.
Bought for my Granddaughter she loves it. Price reasonable. Quality ok.
Battery was dead and couldn't return since it was an XMAS gift.
This watch never reached my granddaughter.  It was lost

review_title: Nice quality, great looks, great durability!!!
review_body: Nice quality and durability for a first watch!!! (My first watch was a Timex in 1972.) :)
The knob on the watch moves the time extremely easily, so it's a pretty useless watch on an active kid's arm.
Just push in the crown for back Indiglo light that is a soft greenish color and lights up the whole dial evenly from behind.
I love this watch!  Even though this is advertised as a watch for kids, adults with a smaller wrist, can wear this.  I like that the numbers are easy to see/read.
Had to return. No instructions.
great, would order again
....for niece and she loved it . Would highly recommend this for others to get for girls 6 and under.

review_title: She loved it! It fit her wrist perfectly
review_body: I got this watch for my 10 year old daughter. She loved it!  It fit her wrist perfectly. It's easy to read and she wears it everywhere!
Great first watch for young kids. Easy to read and teach, and looks cute too!
Cute ballet slippers. They stay on my 4 y/o foot.  The laces don’t stay tied.

review_title: Perfect ballet shoes for my 5 year old
review_body: Perfect ballet shoes for my 5 year old. She loves the special floral print on the inside. You can't go wrong with these.

My daughter is 6 and wears a street shoe 13.5 or 1. I originally ordered a 1 narrow in the 205 Daisy and the fit was extremely snug, her toes were curling! I went to a 2 narrow, but I should have probably only jumped a half size. It no longer seemed narrow, as there is space on both sides even with the strings pulled as tight as they can go. Though from heel to toe, it is pretty much the right fit. It is definitely better to have children fitted at the dance shops for shoes but these prices are unbeatable.
My daughter wears a size 13 and purchased the 13M. They fit perfectly. Never disappointed with Capezio brand.

Ordered these for daughter. She was 2 and starting her first dance class when I got them, and had small feet because she was not a big kid (still isn't). She couldn't even get her little foot into the size 6. However, when we got a size 6 from Payless, she fit in them just fine. Returning this pair would have been a hassle, so we just kept them and learned our lesson.  At 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 years old, a $10 Payless pair is just fine. And you can return with no hassle if they don't fit. Live and learn, Mommy!
Loved that we were able to get a N width.  Had to have these on short notice for recital. You promised next day and delivered. Beautiful color. She loves them.

I was a little worried about how these would fit because of how other reviewers have felt, but they fit my daughter perfectly. They are very close to street size- I don't think they could be closer. They're exactly how I would expect them to fit. The shoes seemed wide at first but that's how all ballet shoes are until you adjust the front bow. I had to tighten it a lot to fit and then tucked the bow inside the shoe so she wouldn't step on it. These ballet shoes are definitely a great value.
Shoes fit fine-according to the chart provided. The shoes arrived with a brown stain on the elastic.
These shoes were what we were expecting for our DD dance class. The price was reasonable too.

Can't place a great review because the pair I ordered for my daughter is too small!  So sad.  I "started" with her street shoe size, thinking that they would fit, but unfortunately I was wrong.  I have to return them and exchange for a size up.  I hope those fit because I'm now wasting time trying to return/re-repurchase and wait for a refund. So frustrating. I do love Capezio and think they offer great dance products though - hoping to have the right "fit" with my next order.

review_title: Read the directions and went step by step and still ...
review_body: Read the directions and went step by step and still cannot get it to work properly. The alarm goes off quite often; yet, you can only set it for one time, and even then it won't go off at that time.
setting up time is nightmare its not easy at all.

review_title: No returns... buckle is on backwards
review_body: This was supposed to have free returns, now it is telling me I can not return the product even though I got a defective watch. The buckle is on backwards making it unwearable ...
The wristband broke after 3 months.
The screen lights red, not purple, as shown in the picture. Seems to work as described.
This watch is terribly difficult to set and program.

This watch is a nightmare. It is very hard to tell how to make changes to the settings and no matter how many times we change it, it constantly goes back to beeping every hour. The face of the watch was scratched within the first week and I finally just purchased my daughter a new watch after about a month which has been just fine. Do not recommend at all.
Hard to program but a good watch for a reasonable price for my preschooler

review_title: Do not buy this! I'm so unhappy with it.

review_body: Watch is cheaply made and will not stop beeping every hour or two - we have tried everything. My daughter cannot wear to school because of the random beeping - it's useless to us and annoying - and they will not accept returns.
I liked the color and fit. My 9 year old daughter loved it. She can wear it mostly with anything!
Sleeves are very long.
Cute, but a tad too big.
Looks great on my granbabies!!
