Nice price and good looking. Granddaughter loved it.
Great fit!
Fits great

review_title: While my granddaughter was delighted with her jacket
review_body: While my granddaughter was

A very cute jacket. I have been looking for a good Jean jacket for my 8 yr old for a while. She loves dressing up and this jacket is perfect. You cam dress it up or down and to me that is very important in clothing. Great material, it stretches a bit too get the best fit.
I bout this for my daughter and she is crazy with it.
Perfect for my tot! She likes it
Luv it luv it

review_title: Disappointed. Watch face cover fell off within a few ...
review_body: Disappointed. Watch face cover fell off within a few weeks, parts were lost. Didn't find this to be a quality product.

review_title: Bought it for a child to learn reading the watch ...
review_body: Bought it for a child to learn reading the watch, but the minutes read on the border circle is... Absent!
Very nice product, my daughter loved it
Makes daughter very happy.
nice for the ones that are learning to tell time
My daughter love it
Granddaughter loves it.

review_title: Pink is adorable, our granddaughters favorite pair of shoes
review_body: Pink is adorable, our granddaughters favorite pair of shoes. Ordered a size up, for toddler. She wears a 6 ordered a 8. Fit was good with a little room to grow.
One boy would wear them all day one wears them outside when wet.  They will go to wilderness Canada. That will be the test

Size 7 ordered for my almost 2 year old - fits perfect, he can get them on and off. He loves these boots and insists on wearing them all the time (he even wants to sleep in them!). And I love the color, they look great. Also very easy to clean!

review_title: Only get these if you want your child to hate you.
review_body: Oy. These. They are SO STIFF. They are like little toddler foot casts. My kid wouldn't even take a step in them. He just looked at me like "Why do you hate me? Why are these on my feet? WHY?!!!" So, no go. I returned these and bought him something else.
My daughter loves these so much that she wears them even when it's not appropriate (hot and dry outside). Great for puddle popping and wet days at the barn. Wish they had this same style for adults.

review_title: These crocs are absolutely adorable. Great little rain boots
review_body: These crocs are absolutely adorable. Great little rain boots, the problem is that they're so narrow it's hard to get the foot in. Also they're super lightweight yet they are bulky so if your child is running it is definitely easy for them to trip.  Ouch!

review_title: We live in the country and they are great because I just hose them off
review_body: I've been buying my Grandkids these boots for several years.  I'm getting to the point I have every color and size.  We live in the country and they are great because I just hose them off, the kids can get them on and off easily with the handles...........they come to my house and put their boots on whether rain or shine!  GREAT QUALITY.  We still use the first pair we bought 6 years ago!

review_title: I bought a pair of hunter rain boots last year and it was the biggest waste of money as she wasn't able to walk around ...
review_body: I ordered these for my threenager and she loves them. I bought a pair of hunter rain boots last year and it was the biggest waste of money as she wasn't able to walk around in them as they were just too heavy. I read the reviews and decided to try these as everyone stated they were lightweight. I will say that many people state they ran on the small size, for us personally I found that to be untrue. My daughter is a size 7 and after reading everyone's reviews I decided to go up to a size 9 as many stated they were about 2 sizes too small. These definitely are big on her and fit like a true 9 would. Thankfully she is able to wear them comfortably and we will get our monies out of these.

Love them!! My daughter looks absolutely adorable in them.. I was weary about the handles looking goofy, but instead they look more like cute little cowgirl boots, but waterproof 👍🏼 I wanted crocs because they're light weight, and sure to last.. plus nearly the same price as the cheap stuff..  they're absolutely perfect!

My kid lovers these, and we get complements on them everywhere we go. My kids are 1 or two sizes apart, and the last few pairs have still been in great shape after both kids out grew them. They aren't as easy to run around in as flimsier options, but the trade-off is definitely worth it.
The face of the outside edge came off.
a challenge to set up for me anyway.

Two stars because my son loved it when he got it, yet it is broken already. Really disappointed, if you are going to make something with the word "kid" in it, it should last longer then two months. The metal latch that holds it together broke off.
My 9 year old loves his watch. It looks nice and seems very durable. He's been wearing it everyday. He does take it off for showering and swimming.

review_title: I'll recommend it to my friend. Worthwhile  The car is just around the corner!
review_body: so far! I used it and looked very durable. Better than some other products, I am very satisfied with the price. Next time I will buy from you. My brother needs this cool product. This is very fast delivery. recommended

This watch is supposed to be water resistant to 5 atm.  My son was very disappointed when the watch took on water and stopped working.  I am very unhappy that this happened one week after the return deadline expired.
It was easy to use, recommend. I met one like this with my friend last week, maybe both of them are sold by the same seller.
Received on time, and works great . I think this is a great product. And thanks for your customer service.
nice watch,work good,the function is very powerful,
My son love the watch! Have alarm and light!
I expected these to fit my daughter longer based on the size posted in the product description but they are much smaller and more narrow than anticipated. Definitely size up!

review_title: Love being able to order odd sizes online
review_body: i love the throwback looks of these shoes.  my daughter needed size 11.5 which was impossible to find at a store.  they never seem to have the size you want and size 11.5 is the odd size between 'toddler' and 'girls' size shoes.  my daughter is only 3.75 years old so i wanted velcro shoes she could put on and take off on her own.  she has wide feet and these fit perfect.  she's going through a pink/princess phase so she was beaming the instant she saw these.  love this and would def get again for the price ($34).
Disappointed with this shoe. Sole is a bit stiff. But mostly the Velcro strap is too short. I got half size bigger & the strap won't reach across the top of the shoe.

review_title: Not for Wide Feet but Soooo Cute!
review_body: Super super super cute! I just wish they offered this style in a WIDE. My daughter has "puffy" feet (18 months old) so the straps don't velcro tight enough. I also bought a half size larger and either she had a growth spurt or these shoes run a bit (not much) on the small side. Perhaps if my children lose their "puffy" wide feet I will purchase these again.
Still a little big for our daughter but we will wait for her to grow into them.  Had this same pair 2 sizes ago and we loved them.
Spent a long time trying to find a pair of tennis shoes for our little guy that were comfortable and easy to put on. These are pretty much perfect (wish they were the tiniest bit softer).

review_title: Great! Love the color and the velcro!
review_body: Got these in yellow for my son. He is 19 months and just loves them. The yellow is so unique and vibrant. I love being able to get something "different" for my son that not everyone else has...but still not break the bank. The Velcro is obviously a fabulous option. Laces at his age are just something to constantly have untied ;-)

These shoes are SOOOO cute! We got many compliments on them! My daughter had been wearing a 5.5 in Adidas, so I ordered a 6.5. When I tried them on her with thin socks, these 6.5 fit tighter than the 5.5's she had. Amazon has free returns, so I exchanged them for a 7.5 and am waiting for them to arrive tomorrow. The exchange was hassle-free and so easy, and the new pair ships out when you create the label for return shipping! So glad to have ordered with Amazon!

Sort of industry standard toddler shoe. I have two boys and have bought maybe 6-7 pair of these over their lifetimes. Easy to put on and pretty durable. I'd go with the darker colors with the black tread (as opposed to green ones, for example, which don't seem to hold up as well).

review_title: Great shoe, comfortable for my toddler, and easy to get on and off
review_body: Toddler boys clothing seems to have a lot of grays, blues, browns, etc.  So I wanted to find a comfortable shoe that accented his clothes. These are it!  They are perfect, cute, and easy for my toddler to get on and off by himself (he's 18mo).  They also have a long life span. Some shoes start coming apart after a few months wear, but these have held strong. I recommend them.
really cute watch quality in the front is not what I expected but still nice
Good shippingOK watch for a Girl
My five year old asked for a watch for Christmas and what give year old doesn't love frozen!? All in a this is a great little watch, especially for kids learning to tell time!
The watch broke in record time.  It was a waste of money
They are cute.  Thank you.
It doesn't look cheap and looks really nice ! Perfect gift for girls !
Great watch for my 5 year old. Great price. I figured the battery would have died by now, lol, but it's still running!
Making your daughter or grand daughter gleam with happiness - Priceless!
hard to set up time.  the buttons got stuck and didn't work anymore within 2 days...waste of money
My Granddaughter loves it. Rants and raves how much she is into it

Very upset. I ordered knowing capezio is a great dance brand. I was in a crunch I bought them for my 4 year old dance pictures next weekend and recital and the slippers came in stained . And with no time to do a return I’ll be stuck keeping them and having stained slippers for her first dance pictures
Nice quality. Conflicting information on what size to wear... I bought her street size and they’re way too small. Definitely order one full size up

review_title: Not happy about the size shown and the product I got
review_body: Not happy about the size shown and the product I got !! I was hoping this will fit my 4 years old toddler girl , and picked the same size !! But not at all close !! And I hate going back to usps !! Trash it and share bad experiences is time saving rather than working on it !!

Sizing is a little off but otherwise it's a good quality and sturdy ballet slipper. My 6 year old wears it everyday at home and dances in it. My only complaint is the laces: they don't stay tied no matter how many knots we make!
My son has a wide foot, but these were way too wide. Sending back.

review_title: Nieces first ballet shoes. I was worried about the ...
review_body: Nieces first ballet shoes. I was worried about the string at the front but she seems to be okay with it.
Had to send back the first pair that I ordered and ordered a different size which fit perfectly.

These shoes were good for the price, however I like the ABT brand at Payless better.  They are a darker pink which is a plus for a 5 year old and they have a snugger fit.  My daughter doesn't have a narrow foot so I ordered the medium width.  They were still too wide for her feet and using the draw strings only helped a little.  I returned these shoes. If you can get the right size (without being able to try them on first) and the lighter color is ok for you, these would be great, especially for well under $20.

These are adorable!  They are superior quality!  I was warned and surprised at how small ballet slippers run. I'm glad I ordered 2 sizes bigger than she is.  They fit her perfectly now but I may have ordered another size bigger to give her room to grow in hindsight.  They are very cute and supportive though!  I will definitely order again!
I was surprised how high-quality these shoes were. Our daughter loves them! I'll end up buying them again when she inevitably grows out of these in 4 months.
was broken in package, returned it

review_title: I like the watch but it LED display is aqua not ...
review_body: I like the watch but it LED display is aqua not purple like it is displayed on the image... that was the decision maker for me, unfortunately I have no time to return it as this it a gift for someone's BD...

I have it to my daughter on Saturday. She loved it, but the following Saturday it stopped working. The numbers no longer showed up & the backlight wouldn't go off. She hadn't worn it in the water or anything.
Doesn't work?!?
i bought this and 3 weeks after i got it - the strap ripped! of course, by the time i got to file a return - i JUST missed the return window!

review_title: Cute watch. My daughter really likes that when you ...
review_body: Cute watch. My daughter really likes that when you push a button, the watch face light changes colors. Likes the purple. But it has proven difficult to turn off the alarm and chime that goes off every hour. Still trying to figure that out!
Lasted for about a day then quit working.
4 months later.... andddddd it is dead!!! Maybe my fault because i let my daughter used it for swimming. But regardless.... i am not happy
Good

review_title: beeps when you don't want it to
review_body: Alarm and hourly chime turn on too easily -- watch is constantly in the wrong mode. No instructions. Experimenting shows pressing right two buttons toggles alarm -- but it turns on again too easily. Can't see an indication for hourly chime, and don't know how to turn it off.
Super easy to see what time it is. I work in a very dimly lit environment & it's hard to see what time it is with smaller handed watches. This watch is perfect!
I love this watch, I've had it for almost 6 months and it has yet to let me down. It survived pool water, hiking, and some snow. It's running great, and it's easy to change the time!
My sister liked it very much. Very good one for daily use.

Disappointed the interface of the watch does not glow as advertised. Good fit, cute and decent for the price. I'm not one to return items. Would be nice for products to be working properly or tested at least before shipping? Not sure if I should call Timex?
Daughter loves it!  She has made herself the designated time keeper of her brothers's "screen time" at home since she has gotten it on Christmas:-).
Fits my 6yr old well.  Still going after 6 months.

review_title: It's a Timex: It Works, It Fits
review_body: It's a Timex. It has an easily read watch face and the sizing on the wristband fits an 8 year old's wrist nicely.
Good Product - 7 year old loves it
daughter loved it.
ordered this for my 8 year old niece and she loved it.  Attractive enough for a young girl, and clear watch face to make telling time easier.
Fits perfect
BRAND NEW AND VERY GOOD ITEM ARRIVED ON TIME THANKS

Fits beautifully, great quality, looks good
Recomiendo

review_body: Size is spot on.  Granddaughter is a tall 6 year old. Normally wears size 7 this is a perfect fit. Had to cuff the sleeve, but that was expected.
My granddaughter loved it!
Fit an average size 9year old girl well.  Child pleased with this giftj
Love this jacket!
its a great little watch
My daughter loved this watch!!!
iam very love this wacth.thankyou!
Great Quality. Really helps with learning to tell time.
Have a good quality I liked
Item was exactly what the description stated. Received item promptly.

I mainly purchased the watch for 5 count markings. Half of the markings were rubbed off within 6 hrs of wear. We don't know if it got a little splash from washing hands or oil from hands.  Also, the strap has already broken in less than a week of wear. I'll look into the warranty but it's disappointing to pay an additional $7.00 for shipping for less than a week. I may have been better off purchasing a $20 watch in the first place.
My grand daughter loves it
Ok
Excellent

review_title: Definitely cute and easy to fasten on wrist!
review_body: I gave this watch to my 7 year old niece. She loved it! She loved the Velcro band. She loved how the minute and hour hands are labeled, and she loved that the flower is "floating". I can not speak for its durability because she hasn't worn it long enough. But it is a cute watch and easy for her to put on!

review_title: Great watch for new time tellers
review_body: I got this watch for my 5 yr old, she was able to tell time from a wall clock but when a family member got her a novelty watch she ha difficulty, which led me to seach for a watch that was more visually assisting with numbers that she could be successful with. It arrived quick and its easier for her to use. With a little more practice she will be a time telling pro. Great price and she's excited that it lights up!
5yo daughter loves this watch. Elastic band is easy for her to out on. I can see the band beginning to show wear after 1 week. This is why it is not getting 5 stars.
grand daughter loved the watch

I didn't know Timex made such a watch.  The numbers are easy to read, the hands are easy to see and the bracelet band is darling!!!!  My granddaughter is a very precocious 3 year old and wears it every day.  With the Timex brand, I know it will last and last.  A great price, too!

My daughter learned how to tell time very quickly and easily with this watch.  She likes the slip on strap - the material is comfy to wear and the adjustable strap makes it easy to size her wrist (she's 9 but has a tiny wrist).  The butterfly that moves around as it counts seconds is a big hit!  I was concerned the butterfly would make it difficult to read the watch but that isn't the case at all.

review_title: Dial is smaller than I thought it would be.
review_body: Love the concept of the watch. I just think that the minute hand and the hour hands are hard to read because the information printed is too small.

review_title: This worked well. But within the first week of ...
review_body: This worked well. But within the first week of wearing the watch face was scratched. I'm sure there will be many more to come.
Very cute watch for little ones. Fits my 3 year old grand daughter well. Will be great for her learning to tell time.  love the color
Adjustable stretch wrist band (no holes) for any child size wrist.  My 6 year old loves it, she's very comfortable, and her wrists are rather small.

review_title: Super light, stay on, easy to clean
review_body: My daughter is very happy with these rain boots. Super light, easy to slip on but stay on her feet really well. When muddy and wet I can simply rinse them since there is no liner to dry out. This is her 3rd pair (wearing since 3yrs old). Almost 6 yrs old now, wears a size 11 shoe. Ordered an 11 but run big (her croc rain boots in size 10 still fit her but she’ll be switching sizes soon).

I don't normally like crocs but these are cute, lightweight, fit well, and did the job at a reasonable price.  I see a lot of reviews suggesting to order larger sizes, but that seems to be to let your child use them for longer. We didn't want our daughter sliding around in her boots so we bought her shoe size and they fit just right.

my daughter loves these and we always get compliments. we look forward to rainy days so she can wear her rainboots lol.  they are also especially useful when we go camping as her feet never get dirty no matter how muddy or dusty it is outside. easy to clean too. love them

review_title: 100% made for kids!! Light weigh and easy on.
review_body: This is the best rain boots for kids! They weigh exactly like any Crocs. Absolutely love the snug fitting to prevent rain from wetting feet and socks! They are so easy to put on, my 5yo puts them on effortlessly. They are true to size. But just to give you an idea when ordering the right size, my son wears 12.5W, I ordered a size 13 and fit perfect! He absolutely loves them!!!!

love these boots so much. my toddler grew out of her last pair so this was a reorder of a product i already knew was good but in a bigger size. you can step on anything with these boots they're indestructible. my toddler loves them!

These boots are adorable, but they didn't work for my toddler. She's a thick girl with wide, big feet, and loves regular crocs. I wanted something for her to use in the garden and chicken coop, but these are so hard to get on and off! She also has a hard time walking in them, as they are not flexible at all.

This is the second pair third year I have bought croc rain boots for my daughter. They are lightweight, easy to put on, and don't split. They last all season and have always still been in good enough shape when she outgrows them for me to hand them on to a friend.
These were purchased for a two year old. Perfect hit. Easy to out on and take off by himself. Loves the boots so much put them on with his pajamas! Perfect

review_title: A little pricey, but a good purchase.
review_body: Easy for kids to get on/off by themselves. I think they were a bit more expensive than other brands, but my son likes how Crocs fit so it was worth it.

review_title: Easy slip on, great for wide feet, lightweight
review_body: My toddler has wide, puffy feet so finding shoes that can accommodate that is somewhat difficult. This fit amazing, are lightweight and comfortable. The best part for her is that she can slide them on herself and LOVEs that! These boots single-handedly made a Croc fan out of me and I will be buying her more when these become too small.
Very nice... my son love everything about it
Very cool watch, my nephew likes it very much. Will buy it for birthday gift again.

review_title: Run narrow and 1 size too small
review_body: Shoes are good quality and look great! They do run small. I have a 2 yr old boy who wear a size 6 and i ordered a 6.5 W and they JUST fit. I ended up ordering the next size up to give him more room.

I liked the design, purchased to replace a classic looking Asics shoe that isnt available anymore. My son was going up from a toddler 7 to an 8. These fit tighter than my sons current 7's. Size up for sure if you get these.
Velcro straps started to unglue after about 2 weeks....Tried these as an option to her converse...Converse won.

These are THE best shoes for baby and toddlers. They open wide to allow the foot to slide easily into the shoe and fasten with one strong velcro. My toddler has been putting her own shoes on since she was 24 months. The ONLY downfall of these shows is that the color bleeds badly if you put them in the wash or get them soaked. My other shoe of choice is the Foal model by Stride Rite. Because they can be expensive and have only one color we started using these.

Shoes are cute and fit length wise just fine. I can hardly Velcro the shut though and my son does not have a wide foot. Bought a pair for my niece a couple years ago and was the same - couldn’t Velcro them across her foot. This is the last pair I buy which is too bad because they are good shoes otherwise.

I thought these shoes were really cute but they were really tight on my son. We actually only wore them a couple times because it felt like I was cramming his foot in. I should have returned them immediately but didn't (my fault.) he had just grown out of his 5 nikes so I assumed 6, but these were way too tight.. He is now wearing a 6 stride rite with no problem...

review_title: Get a size to half size up
review_body: my toddler loves these shoes. And apparently they are very comfortable bc he'll go into his closet and select these shoes every day over his others. Go a size to a half size up, they do run small. He is an 8 right now and we purchased the 8.5 and they were very tight- so we returned for a 9 and they fit perfectly.

review_title: Seems to love them, picks them out every morning to wear ...
review_body: Hard to say for sure as they are for my toddler. However she puts these on & runs!!! Seems to love them, picks them out every morning to wear for walks & they are absolutely adorable! People stop us when we are out to compliment her on her shoes - of course being a ham she loves it! I'll probably buy these again in another color when she outgrows them!

We got these for our son when he needed good, every day shoes. He's been wearing them constantly for months and they're still in great condition. He loves them. The red color is a true red and it's bright, but very happy. They were a little big when we got them but we were able to still have them fit securely and not have any slipping problems. I think we'll be ordering another pair when he outgrows these!

review_title: This is a perfect pair for a preschooler
review_body: This is a perfect pair for a preschooler! They are breathable and it's very important for kids! The outsole has good grip and good cushioning inside & provides right support .. My son has used these for more than 6 months and material still holds well. No sole cracks or wellcrow issues. Easy to put on for kids which they can manage on their own!! Overall, a good shoe!
Can't get it to stop beeping on the hour. Finally chucked it and shopping for another :(

review_title: Watch strap broke within two days.
review_body: Very bad quality. Poor construction. The watch strap broke and snapped into two. Brought a brand new watch. Not even lasted two days.
The band pins fell out after one day!
too complicated for kids to use.

review_title: The alarm doesn't work. I followed all instructions to ...
review_body: The alarm doesn't work. I followed all instructions to set watch but the alarm does not go off at time set. Very irritated with the watch as it is suppose to be for a child and shouldn't be difficult to set up and use.
The setup for the watch is complicated.

The watch is nice... actually liked it a lot for my daughter.  However, considering it is a watch for kids, the band was not so great.  It broke off on the second wearing and the pin to attach the ban was unfortunately lost. Take that into consideration before purchasing this watch.
Really bad quality. It lasted only 2 weeks, now I'm not able to return it. Waste of money!
Thank You
Daughter was excited to get her watch, unfortunately it arrived with a broken watch band and watch us not eligible for returns.  Otherwise watch would of been perfect.

review_title: Great quality shoes but smaller than the stated size
review_body: The shoes are excellent quality but you need to make sure you get the size right. Size 6 is my daughters right size but the shoes were far too small. I returned this one and ordered a size bigger, (size7) and that fits perfectly!

review_title: Fit is great and looks nice inside and out.
review_body: Nice ballet shoes with a lovely floral (kid style) print inside. Daughter says they feel great.
Great ballet shoe. Exactly what I expected and much cheaper than at the dance studio. Will repurchase as my daughter grows!

review_title: Great Little Slippers For Around the House
review_body: These are perfect for my 2 1/2 year old.  She loves the Nutcracker and wanted slippers like them.  These fit her perfectly and are easy to get on but stay on as well.  Very pleased.  Leather bottoms make them perfect for around the house so she doesn't slip and fall on our wood floors as she can do with just socks. Would definitely get these again.

review_title: but impossible to secure the bow in place - better to remove it or do best to secure it ...
review_body: but impossible to secure the bow in place - better to remove it or do best to secure it in place with melted wax

review_title: Buy them a little large to grow in..
review_body: I bought these to go with the Capezio leotard. I knew they would be a little big. Together they were the biggest hit of all the gifts I gave my 3-yr old granddaughter for Christmas this year.  She loved them.  Don't settle for an off brand, only buy Capezio. If they are a little big as they were, the elastic strap holds them on well so she has room to grow in them.

I purchase the Capezio Daisy Ballet shoes for my daughter every fall (for the last 4 years). Always buy 1.5 sizes larger than her current shoe size and they will fit her all school year long. Very well made and the leather stretches perfectly. We tried Bloch, but found that the front of the shoe had too large of a rise and hit the middle of her foot so it wasn't quite as comfortable or well fitting. Love these.
I had to purchase a size up for my daughter, but they were perfect.

review_title: These are good quality. I put 4 stars because they run ...
review_body: These are good quality. I put 4 stars because they run really small. I read other reviews and order a size bigger, but they still barely fit her foot. I’d go up at least a size and a half!

review_title: ... i sure hope they do she is going to love
review_body: They arrived on time and they are so cute we won't know until Christmas if they fit or not i sure hope they do she is going to love them
Well, I ordered this the week of Christmas and really did not believe I would receive it before Christmas. I did receive it on time. The present was for my niece who is 10 y/o and she loved it!
Takes a lickin' and keeps on tickin'....what else can I say :-)
Bought this for my niece. She loved it.

review_title: only complaint is the band it looks like it's made of cardboard
review_body: Cute watch purchased three of them for my 3 and 4yr old granddaughters, only complaint is the band it looks like it's made of cardboard!
junky band but my kid likes it.  watch will probably take a lickin and keep on tickin
Great for my middle school daughter. It looks stylish and works just fine. The Indiglo feature is very useful.
It is cute, pink, and well made.  The numbers are large and easy to read and it is great for a child learning to tell time on a analog watch.  My daughter loves hers.
Value to price ratio is high.  Great gift for young ladies.
Very Good
I purchased this for my granddaughter and it is very nice for a first watch for a girl.
Just as described. Excellent.

Watch broke within a week.what a waste of money.
my granddaughter was thrilled

review_title: BUYER BEWARE. Watch face is GLASS. I bought ...
review_body: BUYER BEWARE.  Watch face is GLASS.  Shame on me for not looking more closely at the description. Shame on Disney for selling a child's watch that has a glass face.  I bought this and another watch from Disney (Princess).  Look at my review on the Princess watch for pictures of the shattered watch face after about three hours of wear by my six year old.  Link to that watch is included in this review.  Shattered glass right at my daughter's wrist.  UNACCEPTABLE.  UNSAFE!  I tried to post the pictures to this review too, but Amazon rejected that attempt.
Really cute watch my daughter loves it
Thank you Amazon. It is realy good
Disney goods maintain nice quality

review_title: it is a beautiful product. Somehow I would have expected a Disney ...
review_body: For the price, it is a beautiful product. Somehow I would have expected a Disney product like this to cost much more, and therefore I worried at first what it would be like. It has the feel of a high quality product and even comes in a nicely decorated metal tin. My grand daughter loved this.
My 8 year old loves it help tell time easyyy

review_title: Minnie Mouse Watch a Big Hit!
review_body: Purchased as a gift for a little girl who loves Minnie Mouse.  She was thrilled and it will help her learn to tell time.  I recommend this watch.  It's cute, seems to be good quality and Minnie Mouse fans will love it!
Very good fits exelent

review_title: A MUST BUY!!!!! KIDS ARE LOSING SKILLS TO READ CLOCKS WITH HANDS!!!!!!
review_body: I absolutely love this watch. Perfect for my little 5yr old princess. The collector's tin it came in was a pleasant surprise. I can not wait to see the look on her face when she opens it. Thank you and I will be buying a Mickey Mouse one for my son for when he is 5 as well.  It's sad that kids are losing the skill of reading time with a non-digital watch. Every child should have something like this. Thank you again for such a great product, and no, i did not get paid or a discount for this review..
Excellent

These boot are great. Easy for my 2 1/2 year old son to put on and he can run around everywhere without them falling off. I bought them one size too big so he wouldn't grow out of them to fast, and we don't have any trouble with them coming off. They keep his feet dry and work great. He has wide feet, so I was happy to find a pair that works since I can't find any wide-width rain boots.

review_title: They are easy for her to put on and easy to clean ...
review_body: My little girl loves these! They are easy for her to put on and easy to clean and you don’t have to worry about making messes in these.. looking for another pair for our second daughter once she starts to walk-run💕

Great Fit, my child does wear size 9 in Crocs but I read the opening to the boot is somewhat narrow, So I ordered a size 11 and they fit perfect with some wiggle room. Overall they're very easy To slip on  even with larger socks! I 💙 Crocs

review_title: Great boots but run too small
review_body: I loved these boots but they run way too small to my taste. My little one wears a size 5 in regular shoes, I got him these boots in a size 6 and they were quite tight. A size 7 would have worked much better. The boots were super light and easy to put on.

review_title: Great for Jumping In Muddy Puddles!
review_body: These are great,  I got them for my grandson to wear on the farm.  They are lighter weight than the rubber boots and he had no complaints.  He immediately wanted to jump in muddy puddles.

I live on property and my girls always wear rain boots outside. These are the best ones yet. They are light weight and fit snug on her my 5 year old's feet. She can run a lot better than she did in her last more traditional boots. I ordered the size that my daughter wears in her normal shoes and they seem to fit perfect. The boots are more snug so I imagine the might be tight with really wide feet.  The boots arrived on time and were exactly as described. The are light weight and appear to be made out of the same material as normal Croc shoes. My daughter is very happy and the boots seem to be holding up better than others.
So cute. More importantly, so functional. Our little one can (almost) put them on with no help. We get compliments all the time. Love, love, love
I love these, and so do my boys. My sons are 4 and 2 and these both love these boots they are great for all weather and great material. Very durable.

review_title: Our 2 year old loves these and had learned how ...
review_body: Our 2 year old loves these and had learned how to put them on and take them off by himself.

I gave these a 5 star because they are awesome to clean up. The shoe is just one piece and not a sole and pad inside. My son gets these muddy and dirty and I just rinse them off. I don't have to worry about the inside sole getting mildew or stinky. They are also extremely easy to clean compared to any other rainbows we have bought in the past. They are also much lighter in weight. He is very happy with them and likes to wear them longer than any others. They do run a tad small for our family.

review_title: I gave thiswatch to my niece for her 4th birthday
review_body: I gave this watch to my niece for her 4th birthday.  She was a little young to be able to tell time, but she adored it. She wanted to sleep with it on. I am giving another one to a second niece this Christmas who is 4-1/2 years old and I am sure she will love it just as much.  It is a good learning watch for a girl of 6+ years old.

I wanted a watch for my little school girl that would slip on and off easily. Telling the time on this watch can be a little hard at first for children that have been taught to read a basic clock as all the extras can be confusing. The band is soft and non-irritating. The colors are cute and girly without any licensed characters which I like.

review_title: Fits great. Easy to get on and off
review_body: Fits great. Easy to get on and off. Perfect as a first watch. Supper simple to get sized to the correct, worked better than to size than a typical watch band for smaller wrists.

review_title: Perfect for beginners to tell time!
review_body: Bought it for my 7 yr old granddaughter and she loved it ! Once I explained the before the hour and after the hour, (light pink and dark pink) she got it and kept telling us what time it was!!
good for kids. not able yet to say if is durable or if working well; just received it a week ago.

review_title: Great watch for children learning to tell time.
review_body: Cute watch. My grand-daughter loved it.

A fun watch, but the band design leaves a little to be desired (the "extra" length is wrapped beneath the outer band and is cumbersome to tighten). This is a small nit, and the watch overall is a great value to for a young girl.

review_title: She swims with it and baths in it all the time and it works great. I'm thinking of buying another as a back ...
review_body: I bought this watch for my 8 year old daughter she loves it!!!!  She never takes it off.  She swims with it and baths in it all the time and it works great.  I'm thinking of buying another as a back up for down the road.

review_title: Looks adorably - it is a gift for a little girl ...
review_body: Looks adorably - it is a gift for a little girl turning 5. I wanted the numbers rather than digital

A really cute watch.  All is fine on the watch but I do wish the face wasn't plastic.  Kids are careless and rough sometimes and that plastic will be destroyed quickly...but I still really like the watch and think it's adorable for a young girl.

review_title: Great comfy shoes for my boys
review_body: I have bought a few of these Sauconys so far (I have three boys all within a 1yr and 1/2 difference in age).  They both (the two that are walking) love them and I expect their younger brother to use them as well as they are very durable.  I picked them out because of the brand, the rubber flexible sole and their light weight.  The color options are great and the kids never complain about any discomfort.  Added bonus is that they can slip them on and off themselves without assistance.  Im sure I will be buying a few more

review_title: These are not great quality and uncomfortable for my son
review_body: These are not great quality and uncomfortable for my son.  The material is stiff and the Velcro flap is not very flexible which makes it difficult to adjust for a high instep foot.  I wish I would have returned these because my son can't stand wearing them.

I really like these shoes-they're stylish. However, we ordered the last 1 in stock and it came with a small stain on it. These shoes are also pretty stiff, but hopefully my daughter will break them in soon.
Horrible! Velcro was too short to lose the shoe.

I bought these shoes for my kindergarten daughter.  These are super cute sneakers and so far they've stood up for 6 months of regular wear.  They're light weight and reasonably priced. I'm impressed that they've lasted as long as they have.  I don't know that they're durable enough for my daughter to pass them down to her sister but for school and play shoes, they've held up very well.
Could not love these more.  Classic styling, comfortable, durable, and colors that my kids love.  This is now my default sneaker for my kids, and no complaints yet!  Well worth the money.

I know these run small because my son has been wearing them since he learned how to walk.  He is 3.5 and measures a size 8.5, therefore wears a size 9 in these.  He really wanted a pair of orange (his favorite color) sneakers.  We settled on these.  They are not my favorite color by any means but my son LOVES them.  My 2 year old daughter also has the Jazz sneaker in pink.  She loves hers too!

review_title: ... size up in these for my toddler but overall like the shoe
review_body: I had to size up in these for my toddler but overall like the shoe.  They have held up pretty well but my kid isn't really hard on his shoes in general

I got these for my 2 year old daughter in a size 7 toddler.  They are really cute little shoes and she likes them.  They are not bulky, pretty lightweight and go on easily.  They only downside is that the velcro strap is not quite as long as you would think it should be, so it does not cover the whole top of the shoe when it's on her foot.  No big deal since it does indeed close, but that could be a problem once the velcro wears out a bit.  Overall, cute shoes and she likes to wear them.

review_title: Great sporty shoes for my little one
review_body: I confess that I got these shoes at least in part because I own some Saucony Jazz red sneakers in my own (adult 8.5) size, and I thought it would be cute to match...just this once. I got the toddler size 5 for my almost 18 month old, and they are pretty great! As others have mentioned, it's not too hard to un-velcro the fastening, so occasional shoe removal in the car is an issue. But they slide back on well, and are even easier to re-fasten.
Niece loved it but band broke quickly
Was great until it broke shortly after.  The customer service was very good though.

review_title: but soft and comfortable on the wrist
review_body: We got this for our daughter who is 9 and in the 4th grade. We figure it will help her visually see when it's time for bed and to do homework and chores. So far it has worked well for us. She wears it all the time and especially to school. Now instead of getting antsy in class, wondering how much time she has left to do tasks, she can see for herself. I had no problems setting the watch when it arrived. It came with clear instructions and only took me about 2 minutes to set up for her. She has tiny wrists and I was surprised that it fit her. Interestingly enough, it even fit my adult wrist as well. The silicone band is strong, but soft and comfortable on the wrist. The watch is lightweight. My daughter is obsessed with the fact that at night, it not only lights up at the press of a button, but it cycles through a rainbow of colors before the light shuts itself off. You can set an alarm on it as well, which is also very easy to do. It shows day of the week above the time and under that ticks the seconds. Press and hold a button and it gives you the month and date. She loves it. We went on a family shopping trip after it came in the mail and during the entire trip she kept looking at it and reminding us what time it was. She slept with it on a few nights in a row and it's still going strong. There are a few dings in the front of it from who knows what (it didn't come that way, that was from my kids), but my daughter doesn't seem to care and it didn't effect the screen underneath at all.

review_title: Bought two of these watches. The functionality is a ...
review_body: Bought two of these watches. The functionality is a nightmare. Very cumbersome to change time, date, set an alarm or to set a timer.

review_title: We thought this looked great - and lists for girls boys
review_body: It's our own fault we didn't look close enough -  but our 10 year-old grandson with autism wanted a purple watch.  We thought this looked great - and lists for girls boys.  We didn't notice the hearts until we received the watch.  He probably wouldn't even notice - but wouldn't want the kids at school to tease him about it.
No instructions and does not allow you to change things (alarms, time, etc). It does light up and look pretty.
I purchased this watch for my granddaughter and she LOVE it!  Great customer service!!

I went to the cape zoo website to figure out my daughter's slipper size based on her street size shoe & it fit perfectly! My only issue is that one of the shoes came with a stain. I needed them a couple days later, so I didn't have time to return for a new pair but that's why I lowered my rating.

I'm probably just wasn't familiar enough with ballet shoe sizing so the original size 7 for a 2 year old who wears a size 7 shoe, couldn't have been wedged on even if I tried. I returned for a size 9 which was a touch too big, but a couple of cotton balls in the toe fixed that. an 8 1/2 would have been perfect, but unfort. I don't think ballet shoes come in half sizes. Otherwise, the quality, etc. were great for the price.

review_title: High quality ballet shoe, but sizing a bit difficult.
review_body: As recommended by a number of reviews, I ordered a full size up (my daughter currently fits a 6.5, but wears a 7 in most shoes). The 8's are a bit too big, but the strap allows them to stay on. It doesn't seem to bother my daughter and she enjoys wearing them to class. The quality is superb, so I'm very happy we went with this shoe - will just take a bit longer to grow into them!

review_body: Very disappointed in the sizing of this product. We ordered the exact same size in black previously and now the same size in this color and these shoes are clearly smaller than the other pair of the same size. Maybe the product was labeled incorrectly, not sure what happened there. We will try to see if they will accept an exchange even though the product has been opened

review_title: Capezio still great shoes for little dancers
review_body: I was paranoid that the shoes would be tight but stuck with the size 10 since my daughter had just gotten a few new pairs of street shoes in 10s. We always err on the larger size so that shoes will last for a bit! She just wore them to her first ballet class and the shoes were perfect, with a little room to grow. She even wore them w/out tights since I didn't have them yet, and was perfectly comfortable. I always wore Capezio shoes for ballet throughout my childhood and will certainly stick with  the brand for my daughter.

My granddaughter started ballet 2 mos ago - she had a pair of "ballerina slippers" that were part of a costume - and wore a hoe in the toe. I sent her these and her mom says she can't get them off her! She went to class and showed all the little dancers "her real ballerina" shoes. Several ladies asked where she got them and were excited to learn "from Amazon" of course.they fit perfect.
Beautiful shoes and perfect for beginners ballet! Capezio does not disappoint!

Bought this as a birthday gift for my 7 year old niece who was requesting a watch for her birthday. She doesnt know how to tell proper time, and I thought that this was a better option than a digital or a non teaching watch... Its hard to tell from the picture, but the hands do say minute and hour on them. The colors are cute and age appropriate... I'd recommend this for kids 4-8 years old.

My 7 year old daughter loves this watch.  She wears it daily & the soft strap is adjustable & comfortable.  She quickly understood how to tell the time & uses the watch face for hints.  I notice that she is now able to look at a standard clock & tell me the time.  Yay - that's the whole point of it :)

When viewing this watch on Amazon I was excited that I found something so brillently designed to aid my daughter over the summer to tell time. I loved everything about this watch. My only complaint is this watch is very very very small!!! I have pretty good eyes and boy let me tell you this watch is really more trouble then it's worth just to see. My husband and I couldn't tell the time on it viewing it as a child our daughter more specifically. You can'y see  the aids of the 5 10 15 20 for the minute hand. This watch is pretty cheap my goal is to find one the same only BIGGER!!!!!

To close as seen in picture, the foot has to be very narrow, which is not usually the case with young kids. If it closes half way. it doesn't look very good.

These shoes look great, fit great, and are functional. This is our second pair for our daughter and we love these just as much as the first pair. My favorite things about this shoe is the thin sole that allows a good feel when she's climbing or running. Too many kid shoes are like little blocks and hard to maneuver in properly. Plus the color selection is awesome. I bought her a pair of shoes from Target for $20 and the fell apart in a couple of weeks. These shoes cost around $22 and I'm sure she will outgrow these like she did the last pair.

They seem very comfortable and the color is better than appears in the photo. (We have the royal blue one)  A little girl in our music class has the purple and they are great too!

review_title: Burn your money versus buying this watch.
review_body: Directions were hooooribl!.  Basically you keep pushing buttons until you luck out.  Once the time is set properly, it proceeds to lose or gain time like it's the primary function.  I got so tired of translating normal people time into "CoFuo" time that I smashed it with a hammer tonight.  Maybe I got the rare one that had an issue...but I bet there's more.  If your a watch repair person and want to give a go at bringing this beauty back to it's pristine condition, go look for it in some stank disease ridden landfill in the state of Kansas where it belongs.  I hope what's left of it got flipped into a dirty diaper and wedged between 2 hot pieces of roadkill.

I at the same time bought my daughter white ones in size 8. They were TEENY tiny. I could not even fit her feet in, even though her day to day size is 8. So, I had to send them back and reorder in size 9. Let's hope they fit...
These seem to be well made.  Just what I was expecting.

I also found that there shoes can be made smaller if you untie the elastic and pull it so that it will be more formfitting on the top, that really helped the fit for my daughter (6). This is a great choice of shoe.

review_title: Sizing Is A Challenge, But Overall Good Product
review_body: After reading reviews and issues with sizing, I decided to measure my daughter's foot before ordering.  After measuring her foot, I determined her size was 12.5 (According to shoe sizing index), even though my daughter currently wears size 10 street shoes.  Of course, the ballet slippers are too big, so I probably should have gotten a 11.5.  That being said, I'd rather it be too big than too small and she will eventually grow into it.  My recommendation is don't buy children's shoes / ballet slippers online if possible.  Sizing is too difficult to determine online and it's probably best to have your child try them on before committing.
They were too small. Child wears a size 2 brought a size 2.5 still too small?

I had to return the first pair because even though they were the size my daughter wears in a regular shoe, they were too small. I had to order a full size larger than what she wears in all her other shoes. Maybe that's how ballet shoes run? Other than that, I'm happy with the purchase. They came quickly...  as did the second pair (when I asked for an exchange). They arrived in two days. The quality seems good. My daughter has worn them one time.

review_title: I researched the capezio size chart and followed the recommendations ...

I already see some strings coming our of the sole, but is expected because she use them a lot. I would size the feet before buying because ballet shoes should be tight and run small if you want to use them long.  She usually wear a regular 9 -9.5 so this are perfect. for her. It whould be 5 strat if it was not for the strings coming out of the sole.

The strap is also placed far back, so it is difficult to get the shoe on.

It fits my wrist perfectly.  I am a petite adult woman and I love the shade of pink, the night glow feature and most importantly the fit.

This is our second pair! I love these boots for toddlers because they are very light weight compared to most rain boots and they do not have the lining inside to get wet and run on little feet. They are so easy even my 2 year old can pull on.
What can I say they are crocs. Very well made and since they have no liner they can be easily put in the washer for a quick cleaning. Very satisfied.

My daughter has had these boots for over a year, I initially bought them a size too big so they can last longer and my daughter, OF COURSE, wanted to wear them right away. She's been wearing them when needed for a year now and they still look new and they always fit her great! When they were too big, they can't fall off her feet and she didnt stumble in them. And now she still wears them, they fit perfect. They look great in ANYTHING she wears, jeans, tights, leggings, etc. These are great to still run in and play in, she never complains about her feet in them. Will definitely be getting these in the next size up and maybe another color to keep the fun with her outfits!

My two kids love these boots.  The handles are great - even my two year old can pull them on by himself.  They have a comfortable footbed (or so says my 4 year old) unlike most clunky rainboots and they stay on the child's foot well both for walking and sitting in a car.  I'm still confused why Crocs are so expensive... they're just moulded foam rubber, but otherwise, these boots are great!

My daughter liked these boots quite a bit, and they stood up to fairly regular use. They were lightweight and didn't slip off her feet, so she was able to run and jump to her hearts content. She outgrew these more quickly than expected - her feet were not too long for the footbed itself, but would no longer slide through the ankle area. I also would have liked them to be slightly taller for deep puddle action. But overall, a very comfy lightweight and sturdy rain boot that my toddler enjoyed wearing.
We ordered a pair a bit larger than our daughter needed, and we use an extra pair of socks or leg warmers when it gets cold.

The material is a sturdy but somewhat foam like plastic material which makes them of better quality and it has some grip at the bottom for slippery floor. My daughter loves them. She is very skinny and they seem a bit wide for her so I double up on the socks and they fit fine.

Other than receiving two left foot boots (replacement arriving in 3 days), these boots are great.  The kid will not take them off.  He doesn't care that they are two left feet (though I do).  They are very easy to put on and seem to be pretty slip resistant.

review_title: Lasts about a year if lucky
review_body: This is now the second one that died.  The plastic cover is a pain since kids scratch them so easily and the movement seems to die after a year.  We like it most because of the elastic band.  I am going to try the band with the metal case version next.

I LOVE the concept, and my daughter loves the watch. That being said the band is an elastic piece that’s only good for smaller wrists. My daughter has to keep this in her pocket which isn’t good, and of course makes it easier to lose and harder to get in a habit of using.
My daughter has a small wrist so she wears it over her long sleeves. Comfortable for young kid
A great watch, not only to tell time but to help little children learn how to tell time. My daughter loves it and is getting better at being able to tell time accurately
girl loves it

Our 8 year old daughter loves this watch and wears it every day.  It's held up well so far with a few scratches on the face due to heavy usage.  If she had it her way, she'd prefer the watch be waterproof (it's not).  It's a great watch for a child to learn to tell time.  We've seen an improvement in her time telling abilities as a result of this watch.

the watch itself and band are nice.  The writing on the face to help a child is very, very small.  The flower is attached to the second hand and blocks the other hands every minute making it difficult for an adult to tell time.  Imagine teaching a child to ignore the flower.
Average price,  good quality
Look so cute on my toddler. I love this brand. They are classic and vintage looking and clean up really nice. Fits true to size.

review_title: fit narrow, velco catches on things, but will buy again
review_body: These shoes are a bit narrow, the top doesn't close completely. I bought a half size up and the shoe still doesn't close. It isn't a huge deal. What is annoying is the loop part (or scratchy part) of Velcro is on the shoe base with the soft part on the strap. So when the strap doesn't close completely, that scratchy part isn't completely covered and hooks on pants and dirt.  Brushes off easy though.

I've bought many versions of this shoe for both my son and daughter. They are easy to put on, comfortable to wear, and hold up well. They also clean up nicely in the wash if your toddler gets them dirty. These are the only shoes I buy for my toddlers...they are worth it!

review_title: cuter than I expected and lasted a long time for ...
review_body: cuter than I expected and lasted a long time for my 4 yr old.  I didn't think they had enough padding on the inside, but my daughter never complained.  well made, but stiff!
very sturdy, great Velcro, stays on my son's feet! We sized up so have two pairs now and will continue to get these!

these shoes were so great I have bought multiple pairs in different sizes. This is a shoe my son asks for now.. his Conys. Plus they have enough of a selection in colors that its easy to choose one. This has been my 3rd pair purchased.

My kids are able to put these on themselves starting at about 2, so we love them for ease. The colors are fun but not super garish, and the shoes last FOREVER. Our three year old just outgrew the pair of size 8s we got for her older brother when he was little, and they'll still be fit to save for the next kid after a trip through the washer.

review_title: Supportive, fun shoes for active toddler
review_body: These are super cute, colorful shoes for my active 4 year old. The large velcro strap makes it easy for him to put them on and take them off by himself. They've held up to climbing, jumping, running and provide great support and traction. The yellow color gets a bit dirty, but they get pretty clean if I throw them in the washing machine & let them air dry.
They fit very well. They are snug. Not tight, but snug so they aren't flopping off his feet like some of the cheaper brands I've bought. This is the 2nd pair I've bought- different colors.

review_title: ... wide feet but with these shoes it sure seems like it. They don't want to Velcro all the ...
review_body: I never thought  my daughter had wide feet but with these shoes it sure seems like it. They don't want to Velcro all the way so its half velcroed. Kinda looks silly. Your kid has to have super narrow feet I think for it to close all the way.
The kids loved the watch.

review_title: ... very well and the instructions were very clear and easy to follow
review_body: Got it packaged very well and the instructions were very clear and easy to follow.  My daughter really loves it and uses it everyday!!!
Good watch for the price

review_title: Has flashing colored lights when proper button is pressed!
review_body: This watch was purchased for a 2 year old who wants every trapping of big-kidness, the highest pinnacle of which being the wrist watch.  I considered buying a Timex like the one we'd bought for our older daughter, slightly more expensive, but found that it was not so water resistant as this one and, knowing my little one's tendency to splash about, decided on this one.  I was a bit concerned that the band would fit, but was quite pleased to find that the smallest setting was not too big for her, and she was thrilled with the gift.  It is quite lovely, the band is a flexible silicone, it would seem, and just yesterday we found out the newest excitement about the new watch: it lights up, with colors!  Our accidental discovery sent the face of the watch flashing in a range of colored lights, and was immediately the envy of the older siblings!  It's pretty, water resistant, practical, well-fitting, reasonably priced, and fun, too!  Definitely a keeper!

review_title: I got this for my daughter and she loves it ...
review_body: I got this for my daughter and she loves it. It is holding up well. No cracks or wear showing and she wears it to school every day.
Nice child watch. Better than expected.

review_title: good enough for a first watch
review_body: The watch is fine for a nine year old.  The watch is easy to use and simple to read. The band is soft, and the face is clear. The buttons are easy to push. The price is perfect.
Recieved the watch today but it was dead when I opened it!
Good for a little girl
Very good experience with this seller and product
great product my daughter loves it.

review_title: The watch immediatley fell apart when we put it on ...
review_body: The watch immediatley fell apart when we put it on our daughter Christmas morning. My husband was able to fix it but, not the highest of quality.
Piece of junk. Doesn’t sing as described in the watch headline. The time doesn’t stay set.
Comfortable and Adjustable strap
Beautiful colors. It is for my granddaughter, but I would wear it myself!!!
Bought as gift for needy child.  I am sure it is well loved
My 4 year old loves it. Then again it is Elsa and Anna
I love the watch but it has been bought for a Christmas gift.

review_title: Got this as a present for someone and the battery ...
review_body: Got this as a present for someone and the battery died after 2 days.  Not impressed.  The little girl loves the watch, but now she is frustrated because it won't work.  Will replace the battery soon, but am sure that the cost of the battery will almost be as much as half of the watch.

review_title: Its good but very big for her hand
review_body: Bought this for my 5 year old daughter for christmas. Its good but very big for her hand. Its loose and more like a bracelet.

Fits my daughter who normally wears a size 10.5. She is comfortable in it. The fabric is great and doesn't scruff easily. The garter lace does come undone easily so the teacher had to tie it a few times during class.

Great quality, they look great.  They run too small.  My toddler's street shoe size is 6W, we had to exchange/ order up a whole size and a half, 7.5 wide, for them to just fit. I was hoping by adding a half size that would have a little growing room.  I guess we'll have to order 2 sizes up if there is a next time

review_title: These shoes were exactly what my daughter needed for her ...
review_body: These shoes were exactly what my daughter needed for her first dance class however they were quite small on her already small feet. I ordered her current size but really needed a half size larger or maybe even a full size for her to grow into.

My twins wear normal shoe sizes 6.5 & 7. I sized up & bought the dance shoe in 8M, for both girls. When they arrived in the packaging, before I unfolded, they looked TINY. My husband said "No way! That's not going to fit!" However, once I unfolded them, they were GREAT! The straps keep them on the girls' feet but not too tight that they leave marks. They're actually a little large, which leaves room to grow into. The sides are a bit odd. Idk if it's b/c my girls needed size "wide" as they're a little thick for their height at this point, or if it's b/c the shoe is still a little larger size than they wear. Either way, they were bought to wear around the house, in their Christmas dresses & for dress-up. They love them & look adorable. Delivery was fast & it's a quality product overall which I'd recommend. Price was right. Side note: they have a pair of size 8M pink ballet shoes from the Payless brand, & in comparison, the Payless runs smaller than these.

I read the reviews that said to order a size larger than shoe size. My daughter wears size 10 shoes so I ordered an 11N. They are a little long and wide. My daughter has never measured narrow at the shoe store. The positive thing is that the elastic strings that tie the bow also allow you to tighten the slippers to a degree. They stay on and allow her to dance. Overall, I am happy they are a little to big than too small so she can grow into them.

review_title: Go up 2 shoe sizes from street shoe.
review_body: Love the quality but order big. We went up two sizes from our daughters street hoping they would be a little big to last her all year and they fit her perfectly right now.

review_title: Too small, even though I ordered up
review_body: My 2-year-old is in size 5-6 shoes. I ordered a size 7 based on the reviews and they were still far too small but yet they were very wide on her feet (and I didn't order the W). Had to return them.

review_title: Room to Grow but Fit Too
review_body: These ballet shoes are amazing.  I love that the strings help you "fit" to your child's foot which is important as their feet are growing sporadically.  We've been through 2 pairs of "regular" style ballet shoes but these have lasted 1.5 years without being clunky.  I will definitely repurchase when necessary.  I bought pretty close to true size, maybe half size up to get that additional room to adjust.  Over the summer, I had the laces tighter and now in October, loosened a bit since daughter complained it was too tight.  Excellent to be able to adjust.
Very nice, soft and comfy shoes. My daughter loves it and wants to wear it anywhere. My daughter wears size 7, regular shoes, I ordered 7.5W and it fits perfectly

We ordered the size my granddaughter is not quite in yet. Our thought was she would grow into them. However these shoes would not even go on her feet. We wanted to exchange these brand new shoes for a full size bigger. Amazon is saying we cant

review_title: My daughter loves this watch and likes to play with ...
review_body: My daughter loves this watch and likes to play with it all the time. I wish the strap holder pieces wouldn't be able to come off though.
My grandmother bought me a Mickey Mouse watch lorus Young so now it's uncle's turn.
I bought this watch for my almost 5 year old granddaughter who loves Mickey & Minnie Mouse!  She will be so surprise on Christmas morning!

Literally fell apart in my 2 1/2 year old daughters hands within 30 minutes of her wearing it. First thing that happened was the glass face fell off and then the knob to adjust time pulled out. Terrible construction for a kids watch. She was so sad when it broke too. Save your kids from heartache and don't buy this.
My daughter absolutely loves it! Durable and nice for a 3y/o.
48 kids watch should be more durable
Looks good, but made of cheap materials.

I am very disaapointed. I bought this watch specifically because it has the numbers around the face to help my daughter learn to teell time, in less than a day all the numbers came off. Now I have a very dissapointed daughter to deal with.
Nice Kids Watch, my children Love it.
Very good item, thank you very much.
Its not look like as picture, it was like so many used and returned it.

review_title: Nice watch, but weak cover and goes late
review_body: At first, my daughter loved this watch.  She wore it everywhere and by doing so she learned to tell time.  However, after a couple of days, the watch was about 5 minutes late.  Also, the watch cover does not appear to have any scratch resistant qualities.  After about a week, the cover was very scratched, still readable, but it doesn't look like a new watch, when it still should.

review_title: Not as small as I was expecting.
review_body: Nothing wrong with the watch! I am 60 years of age and wanted a small watch which would fit my very small wrist. Way too large. It is still a very nice watch and works great. Will work great for a normal size child, just not an abnormally small adult.

review_title: bought this for my 8 yo daughter
review_body: for her birthday. showed up on time and as advertised. it looks about right for a child's first watch. it looks durable enough, and I will be satisfied as long as it lasts about a year or two.
Got this for my 10 yrs old and she wears for every day. Consider this as a durable piece. Daughter is happy too.
I bought this for my little daughter's birthday and she loved this watch. She looks so cute in it and likes telling us the time.
We are pleased with this item.
I ordered this as a gift for my eight-year-old granddaughter.  She is pleased to have a watch of her own; the pink wristband adds just the right touch.
grand girls birthday gift  ( twins ) look great loved them
Breaks too easily for the age recommended.
Great price and great quality. Fit as expected.
Fits perfect
It looks super cute! My 10yo loves it.
Product fit perfectly
Great fit. Good buy
Nice Jacket . My kid loved it
Adorabld
My daughter loved this purchase.
I loved the way it fit perfectly on my granddaughter
Nice quality – fit was expected.  My daughter loves the new jacket.

I love the adjustable band and the material is very comfortable. My daughter loves it too. We have had it for a couple of months now and it is still working well. The face of the watch is easy to read.

review_title: Overall very happy- one small criticism
review_body: This watch is a Christmas present for my 5 yr old daughter. I really like the explanatory nature of the face design (hour/minute hands; second hand w/cute flower; 5 min increments; and shading to distinguish "past the hour" and "untill the hour"). I also like the elastic band. Important for Miss Indepedent to get on/off by herself. I think it will really help her learn how to tell time properly on an analog watch. The only critical comment is the metal buckle- it's a bit industrial looking for such a cute watch. It's definitely functional and will hold the band properly. Overall, very happy!
I think it's cute, it's a Christmas gift for our granddaughter.

Bought this for my 5 year old. She doesn't wear it because she's worried she is going to lose it. But, i give it 4 stars for quality, cuteness, functionality and the price was great! Also comes with a great warranty!

My granddaughter loves this watch.  Helps her learn time and is cute to wear.  Called Timex about safety in water and for average use, if you DONT press the buttons, it is waterproof.  Great value for the cost.  Kind of soft Velcro band so easy to adjust.
It will be a gift.  She is only three years old, but I am hoping she will like it.  Her favorite colors are pink and purple.

review_title: Adorable watch that really helps kids learn
review_body: I bought this for my daughter's sixth birthday.  She absolutely loves it.  The band is soft and comfortable and the extra help on the watch face made a big difference when she learned how to tell time.  The face of the watch scuffs easily, but the scuffs come off in seconds with a drop of toothpaste.  The colors are fun and stylish. We've had this watch for more than a year and it still works and looks great. I would definately buy again.

review_title: Very cute watch. I have had this for two ...
review_body: Very cute watch. I have had this for two weeks now waiting to give this to my daughter, before she has a chance to destroy it, and it is keeping time perfectly. I will update this post after a few weeks of her wearing it.
Closure doesn't stay securely closed - it slips and then the watch is too big for a small wrist.

review_title: This Timex kids' watch seems like it was in stock for a long
review_body: This Timex kids' watch seems like it was in stock for a long, long time that the wrist band has no longer has the expected elasticity. Other than this, it is good enough for a kid to enjoy briefly and is reasonably prized.
The Crocs boots were a birthday present for my grandson. He upgraded from last year. And he lives them

review_title: My son has rather slender legs so it may be that the larger size would be better if his legs were chubbier
review_body: I got a size up because people told me they run small. They are too large but he will grow into them. My son has rather slender legs so it may be that the larger size would be better if his legs were chubbier. They are sturdy and well made.

review_title: Great Wet Weather Boots (May Want to Size Up)
review_body: We love these boots but did find that you'll need to go up a size if your child has wide feet or if you want to tuck their pants into their boots. Otherwise, perfect for playing in mild cold or wet weather without overheating your child.
He wore these to school ONE day and they ripped at the handle. Sorely disappointed. In every other way they were perfect.

I purchased these for my almost 6 yo son since he outgrew his blue handleit boots. He really likes these Crocs. His favorite color is green which was an added bonus this go-round. According to my son they are comfortable. I think they are easy to wash, great for playing in the mud and perfect for walks to school. His previous boots took a bit of abuse and held up well. They are now handed down to my daughter who loves them too.
My toddler loves these rain boots! My child stepped in wet dirt and it came off instantly. Not much cleaning needed! Very impressed!

My toddler just loves these boots! They are so light compared to others and he can easily get them on by himself at 2 years old. He looks for ANY opportunity to wear them. I anticipating buying these boots again and again for him as his feet grow.

These boots are adorable. The color and fit are just right. They are a staple for every little girls shoe collection for the rainy season. I bought them a size 10 though my daughter is currently a 9. But with socks they seem to fit her just right.

review_title: Not a single complaint from this happy Mama!
review_body: My 2 1/2-year-old lover hew new boots!! They're easy for her to get on and off. They kept her feet & socks dry when we were outside during Hurricane Matthew this past weekend. She didn't have any blisters or other irritated spots when we took the boots off after hours of wear. Not a single complaint from this happy Mama!

review_title: Perfect light weight rainboots for kids!!! Must Buy!
review_body: We are very pleased with the CROCS rain boots. My 6 year old daughter absolutely love the fuchsia  is color and comfort of these boots! The rainboots are light weight, comfortable and well made. It was promptly delivered to us with no problems. Very impressed and high recommended!

review_title: Ordered a second pair after the first pair was outgrown
review_body: Boy runs wild throughout the woods, creek, dirt roads, etc. and they hold up extremely well and are user friendly for both him and me.  I'd highly recommend them as they are tough and durable, stylish, and affordable.  Great product, had never bought Saucony before but will again and again.

review_title: This is my daughters 3rd pair of these exact shoes ...
review_body: This is my daughters 3rd pair of these exact shoes (same color and everything).  She's very particular about what she wears on her feet (both the shoe and the color) and these seem to be amongst her favorites and I have tried lots and lots of shoes for her.

review_title: its a shame very nice shoe.
review_body: The Velcro does not  reach all the way across my sons foot, barely half way if that. I will be returning these, its a shame very nice shoe.
The soles of these shoes wear very quickly, but otherwise they are terrific!
Great shoes.  Keep buying the size up every time my son outgrows them.  They last well and look great!
My 3 year old loves these.  They allegedly make her faster and jump higher; results may vary! :P

review_title: Good shoe, kids can get them on/of without help
review_body: Got these for my son (in Kindergarten) as he can't yet tie his laces, but needed shoes which were appropriate for PE. These are great! He assures me they are comfy, quickly became his new favorite, and he can "run super fast" in them.

I loved these. They fit as expected and look comfy. They are well made and my two year old can put them on and fasten them himself, which is awesome. The colors on the navy/red combo are true and classic. I am sure he will out grow them before they wear out!

I like the shoe very much, but it just didn't fit my daughter well. The top part was way too stiff and tight, and the velcro strap would only secure about halfway because the top of my daughter's foot wouldn't allow it to go further. There's no way she could wear these comfortably.

I bought these for my 2 and 4 year old daughters.  The shoes are comfortable, adorable, and durable.  We have had them for about 3 months being worn 3-5 times a week (rotating with sandals).  They have been hiking in them, running, leaping, dragging, puddles, etc.  they hardly look worn.  Very high quality.  Most importantly the shoes are comfortable and my girls like to wear them.
Excelente

review_title: Nice little watch for the price
review_body: I bought this watch as a gift for my granddaughter for her birthday. She loves it! I bought her this one because it is waterproof and they have a swimming pool, so if she forgets to take it off, and gets in the pool, it won't ruin it.
my kid loved it as a gift

review_title: The material of the band is great too.
review_body: My daughter is a frozen fan. She loves her watch. The material of the band is great too.

beautiful, very cute.
