My daughter wears a 7.5 (normal) and I bought an 8.5. They definitely run 1 to 1 1/2 size small (for normal size). Also, the string for the bow comes undone all the time.

review_title: For little girls with "baked potato" feet.
review_body: I bought these for a friends 6 year old.  Her mom calls her feet "baked potato" feet.  These fit perfectly and looked great
Fit okay but they were a bit wide for my daughters feet. I've purchased the same exact size in store at Capezio and they were not as wide fitting so I thought these would be the same.

review_title: Order 4-5 sizes larger than you need!
review_body: I ordered this shoe in my granddaughter's size for Christmas and when we received it, the shoe was half the size it was supposed to be.  Not just a little bit small but easily 3-4 sizes too small.  Very disappointed.

They look and feel as described. My girl is 2 y.o. and normally i get her size 7.5 (with some room to grow!), but these were too small. Also she has narrow fit, well these were wayyy too narrow. Then,  i got her size 8 Medium and they seem to be too wide and not a perfect fit either. The good thing about them is that they are adjustable, so when i "laced" them, my daughter seemed to be pretty comfortable.

review_title: They are perfect. Her feet are a little narrow and the ...
review_body: This is the second pair of these we bought (she outgrew  the first ones).  They run a bit small, so buy up a half size.  My daughter is a 10 in Capezio tap shoes, but we got a 10.5 in these.  They are perfect.  Her feet are a little narrow and the ties adjust the shoes for the perfect fit.
They run small. I just returned for the next size up. Good quality.

review_title: fit as expected, not as pink as it looks
review_body: i bought these for my Little girl, and before i read some reviews so i can made a choice and i have to say it was really helpfull. My princess is 4 years old and i bought for her a size 10 that was perfect for her because it just left a Little bit of space for her foot grow and the bes of all she loves it. I totally recommended Capezio.

I got the shoe a half size bigger for a little room to grow and they still stay on just fine.  My daughter unfortunately unties the front laces a lot -- which of course is decoration and not really for anything else -- so I might purchase ballet shoes without laces next time but that does not detract from the good quality of this shoe. It seems to me that they are made with the same high quality as a woman's ballet slippers. I recommend them.
A great first watch. The band fits beautifully and the numbers on the face are easy for a toddler to read.
Beautiful

review_title: It was well received and packing was also very good. The product was also same what I expected ...

adorable and just as pictured... Thanks

review_body: I actually bought this for my 84 year old mother.  She is very tiny and has poor eyesight.  It works fantastic for her.
Bought it for my daughter. She loves it. Wears it everyday!

review_title: This is NOT an "Indiglo" watch despite what the description/picture shows!
review_body: This watch is NOT INDIGLO!!!!  Although the picture clearly shows "Indiglo" on the watch face and even the description says it is, it is not an "Indiglo" Timex.  I bought this for our soon to be 8 year old daughter and she was looking forward to seeing it light up.  When the first watch arrived she eagerly tore open the box only to be disappointed that it didn't light up.  I immediately contacted Amazon and they sent a replacement watch assuring me that this one would be correct, only for her to be let down again.  Still need to contact Amazon again to resolve this but will not be asking them to send me another watch that will also be wrong.  FIX YOUR DESCRIPTION AMAZON!!!!
This is a Great watch for a kid
A+++ Very cute!!! Bought this for my granddaughter, she loves it!!!
simple but elegant for my daughter the princess
Items came as described on the listing. My daughter loves it.
Very cute!!

Great fit

perfect!!!

My granddaughter loves this watch. But it had to be exchanged because it did not keep correct time. It lost 10 minutes over the day. Only the replacement had the same problem so they were both returned and she was heartbroken.

review_title: Cute watch for a little girl
review_body: I bought this as a present for a 6 years old girl. Her mother told me she was really happy with the watch and she pointed out the fact that she was happy to find out the strap was elastic and adjustable which seems to be a problem in most watches for little kids.

review_title: Teaching how to tell Time for my Grand Daughter is very easy with this special watch.
review_body: Thbis Timex watch is just the thing for teaching the young lady in your life how to tell time plus it is a very attractive item for her to wear on her wrist.  Learning to tell time was quick and effortless.  I would recommend this watch to anyone who has a youngster in their life that is ready to learn how to tell time.  Thanks Amazon
My daughter loves this watch and it has helped her learn to tell time. The one thing I really like is the band is elastic so once you've sizes it she can easily put it on and off herself.
Way cuter than I thought it was going to be

review_title: I like the idea behind this
review_body: I like the idea behind this watch as a way for kids to learn to tell time using an analog watch.  However I gave the watch a 3 star because of the strap.  The buckle on the strap calls for threading the strap around it in order to secure the strap.  If this is not done properly then the strap will just come undone and the watch will fall off.  I don't know if I can find a replacement band for this watch but I will be looking for one.

review_title: Very comfortable to wear and easy to read
review_body: Very comfortable to wear and easy to read, my 6 year old learned from this watch on how to read analog time. Great color and quality!

review_title: I bought this for my daughter. She loves it ...
review_body: I bought this for my daughter. She loves it! She can understand the minutes with ease and loves that the second hand is a butterfly.
The battery is dead!  And I see no way to get a new battery replacement.  Will return it sadly.  Not going to make it as a Christmas present.
Gift for grand daughter. She loves it.

The size is just a little large, but then I knew it would be because my son just grew in to a toddler size 10.  As other reviewers have noted, these rain boots are great in that they do not have a heavy sole.  My son can easily walk in these and they don't come off.  The handles were such a smart design.  Without even having to tell him anything, as soon as we took the boots out of the package my son slipped them on immediately himself.  The very next day after receiving them, he wanted to wear them outside.  He loves them.  These were a great purchase.  If you need rain boots or gardening boots for your toddler these are it; I would not purchase them for cold weather though and would definitely not use them for snow since they are not designed for this.

These are great!!!! Best boots ever. So easy to put on. They are holding up much better then any other boots we have had. We live on 3 acres and I have three boys. They wear them ever day outside.  No fire ant bits anymore.

I love Croc boots for kids. We live outside of Seattle, so we see quite a bit of rain. These are the only rain boots I buy for my 3 boys. They are lightweight, clean extremely easily & my kids don't walk out of them constantly like the heavy rubbery ones I've gotten them in the past. Also, they aren't too pricey, which is nice, since they usually go through 2 different sizes each year.
So comfortable. I bought these for my toddler, so she could garden with me outside. She wears them almost every day.

review_title: They came a little large, but they keep our daughter's feet dry.
review_body: A little bigger than expected, but our daughter likes them.  Her feet stay dry and she doesn't complain about her feet getting hot in them, which we were worried about.  They're light, which we like, and she loves the handles.  She can put them

review_title: These croc wellies are awesome.. Ordered a size up for my grandson ...
review_body: These croc wellies are awesome.. Ordered a size up for my grandson as he has wide feet. He usually fits a 9 a ten was perfect with room to grow.Well made lightweight and water proof.
Perfect, the are pretty cute

I bought these two sizes larger (per suggestions I read in other reviews) and they were still too small!  The foot bed would have worked, but my daughters calf would not fit into the opening. I was hopeful these would work, but I sent them back.

Wonderful Quality. They do run a little large but I am ok with that because she wears them with thick socks and tucks her jeans inside on rainy days. These are such cute boots and she will totally be able to wear them next season as well.

These boots fit just as expected! My 2-year-old was able to pull them right onto his own feet with no problems! They are lightweight so he can run and around freely, and he was able to wear them all day with no blisters!! These are wonderful!

The material on the outside, in the front (by the toe) of the sneaker is all pilled and they look old. I had bought similar sneakers in the past for my son and they did not look like this.

review_title: they may fit better on child
review_body: I purchased a wide in these sneakers in 11.5 and they fit very tight to the foot.  Maybe if one purchases a size larger, they may fit better on child.

My son was ready to move into the next size. These were a little big when we got them causing them to Rub on his heal. They're fine now. It's difficult  to shop shoes online because it doesn't seem that there's a standard for sizing

review_title: Nicest made kid sneakers we tried so far
review_body: My toddler loves to feel like mom and dad in her little running shoes. Nice construction with durable stitching and nice grippy soles. So many kids shoes don't seem to have good soles and my kid took spills on linoleum/smooth flooring. With these she can run and stop with no issues. Fun design and strong velcro means they stay put and come off only when you want.

Super cute shoes for my 2 year old son. I bought them big but he can manage them just fine--he's pretty well-coordinated. He likes them (doesn't complain), and they seem to be great shoes. I like the double-Velcro because I think it helps with the fit, as opposed to only Velcroing up by his ankle.

review_title: Great shoes! My 4 year old loves them and ...

This is the 2nd pair of Saucony Jazz sneakers we've gotten for my toddler. (now 2.5 yrs old) They are extremely durable, easy for him to run in, and really fast to get on and off. (He can take them off by himself.) Plus, they're super stylish. I get compliments on them. They seem true to size.

review_title: I love Saucony shoes for my kids because they have wide ...
review_body: I love Saucony shoes for my kids because they have wide feet and the brand's wide-fit gives them a nice comfy shoe. With this order, however, we did order the pink sparkly shoe but received just a plain pink shoe.

Great tennis shoes at a good price.  Super easy for my 3 year old to get in and out of.  The color scheme (navy and red) is so cute and my son can run and play in these all day.  Very happy with these shoes.

review_body: Love love these shoes, but they are narrow for my daughters foot. She wears them, we just can't Velcro the whole way. I feel my child has wide feet, which I hadn't noticed until I purchased these shoes.

The narrow sized worked well for my 3 year old.  The "lace" would never stay tied, no matter the knot I used.  Our dance teacher told us to use clear nail polish and it would keep the knot from untying.  I, however, decided to just clip it off and it hasn't affected the fit.

Very durable, lasts through my kid's ballet class until she move up to the next size....

It helped that I knew I wanted this shoe and I knew what size I needed because I was buying a larger size for my child. The shoe is fairly true to size. If you are unsure, then order 1/2 size up from the toddler/kid shoe size because it's okay for the shoe to be a little loose than it is to be too tight. Capezio shoes are great and will last through several kids as hand-me-downs.

Like 20 minutes till instead of showing 40minutes.  That's the half pink and half purple you see on the face. for a little kid it's confusing,

review_title: Perfect watch for my daughter who was learning how to ...
review_body: Perfect watch for my daughter who was learning how to tell time. The minutes going from half past to half to are different, and I wished they would just be like normal clocks, but it is still a great watch that holds up to a child's abuse.
my niece loved this !

This watch stopped working reliably within 6 weeks of very mild use by a careful 6 year old.  It runs some of the time, and stops some of the time.  Amazon will not return in as it is after the 30 day return window.  Warranty claims with Timex appear to be a pain as you have to go to a retailer, obtain a form, and send Timex $$ and the watch.  Very dissapointed.

Has many features to help a child learn and "understand" how to tell time. With a flower second hand that moves around the numbers and a feature that tells whats "before" and "after" the hour. It has a nice adjustable band that children can eaisly use and it also glows in the dark! Timex is a name I know I can trust. Very reasonably priced.

My 3 year old has wide feet so it can be hard to find shoes that fit her. I took a chance and ordered these in the size she is currently wearing and they fit great. The handles make them super easy for her to quickly put on herself. They are rugged and sturdy so it looks like they should last until she grows again.

These boots are so cute! My little boy loves them and wants to wear them every day. He is able to run and play even in rain and mud with no problem. They are very lite weight and don't rub blisters, even though he doesn't wear socks. They slide off and on very easily, but he can't take them off on his own--which is good. Great purchase!
These actually broke the first week we had them

review_title: Love! My 2 yr old can grip the handles ...
review_body: Love! My 2 yr old can grip the handles and pull on himself. They wash off so easy and no liners that come out like other rain boots. They were a great buy and we have these in all different sizes.

review_title: My son loved them. The color is more purple than blue ...
review_body: My son loved them. The color is more purple than blue which I found disappointing. If they were a different color, they’d be perfect!

review_title: really light weight and they seem good quality. Can't say if they keep toes dry ...
review_body: They do run a little smaller so I would suggest to size up.  My daughter really wanted to wear them right away but we noticed that the boots are different sizes even tho they are marked the same size.  Not worth keeping because of the sizing issue.  Other than that, really light weight and they seem good quality.  Can't say if they keep toes dry since we won't be using them and will be returning.

review_title: I picked out the yellow ones and they have become the favorite pair of shoes our toddler chooses to wear everywhere
review_body: I ordered up two sizes to get the most use out of these. They are so light weight that my 2 year old doesn't seem bothered that they are little big. I picked out the yellow ones and they have become the favorite pair of shoes our toddler chooses to wear everywhere, even in the house.

review_title: These are easy for my daughter to get on and off
review_body: These are easy for my daughter to get on and off. They are heavy at all, which is perfect because then she doesn't complain her feet hurt. I definitely recommend these! Perfect for the rain, playing outside and just cute to wear!

review_title: Great lightweight, comfortable, and weatherproof rain boot
review_body: These are the BEST rain boots.  I wish I had my own pair.  We have had them for every growth spurt, and never disappointed.  They are great to keep out the water, comfortable and light (unlike most rain boots), and easy to put on. As always, can't beat Amazon pricing.

Fabulous rain boots. My kids wear their boots HARD, and other boots always split along a seam, or the liner rips out, or the sole peels off. These have none of those issues, and if you get a hole in them, you can patch it with RTV sealant. The boots are light, can be worn all day, and can be disinfected if they get stinky. What's not to love?

review_title: The Velcro flap is the worst
review_body: The length of the shoe was great.  And super cute.  Unfortunately, these shoes did work at all for our 18 month old.  My husband and I have high arches, maybe our daughter does too.  The flap barely barely touches the Velcro on her feet.  It needs to be twice as long.

These were cute and our 18 mo loves them. The soles were not as thick as the adult shoes- this is good since I worried they would be too rigid. They ran much smaller than brands we are used to (primarily Carters, Stride Right), so we had to size up a half size.
Love these shoes! They are hard to keep clean because of the suede, but my kid loves them.

review_title: These are great shoes for kids
review_body: My 17 month old puts some miles on shoes, indoors and out, and these fit the bill perfectly. Easy on and off. They are lightweight and don't trip her, since the tip of the shoe is lifted up a little. They are easy to clean, if your kid is prone to wandering into mud puddles like mine. Plus, the coloring is fun and cheery. Only wish she didn't grow so fast and I didn't have to buy new shoes as often.

This is the second pair of Saucony I have bought for my daughter. The first pair lasted 6 months, which is a long time for my daughter! She usually wears her shoes out before outgrowing them. They run a little small, so I order a size up. They are easy to put on. My daughter is 3 and is able to put them on by herself. I hope the sparkly aspect does not wear off quickly, which was our experience with other brands.
We've bought these sneakers over and over again in different colors and sizes as his little feet grow bigger.  He likes them and they hold well to an active boy that beats them up pretty good.

review_title: No laces, just put on and go outside to play.
review_body: This is our new favorite brand now. Forget about the bigger brands (nike, addidas, UA, etc) and go ahead and get these shoes. Easy to put on, easy to put out. No laces, just put on and go outside to play.

I've been getting the Saucony Jazz sneakers for my little guy for 2 years now, in about 4 different sizes.  They haven't failed me yet.  My little guy is tough on sneakers, and we tried a number of other brands.  Stride Rites developed holes in the toe after 2 months, LL Beans (which I thought would be more durable) kept hurting his feet because of the sharp hard glue on the inside of the shoe.  These though, are easy to convince him to put on and get out the door.  They do fray after some time, but I haven't had any develop holes.  They're easy for him to put on too, which means less work for mom.  Great shoes!
Fits well. My child likes these. We've had them for one month.

We bought the same exact pair last spring for our toddler son and he wore them out. When we let him pick out a new pair for this year, he picked them again! He loves them. They seem super comfortable and hold up through every day wear and play. We ran his last pair through the washing machine many times, they always came out cleaner and and we just let them air dry! Highly recommended!

My 4-1/2 year old has shown an interest in learning to tell time, so I bought this for her.  It's cute...the girly pattern certainly makes her interested in wearing it...and the soft band is comfortable.  The main numbers are big; but I dock stars because the lettering on the hour and minute hand are SO tiny...even she can't see it.  Additionally, there is the added "15" and "30," but they are also small.  And then they put "15 of" on the 9...which isn't helpful to a new learner.

review_title: Loving the face of this watch and it's been really ...

review_title: Perfect low stim time learner watch for our Autistic daughter's care plan.
review_body: Purchased to accompany my Autistic daughter's school program.  Decent sturdy design with no Velcro or awkward buckle.  This is perfect for her, as it has the time learners as well as a "low stim" design.

review_title: The puppy barely picked it up right before I gave ...
review_body: The puppy barely picked it up right before I gave it to my daughter as a birthday present. When I handed to her the watch was already broken. If it can't last a second with the dog,I don't know how well it would survive with children.

This is a great watch, the only reason why I put 4 instead of 5 stars is that I don't think it should be the first watch to teach a kid to read the time as the minutes don't go to 60' and it does confuse my 3 year old daughter... So I am going to get the whole 60 minute watch and save this one for later...

review_title: It came well packaged and on time. It is ...
review_body: It came well packaged and on time. It is darling.  My granddaughter whom I bought it for didn't care for the design so I gave it to another little girl, about 9 years old and she loves it!

Purchased this watch for my daughter for her 6th birthday.  She absolutely loves it!  It's stretchy and adjustable, so it fits even her tiny wrist fairly well.  There is plenty of room for growth.  The face is pretty small, and the words and numbers are hard to read, so I don't see it as a great tool for learning to tell time (any more than a normal watch), but she loves just the same.

Amazing boots for my dirty little explorer!  These boots fit my son very well, are weightless, and are very adorable.  Like all Crocs, I love how easy they are to clean!  The handles are strong, and they make it easier for my son to pull on all by himself. These boots are definitely worth the money, and I see myself buying a new pair each time his little foot grows bigger!

I purchased them flr my 3 year old twins and we really love them. They are very easy to put on, so my kids can put them by themselves. They are very light and confortable, and cute!. We use them not only for raining days but for playing in the garden too. I absolutely recomend them.

review_title: my toddler seems to find them comfortable. However
review_body: These boots are cute, lightweight, my toddler seems to find them comfortable. However, they run a bit small, and are kind of narrow. My toddler actually has really narrow feet, so thats saying something. They're difficult to get on, and the ankle is too fitted to tuck pants into, resulting in muddy pants.

review_title: Great waterproof boot for rainy/muddy days
review_body: Great waterproof boot for rainy/muddy days.  Very light compared to other similar boots.  They do not breathe well, but on the upside, they keep my kids' feet warm.  They are not lined with anything on the inside, so for cold, snow days probably need warmer socks. Also, they last, are easy to clean, and are super easy to put on.

Best rainboot out there! Super lightweight, unlike clunky, heavy rainboots, which makes walking and running a breeze for little ones. Easy to clean inside and out. The handles make it easy for my 2 year old to pull on. Love it!

review_title: waterproof, durable, and perfect for a rugged child in soggy spring
review_body: We wanted a boot for my 8 year old that was comfortable, durable, and waterproof for adventures around the farm and local creek. He liked the blue color best. I thought they were a great price for a rain boot that will hold up, as crocs tend to do over time. Easy on/off, and very comfortable for my son. These are fantastic! We'll be purchasing more in the future as he grows and our other children acquire a need for boots.

My baby loves these, I bought then when he was 22 months wearing shoes 6.5 size. I got size 8 in the boots and he loved them from first try. Excellent for the rain season, would not survive it witho T these. He is 25 months now and went up to size 7 in regilat shoes, still good in the crocs size 8. He can run and jump and always tries to persuade us to put these on him even when there is no rain.

These are adorable and comfortable.  I got them for a much better price then on the crocs website so I was super happy about that.  She has never worn them for an extended period but I think if she did then her feet may get sweaty because there isn't as much breath-ability on the bottom for obvious reasons of course but it shouldn't be too bad if she has socks on.
These little boots are so cute! They are bright green and my little boy loves them! They don't have any seams so no way to get leaks, unless the shoe is punctured.

These boots are great!! Perfect for any weather. They are lightweight. My 2.5 year old wears them to do everything outside. Run, ride bikes, hike, jump in puddles, etc. They are easy for him to pull on himself. We live out in the country and they have held up to the wear and tear.

Look exactly like the picture. I love the retro look. My husband actually bought an adult pair in a different color and didn't realize they were the same as our son's. Apparently they're comfy for adults too. My son's foot is a little wide, so the velcro doesn't close all the way (some of the velcro is showing on the edge) but I don't mind that.
These are the first pair of shoes to be wide enough for my son’s super wide feet! He loves them and they are great quality ! I love the blue!!

review_title: Adorable and supportive shoes -- bought them for my daughter ...
review_body: Adorable and supportive shoes -- bought them for my daughter because I liked this color best of all the options, and in less than a week they have garnered tons of compliments. I think it's a bit silly that these are labeled "Boys" -- think of all the toddler girls out there missing out on these awesome kicks because of the labeling!
Love these! I buy them usually at Nordstrom Rack but there is a larger variety of colors and size online.

these shoes have been great so far! we've had them for 4 days and so far they haven't fallen off. the velcro sticks great and she has no problem walking in them. definitely recommend for babes that have been walking for at least a couple months as they are more stiff on the bottom.

review_title: My 3yr old loves these shoes. They seem to ...

Fits on the smaller side than the brands I'm used to but my son's foot is narrow, so it fits him great.

Good, inexpensive shoe that our son can take on and off completely on his own. They have a pop of color, but I probably wouldn't buy these in any bigger size because my husband and I think the cute factor drops the bigger this particular shoe is, but I would definitely buy them in a little kid 12 or smaller as a gift.
Grandbaby loves!  Good value for the price.

review_title: Elegance & beauty placed upon your wrist
review_body: A most beautiful watch from an equally beautiful movie, this will help to tell time & make its wearer look good while doing so! A lovely magenta/purple straps with snowflakes combined with an adorable photo of sisters Anna & Elsa & easy to adjust, this watch is a must-have for anyone who loved the movie 'Frozen' (& honestly, who DIDN'T?)! If you're looking for a Grade-A watch featuring Disney's Snow Queen & her younger sibling, look no further than THIS little beauty!

great shoes, but definitely an entire size smaller than "regular shoes"

review_title: Why-why-why are shoe size's not standard in ballet shoes?
review_body: Why-why-why are shoe size's not standard in ballet shoes? I just enrolled my 5yr old daughter in ballet class and ordered her standard size 9 shoe size in the capezio shoes. Unfortunately, I did not read all the reviews, nor do I see the size chart (at least not shown on my iPad). Anyhow, shoes are too small and now I'm stuck with them.  So annoyed!

The fit and the color of these ballet shoes are perfect. I ordered a size up for my soon to be 5 year old and at first I thought they were too big, but luckily you can pull the string until they fit perfectly. She loves them and dance as well.

review_title: Perfect, my six year old is very happy!
review_body: After reading all the size discrepancy I was nervous about what size to get. I finally measured her foot with amazon's kids foot size measuring print out. According to that she was a size 11, 11.5, although her shoes she wears to school every day are size 10 and still are roomy! So I ordered 11's and they fit perfectly. I could have gone to 11.5 to have growing room, but the 11's are great and I didn't want to deal with the hassle, we'll just know to go a tad bigger next time. And, she loves the flowers on the inside, she mentions them every time she talks to people about taking ballet: "And my shoes have FLOWERS inside them!" So cute.
Fit my granddaughters feet great and she loves her new shoes.
Well made just comes in a smaller size. Not true to size
If you're new to purchasing dance shoes, make sure you go to the manufacturers website to check their sizing! Buying dance shoes is NOT like buying street shoes.

Purchased for my daughter to wear for her ballet class. Worked wonderfully while her feet were that size. Shes worn them almost all season and they still look almost new. Great construction and wonderful fit. Purchased a second pair in her new size from them and will most likely continue to purchase from them. The price is half of the cost of others and the quality is amazing!

Great quality but I bought the tap and ballet capesio in same size 9 wide and the ballet shoes were way too wide. Kid would have to have very fat foot to need a wide in this. The tap in wide fit great.
not bad for low price
Broke literally the day after arriving
Bought this for my preschooler and it fits her on the smallest setting.
The band is very cheap. Wrinkled and old looking out of the box.

The watch may be ok, but the band is junk. I'm sorry to pan this piece of junk but it folds like the interior is made up of discrete pieces of cardboard instead of a unified band. DO NOT BUY THIS WATCH UNTIL THEY MAKE A BAND THAT IS QUALITY. this is a piece of junk. My apologies to the seller. STop selling it.

review_title: Would also love in hot pink
review_body: Cute watch.  I needed something that would really help my 9 year old daughter tell time. Maybe needs a couple of flowers and butterflies.  Would also love in hot pink.
Our daughter loved it and it fits her small wrist beautifully!  It made a perfect birthday present for her to wear!
Really like the watch!
This is a very nice watch. Simple design and easy to read, my daughter loves it. She has a small wrist and it fits her well with much room to grow!
My grand daughter loved it, well made, good price.
Jacket is very bulky
Cute and great for mix and match!
Nice fit and beautiful jacket!
It fit perfect
Perfect!

review_title: Fit perfect and was exactly what I was looking
review_body: Fit perfect and was exactly what I was looking for
My granddaughter loves it!
Fits my daughter good. Will order again.
exactly as described. No issues
My daughter loved it. It fit as expected. I was very happy.
Great first watch. Adjustable band was perfect for my small framed child

We got this today, and my four year old was so disappointed to find that I didn't function out of the box. We are returning it. My daughter really wants a new watch before the start of school and the reviews seemed to suggest this would be great for her. She did love the way it fit and found the strap to be comfortable, but it sure doesn't do us much good if it doesn't tell time.

Yes, the watch is super cute, and my daughter loved this gift. As other reviews have indicated, it is wise to sew the strap together so that it will stay snug and not fall off. Unfortunately, from the very beginning the watch lost an hour each week, making it useless as a timepiece, so we had to return it. This is the second Timex Kids' watch we have had trouble with. Bad luck perhaps, but I will not reorder this watch.
Survived my 5 year old daughter...so far!

review_title: The band is soft and sturdy, stays put with lots of room to grow
review_body: My seven year old daughter was thrilled to receive this watch from her Gramma. The band is soft and sturdy, stays put with lots of room to grow. The shaded face and the minute and hour hands being labeled has accelerated her grasp of telling time. Love this watch.

review_title: It is durable and is easy for children to take on and off on their ...
review_body: My daughter was able to grasp the concept of telling time within a few days thanks to the Timex kids watch. It is durable and is easy for children to take on and off on their own. It can handle play, water, and being banged a round on the playground without any trouble. Worth every penny!

review_title: Perfect kids watch- made very well and expands to fit ...
review_body: Perfect kids watch- made very well and expands to fit any size arm. My 3 yr old granddaughter loves it She's learning how to tell time.
Granddaughter loved it

review_title: My daughter loves it. On the first day upon ...
review_body: My daughter loves it. On the first day upon wearing it she was able to differentiate between the hour hand and minute hand.

review_title: I was disappointed at first when I realized the minute numbers on ...
review_body: cute style.  A little hard to adjust the strap, but we got it figured out.  I was disappointed at first when I realized the minute numbers on the left side of the watch were counting backward from the hour, but after just a couple days, my 6 yo daughter will say the time both ways ("it's 20 minutes to 4, so that's 3:40").  My daughter is in ballet, so she especially likes the design.

review_title: Great for toddlers, especially if looking for a little bit wider of a boot...
review_body: I bought these for my son who loves his croc shoes and was needing new boots.  I loved the reviews and I loved that people were posting that they run slightly wide.  My 4 year old has some serious feet so based on other reviews I thought I would give them a try.  They are AWESOME!! My son loves them!!

I bought these for my 17 month old so he would have something to wear during the muddy spring. He wears a size 6W shoe and I ordered a size 7 boot. They fit well and he still had plenty of room to grow into them. When I first put them on him, he was a little wobbly, but he was running around the house in a few minutes. He seemed to like them so much he fussed when I tried to take them off. He hasn't worn them outside yet, but I'm sure they will work great.

As other reviewers have stated, it's best to size up with these. I like that they are light weight, but my toddler walks more awkwardly in these than other shoes and boots, causing her to fall more. The tops of the boots are kinda narrow too, so unless your kid is wearing leggings or tights, pants will need to be rolled up.
Instead of winter boots which he complained were too tight we went with these and warm wool socks. No complaints and toasty dry toes!

I always have two sizes on hand , one that fits and the next size up because I never want to be without these boots. 3yr old can put them on herself and one size up fits over footie pajamas because its just fun to make smores in your pajamas and stay up past bedtime.

These boots are great!  Not only are they super cute but they are light weight and easy to take on and off.  My son was complaining about his other rain boots not staying on when he would be on the swings at school...because they are so heavy they slide right off.  He never has an issue with these and can run more naturally as well which seems to be a struggle with regular rain boots.
Bought these for my 2 yr old son, a size larger than what he wears now, hoping they will last a little while. So I don't really know how well they fit, but they are certainly big enough.
Great quality. Feels funny to child who never wore rain boots. They are so adorable. We keep getting stopped by people who want to know about the boots.

My daughter says these are comfortable rain boots. They seem sturdy.  As other reviewers noted, these do seem to run narrow...My daughter's feet are so narrow that rain boots rarely fit her, but these do.  So, 5 stars for me, but I can see how these might be a problem for wider feet.

We have three kids 8 and under and have tried multiple brands of rainboots. These are by far the most sturdy and long lasting boots we have ever bought. Every other pair have broken, cracked or just fallen apart shortly after the kids started wearing them. These are worth the money and hold up past the time our kids have grown out of them! We will keep buying this brand. Thank you for making and selling quality kids boots!

review_title: Nice looking and difficult for toddler to remove
review_body: My toddler does not like to keep shoes on and we lose them constantly for this reason. This one fits well and the strap is hard to remove. So it is working nicely so far. The shoes don't look soft for toddlers, but stylish otherwise. 1 less star as I would prefer a softer bottom.

These do not seem like real saucony sneakers but rather knock offs or they are the cheap version of saucony. I have other saucony sneakers that my son has bought from a Stride Rite store and they a are much better quality. These are very stiff and have a very thin sole compared to our other saucony sneakers. If you're expecting real saucony sneakers, these are not them.

review_title: my 4 year old loved them. The size is a bit small
review_body: I did not think these shoes were too stiff, my 4 year old loved them. The size is a bit small, my 4 year old is a 7.5 and I've had to order an 8 to fit properly. Not sure if that was a me problem or the shoe. But good quality, well made product.
Holding up well so far for very active 22-month-old. Big brother (age 4) also had a pair that were very comfortable for his sensory needs.

Bought these big for my toddler and she loves them. Even though they are big they aren't clunky, she can run and play like she were barefoot. They've been thru farms and parks and back and are holding up perfectly. Great quality, may buy again when she grows out of these.
Cute, trendy shoe-my daughter loves it! I'm so glad Amazon carried this shoe, so we didn't have to go to the big box store and pay more for the same shoe!

This is the third pair of Saucony Baby Jazz sneakers we've purchased for my son. We like the look and quality of these shoes. In the past we've had gray and navy pairs, and this green does show dirt and wear more easily. We'll probably go back to a darker color since they see lots of dirt and sand at daycare. Overall we love these shoes and plan to keep them in our shoe rotation.

review_title: Super cute on my little dude's feet
review_body: Super cute on my little dude's feet. The straps are a little flimsy, though, and are hard to stretch over, even though his feet are narrow.

review_title: Love these shoes for my kiddos
review_body: Love these shoes for my kiddos. They do seem to run a bit short and narrow, so I know to size up when I buy them. Easy to put on and my kids can wear them all day. Have them in several different colors. Adorable and comfy!
We have had 3 pairs of these shoes and the first pair is now being worn by my second-born. They're durable, adorable, easy on and off. Love.These.Shoes.
Cute, seem to do the job just fine. My 4 year old has smaller feet than other kids her age, and she wears the 9.5. They are wearing well and we haven't had any issues.
My daughter is just into size 10 in little kid shoes. Size 11 fits comfortably (10.5 was snug, so we exchanged.)

These are a great price and good quality, but run VERY small.  We ordered the exact size my daughter was measuring and could barely wedge her foot into them.  We re-ordered a whole size up and they fit.
Super cute but waaaaay too small. Had to send them back and order 2 sizes up.

review_title: Worth the $$ great pricing Always available
review_body: Remember ballet sizes and tap shoes sizes are different from sneakers. Worth the $$ great pricing

review_title: Sizing is similar to street shoes!
review_body: I ordered these shoes for my daughter who was recently measured as a 13.5 W. After reading the other reviews, I decided to go up a full size to make sure that they wouldn't be too small and ordered a 1.5 W. They arrived today and are decidedly roomy. Theoretically wearable (they wouldn't actually fall off her feet) but clearly not the correct size. I'm re-ordering and going with her measured street shoe size this time. I think we'll just keep the bigger ones for her to grow into.
Fit good. Great product for price.

review_title: Great ballets. This is our second pair after my ...
review_body: Great ballets. This is our second pair after my little one grew out of her first pair I grabbed another brand and they were right and itchy for her. She’s 2 and has chubby feet so this wide band is comfortable for her.
Perfect for my 3yr old. Make sure you know about ballet slipper sizing. I believe its about a size and a half larger then their actual size.

Most of the reviews stated, "Order a size-up,"  so I did.  But these shoes were way too large.  It appears that her street size is exactly the size that she needs.  In addition, she does not have a narrow foot by any stretch of the imagination, and these shoes are quite wide.
It stopped working a few days after we got it:(
my daughter loves it.  good stuff.
Perfect gift for my daughter for Chrsitmas!
Just received it and love it! Very cute watch!!
My daughter seems to love it.
Our granddaughter loved this
Looks good and easy to set.
Grand girls live their new watch!!!!
Excelente
great stocking stuffer for Frozen lover

review_title: It's pretty, and quite appropriate for a young (11 y ...
review_body: It's pretty, and quite appropriate for a young (11 y o) lady. I think she will be very happy with it.

review_title: so was glad to find a watchband that was imitation leather
review_body: I'm allergic to wearing real leather, so was glad to find a watchband that was imitation leather. And it has an easy to read dial.
Nice product, quick shipping
My grandaughter loves this watch and wears it all the time.  Makes a nice, practical, Christmas or birthday gift .
just the right size for my 11 year old. she wears it all the "time" lol
Good watches. They are looking nice and accurate. Could be wearing to school.

This watch is great!  My 6yr daughter received it as a Christmas gift.  She loves it and she has tiny wrist and it actually goes small enough to fit her.  She has had it for 3 months now and it is holding up great and still looks nice.
My daughter loves it.  Seems to be working very well
Am very pleased with my Timex pink leather banded watch.  It's comfortable, is easy to read and the face can be lit up with the press of a button.  Wonder if it comes in other colors.
Got the watch for my niece's Easter basket. She loved it.  I am very pleased as well. Pretty pink band is so girly and the price couldn't be beat.
Fit as expected
Just like the Children's place jacket in store but much better price!
Love the jacket
My granddaughter loved this jacket and it was such a great price. Wish it had pockets.
Puurrfect
Very nice for the price.. Fits great got it to large to keep for a while..
Great Jacket!!!  My 6 yr old loves it. Fit as expected.
Perfect, my daughter loved it.
I like it very much
My daughter loves it!
as described very satisfied.

review_title: Perfect accessory for my precious girl
review_body: Perfect for my granddaughter of 8. She is all about looking pretty and wearing jewelry these days, so these added to her collection. Not to mention that looks pretty without looking so little girl since she is growing, thought it was a perfect detail for her.

Gave as a gift, but I got two similar ones for all my little girls and they are fine. The oldest can now tell analog time, and it's only a matter of time before the 5ers get it too. Needless to say, they are ruthlessly abusive– I have stepped on them many times and they have never had to be reset in 13 months.

review_title: She says its very comfortable and she is very proud that she can tell ...
review_body: My daughter loves this watch. She says its very comfortable and she is very proud that she can tell time using it. She likes it so much that when she accidentally left it on vacation we quickly replaced it with the same model for a very affordable price.

review_title: Good quality and great for a little one learning to ...
review_body: Purchased for my neighbors little girl and she was thrilled!  Good quality and great for a little one learning to tell time!

bought this for my 6 year old daughter (and the cars one for my 4 year old son) for Christmas. It's a decent kids watch although this one is never the correct time (don't know if it's user error or if it needs a new battery even though they've had it only a week now - the cars one is keeping the correct time). I'm not a big fan of how the watch band is set up either - it's tightened around a rectangular return slider but the remainder of the band returns underneath and is not fastened. The kids don't seem to mind too much but it's not a "finished" look and I'm considering adding velcro on my own.

I bought this for my daughter for xmas.  She was delighted!!!!  She has yet to actually *wear* it, but I think it's adorable, and it the time it displays is in keeping with my perception of the time-space continuum, so, thumbs up!  I might take to wearing this myself, if it will fit around my adult wrist!
Excellent!!!
Love the colors and style.

My wife and I purchased this watch for our daughter for kindergarten. The watch looks just as it is pictured, so it was a huge hit with our daughter and us. It has also proven to be very durable and capable of handling the rough and tumble play that children can get up to. The elastic fabric ensures that the watch fits comfortably throughout the day wiithout causing any form of irritation or becoming overly snug. This ensures that the watch doesn't slip off and get lost, while also being very comfortable. All in all, this is a great product!

I do wish the boots were higher towards the knees considering the price. Lots of water gets in them just from splashing in puddles. Other than that, they would last for years and years if the kiddos didn't grow so fast. Great for donating once the kids grow out of them.

review_title: works great in all wet and dirty conditions
review_body: my kid loves it.  wears it everywhere there is rain.  i even use it as a "snow boot" with thick socks and seems to work too.  this helps so that I do not need to buy multiple pairs of shoes for different seasons in the same year .... you know, kids grow very fast.

review_title: Cute, easy to get on, true to size (so don't order big for new walkers).
review_body: These boots are easy to get on and comfy for my 15 month old to walk in. He had a little trouble at first, because they obviously feel different than sneakers. I ordered big because I just wasn't sure how they ran and I wanted them to last more than one season. In retrospect I should have ordered a size smaller. They are cute and good quality, I don't recommend ordering bigger than your child's normal size though (unless its a half size).

review_title: but it took maybe 2 outings with them and he was fine. They go off and on easy and that's ...
review_body: keeps his feet dry.  That's all I wanted! They were a bit hard for my 18mo to walk in at first, he's only used to soft shoes, but it took maybe 2 outings with them and he was fine.  They go off and on easy and that's ideal.

These are great! I've tried so many toddler rain boots that are so heavy they just flop off or trip the kids. These are super light, durable, and comfortable. My 22 month old acts like a super hero when she has these on! Seriously considering more in different colors.

These are the best rain boots for toddlers. They are lightweight, flexible and easy for my 2 year old to put on herself. She did so multiple times and seems to love wearing them, which tells me they are comfortable. They are also easy to clean and very durable. She gets compliments every time she wears them. You can't beat a bright pair of pink rain boots on a cute little girl!

My 19 mo old loves these! She won't wear another pair of shoes regardless of the weather and it's been over a month! ;) I believe they are extremely comfortable for her and she's now begun putting them on herself!

review_title: They are very durable and I would say run a tad bit small- I ordered a size up and they are perfect with a tiny room to grow
review_body: My toddler loves these boots! Its his second pair of them. They are very durable and I would say run a tad bit small- I ordered a size up and they are perfect with a tiny room to grow.

review_title: Light weight, non slip, tight around ankles.
review_body: Love these though they are tight around the ankles. This is nice to keep boots from falling off, but make getting boots on tough. Have to do a slight twist to get foot through. Also, no room for pant leg in there. These are incredibly lightweight and have nice tread. I would buy again, but might try a size up.

review_title: Sturdy and easy on/off for our 4-year old!
review_body: My 4 year old loves these boots. Easy on, easy off. Mom win! Our 4 year old even runs in these!

These are fantastic shoes for little ones!  The velcro closure flap is easy to use, even with squirming toddlers.  I will absolutely buy this same style in larger sizes as my boys grow.  Great value, great quality!  I even like the color combination options.

review_title: My kid likes these pretty well. Sand gets under the insoles which are ...
review_body: My kid likes these pretty well. Sand gets under the insoles which are only partially glued down. Seem to be of good quality and comfort.

review_title: ... one year old doesn't complain and his feet are pretty flat so far
review_body: They may not have much arch support but my one year old doesn't complain and his feet are pretty flat so far. The size is very true and they look great. He just started walking a few months ago and transitioned to these just fine. We also have some of the flexible stride rite shoes and I don't see much difference.
Fit fine. Comfortable and durable. However, dirties VERY easily.
No way these are "wide" width shoes.  They're nice and well-made, but they're just plain narrow."

review_title: Only sneakers we use with our kids. They are ...
review_body: Only sneakers we use with our kids. They are quality, fit well and last even for handme downs for our younger one.
My son loves these. Fits perfect for my 3 year old. Good quality shoe.

These have been great shoes for my 3 year old son.  He has gotten months of great use from them.  My only complaint would be the suede portion of the shoes have taken on a whiteish appearance over time.  I suppose that is what to expect from that suede type of material when little kids run around and play in these.  The Velcro has held up just fine and there don't seem to be any issues with quality or weird sizing or anything.
Great shoe for a kid! Comfortable and versatile, my 3 YO loves them! They hold up well and I will definitely continue to order this brand. She also loves that she can put them on herself.

Adorable shoe. Fits ok... The strap doesn't come all the way across the top of my 18 month olds foot. Maybe her step is high not sure. But it looks funny because you could see the Velcro underneath since the strap stops short.
Very cute, fit my daughter very well. Quality is great!
These are very nice quality. I returned them because they were too small, my child is normally a size 6T. I ordered a size 7T. Couldn't get it on. Ordered the next size.

The shoes were great quality and super cute! My only gripe is they are not sized the same as street shoes so make sure you get at least a size larger!  I was not familiar with any type of dance shoes so I was unaware of this and I was in a hurry so I did not read the reviews. Silly me!

review_title: Every was adorable on her and very comfortable says her mommy
review_body: boght these things for our little granddaughter, age 21 months starting dancing lessons.  Every was adorable on her and very comfortable says her mommy!  Thanks again.  Will be ordering more dance apparel from Capezio! through Amazon.
Our favorite ballet shoes. They run a tad small.
Perfect for our toddlers ballet class
I would recommend ordering at least one size up.

I ordered these for my daughter's first ballet class. I do not know about ballet shoe sizing and I ordered these before reading some very helpful reviews on her in regards to the sizing. I ordered 1 size up relative to my daughter's street size but they were too snug around the toe and loose around the top of her foot. I plan on returning and ordering a bigger size.

Really cute ballet shoes!  These have a nice spot on the inside to write your child's name, which is really convenient when they're in a large class and everyone has the same shoes!  The shoe is soft, comfortable and high quality.  I use Capezio dance shoes, so I was happy that their children's line was just as amazing as I'd expected.

review_title: Street shoe size works for us!
review_body: I ordered a size 11 for my daughter who wears an 11 in street shoes, and this fits her well with room to grow.  We can tighten the ties to make up for a little slack on the sides, but the length is spot on.
love it
Cheap watch for a six year old. Enough said.
Cheaply made. Broke within a week. Very cute though.
Poor quality, my granddaughter wore it one day and then band broke.
My daughter loves this

So disappointed! Price says everything I guess.
nice kids watch
This is a first watch for my granddaughter..I love the quality of this..very cute and I think she will love it
Niece loves this watch. Parents like it too.

We bought this watch for our 9 year old daughter and she is thrilled. It is beautiful and easy for a child to use. It also glows in the dark, which is a feature our daughter loves. The quality is very nice and the price is such that we don't have to worry about her wearing it to school and everywhere she goes. A great first watch for a child.

The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because our first one broke within a few days. The watch is a nice color for a young girl, she can read it well, and the band fits her. We've had the second one for a couple weeks with no problems so far. I'll buy it a third time if she breaks it again.
Cute watch, but the battery only worked for a few hours.
Little girl liked it
Didn't last.
very cute and just right for my wrist
I bought the kids size because I am 4 feet 11 inches tall, I often wear children shoes and jewelry.  The watch fits perfectly.  I love it.

my daughter liked it very much

Love it! So much cuter in person! Rating from his wife lol
Great loved it

Awesome

review_title: Good real watch to tell learn to tell time, or to just tell time.
review_body: A+ rating for granddaughter.
This was my 3 year olds favorite gift from her birthday...even though she can’t tell time she LOVES it!

review_title: This is the second watch like this that I bought
review_body: This is the second watch like this that I bought.  My grandchildren love them!  Maybe they will be able to read a face clock instead of just digital!

This was the perfect present for a six-year-old girl, and I delighted in watching her face light up when she opened it. The colors make it ideal for girls, and the elastic, adjustable band makes it work for different ages/sizes of kids. The bonus of teaching kids how to read time on an analog face instead of a digital one is great. Highly recommend it.
Great little watch, surprisingly sturdy!  Daughter loves it, and though she doesn't wear it every day, it does get regular use and has held up very well!

We got this watch for our granddaughter's sixth birthday.  It was a big hit.  The elastic band fits her beautifully and the ballerina design is perfect for her.  The watch face is just right for learning to tell time.  Everyone was excited with this gift.  The warranty is great for young ones too!

First, the description is as it says, I've no blame there. I just hadn't noticed that it lacked any info about a light - frankly, I didn't even know the older ones had one. My girlfriend has had a previous version of this watch, exact same design and colors and such, for quite a while. Yes, she's a full grown twenty-something adult, don't be rude. It finally stopped working fully (and it had been through a lot, water, dirt, sand, so no qualms there), and a new battery didn't resolve it, so I went online to find her a replacement since she loved it and was super excited to find it here.
Granddaughter is 8 years old and has no respectfor property. She loves it and does not take care of it but it takes a licking and keeps on ticking.

review_title: These are made nice. Perfect for my toddler grandchildren
review_body: These are made nice . Perfect for my toddler grandchildren . Nice band , fits well and doesn't bother their wrist .

review_title: My daughter is very excited about this watch. The ...
review_body: My daughter is very excited about this watch.  The one thing I wish was different was the tiny numbers around the clock I with continued to count in 5s all the way up to 60.

So far, these rain boots are just what we were looking for. They’re lightweight and durable and my toddler son loves them. Based on the reviews, I decided to purchase two sizes larger so he could grow into them and since they seem to run pretty small. Other than that, they’re perfect. The blue color we got is nice looking and they seem easy to clean.

Durable and cute, easy to clean, cute colors. We have yellow and green, and the colors are true to the product photos. My one-year-old can put them on herself thanks to the handles. They're her favorite shoes and she wants to wear them even when it's not raining.

My son is absolutely obsessed with his crocs rain boots. He sets them up next to the coffee table and slips into them on his own. He wears them around the house every day. He even wants to wear them outside when it's hot and sunny.

My 3 year old loves these boots.  He can easily pull them in and off.  They're very light weight (unlike his previous Western Chief boots) so he runs all over.  I live that they're so easy to clean.  They are not flexible so I only recommend them for kids of average height or taller and at least 2 years old.  Great purchase.

review_title: Huge. Some plastic off gassing smells. I ordered ...
review_body: Huge. Some plastic off gassing smells.  I ordered a pair of size 12 sneakers and they fit my little  one but she was swimming I  these size 12 crocs. debating another return.
Best toddler rain boots! Easy on/off with the handles and lightweight and flexible. Our daughter doesn't want to take them off.

These boots are adorable. I wish I could buy a pair in every size for my boys. So they always have them to wear. I used the prime wardobe to figure out sizing and colors. I will be buying more of these.
Love these Boots!! They are super light and easy for my daughter to get on and off by herself with the handles!!!

Ordered for my son when he out grew pair that he had. He loves them and is always wanting to wear them; even in the house with his pj's. The boots hold up well for a very active toddler and are easy for my son to pull them on himself. I ordered a size bigger than what was needed so they he could wear them longer. They are a little sloppy when he walks, but not bad considering they are in fact a size larger. Will probably be ordering another pair when he grows out of these.

Great boots! I ordered a size 6M Toddler for my normally size 5M toddler, and they’re perfect. Just the right amount of roominess for growth/bigger socks. She LOVES them! Fun for her to pull on, and easy for me to wipe down. I could see these being a yearly buy.

review_title: Love this shoes on my daughter so much I bout ...
review_body: Love this shoes on my daughter so much I bout her 2 pairs in different colors, highly recommended, I'm a "nike" guy but for toddlers al of their shoes are ugly as hell, this saucony shoes are perfect a look awesome on my baby girl. My wife had to tell me not to get her more than two pairs that's how much I liked them.
Nice quality for the price. I also like that you can't pull the velcro all the way out of the shoe- with a feisty toddler it saves me the hassle of having to fish it back through all the time.
Good shoe and my LO likes it. Decently easy to put on.
Great pair of sneakers. My almost 4 year old loves them.

It's too be expected I guess because it is suede. I bought these because my son needed something light, but I do feel this won't last that long because of it's lightness, i.e. material etc. If you different sneakers to choose from this should last awhile, but as an only shoe these won't last that long with everyday, running and playing type of wear. Since I'm always getting new shoes for my son, then it's okay.

review_title: These are great, my daughter loves the purple ones
review_body: These are great, my daughter loves the purple ones. They wash well even though they do turn a little grey, but my daughter plays hard in these. They seem so comfortable!

review_title: The first were still in good shape, despite a rough 3-year-old wearing them
review_body: Our second pair of Saucony shoes. The first were still in good shape, despite a rough 3-year-old wearing them, she just outgrew them. I get tired of character everything so these are great for us!

review_title: These are great shoes for toddlers
review_body: These are great shoes for toddlers. This is our 2nd pair of them (due to outgrowing the first). The shoes are durable, washable, and easy to put on and off.

My daughter LOVES these shoes. She doesn't continuously take them off (she's 2), she runs everywhere now and is constantly talking about "my new shoes". We've had them for a week so I can't speak to wear and tear yet but overall very happy with them.

review_title: Bad Facric Choice for an Active Kid
review_body: Cute shoe but fabric is not conducive for an active little boy.  I have twins.  One has this shoe, the other has another Saucony shoe made of faux leather.  This shoe started getting dirty and worn almost immediately. The faux leather one was "like new" for much longer.
My granddaughter uses them for her 4 year old ballet class, she only wears them 45 minutes at a time but they are VERY comfortable looking and very soft leather , quality ballet shoes!!
Cqpezio is a great brand and makes quality ballet shoes. I always purchase this brand when it comes to my kids ballet needs. These fit as expected and I would definitely purchase them again!

My four year old  granddaughter has taken ballet for over a year.  The best slippers, the size is perfect, because they are clear what size to order depending on the size of her regular shoes.  Excellent.
Excellent fit and excellent quality shoes. Have bought them for the past 4 years for ballet class.
All Ballet shoes are meant to be small to fit tightly on the foot.  Otherwise they are decent quality.
These are great and I especially love the price!
very good quality and price

review_title: Moisture inside case despite being "water resistant"
review_body: Bought this for our daughter, she was very excited and loved the watch. However, after the first trip to the pool, we noticed that there was moisture in the case and behind the clear dial window. The watch is supposed to be water resistant but it was not. We returned it and bought a Casio, which has worked much better around water.

review_title: Nice watch, smart concept for teaching your child to ...
review_body: Nice watch, smart concept for teaching your child to tell time, but the band sizing feature could be improved. It sizes down to our 5 year old's wrist, but the excess strap has no way to stay tucked.

review_title: I really like this and think my 5 yr old would learn ...
review_body: I really like this and think my 5 yr old would learn to tell time if she'd just wear it. She keeps losing it. For now I've got it put up. SHe hasn't missed it unfortunately.

review_title: This watch is a wonderful tool for little girls
review_body: This watch is a wonderful tool for little girls! Would recommend highly. Its nicely made, the band comes off so it can be washed. Our grand daughter loves the colors and is now interested in learning to tell time.
Can size down really small for little wrists. Perfect for my 5 year old

Easy enough to fit to my child's wrist. She liked the watch and the ability to learn to tell time. The battery didn't last as long as I expected but no big deal. Build quality was fine and the strap seems to be in good shape after repeated abuse.

review_title: I didnt like that the band doesn't hold itself tight
review_body: Cute watch.  I didnt like that the band doesn't hold itself tight.  It loosens by itself.
poor quality > expected better ??

It would be great if it kept time.  I returned the first one we bought to Amazon because it didn't keep time and they sent me a new one.  Had this one for less than a week and it doesn't keep time either.  Not good for a child who is learning to tell time, when it is never the correct time.  Need to return it and find a whole different watch for my daughter.
Cute watch, works well for learning time.

review_title: My daughter love them Very comfortable boots and very light weigh She ...
review_body: My daughter love them

These boots are adorable, and the sizing was right for my child’s foot.  However, by the end of the first day wearing them she has one small toenail that is falling off and the other is on its way.  I was so disappointed, especially for the price.

review_title: Good boots- Order a size up
review_body: These boots are sized short and wide, so order a size up.

I got these for my 22 month old who cannot put on his own shoes yet --- but he can put on these boots by himself and he LOVES them. We actually have to fight him not to wear them on sunny days. They must be quite comfy, too. He wears regular 6/7 size croc sandals, but these in an 8 are perfect, so I would suggest ordering up. He wore them to daycare and the teachers thought he was the cutest thing they've ever seen! Lots of compliments and everyone is happy all around.
These are my grandson's second pair of these boots. He loves them. They are easy to pull on and off.
I ordered this for my daughter and ever since these arrived they  are a huge hit with her. She wears it all the time and enjoys her muddy puddle moment when it rains. They look cool too
Crocs are durable, easy to put on, and so cute! However they run small. I ordered based on my son's normal croc size, and these are smaller. Thinking of returning.
Great! My daughter is very happy with them (and I like that they aren't as heavy as standard rain boots.) My 9 year old wears size 13 in regular crocs and the size 13 rainboot fit perfectly for her.

review_title: I love that they are lightweight for my toddler
review_body: They fit as expected and seem to hold up so far. I love that they are lightweight for my toddler.
Little one was so happy to be able to stomp through the puddles!  They fit as expected (we bought them big to hopefully last the summer). Easy on and off and lightweight.

I've been buying the same style for 3 years. Easy for her to put on and off and the velcro closure is wide enough to keep the shoe in tact. The glitter style is a little stiffer than the fabric ones, but they soften up after a while. Totally recommend, not to wide, not too narrow.
These shoes run WAY TOO SMALL compared to other toddler shoe brand sizes. Order 2 sizes up, at least.

review_title: I love the shoes for my toddler
review_body: I love the shoes for my toddler. He has a wide, chubby  foot. They are easy to get on and off. And they last a very long time. They also come in so many colors. You could always buy multiple pairs to match any outfit.
Love these shoes... Our 5 and 3yo have only worn these as their main sneakers.... Hold up great.
My 3 year old daughter chose this sneaker from a number if sneakers we showed her on Amazon.  This sneaker has great styling.

review_title: Love these shoes, just bought a second pair in the next size
review_body: These shoes are my toddlers favorite. They have great grip and give her solid support. She loves to run and these shoes are sturdy and comfortable. She always picks her "'conies" over her other shoes.

These shoes do not last very long, unfortunately. After a month of intermittent wear, the material on the side of the toe box tore away from the sole. Thankfully, Amazon replaced them for free. However, after a week of everyday wear, the replacement pair looks like my four year old son has had them for six months. I love how super cute they are and how many colors they come in, but they just do not last long at all.

review_title: My girls love these shoes but they do run narrow (and one ...
review_body: My girls love these shoes but they do run narrow (and one of my daughters has a skinny little foot).  I would suggest getting a wide even if your child is not wide, just so that they fit perfectly, and so the velcro raps completely across to the next side.

These fit well, but both my kids have some trouble getting them on. Because of the velcro it is hard to lift the tongue to slide their fat little feet in. My kids are under 5 and I'm sure that it'd be easier for an older child to get them on.

review_title: Difficult to put on toddler foot
review_body: Very cute shoe, but had to return it because it was too small. My 2 year old is just growing out of a size 6, but the size 7 I ordered could barely get on her foot. The main challenge was with the velcro strap. There's not a lot of give to it, leaving little space to stuff a toddler foot into the shoe. And once we got her foot into the shoe, the velcro strap barely closed.
Very very good quality, soft but well protected her little feet.
Perfect for a three year old in ballet

review_title: Good quality and true to size!
review_body: I ordered this shoe 1/2 a size bigger since my daughter is growing up so fast and I want it to last little longer; I also like that it comes in "wide". The lace makes the shoe adjustable, it "hugs" the foot so it is steady while she dances. A question I personally had was if this are true to the street shoe size that she wears daily, and it is! A great buy and will come back again when I have to buy the next size. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
My daughter wears a size 13 sneaker. Ordered these in 13 first and they were just hitting her big toe at the end, but too loose on sides. Exchanged for the 13.5 Narrow size and they are perfect.
These are great quality ballet shoes for the money. My daughter has work th same for over a year and I just bought exact pair in larger size. Great buy!

review_title: Love this ballet shoe. Order two sizes up.
review_body: Order at least a size up. My daughter wears a 6 regular shoe. I had to order a size 8. Fit perfect. So order a size or two up. Perfect for what we needed.

review_title: Perfect for two year old’s first ballet class
review_body: Perfect for two year old’s first ballet class. Took sizing suggestions from previous reviews and they worked out great. Will definitely purchase again when she out grows current pair.

review_title: Very nicewatch. It is simple but the construction is ...
review_body: Very nice watch.  It is simple but the construction is solid enough.  The date and time change are recessed so you need a pencil or pen to set it.  This also allows it to be out of the way and not easy to change by accident.  The band adjusts a long ways from the very small to the very large wrists.  You can easily cut it if you want, but you won't have to, as it has double bands that allow the wrist strap to be kept in place even when extended a long ways.  For the price it is a good buy. My daughter loves all things Anna and Elsa.

I got this for my young granddaughter who loves frozen.  It also helps her to learn how to tell time . Purple is her favorite color,so that was a plus also. It's just the right size for her little wrist.  I'm very pleased with my purchase.

review_title: Nice look, but poor quality watch.
review_body: Nice looking watch.  Has a larger "boy" size face but still fit on my 5 year old after we punched an additional hole.  However, the digital display failed after 5 days.  Thankfully Amazon accepted the return.

I bought this for my granddaughter for her 10th birthday because she wanted a watch. Timex is classic and always a good buy. They are long lasting and constructed to last. I think my first watch was a Timex! Her favorite color is pink so that's what color she got. It is easy to set and the band latch is easy for little fingers. The numbers are easy to read and the second hand moves smoothly. I can't think of anything I don't like about it and plan to purchase from Timex in the future. Her brother saw hers and already let me know he wants a watch for his birthday in June! Your will be hearing from me in the future Timex!

review_title: Looks like a big kids watch
review_body: My daughter loves this watch. She is very petite and this fits her wrist. She likes the leather strap, and the fact that it is not made to look like a little kids watch! She is 9.

The strap looks flimsy although.  Nice readable dial.  Let's see how they endure since I got them only yesterday !!

Overall, I liked the look and feel of this jacket and so did my daughter, but in the end we had to return it for a couple reasons. As other reviewers have noted, the sleeves on this jacket are long. This wasn't a deal breaker for me as the sleeves can be rolled up and it still looks cute. For me the biggest issue was that the snaps make an audible jingle as the wearer moves. I can only imagine how annoying this would be in a classroom or even just in general. This might not be a big deal to others but for us it was.

my 20mo toddler LOVES these boots. we have another pair that were just way too stiff and heavy for a little tot, and she refused to even put them on. but she wants to wear her croc boots every single day, even when we're indoors!

review_title: While light weight and easy for my son to run in
review_body: The area around the ankle was really tight and a struggle to put on. Once on, the footbed had plenty of room for the toes. While light weight and easy for my son to run in, they also leaked from where. I weighted them down in the sink and the insides would get wet, although, I never found a hole or crack.

My daughter LOVES these shoes, and she can put them on all by herself (Age 4). It has made getting dressed in the morning easier because she actually wants to put her shoes on. They are also really well made.

My daughter loves the sparkle and color of these shoes. This is the second pair we've bought for her. She's hard on her shoes and the sparkle holds up as expected. It's not like typical glitter that makes a trail of where it has been. These are also very easy for her to take on and off herself. She doesn't complain of discomfort and if they did hurt her feet she wouldn't want to wear them.
Great shoe for toddlers.  I appreciate the fact that they come in half sizes.  Most toddler shoes do not.  These fit well and the velcro stays put.  Very good traction for climbing up slides!

review_title: Your kid will out-grow them before they wear out.
review_body: Daughter loves them. They have a slick retro look and feel like they can take the types of wear and tear that an kid can dish out. Your kid will out-grow them before they wear out.

My 3 year old son wore these shoes maybe 5 times but not doing anything crazy.  The fabric already has holes in it but the tread is perfectly fine.  We just missed the return date so we are stuck with shoes that are falling apart.  Sad, that Saucony has such bad quality because I had always thought it was a good company.  Definitely, don't recommend getting these shoes.
Love these sneakers. Only comment is that the color looks more Royal Blue in the picture; whereas the actual color is clearly Navy Blue.
Super cute but runs very small. My daughter currently wears a 9 - 9.5 and I got a 10. She says they are too tight.

review_body: Love these well made tennies.  My daughter loves that they are pink but I love the quality.  This is out 3rd pair and they outlast how long the shoe fits.

review_title: but these ones in size 5 were narrow and fit like a 4
review_body: Cute, but tons of glue coming out in between shoe and sole and my girls are now about size 4 in all shoes and Carter's brand size 5 is way big, but these ones in size 5 were narrow and fit like a 4, just replaced them w/ a 6.

My daughter loved the watch. It's brightly colored and cheery. Only problem is that it was a little smaller then what I imagined from the pictures on amazon. The dial was rather small. The other problem is that the strap tends to loosen while my daughter wears it and it needs to be tightened every now and then. Anyhow 5 stars because my daughter adores it. It's her first proper watch.

review_title: Like that it has an elastic strap.
review_body: Bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it! Grandson was jealous so I had to buy him one too. LOL

I got this and two similar ones for all my little girls and they are fine. The oldest can now tell analog time, and it's only a matter of time before the 5ers get it too. Needless to say, they are ruthlessly abusive- I have stepped on them many times and they have never had to be reset in 7 months.

The design is really cute and the material is really good. I have always had good experience with Timex products and this was for my baby girl. Really happy I got this for her and she loves it! (Even though she's too young to even tell time)
Perfect

I like the watch but I was disappointed that it came in the mail and was ticking. There is no telling how long the watch was on. Every watch I've ever bought, you have to remove the plastic piece to get the watch to start working. I just hope my daughter will get to wear it for quite a while before we have to get the battery replaced. It's a Christmas gift. So, it will be nice if it lasts a while. It could have been shipped a little better also.

The watch is great. Just the right size for my 6 year old. Waterproof... Lights up when you press the button in.... Great. CON- the band is terrible. Its a stretchy elastic sort of band. It's terrible... It loosens all throughout the day....she's constantly asking me to tighten it for her. Other then that... Great watch. I may just swap the band out

review_title: It’s cute and my girl love the unicorn which moves along its seconds
review_body: It’s cute and my girl love the unicorn which moves along its seconds. The 5 minutes intervals are written clearly. This watch really serves as great motivation for my girl learning to tell time.
