My 3 year old loves these. The width is adjustable through the strings for the bow. My 3 year old is a 6-61/2 and we had to exchange for a 7 because her toes were scrunched. Great quality!!
These definitely run large, as advertised, by around 1-2 sizes. They are a great quality and if I need purchase another pair, this will be the go-to brand.

review_title: Runs about 1 to 1.5 sizes too large
review_body: Great ballet slipper, just make sure you get the right size.  My daughter, whose feet are on the narrow side, comfortably wears an 8R in most street shoes (with slight room to grow).  The size 9N ballet slipper fits her perfectly (with not much room to grow).

review_title: Great product! I would go one size above street ...
review_body: Great product!  I would go one size above street shoe.

I bought these for my 3 year old daughter for her Intro to dance/movement class. They are very well made and really cute. According to the description, you can order street shoe size to fit properly and I unfortunately did not have time to try and print the size sheet. I read mixed reviews of people where some said street shoe size was perfect and others said that they turned out too small. I took my chance with street shoe size and they are too small on my daughter. I can get them on her feet and she says they don't hurt, however, you can see her toes do not have enough room in the shoe. I'm sure after enough use, the leather would stretch, but not enough to properly accommodate her foot. I am still happy with the purchase and for the short time she wears them, I think she is ok. If she continues with dance, I will probably purchase shoes through dance school or physical store to ensure proper fit.
Fit like street shoes.

review_title: These in size 9 1/2 wide are the perfect width, but the toe is a little long
review_body: My child wear a size 9 in tennis shoes.  These in size 9 1/2 wide are the perfect width, but the toe is a little long.  We just cinch them up with the tie.

Very cute shoes! Bought pink shoes for first day of class but found out then they only accept white ballet shoes.  when I went to return these online they were NOT eligible for return but when I called Amazon customer service they made things right, thank you thank you!

These boots are lightweight and easy for my kid (4 years old) to take on and off unassisted. They are easy to wash, and have held up well so far (about 4 months in).

This is the second pair, new style, of these boots for our daughter.  First pair held up very well for near daily use in fall.  The boot fits as expected and is actually easier for little hands to put on with the large loop at the top.  The old version only has little holes at the top, which proved difficult to put on.  Hopefully these will hold up as well as the old pair

I have searched for boots for my 2 year old and most of them are too heavy and bulky. These are perfect. Extremely light weight and easy to walk in. He has no problem running around in these. And he insists on wearing his boots everywhere. I will be ordering these again in a larger size for sure.

review_title: Rain boots fits as expected of size 13 toddler.
review_body: Rain boots fits as expected of size 13 toddler. It is bright yellow and comfortable to wear for several hours. It repelled water and two handles on each boot made it super easy for toddler to pull up the shoes alone.

review_title: I like that they are lightweight and somewhat snug around the ...
review_body: These were smaller & narrower than i expected, but still fit my 2 year old. Though he will grow out of them fast!! I like that they are lightweight and somewhat snug around the ankle. So far they seem good, but i probably will go with a cheaper boot next time ;)
I love these rain boots! They are a little more expensive than some, but my kids could never keep the other brands on because they were so heavy. These are well worth the extra expense.

Got these for my kindergartner.  The velcro is lasting much better than similar pairs we've gotten from Puma and overall they're easy for a five year old to take on and off independently, plus they look cute, too.  So many hook and latch sneakers for kids look terrible; it's hard to find any with style that don't cost fifty bucks or more (even though they'll outgrow them in four months!).  Overall, I'm very happy with these!

We had some of these in a size smaller and they have held up well and the velcro and deep tongue make this shoe easy to get on and off for a preschooler.  The new ones are stiffer than our older pair, I'm hoping that they'll loosen up as our 3 year old wears them this Fall.

review_title: Cute shoe but wish the straps were longer.
review_body: Really like the look and style of this shoe.  Size was perfect but the straps are to small.  They don't wrap all the way over the velcro.

Our three year old loves these shoes (she picked the color) and likes that she is able to put them on herself.  They are mini versions of actual running shoes vs cheap baby shoes.  She has put many miles on these shoes and they have held up amazingly well.

review_title: These were the perfect shoes for my 2 year old to start learning ...
review_body: These were the perfect shoes for my 2 year old to start learning to put her own shoes on. Without worrying about laces, she could focus on left and right foot into the proper shoes. The only drawback with having a cloth shoe and Ann artsy child is that she has since decorated the shoes and we can't get the new colors off.

These shoes are great quality and super adorable. I want to get myself a matching pair so my daughter and I can be a cute mommy daughter duo. My daughter is just over three a she can easily put these on herself. I will buy more colors. Thanks!

review_title: Velcro should be longer for "wide" shoes
review_body: love the shoes, they look really cute and comfy for my toddler boy who was VERY wide, chubby feet. But I think the velcro should be longer for the shoes that are wide. See pics, it seems that the wide shoes have the same length velcro as the normal width shoes. so it's my aesthetic complaint but it fits well.

review_title: We liked them so much I bought the exact same pair ...
review_body: These are my toddler son's second pair of these sneakers. We liked them so much I bought the exact same pair when he grew out of the first. They look cute and are easy to get on an off. Seem very comfortable as my son never asks to take them off.

review_title: My 2 year old LOVES these shoes!!!
review_body: My son got a hand me down pair and LOVED them so I started the search for the next size up. Luckily Amazon had them. He lOVES his new ones. Great fit and he seems to think they are very comfy.

This shoe is a well put together shoe, easy for the child to put them on themselves since there are no laces and they are stylish! The grey material does not make the shoe look  dirty after some wear and tear because it is a nylon like feeling material- it's not a cotton that would stain. I am not sure what synthetic fibers they are but they hold up great on fast little feet!

review_title: Good watch for kids learning to tell time
review_body: Pros
Great for 7yr old
Cute watch for my little one learning to read time.

This watch does not keep time! It is really cute, and is great for helping kids learn to tell time--unfortunately, the time is not accurate. I have to reset this watch every couple of days. I'm very disappointed in Timex and would definitely not recommend this watch.
Just what I was looking for perfect

My 6-year-old is very proud of her new big-girl watch and takes every opportunity to tell people what time it is. Very comfortable - stays on securely and it's easy to shove it up her arm to wash her hands so that the band doesn't get soggy. I really love how un-cluttered the face is - most of the time-teacher watches I saw had so many distractors on the face - unnecessary decorations and the like - this one is simple, but still pretty.
Nice watch but band tends to get a little fuzzy over time.
Great for tiny wrists and grows with them too. Easy to read.

My daughter loves her watch. I am not to thrilled. It's not to the standard of other timex pieces. The band will easily fall off, it doesn't buckle. The plastic of the watch is thin and light. You can't see from the picture but the minute hand doesn't count off the 60 minutes it goes to 30 then backwards again. Kind of confuses the teaching method of skip counting by 5 for the minutes. Though she loves her big girl watch, it will not last long.I wouldn't recommend or buy another like this.

review_title: Very cute and the hands are labeled.
review_body: It can survive a four year old.  My little girl loves it and she's learning to tell time on it.
My kiddo wears size 6-6.5, so we ordered size 7 - but these are way too small, her toes are all squished already.

review_title: good quality but run a little large in size
review_body: cute shoes but they were a bit big for the size they were supposed to be. My 18 month old would only wear them for a little while before she tried to take them off because they kept slipping. Got us through her baby ballet class though.
My twins wear these every year! They are my go to ballet shoes!

review_title: Sizing is wrong -- these run very small
review_body: The sizing on these shoes is crazy. I bought a full size up for my son and it was way too small. It took buying 2 sizes bigger to find some that fit. Plus, returns are "free" -- they charge you to ship them back. Not a good deal.
Absolutely love these shoes and will continue to buy them.  They run a bit small, but they're great.
Great ballet slippers. There are some cheaper slippers out there, and you definitely get what you pay for with them. These last until she outgrows them! Never a quality issue.
These are good quality, but we're really tight. We're still using them, hoping they stretch a bit. If not we're going to have to buy a larger size.

I've normally purchased another brand of ballet shoes and thought I'd give this brand a whirl. They are acceptable. I didn't care much for the leather in these- they seemed plastic-y. These also ran a bit large. So order an exact size or smaller. They will definitely still get some use, and I'll stick to another brand the next time.

review_title: Great quality for an even better price
review_body: I got these on sale and they were priced cheaper than Payless.  These are far better quality than Payless.  My daughter has no issues with them and loves using them at dance class.  Her dance teacher and the other dance moms could not believe what I paid for them.  They were at least half the price of the ones of similar quality that were at the dance store.

I am super pleased with this purchase! The leather is soft and the shoes are comfy. They run true to size, in my opinion. I ordered a size up after reading the other reviews stating that they were small. It's fine because the drawstring allows me to cinch them down on my daughter's foot for a better fit, but they are roomy in the toe. If I had ordered her normal size it would have fit, I'm sure.
Great watch
My 8yrs old daughter loves it.
The best watch ever!
The watch stopped working in 2 months.  Returns/exchanges should be allowed for 1 year.  Warranty policy is poor since the shipping cost to customer is about the cost of a new watch.
7 y.o. granddaughter loved it.

review_title: Got this watch for my daughter to help her keep ...
review_body: Got this watch for my daughter to help her keep time. Everything she needs to learn how to tell and keep time.

review_title: Very cutewatch.. my daughter loves it
review_body: Very cute watch..my daughter loves it! Seller was excellent. Had a problem with the shipment and it was taken care of immediately. Thank you.
Nice too nice. Just that its little too small.
The watch stopped working after 2 weeks.
I GAVE IT AS A GIFT AND THE LITTLE GIRL LOVED IT.

face got scratched right away- cannot even see the time

a10 gift was a great hit

review_title: My daughter loves these books - Normally the ones she ...
review_body: My daughter loves these books - Normally the ones she picks to wear ... She'll be 2 in April and puts them on by herself :)

review_title: Love these--they are comfy and easy for the kids to ...
review_body: Love these--they are comfy and easy for the kids to pull on.  One problem was that one boot tore when my little girl pulled on it.  Amazon was wonderful about it and replaced it without question.  I just hope the next pair won't the same!

I bought a pair for each of my kids. They are lightweight and don't suction to their feet light other rain boots. These look super cute on them and are necessary for Seattle weather. I have gotten so many comments on these boots.

review_title: He LOVES them.... was splashing in ...
review_body: He LOVES them....was splashing in puddles as soon as we got them out of the box, and on his feet

Great rain boots for a toddler!  Because they're made of the crocs foam, they are lighter than rubber galoshes which seems easier for young walkers like my 17 month old daughter.  Very happy with the purchase.
Love these boots! Very cute and practical for rainy days. Love that my soon can pull them on and off on his own.

review_title: Holds up alot better than regular rain boots
review_body: We sure like these crocs so much went out and bought croc shoes too

review_title: These are great, easy to get on little boy feet and ...
review_body: These are great, easy to get on little boy feet and keep toes dry during romps in the rain and mud. Easy to wash off! They do run small as many people have suggested..so buy a size (or two) up!
Love these so far for my toddler. They’re comfy and seem more durable than the last rain boots we got him which had that rubber thin like fabric which broke and tore over time.
Love these boots! They have held up amazing well and keep our daughters feet nice and dry in the rainy Pacific Northwest.

These are a decent shoe, but are too stiff for my liking and they do not hold up as well as my son's other shoes have. We have had 2 pairs of these shoes and the price and the bright colors are the best thing about them. We will not be getting any more of these, I would rather pay a little more and have shoes that last a whole lot longer.

These shoes are great for my daughter. They hold up fairly well as she wears them everyday to daycare. Only thing I wish is that they were more reinforced at the toes... She destroys the front of the shoe within a couple weeks. Other then that they are adorable shoes and she had no complaints about the comfort

Cute and sturdy! My daughter is 13 months and not walking yet, so I ordered a little bigger than I wanted so she could get used to them. She likes walking around outside on then while holding my hands. Even though they're a little big like I wanted, she could still walk around which was nice.

Purchased these shoes for indoor soccer for my toddler. They are perfect for what we were needing! the velcro is strong enough to hold, but easy enough for him to be able to put them on himself. Looks exactly like the picture. Fits exactly to the size we needed (enough room for his soccer socks to fit in). Other than being on the pricier end for toddler shoes.. since us mother's know how long they will really last, if they don't get beat up too bad.. I can't complain! If anything happens throughout the life of the shoes since they are a week old, I will be sure to update amazon.

review_title: ) love the velcro which helps him understand which foot to ...
review_body: Got these for my son and he loves them. I had a pair for him when he was much younger and was starting to walk and he wore them til he outgrew them. He calls these his "fast shoes" :) love the velcro which helps him understand which foot to put the shoe on.
Love these shoes for my active toddler

review_title: These shoes are not meant for wide toddler feet.
review_body: If your looking for a wide shoe for your child this is not it! I ordered the wide but they were not wide at all. I am pretty disappointed especially since I did my research and this was one of the top 10 shoes for wide feet. I would not recommend this shoe at all.

Bought these for our 13 month old after she was walking more steadily. She wears them everyday with anything and they still look bight almost 2 mos. later. They fit great, stay on her feet,  provide stability, and she can even move about well when she's crawling about. Also, love that they are not pink, don't have a character or flower on them, and that I saved  $10 by buying them on Amazon.

review_title: Good quality, basic shoe at a great price!
review_body: I love the shoes but more importantly my 4 year old loves them.  The Velcro makes it easy for him to do himself.  The colors are nice too and I can pair them with a lot of outfits.  Solid quality so far.

review_title: comfortable and hold up well to an active preschooler
review_body: These consistently fit a narrow foot well, comfortable and hold up well to an active preschooler.
Ordered for my goddaughter.  Not only is it pretty for a little girl but it is very educational. It has already put her on the path of learning how to tell time.

review_title: In two days after receiving this watch my daughter knew ...
review_body: In two days after receiving this watch my daughter knew how to read it. My only concern is that it is so small, I plan on transition to something a little bigger because of that. If you need your child to read the analog watch this is the watch to purchase.

review_title: This watch is great for a kid
review_body: This watch is great for a kid!  It is a fun way to start to learn time.  But, it needs velcro so that the clasp stays closed and the band does not stretch and fall off.
Cute watch. I bought this for my granddaughter who just turned 9. She loves it. Great way to learn to tell time with the outside nos counting by 5's.

review_title: LOVE this. It was hard to find a
review_body: LOVE this. It was hard to find a watch for a small girl to help her tell time. Most of the small ones are digital. The regular ones have too big of faces. This is just perfect!

The watch was working when we received it; however, when we gave it to our granddaughter as a gift 5 weeks later it was not running.  If the problem is the battery, Timex needs to put longer lasting batteries in their products when they are sent or include a replacement. If it's not the battery, it's too late to return.  I am not impressed and would not purchase another of these watches.

review_title: Great for first time watch readers
review_body: Great for a first watch. Helps in teaching time. My daughter is pleased. She doesn't want to take it off.
Durable great product.

Great watch! Bought for my daughter to gain confidence in telling time. She loves it! The pink hour hand corresponds with large pink numbers as well as purple minute hand that corresponds with small purple minute numbers.  The wrist band is nice thick elastic the length is adjustable and she can easily slip it on and off. Very happy with purchase.

review_title: but the quality is good and they're comfortable and my daughter likes them better ...
review_body: Really cute ballet shoes. I felt they fit a tad small, but the quality is good and they're comfortable and my daughter likes them better than her former ballet shoes. Would recommend but maybe size up half size.

I bought these for my daughter's first dance class.  We have had them for 3 months and they are practically still like new.  They more of a tannish pink (not light pink) with adorable little pink and yellow flowers on the inside.  They have an elastic strap on top a very long elastic string that ties.  This is constantly coming untied despite double knots.  They have been very durable and also very comfortable for my three year old.  She was in a size 8 shoe at the time and I ordered a 9 1/2 M.  I am very glad that I went up in size though a 9 probably would have been perfect.  When she outgrows these I have no hesitation to buy them again!

review_title: Nice quality, but a little wide
review_body: Quality of the ballet shoes looked great - rated three stars only because the shoes were too wide, even at a normal width. i had also ordered a half size larger than her current shoe size based on the comments I read. I wouldn't do that again - it made them way too big! If I reordered, I would order her current size at the very minimum - I might even consider trying narrow.

review_title: Good but on the large side
review_body: My 3 1/2 year old daughter grew out of her size 9.5 Bloch Bunnyhop slippers. I got these in a 10, which is her current shoe size. They are fine, but a little on the big side. The laces are ridiculously long, so they come untied a lot. The quality is great and she likes them, and wears them for ballet class. I guess it's good to have room to grow.
Small and I can’t even return it
Look at all the reviews. People said to buy a half to one size larger. Do this. My daughter is a 7ish and we bought an 8W (her foot is wide) and they fit great. You can cinch to fit.

I didn't read other reviews on sizing and the shoes are definitely snug on my 3 year old. I would have gone up another size. But, they aren't so tight she can't wear them. The color is a lighter, neutral pink. I wouldn't call then "nude," but they aren't as pink as the picture.
She LOVED them!!!!!

review_title: The second pair is a good fit-but a tad wide
review_body: The size chart is a tad off-I'd say this item runs small. This is our second pair, the first, we went by the chart and they were way too small. The second pair is a good fit-but a tad wide. I should have ordered the Narrow.

review_title: Good fit--true to shoe size.  Good quality.
review_body: I purchased these for my 4 year old granddaughter to go with a fancy birthday dress.  Although I was concerned about all the warnings and complaints on sizing of ballet shoes, these were exactly the same as her shoe size and fit perfectly.  The quality seems good and she says they are comfortable--wears them all the time because she's always dancing :)
nice watch for kid.
Perfect for a 9 year old .
Perfect for a girl, I guess it might fit an adult too but the design is definitely made for a child.
I gave just one star because two days after we gave it to our daughter it stopped working. I might be the battery but still, it should have come with a new one.
very good

Grand-daughter loves it!

Watch does not work.  Will need to return it.
she loved it! and is learning time very well!

nice products thank you very much for your business
Great boots, I will consider this brand and model for future purchase

if you're looking for a rain boot for farm living, where your kids play and work HARD, then these boots are the best choice! we've gone through many Western Chief boots, they just crack and don't hold up in just a matter of weeks. but since we've switched to the Crocs I've been impressed! I've got 4 kids who work and play hard around our muddy farm and these boots will be handed down to all of them and then some....i'll never choose another brand for a rain boot for the kids again! I highly recommend these! Worth every cent! And, the kids love them. They're easy to put on and off and easy to clean off.  Perfect!

review_title: The Crocs proved to work like a charm
review_body: After a long search, we finally settled on the Crocs Handle It Rain Boot per the recommendation of a friend. Our son is 16 months old, so we were concerned that he might have difficulty walking/running in these boots (many other rain boots proved to be too tall for him, thus making it difficult for him to walk comfortably). The Crocs proved to work like a charm. Our son is 33.5/34 inches tall and we ordered the size 7; he's had absolutely no difficulty walking in them. Please note: in other brands and shoe types (See Kai, Reebok, etc.), he is just transitioning from a size 5 to size 6, but after trying the size 6 in these, we realized that we needed to go up a size (the size 6 was too tight getting on/off and literally had no room for growth). Very pleased with these boots.
Good quality boots, easy for our 2 year old to put on an take off on her own.

review_title: These are great cheap rain boots
review_body: These are great cheap rain boots. We don't get a ton of rain but these are perfect for fall and spring. They are not lined so they are not great for warmth but because they aren't lined they dry easily.
These were a gift for our niece....and she loved them!

My 3 yrs old daughter loves it from the first sight. It's raining season in CA now and she always runs out to play in the rain wearing the new rain boot. Just give her a tool so she will learn to play with the nature, isn't it more wonderful than buying her silly toys?
Perfect for my 2 year old! He loves them! Always been a fan of crocs.

review_title: we love these croc boots with the handles
review_body: we love these croc boots with the handles.  easy for kids to get on and off.  it can be annoying to size though, since they don't do half sizes.

We love these tennis shoes.  We tried to go for another brand that also would "light up".  They didn't have the staying power that saucony has.  My son thinks these are so comfy and amazing.  The bright red color is fun.
Really like the Saucony brand.

review_title: Soles are pretty stiff, but it doesn't seem to slow down ...
review_body: Soles are pretty stiff, but it doesn't seem to slow down my 13-month-old.  They are super cute throwbacks.  We get lots of compliments on them.
These are my daughter's favorite shoes!  Easy on and off and such fun colors!  Everyone compliments them which makes the transition back to school shoes from sandals much better for her.

Supper cute! I purchased these for my 18 month old son give I needed shoes that he could wear socks with. After a couple of days of not wearing them with socks he broke them in and now with thin socks they fit perfect! He has chunky/wide feet. I'll definitely be purchasing more!

review_title: I liked the fitting and the shape
review_body: I liked the fitting and the shape.

Not a great bargain, in my opinion. Too narrow, and although higher quality than bargain-basement shoes, not really worth the relatively high price--especially considering how quickly they're outgrown!
Great shoes for my daughter. The velcro holds tight--we haven't had problems with her pulling them open. She's only had them a few weeks but they're holding up great!
a great show for my kid
These are perfect for the kid on the go!

My daughter loves this watch. I got it for her as they were learning to tell time in school and she felt like the coolest kid in class with her cool watch. She loves that if you press the button it glows bright green in the dark so you can see the dial. And now she likes to time herself when she does her homework. win win!!!!

My 9 year old daughter LOVES this!  It is super cute, comfortable, easy on/off. She wears it every day. She has a little more freedom in the neighbor now and is using her watch..."Be back in 30 min".  She loves the watch and the responsibility! Me too!
This is a cute watch however the band keeps coming undone.

Great little watch for learning how to tell time. Daughter loves it. Battery running slow right out of box which is hugely disappointing. Not worth replacing the battery so basically throw away a new watch she really likes.
This watch looks great, is easy to read, and is easy for my 4 year old to put on and take off by herself.  It's the perfect combination of being a grown up watch and still being a kids watch.
Cute and helps reduce the anxiety of knowing when things will happen, drop-off, pick-up, etc...
Will recommend item

review_title: The shoes made of good quality of material and looks very cute
review_body: The shoes made of good quality of material and looks very cute. The only reason I returned it is because the color of other shoes i ordered (Bloch) more pink than this one. The color on this one looks more of tan/cream. Other than that, it is a very good ballet shoes.
Narrow fits little girl narrow foot perfectly.  Well made, as expected from Capezio.

I was so happy with the price and quality of these shoes.  I purchased these for my 2 daughters' first ballet class.  I have prime, & with free returns, I did order 2 sizes each.  I was able to try them on and pick the best pair for each girl.  The shoes feel nice, and are holding up fine so far (through 4 classes so far, no signs of wear).  Great find!
I like Capezio brand dance shoes. These fit well and looked great.

These shoes are an absolutely perfect fit. They are well constructed, and I can tell they will last all semester. The price is much more affordable than other online retailers. We ordered them in narrow and even though they are not as narrow as I would've liked, they are a much better fit than other brands we have tried. We will be ordering more!

review_title: perfect for my 5 year old in ballet
review_body: Works perfectly for my 5 year old starting ballet.  She has high arches and a very high instep, and has a lot of trouble with Mary Janes so I was concerned she might not be able to fit her foot into the shoe.  But these fit perfectly and she loves them!

review_title: THE BEST TAP SHOE FOR BEGINNERS
review_body: The shoes fit perfectly.  However, I ordered one size larger than my daughters normal street shoes.  She wears a narrow width in both tap and her street shoes.  This is her second pair and she is very pleased and so am I.
My 2 year old wears a 5 in most shoes. I ordered the 6M and they fit perfectly with not much room to grow. I think they are great quality though!

I thought I figured out the sizing by reading the reviews and looking on the Capezio website for measurements, however I still managed to order them too small. Here's my personal recommendation go 1 full size to a 1-1/2 sizes bigger than your child's normal shoe size and they'll be perfect. I ended up returning and ordering 1-1/2 bigger so my daughter would have some growing room. Other than figuring out the sizing, these are the best ballet slippers!

review_title: Great to save money on these well made shoes
review_body: Great to save money on these well made shoes. The shop which specializes in dance wear sells them for a lot, lot more!!!
I bought this for my six year old and she LOVES it! Easy to read and totally age appropriate. I purchased because Timex produces good quality watches.
Very attractive.

This watch will be a Christmas gift for my grand daughter (she's new at telling time thus no digital watch). I am pleased with the number of holes in the well crafted leather band which closes with a buckle. The numbers are clear and the watch face can be lit with a push of the stem. Lovely little watch!
I got this watch for my daughter that's 8. She loves it and it's very easy to tell time on.

review_title: Perfect watch for eleven year old girl
review_body: The Timex watch is just the perfect size and easy to adjust the time. As all Timex watches that go back to the time of John Cameron Swayze, I am sure that this girl's watch will have a lasting value and ability to keep the accurate time.
Very good product. Nice looking watch.
Watch is great but battery is already dead.
This is a GREAT watch for the price. Very nice color, nice size for a small wrist, and although it DOES NOT light up, still a great buy!

This watch was bought as a Christmas present for our 6 year old granddaughter who is always asking "what's the time now?" to encourage her to work it out for herself.  The numbers are clear and easy to read but she was particularly taken with the back-light facility - and pink is her favourite colour!

review_title: Great watch for a great price.
review_body: We gave this to our 11-year-old daughter for her birthday and she loves it!  I trust the Timex will last a very long time.  The light feature was a bonus she loves as well.
Wearers it a lot!

very satisfied

review_body: These boots are great for rain, muck and even snow. The kids wear them constantly. We have bought them for years now and they have help up great. (& I have super rough and tough kids!)
Super lightweight which makes them 10 times better than regular boots!

review_title: A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY PARENT!!!

GREAT product and the awesome thing is, you can wash them inside and out in your sink.  I would buy these again and again and my child loves them.  They are cute too!!!  The best purchase ever.

review_title: Runs very large. Had to return. Did not ...

review_title: They are perfect--and I love that the handles make it super easy for both ...
review_body: I bought two pairs of these boots for my two and three year old kids. They are perfect--and I love that the handles make it super easy for both kids to put them on by themselves (a major mommy win)!

review_title: Seemed tight/not easy to get on
review_body: We returned them. A friend had the yellow ones for her son, which are cuter than the blue, I think. Our son wears a 7.5 tennis shoe, so I bought an 8 in these. Seemed tight/not easy to get on. Returned them.

review_title: she played and jumped into water pools withe them happily!

We just keep coming back to buy the next size as she grows. We love these boots!
My child loves them. He tried them on inmediately and they fit perfectly.
They're great as long as you know that they run small. My daughter is a size 9 and she's wearing the 9.5's. This is her 3rd pair. We love them!

review_title: Look great. Decent fit. One downside...
review_body: They fit my son well except for the strap across the top. Looks like they will stop being able to close across the top of his foot before he actually outgrows the shoe. We have had other shoes with this problem so I guess he has chunky feet.
Great fit son loves them

There's plenty of space around his feet when they are (finally on), but getting them over his normal little ankles is a pain. I dunno, maybe it's just us, but these were disappointing.

Unfortunately, these seem to be made in a different factory from regular crocs. They are so flimsy that the first time my six year old Grandson pulled them over his feet, the handles broke and also ripped the sides of the boots down around two inches. My son wears these all the time. They work really well for water but are probably not a warm boot. Have held up through 6 months of semi regular wear.

I thought we had a mold problem in our mudroom until I figured out it was just the sneakers! After trying the washer, baking soda, vinegar, direct sunlight, these have to be tossed. Such a disappointment.

my 4 yr old daughter calls these her "fastest shoes".  She wore them until the toe got a hole from her very rough use. They were super comfortable for her and they are super easy for her to put them on herself. They are adorable on !

I have a very active toddler and these have served him well. They are really easy to get on and off but also stay on well. They fit well and are great for running and playing. I highly recommend it!!!

review_title: These are the best rain boots I've found for kids

review_body: I bought them large so my little guy could wear them next winter, too.  They go on nicely but look a little goofy when he sits down.  Pants don't stay over them and, for a boy, it's hard to tuck them in.

My son loves these. We ordered up because I read they run a bit small and they do so I'm glad we ordered up. I love how lightweight they are and so far he has been wearing them without Socks and no stinky feet!

Easy to get on & off.  I got these for my 4 year old son so that he can do more outdoor stuff with me without worrying about tick bites,  I let him "practice" wearing them for a few hours first, we went out to run errands & eat dinner.  After that practice, he is very comfortable walking and moving in them.  He loves to wear them so I have to assume that they're comfortable.  Sizing seems exact.

My 3 year old son and I both love these boots. He is able to put them on and take them off with no help. They are very durable and he loves to wear them. He also loves that we can add the little charm things so they are now "batman boots".

I got a size 8 for my son. Fits great with some room to grow. They are easy to slip on and perfect height for puddle jumping. He loves the handles for putting them on himself. I love that they aren't as stiff and hard to put on as other rubber boots. Overall very happy with this purchase!
Adorable. Light-weight. Perfect for little ones. Love the handles. Only thing is that THESE RUN SMALL. 2 sizes up might not be a bad idea. Other than that, Love everything about them.

Perfect rain boots. So lightweight, and no cracks or crevices to get dirty. Order at least a whole size up - my 22-month old currently wears a size 6 pair of Natives, size 6.5 pair of Kid o Fits, and size 7 Gap boots (which are still too big on her). For these rain boots, we had to get her a size 8!

If your child has narrow feet, they gap along the sides.  The first time I ordered her normal size and her toes hit the end so then I did have to order 1/2 size up from her normal size and pull the strings all the way tight.  They will work well enough but even in a narrow I found them to be wide on her foot and run a little small.
Great product as usual.  She will outgrow them before they are worn out.  No rubs on first wear, so great fit and very soft interior

This is my second pair of these for my son.  I have a little ballet dancer rather than a ballerina and they are required to use black shoes.  This is his second pair and they seem to do the job.  His last pair show no signs of wear and he wore them for several months, but out grew them.  They do fit tight, so I went with the wide width and a 1/2 size up this time around and he has some room to grow.

There's a lot of confusion regarding sizes and fit. I highly recommend printing the Amazon shoe size chart. My daughter's foot came a little bit under a size 2 (although she wears a 1 on street shoes). I ordered ballet slippers in size 2, hoping they would fit right, not too loose. They are perfect! They are a little bit bigger than her foot thus giving it room to grow (and I won't have to buy another pair in some months!). It's exactly as I expected them to fit. My recommendation: follow the Amazon chart, not the current street shoe size.

Next time I just know to get a size up though

Goodness knows that one will get left somewhere immediately. This one is fine for the meantime and though it needs to be reset often, it looks schnazzy on her wrist and that is what matters.

review_title: comfy and easy for little ones to put on
review_body: Very light weight, comfy and easy for little ones to put on. My daughter loves hers!

First time I've ever written a review but I just had to because these boots are AMAZING!!! I have 7 & 5 year year old farm boys and we have gone thru our share of mud boots. I won't buy anything but these. PROS: All one piece,  no more breaking handles when they get stuck in the mud. Lightweight so they don't get heavy when caked with mud. No pesky liner on the inside that falls apart/gets lost / gets wet. When these boots get wet, I just wipe then out with a paper towel and they can wear them again immediately. The croc rubber is amazing. Doesn't Crack and break like all other rubber boots. They are definitely worth the money as they are the only boots that have never fallen apart from all of the heavy farm use they get.
Actually waterproof with no seams to leak!! Only ask is that it was a little more stretchy to get on and off
I have purchased 3 pairs of these boots, one as a birthday gift and two for my daughter! She loves them, so easy to slip on and comfortable!
Love the little handles on the sides. Makes it easy for toddlers to pull them on. Easily cleaned. Good quality.

review_title: My son LOVED these and they looked like they were good quality ...
review_body: My son LOVED these and they looked like they were good quality but after only one month of occasional wearing BOTH ripped from the handles. I'm SO DISAPPOINTED.

absolutely the best rain boots for toddlers. my daughter is 2 and she can get them on and off herself. the handles are wonderful. super durable, easy to walk in and a breeze to wipe off if they get muddy.

review_title: Love how lightweight these are and how nicely made they ...
review_body: Love how lightweight these are and how nicely made they are. They fit my son perfectly and he loves how easy they are to get on and off. Love the color!
great shoe savers for working in the mud and dirt

review_title: Best rain boots to buy for your child on the market
review_body: That's the rain boots my daughter has a pair and my son has a pair both of them get compliments every time they wear them fun and easy for them to put on by themselves
Only rain boots my very active 4 yr old hasn't managed to destroy in less than 3 months, and he wears them all the time, and plays hard.

I found these boots for my son last fall at a used clothing store. He has wide feet and most rainboots are impossible to get on him. He loves his Crocs so much that when he grew out of his first pair, I bought him another. The little handles are great for him to pull the boots on himself, they are really lightweight, not clunky like a lot of rainboots and there are no seams for leaks or splits.

review_title: the 13 fits great. Other rain boots seem heavy
review_body: My daughter wears a 12.5, the 13 fits great. Other rain boots seem heavy, I like that these are lighter. My daughter is clumsy and we don't need to add another variable on rainy days ;)

My son can pull these on and off by himself! He thinks he looks like Boots from Dora. These are great, waterproof and comfortable. The only problem is that there is NO ventilation. My son's feet get pretty gross after a short amount of time in these boots. The good news is they can both be easily rinsed.
Love these boots, this is our second pair because my toddler outgrew the first. They are light weight, hold up really well and the handles make them easy for my little guy to get on by himself.
Great rain boot. Super light weight. It’s our second rainy season buying them

review_title: got this for my 3 year old grand daughter she ...

My youngest loves her ballerina watch. I'm shocked at how well she has taken care of it actually. The band is adjustable for her tiny wrist. The watch hands are clear and helpful for her in telling time.  She loves that it has indiglo!

review_title: Daughter says to give it 5 stars.  She's an easier grader than I.
review_body: Daughter loves it. She says she loves it, despite not actually wearing it for the most part.

review_title: Great watch for 8 yr old girl
review_body: My daughter picked out this watch herself and it is great.  The Indiglo light allows here to read it at night.  The little butterfly that moves around with the second hand it cute too.  And the fact that it's waterproof lets me not worry if she wears in in the shower.
muy bueno

This was a perfect gift for a three year old. She is so excited that it has not left her wrist since we gave it to her. She loves to tell us what time it is and the fact that she can push in the bezel and the face lights up just makes it even better.The band is very soft and easily adjusts to a small wrist.

My 4 yr. old granddaughter loved this watch so much it made learning how to tell time so much fun for her. The watch fits her tiny wrist and will grow with her. The face decoration is pretty and is not too much to distract the time she is trying to tell. She loves to wear it.

Purchased this for my great niece.  She loves this watch and is having lots of fun learning how to tell time.  Her parents are also happy about her learning discovery,  but is now dealing with minute by minute announcements of the time of day.

Perhaps we got a defective one, but this watch doesn't keep time. It loses minutes throughout the day. Whenever our child goes outside, we have to check the watch to make sure it is accurate so we don't run into check-in time problems.

After much researching and looking around (seems we do more of this for our grandchildren than we did for our own children!), we purchased this watch for our 4 year old Granddaughter for Christmas.  She is very sensitive to itchy, tight and scratchy things, so we needed to find the perfect comfy watchband and fit for her wrist.  This was it!!  She put on the watch immediately and hasn't taken it off except for bed and bathtime!  She loves that the face lights up, too.  We also love the fact that it is helping her learn to tell time like 'we' did, instead of time being told to us with a digital watch.  This timex watch meets our expections and the smile on our granddaughter's face is priceless!

review_title: My kiddo really loved these shoes
review_body: My kiddo really loved these shoes. The color is really bright!

This is our second pair. We love these shoes. Only downside is the difficulty of cleaning the suede leather. Our first pair were brown and I would recommend purchasing a color that can accommodate the abuse of your toddler.

review_title: easy to apply to your toddler
review_body: easy on wins these shoes big points in our household. the combined nature of the two straps into one is a nice bonus. the shoe itself is wider than our other tennis shoes, but i think that makes them a little more comfortable for chubby toddler toes anyway. my son is comfortably wearing these in 5.5, puma's in 6, and sorrel snow boots in 5/6 right now. he runs everywhere he goes and loves to get his shoes to put them on!
Light comfortable shoe. Nice design. I like the colors. They fit just right.

These shoes are adorable & my 2.5 year old loves them. We ordered in pink & the white part (logo) on the sides has muted pretty sparkles. Based on other reviews, I ordered 1/2 a size up & they fit perfectly with a little room to grow. They seem to be very comfortable, as my daughter loves to run & jump in them.

Bought these for my newly minted 2 year old for his birthday and the half size was the key ... Initially tried the 9 and it was huge so we exchanged for the 8.5 and they fit perfectly for my guy who is growing out of his size 8.  Plus the bright color is great for spring and distinguishing him at the park.  His size 8 Saucony were washed several times and are still in good shape so hoping the same here ...
Love these shoes! The best fit we’ve ever had!

Happily surprised that these fit well, are constructed well and our little Man walks very well in them!  Glad I found this color on sale. (Green). All other colors were too pricey for a baby shoe. I will buy these again if I can find the discount.

Originally I bought some reebok for my almost 3 y/o daughter, they were too narrow. I returned them and got this ones, I guess my girl has a little bit wide feet and this are perfect and you can adjust them fine. She says they don't hurt and she likes them a lot and me too :-)

review_title: I love these shoes and plan on buying them in the ...
review_body: I love these shoes and plan on buying them in the future. My daughter will not take them off ! She loves them.

These are great little shoes that look good and and work great, we had to reorder because the size 6 toddler was way too small, had to order size 8 and it was a perfect match. Amazon has a fantastic return setup which is easy to use but buying  these shoes would be even better if they would match their sizes to the US sizing better.

review_title: but this is kind of quite a hassle and a guessing game that could easily be avoided with an accurate size chart
review_body: WAY too small.  The sizing seems to be way off.  I've returned the pair and ordered 1.5 sizes up - hoping they will fit.

review_title: Great black ballet shoe for little boys
review_body: We bought these for our son (4 1/2) on the recommendation of a friend, and they are a good fit! They are a little long on him but he will definitely grow into them. The adjustable tie is great! He does complain that the inside where the elastic strap is sewn in itches his foot, which is the only reason I am giving them 4 stars instead of 5. They are holding up quite well!

review_title: Great Shoes! My daughter loves them!
review_body: I was having second thoughts on whether I should buy online for my daughter's ballet shoes, but I had to get her a pair somehow. The deal maker for me was based from the others' reviews, and because I don't have a choice in my current place, TBH. I don't want to get her shoes that won't fit now so I'm NOT buying her a size up. so Thanks to the other reviewer who said that this specific model of Capezio ballet shoes is sized as street shoes, I got the exact size perfect for her, great quality, she loves the details, they're soft to put on, and not slippery when used :) thanks, thanks, thanks!!!

review_title: Couldn’t ask for a better boot!
review_body: So lightweight and easy to put on, great in the rain and the snow with wool socks - this is our second pair.. we LOVE these boots and I’ll probably buy them every year.

They still fit and are comfortable enough for her to wear, but initially she complained that they were too tight.  Now that they have stretched a little, she loves them and has no complaints.  If your kid has a wide foot, these are not for you.

My daughter loves these. She currently wears a 7 1/2, so I followed the advice of other reviewers and ordered a size 8. They fit perfectly (with just enough room to grow). The color is a very bright green, very true to the picture.

very small face - i can't read the numbers.... but she can, and that is all that matters.

This watch was purchased as a gift for our 10-yr.-old daughter. The product was exactly as advertised, and our daughter loves it. It has a very comfortable fit and it's very easy for her to operate. The return/exchange policy was another bonus. Great product - we would definitely purchase another.

review_title: Daughter loves it & really tries to learn!
review_body: My daughter wanted a watch that was easy to read & that was waterproof. I wanted one she could learn from. I think this is a great combination. She loves the color too. My only complaint is that the words "minute" and "hour" on the watch hands are so small you can't really read them.

review_title: Easy to fit on her wrist and she says it ...

review_title: pretty good for an inexpensive watch
review_body: My daughter has been wearing this nonstop for four months, pretty good for an inexpensive watch.

Watch arrived quickly. Packaged good. Battery wasn't dead upon arrival like other reveiwers experienced. However, did die about two weeks after purchase...lol...thats why I gave it 4 stars not 5. Good tool to teach my daughter how to tell time and has held up good. Washed the band in the dishwasher and held up fine.

Buy two sizes larger! But it’s the only shoe I’ll buy!

It just means she will need the next size sooner now. But the shoes are excellent quality and price. I will continue to buy from here.

She used them for the first time for her first recital and she was comfortable in them.

looks exactly like the picture, no surprises. fit seems pretty true to size. could have a little more leeway with the velcro.. it never seems to reach all the way across to the end. not a big deal they don't come undone or anything. good price for something toddlers grow out of so quickly.

review_title: Saucony, Camo and Velcro? =  Win X 3

review_title: Super cute. My little guy was excited to get ...
review_body: Super cute. My little guy was excited to get them. So far they've held up well, and he's tough on shoes. Would buy again.

review_title: They're easy on and she runs around really well in them ...
review_body: My daughter is wearing 6.5 shoes so I ordered a 7 thinking she could grow into them but they already fit. My daughter loves them! They're easy on and she runs around really well in them I'm glad I didn't order true to size though.

review_title: Expensive, but a great toddler shoe
review_body: The price is very expensive for a toddler shoe, but them have good tread, hold up well to lots of wear, and are quick to get on and off with the velcro. Our child has large and wide feet and they still work, though the velcro doesn't pull the whole way across, but still fastens fine.

review_title: They show dirt pretty easily because of "suede-like" material
review_body: Buy this style of shoes for my boys continually as they have grown from age of 2, now at age 5. They show dirt pretty easily because of "suede-like" material, but wash and wear well over the course of 6-8months. Absolutely durable quality.

My daughter usually leans backwards in her shoes.  But this pair of Sauconys has changed everything.  The engineering design that was chosen to build these shoes is 'top notch'!  She is able to stand balanced and thus is able to walk and play in these shoes much easier than some cheaper brands.

review_title: Good Timex Watch but without Indiglo!
review_body: The Timex watch was good but I returned it as I thought it had Indiglo. It seems some versions of this watch have indiglo and some do not. Overall it looked pretty good but since I wanted Indiglo for my daughter to read the time at night, I had to return it and get another watch. The good thing about an analog watch is that kids can't tinker with it too much. My daughter has a digital watch now, but she keeps messing with the various buttons which change the settings.
Very nice
Nice size watch.  Very pretty color.  Nice starter watch for a young child.  This was for an 8 year old.

I've always loved Timex.  This is a perfect simple watch for young children to learn how to tell time.  The band is soft and comfortable.  That has been an issue we had with previous watches being to rigid and chunky.  This timex has been worn during sports and PE and seems to hold up well.  For the price and quality, I like the watch.
Great watch for price!! My 8 year old daughter loves it.

My 5yo and 6yo daughters asked for a "real watch" after they each received an analog watch for Christmas last year, neither of which kept the correct time.  We purchased this watch (and the one in light blue) after reading the reviews and our own experience with the Timex brand.  This watch has more than exceeded their (and our) expectations.  The soft-buttery leather strap fits nicely around their wrists - it is not too big (they can wear it on the tightest fitting).  The watch face is large enough for them to read the time, altho' as young girls it doesn't appear to be too big in proportion to their body.  As well, second-hand has helped them learn more about time.  The Indiglo Light is a bonus for fun, altho' now they insist on wearing their watches to bed (even tho' they each have a digital alarm clock).  As well, the water-resistant feature is a plus because they still like to get messy and clean up on their own.  This is a great watch at an excellent price that I expect they will own for some time and will grow with each of them into their 'tween years.

review_title: Perfect fit for my perfect little ballerina!
review_body: My daughter wears an 11 shoe so I bought a half size bigger and it's perfect.  There are drawstring that make it nice and snug feeling too even though I think these will last her all of her dance season!  Can't beat the price for a shoe of this quality either.  Oh, and I got them the next day without paying for overnight shipping!  Sweet

If you already know what size to buy, the quality of the shoe appears just fine. (Hence the 2 stars) I ordered my child's street shoe size, as suggested in some other reviews, and they are at least 2 sizes too small. I would advise either buying a few pair knowing you will be returning the extras, or going to a store for your dancer's first pair. My town has no store that sells ballet shoes so my options are limited.

review_title: My daughter loves these and they have held up very ...
review_body: My daughter loves these and they have held up very well over the last year. Sizing was tricky though. I read a lot of reviews in order to get the correct size.

Quality of Capezio is always good, I'm a stickler for material weight, and Capezio always hits the mark. Sturdy, but bendy, still comfortable, and my daughter never complains, as she has done with other cheapo dance clothes and shoes that have sloppy scratchy stitching or glue. Fits as expected.

review_title: Overall I am satisfied with the order
review_body: The shoes are incredibly tiny! The fit very snug as dance shoes are expected too. I ordered up a size and a half and they barely fit. Overall I am satisfied with the order. I ordered ballet shoes from two other vendors and had to return them. I would order the Capezio Daisy again from this site.

review_title: These are great ballet shoes for my four-year-old
review_body: These are great ballet shoes for my four-year-old, but just beware! They run very small! Size up about two sizes.
The simple leather ballet shoes are perfect for my four-year-old's beginning dance class

They do run really small. My daughter wears a size 4 in shoes & I ordered up like the reviews recommended . I ordered a size 6 & they fit perfect. I almost wish I would have ordered 6.5 so that she could get a little more use out of them since toddlers grow so fast!

These shoes are so great, my daughter loves them.  They do not feel like cardboard like some others do.  I love the longer laces that allow you to actually tie the shoes tighter if needed.  Great price as well, so of the stores that sell them have such poor quality and they are pretty high priced.  Glad I looked on amazon.  This is the second pair I have ordered.
I ordered a toddler size 10 and I got a c6 that was way too small. I had to return it. I'm not sure how you can avoid getting the wrong size if you order this; they're great boots otherwise.

Great rain boots, bright, easy to put on and off, very lightweight. Doesn’t look slim on kids feet, pretty wide, but both my daughters loves them.

Best rain boots ever!  I will be buying these in every size from now on.  We've been wearing Crocs for years and this is the first time I've boughten the rain boots.  Partly because they are more expensive than most rain boots but I see why now.  They are super light and very durable.  They wash up great and my son LOVES to wear them.  He's 4.  My daughter who is 2 and doesn't have these rain boots (has another brand) is always putting these on and wanting to wear them around the house.  They are super easy for toddler to put on because the handle and the handle is very sturdy compared to other rain boots.  We had a pair of Fireman Western Chiefs and my son broke the handle very easily on those which is what prompted me to try these.  Because these are so durable, I will be able to pass these onto my daughter.  We paired these with the Skip Hop Monkey Raincoat (which I also highly recommend as we will be able to pass that onto my daughter as well).  I will be buying these in every size for my son so he can give to his sister when she grows into this size.
Fits as expected but my 2yo’s feet were all pruned after wearing it for 8 hours.

the children seem to not be that excited about the books.  surprisingly they are a bit tough to get on and off.  they do have a wide toe box which is not easy to find.  I think thick socks or liners would be good as they seem less cozy than the traditional rain boots that have lining. these don't have lining.

review_title: Based on past reviews we had high hopes and I love that these boots have lived up to every expectation
review_body: I recently ordered these boots for my 3 y.o. who is quite active and wants to be independent. Based on past reviews we had high hopes and I love that these boots have lived up to every expectation. They are lightweight and easy to pull on. He can wear them all day long without any problems and we love the color options. His feet are on the wide side and they provide plenty of room (he is an 8.5 wide and I ordered him a size 9). Like others, I am not a fan of Crocs, but these are definitely worth the purchase. When he outgrows them, I will be buying another pair.

review_body: Bought these for the toddler.  She doesn't mind them, which is high praise; I love the ease of securing them with the large velcro closure. Good support and she runs well in these.

review_title: Nice durable shoe for a toddler who is always bouncing ...
review_body: Nice durable shoe for a toddler who is always bouncing off the walls and easy for my 3 year old to get on and off by himself (when he wants to).

review_title: Like these shoes! Versatile, dressy or casual!
review_body: These shoes are good for errands and outside play. They are cute and versatile; you can dress them up a bit with nicer clothes, or go casual. They haven't faded and I still like them! And I'm very picky, ha ha.

review_title: Great shoe but the periwinkle color is not my favorite
review_body: Great shoe but the periwinkle color is not my favorite. Quickly looked dirty, much different than others we've had. I'll be sure to continue to order darker colors in the future.
I like these for several reasons but most of all because my 2 year old can put them on himself. They are very cute shoes and match almost everything he wears.
A bit narrow but so cute on my son
This is the Second pair we bought for our son. Great shoe. Will buy again.
These shoes made my daughters feet stink. They are super cute, but don't produce a super cute smell. I even washed them and she wore them the next day and they smelled just as bad.

It is nice for kids

Timex tick all the boxes for me, great for young and old, my kids had Timex watches through their school years.With a year guarantee, relible and robust and a great price, this model for an eight year old was received with delight. Delivery was spot on too.
I sent this watch to my 6 year old grand daughter in California.  She loves it and is learning to tell time.

My 8 year old daughter has a small wrist, so I was looking for a small bodied watch like this.  It seems to be of decent quality but the band is far too long - long enough for a smaller adult to wear.

review_title: Great but no battery and no indigo

I was uncertain which size to order after reading the reviews and most reviews I read to order a wide size and i did just that. My daughter's current size is 9M and I ordered a 10W, which they were a bit too wide for her foot. I ended up washing them by hand with cold water and hang dried them which they shrank a bit and now they are not loose as they were and they fit just perfect.

Perfect

Glad her dance class only lasts 4 months!)
My toddler was thrilled when she opened these and put them on for the first time! Fit great and good quality!

review_title: Good quality material and nice color
review_body: Good quality material and nice color. I bought a size of US toddler 7.5 median, but the shoes is 1.5-2 size smaller than regular US toddler size. So I ordered a second pair toddler US size 9 wide barely fit my girl, whose current shoes size is kid 7.5.
Ballet slippers good quality, ordered her regular shoe size but slippers too small  I gave them to the instructor to give to a child who didn't have slippers. Perfe CT fit for her. A happy ending!
Got these for my toddler after an ill fitting pair by another brand was a complete disaster. These fit like a glove amd she looks so adorable in them. Capezio never disappoints.

review_title: I have had many timex watches over the years and assume that this one is just as great. This is a holiday present so won't know
review_body: Bought this for granddaughter because it had the Indiglo feature which intrigued her.  It definitely has the indiglo button and lights up the background.  I have had many timex watches over the years and assume that this one is just as great.  This is a holiday present so won't know how it performs till then.

This is a great watch for beginners at time telling. My daughter loves the butterfly second hand and the reversible band. My only complaint is that we have to keep it a little loose so she can slide it on and off her wrist, otherwise we have to under the whole watch each time. It would be nice if there was a real clasp that could open and close easily.
Minutes are correct until 30 and then go backwards.  Waiting on the third watch hoping  this one is usable.
My daughter loves this watch! No backlight or light up face, but that's ok. Seems to withstand light play, water splash.

review_title: Confusing for kids learning to tell time
review_body: I really like this watch and my six-year-old daughter does too, but it is a little tricky helping her learning minutes. The numbers count down from 30 to the top of the hour so instead of looking like it is 3:40 it looks like it is 3:20 (because it is 20 minutes to 4). She is getting the hang of it now, it is just a bit of an annoyance,

This watch is great for my 4-year old niece.  It has her favorite colors (pink and purple), yet it doesn't have princesses on it (which everything else usually does).  Plus, it displays the time in increments of 5 minutes which helps her to read the time correctly.... for example 5:45 p.m. rather than reading it as five, nine.
Nice looking but battery was dead when received.

review_title: do not waste your money on this
review_body: peace of trash. always shows incorrect time sluggish all the time even after battery has been changed. had to throw it away. do not waste your money on this.
Great watch to help your child learn how to tell time on!
My granddaughter loves it. She doesn't believe it's a real watch because it's plastic so she is constantly checking the time.

review_title: Pretty watch; hard to set time
review_body: Very cute and my 8 year old niece loves it.  It even fits her small wrist.  The main problem is setting the watch.  There are no instructions.  There is one obvious button but nothing happens when you push it.  I looked on line and saw a second recessed button so went back to the watch and when you use a pen point to depress the recessed button, you can set the time with the obvious button.
gift

review_title: Quality, ease and cuteness all in one
review_body: These are great for my toddler. I liked the price point. They are super hip looking too! They are maybe a tiny bit stiff but he's active so they have loosened up. Super easy to get on and off.
Very nice good looking sneaker for my boys. Seem very comfortable and he loves them. Wear them all day, jumps in puddles, gets them dirty and I even through them in the dryer on low. No issues.
They are narrow and stiff as a board. There is no cushion or arch support. They are an ok play sneaker but I wouldn't want my kids to be in them all day.
My daughter LOVES these.  She calls them her "sparkly racing shoes."  They go with pretty much everything and I love that she will wear these practical shoes just because they are also sparkly.

My son complained that his feet hurt while wear these. I tried flexing them and realized they are quite stiff, so I think this contributes to his comfort level. He still asks to wear them sometimes because he likes the green accents, but I try to avoid putting them on him when I know we will be doing a lot of walking.

The suede makes for a tough cleaning task but thankfully my son doesn't seem to get into terrible messes. He wears them daily and they're a good fit. He doesn't pull these off and they go on easily. They're a good price and haven't shown much wear and tear.

review_title: These are super cute and my granddaughter loves them but the arch ...

review_title: Perfect first watch for little girls
review_body: Perfect first watch for little girls learning to tell time. Easy to read and just the right six for small wrists.

review_body: It is great, and my daughter loved it, however, being a kid, she scratched the plastic surface within a week (not that I expected my 6 yr old to do any differently really). But if it were glass, it would've endured much more, however it would've costed more as well. I guess one things goes with the other.

Great first watch for my 4 year old. Love that the hour and minute hands are color coordinated with the numbers. She loves the butterfly also!  Easy to get on and off and live that it's water proof so she doesn't have to remember to take it off when she washes her hands or paints. Great Christmas gift for my peanut.

review_title: She is beginning to tell time and I thought this would be good for her
review_body: I bought this watch for my daughter. She is beginning to tell time and I thought this would be good for her. My only complaint is that the face scratches very easily and kids can be pretty rough on watches.

review_title: Easy to read display, comfortable, good for small hands
review_body: The watch has a good display; the numbers are clear and easy to read.  What I really like about this watch though is that it fits nicely and comfortably on a small hand.  The ones with the plastic bands can be a little uncomfortable when the band is made as tight as it needs to be to fit a small wrist. In contrast, the fabric is nice and soft on little hands.

Great little watch. Works well, clean, clear numbers and words. Love the stretchy band. And it helped "time" make sense to my daughter (as opposed to a digital clock). The face is a hair small with all that info on it but still okay. My one issue us with the strap closure. The strap end loops through a metal double bar but has no buckle or velcro to secure it firmly. My daughter puts it on fresh each morning so it hasn't fallen off (yet) but it loosens a bit as she wears it. Still, I love it and would but it again.
My granddaughter loves it.
My daughter was very happy with this watch.
it is rough design

beautiful & great price. They run snug, if your child is a true 6.5 in shoes then the size 7 toddler will fit precisely. The only con is the laces in the front come undone very quickly

My 5 yr old has very narrow feet -- we had to order online as the dance supply store didn't carry the narrow size we needed.  Only thing is that the strap could have been made a little tighter, esp on the narrow version of the shoe. (BTW it was cheaper on Amazon than at the store too.)

My daughter always had problems with shoes that have straps on them as they are so tight that they leave a mark on her foot and extremely uncomfortable.  This ballet slipper is great because it is comfortable, it fits right and the strap is sturdy enough that the shoe won't slip out during dance class but not so tight that it hurts her.  Am very happy with this product.

review_title: Basic ballet shoe with an annoying bow
review_body: This is a basic shoe, perfect for beginning ballerinas. It's much better than many of the slipper styles I've seen at certain low-price shoe retailers where you pay less. It runs true to size and is easy to slip on and off.
These are great, the only problem is the strings constantly come undone.

I have my daughter wear these as indoor shoes at daycare because she is a bit of a brute and if I were a toddler about to get trampled, better that the assailant be in a soft soled shoe. This is our second pair for her and while she wears a 7 in all other shoes, she wears an 8 in these. They hold up better than most of her shoes and are very cute.

review_title: True to size. Keep in mind the width.
review_body: These are true to shoe size. Most kids will be "N", which is narrow. I made the mistake of initially ordering a medium width, and they didn't fit, as ballet shoes need to be snug all the way around. The medium was very loose and puckered around my daughters' feet. All in all, a good deal though.
This is a great pair of slippers.  Very comfortable and well made.
Again, 4 stars due to having to return for a larger size. We initially ordered an 8, but had to return for an 8.5. Order 1.5-2 sizes larger than street size.
Bought for my granddaughter.She wares a size 2.Tryed some in stores 2 was big 1 was small the shoes were not soft! These are perfect!

So I decided to still give this product a try despite the reviews saying that the sizing is way off.  I measured my daughter's feet carefully like one reviewer suggested.  Her foot measures a little less than 6", which would be between size 8 and 8.5.  I went ahead and ordered her a size 9 and it still didn't fit!! The problem lies in the company stated shoe size vs the sizing info provided by Amazon.  The shoes itself only measure 5.75" which is not what the sizing info states for size 9. Her big toes are curled up inside. So now, we have to return the item and pay for shipping because according to Amazon, it's not their fault. Really cute shoes, but yeah, the sizing is like playing roulette, you never know what you would get!

These are perfect.  I read the reviews and considered them when choosing the correct size to order.  It was confusing because one Capezio style was not supposed to be true to size, but this style was.  I did find this style to be true to size. My daughter is about a 7.5/8 in street shoe, and I so I ordered a size 9, and she does have some room to grow as I had hoped.

I always love Capezio's product, either in clothing or shoes.  They fit just right, what I love most is that they come with the elastic already sewn on.  Years ago, the elastic came separately and you have to sew it on, such a hassle, now no more hassle, and the shoes are made better too.  Great job Capezio!

review_title: No complaints except the laces do not stay tied no ...
review_body: No complaints except the laces do not stay tied no matter how hard you pull. May just need some use.

review_body: My daughter has wide/chunky feet. After reading reviews, I bought one size up and in the wide width and they fit perfectly with the string adjustment. She wouldn't take them off when we got them.

My daughter's feet run on the wide side, but not hugely wide.  I bought the 9.5W and they fit great on her feet.  She loves putting them on and wants to wear them all the time.  I take this as a good sign for the shoes.  They must not be too tight and hurt.  Would recommend them as they fit as expected.

We switched ballet studios so my girls needed white slippers instead of the black we already have.  I was nervous ordering these because so many people had different things to say about the sizing, but the price was great so I gave it a try. I actually ordered them both the size they wore in another brand we'd tried on in in a store because those ran 1/2 a size to a size bigger than their shoe size.  I ordered one the narrow and one the medium because one has wider feet.  They both fit great, although both could have gone with the narrow - I just tied the other ones tighter and they still worked great.
Bought this for my grand daughter. She loves it. It's tough enough for a little girl who is relatively (read very) hard on accessories. :) Keeps good time so far.

review_title: The band is a nice, soft

My 4 year old got this watch in her Christmas stocking.  She won't take it off!  I love that it does not spin around her little wrist and is obviously comfortable for her to wear.  The colors are very cute too!

I got this watch for my 7 year old- but the minute increments on the left side go from zero at the 6 up by 5s instead of continuing sequentially after 30 back to the top of the hour, so she's having a hard time using it. Wish they had just kept the numbering going for 35 past, 40 past etc to make it easier for kids to learn to tell time. Back to digital for us.

review_title: ... has another pattern of this watch which works just fine, for some reason my 7 yr old's runs ...

review_title: My review for my Indiglo Flower Watch.
review_body: I gave this watch a five star rating because five is better than two and I am very happy with the watch and it helped me learn to tell time with an analog watch. I would also like to say that the band is so beautiful and I love the way that the watch can light up in the dark. I would definitely recommend this watch to all my friends that are six year old girls.

This is the perfect watch. I bought it as a present. A ton of children's watches don't have all the numbers, and it makes it difficult when learning how to tell time. This is perfect. All numbers, and something a little girl would love to accessorize.
Timex watches were a perfect gift for my granddaughters  at Christmas.
Cute little watch that works as it should.

review_title: Runs about 1/2 size small. Wide shoe which has ...

Velcro "U" shaped closure is a little short and gives my 2 and 3 year old a little trouble at least this first week with them.  5 year old has no trouble.  Glitter is brighter than I expected in silver shoe, but has stayed in through almost 2 weeks and 2 soccer practices.  I'm surprised but I have not found glitter anywhere on my floors.

review_title: They go on easily and the velcro is a bonus because I don't ...
review_body: My little girl wears these shoes all day long.  She can play and run in them also.  They fit true to size.  They go on easily and the velcro is a bonus because I don't have to tie shoes all day.  They are super cute.  I LOVE the color combination.

review_title: These shoes seem to run a bit smaller and narrower ...

Very highly recommend these shoes for a young toddler! We have had 7 pairs over the past couple of years (due to growth spurts and color variety) and we just LOVE them! My son complains when he wears other sneakers, but these are fantastic!!!
