review_title: Sold on Saucony for Toddler Son
review_body: I have been buying this shoe in this color for my toddler son for a year now- just keep going up in size as he grows. The cobalt blue color goes with everything and is cool.  The Velcro is super easy to fasten.  The streamlined fit and thinner sole make it easy for him to walk and run but also have held up well showing little wear or dirt.  They dry quickly and aren't too hot in summer or too cold in fall.

review_title: cute, wish they came in wide width
review_body: The only reason I'm sending these back is because my toddler has wide feet. If not for that we would definitely keep them.  As it is we're going to go a size up. They're cute and not fussy at all!
Super cute shoes but too narrow for my toddlers foot.  Had to return.

these are cute but not very functional and kind of clunky.  the straps are u-shaped so they don't come out of the shoe, which means you have limited room to stretch open the shoe to put your child's foot in.  my 21 month old daughter has to jam her feet in every time and she doesn't have particularly large feet.  she hates it and i won't be buying these again.

Sneakers are super cute however, very narrow for my 2 year olds chunky feet.  Although I was able to get his foot inside the shoe, the strap didn't have a chance of closing.  The return process was seamless and I was refunded within a day.

review_title: ... loves her new shoes and says they are very comfortable, fit was as expected and the colors are ...
review_body: My daughter loves her new shoes and says they are very comfortable, fit was as expected and the colors are exactly what you see in the picture.

I bought these for my 3 year old son who is just barely out of a size 8. I thought they'd be a little roomier. Length seems good, but despite appearing wide, and his feet not generally requiring extra wide shoes, the velcro can only come halfway over!
We love these shoes for our 2 year old! So easy to get on and off, which is the main reason we bought them! My son loves them!

review_title: The look of these shoes would be great if My son could wear them
review_body: The look of these shoes would be great if

My son LOVED these shoes. I bought them and he grew into them and he has worn them for a month. Well today they somehow ripped on the side (the sued like part). So I'm pretty upset. I'm still going to let him wear them but it's going to get worse. Definitely wish they had lasted longer.

We really like this watch. It's easy to read, cute and small enough for there tiny wrists. My only complaint is the it gradually gets bigger through out the day.. But for a learning watch it's a great tool!
Love it! I am allergic to metal so I can wear these with no problems!

review_title: ... for our granddaughter and I am sure she will love it!
review_body: BIrthday gift for a July birthday for our granddaughter and I am sure she will love it!

I bought this watch for my 6yr old daughter and it is a very cute watch for the price. The only thing that I didn't like is that the battery didn't last long. Please be sure to buy spare batteries also.

review_title: Nice watch for a kiddo learning to tell time
review_body: Cute and adjustable. Will make learning time easier!

review_title: My daughter begged and begged for awatch. She wore it the first day of school ...
review_body: My daughter begged and begged for a watch.  She wore it the first day of school and the band frayed beyond use.  If I had known this band was this flimsy, I wouldn't have purchased it.  It should be more durable for children seeing as it is a child's watch.

review_title: far it has held up great.
review_body: My daughter loves this watch.  She wears it daily for the past two weeks.  So, far it has held up great.
My 5 year old is learning to tell time. Love the simplicity and cute colors. The best part is the adjustable stretchy band.

Got two of these for my granddaughters.  They loved them and the watches are marked so it is easy to learn how to tell time.  I also like the fact you can send in $10.00 and the watch will be replaced for a small fee if anything ever goes wrong.  The lighted Indigo feature is a big plus as well.

These watches are wonderful for children learning the nuance of time.  There are small numbers at the edges reminding them that if the big hand is at 10, it is 50 minutes after the hour, etc.  They are comfortable, and inexpensive enough that the kids can wear them to school without worry.  They are NOT water proof, so need to be taken off before showering or swimming, but can endure almost all other activities.  My granddaughters wear theirs always and I believe it helped them to learn time quickly and painlessly.  The batteries are long lasting.  They come in a wide variety of patterns and colors for both girls and boys.  You really can't go wrong with these watches.
I've bought several pairs of the Crocs handle it rain boot in different colors as the kids have grown. They are light weight but sturdy. Kids love them and can get them on by themselves.

These boots rock! Easy to clean-they dry quickly too. My son has no problem getting them on. We wear rain boots year round and they have held up very well. Will definitely be ordering in the next size up.
Bought these for my 5 y.o. She doesn't have any trouble getting them on or taking them off. They are very lightweight. They look extremely bulky, however.
Bright and fun color. Easy to slide on and very durable for a hyper boy

Based on other reviews, I ordered a size up which was essential.  My toddler wore these with thick socks for about a month at the end of winter for short periods of out door play (15-20 minutes)  She continues to demand them regularly, even on days when there isn't a rain cloud in sight.  They have very little visual wear.

review_title: They fit him great. Easy to put on and take off
review_body: My son absolutely loves these boots. They fit him great. Easy to put on and take off! Light weight!

review_title: super lightweight and easy to get on and off even ...
review_body: Bright color, super lightweight and easy to get on and off even for a wide-foot pre-schooler. Love them!
Ankle area is really small so hard to get my kid's foot through.
Fit well, easy on and off. Super cute with lots of compliments. Keep her feet dry and warm.

My kid loves these boots!  He can get them on and off by himself at age 3, and my daughter will even put them on she won't be 2 for three more months~ he seems to be very comfy in them.  I even caught him sleeping in them recently!  I did remove them because he feet get hot and sweaty in them
good
My grand-daughter who likes everything pink is very happy with her watch.  It is a Times brand and I am sure will last her as long as she continues to wear pink.

review_title: Little big for a 5 year old but it adjusts just fine.
review_body: Cute watch. Little big for a 5 year old but it adjusts just fine.
Perfect size for a young girl & Timex even replaces the watch for $10 if it's lost within 1 year.

I get that this is a kid's watch, but since I had trouble finding a pink band or watch I liked, I decided to go ahead and get this for myself. The hands are HUGE and really believe most every kid could read the time with them being HALF the size they are. I also think the band is quite large for a kid, but then again, sturdy is the name of the game with kids. Otherwise, it's a fine watch.
My 7 year old granddaughter loves her new pink watch. She was excited to show me it glowed in the dark.

VERY NICE LOOKING WATCH FOR A LITTLE GIRL,  AND AS WE ALL KNOW TIMEX HAS BEEN TESTED, TRIED AND IS STILL TRUE...  I GOT TO ADMIT IT DOES SEEM THE BAND WAS MADE IN CHINA, AND THAT DOES BOTHER ME SOME...  BUT I FEEL THAT AMERICA SHOULD TAKE CARE OF THEMSELVES AND LET THE REST TAKE CARE OF THEMSELVES...  BUT ALL IN ALL A GOOD PRODUCT...
Too bad, she already had one.  It's OK.  She'll probably lose one of them.  I need to see more thing for little ones.
nice simple watch for young child, my eight year old daughter loves it. she especially likes the light on it.
I really am happy with this item. Perfect for a first watch for my eight year old daughter

I bought these for my 2 year old. I don't feell ike her foot is necessarily wide, but the velcro barely connects. Other than that, we love this shoe and plan on buying it in other colors. The shoe fits well and does seem to bother her feet at all.

review_title: they look just like the pic. great show, For a narrower foot.
review_body: Great, cute shoe. They are too narrow for my 2yo(29mo,30lbs). The velcro is about a full inch or more too short so it almost closes at the top;

review_title: I love these little shoes SO much for my little girl
review_body: I love these little shoes SO much for my little girl, I'm thinking about ordering another pair in a larger size so she can wear them longer!  SOOO cute!  They're probably a little narrow, but so are my baby's feet!  For her, they're perfect!
My son LOVES these shoes. This is the third pair we've bought because they are so durable and such high quality. Every time his feet grow too big, we pick out another pair.

review_title: well they were nice looking shoes
review_body: Tried to put these on our son, but the velcro strap did not seem to reach across the top very well. Size was correct, but the just seemed to slim for his feet. Oh, well they were nice looking shoes.
My 2 year old wears these on a daily basis and they are holding up very well. She gets tons of compliments on how cute they are!

review_title: so we bought up a size and they seem to be very comfortable on him
review_body: Bought these for my son who has odd shaped feet.  He's probably a slightly wide foot, so we bought up a size and they seem to be very comfortable on him.

This is the 2nd pair of these shoes I’ve gotten for my daughter.  Last year she had the purple ones.  I love these!  The only thing I don’t like about this particular pair is the silver gets dirty easily.  But other than that, great shoes!  She can easily put them on and take them off herself too.

review_title: Good looking, high quality, and easy care.
review_body: High wuality and good looking shoe.  Works wonderfully for daily wear and hikes. My 3 year old daughter loves her shoes, and chooses these over most any other pair.  For as expected (toddler size 8).  Washes well (throw in the washer and tumble dry) and holds up well.  Highly recommended.

My daughter lived in these when we first got them. They look just like the picture, and fit wonderfully.  I posted a review of another Saucony todler shoe- one with unfortunate velcro flap placement- and these are the BETTER alternative to those unworkable shoes.  I will likely buy another pair in a different color.
Good Quality and very comfortable

review_title: Lovely watch but can't figure the strap
review_body: The watch is cute and accurate and our 8 year old daughter loves its looks. The elastic band is comfortable, however, she has a very small wrist so the band is too long and hard to manage (get out of the way - otherwise it covers the watch). The open end of the band seems to be specially hardened so if If I shorten it, I am afraid that it will fray. Will have to figure a way around it.

It appears to lose about 3 minutes every hour.  Going to change the battery and see if this fixes the issue.  Also, the watch is cute and I bought it for my 2nd grader to help her learn how to tell time.  The seconds are by five (of course) until you hit 30, then move backwards to 0.  I didn't notice this when I ordered.  It is very confusing for my daughter, which is unfortunate.  We were looking for one that simply counted by 5's all the way around to 60, something simple to help her practice.

Bought as a present for a 5 year old girl. She is very slight and the watch fits her wrist perfectly. It adjusts easily and the elastic band  makes it easy for her to take it off and put in on by herself. The hands are adorable, miniature ballet slippers. The screw on the side also lights up the face. 5 out of 5.
Arrived broken

My 8 years daughter likes it. It is light weight and the time is accurate. 2 min late per week. Good for the price. The plastic cover is not very clear compare to her old watch. The watch band doesn't have a fastener to fix the length, so it is easy to put on but also easy to get loose. She needs to adjust it very often.

The face on this watch helps kids to learn to tell time on a real watch!  It is nicely done on the face with readable numbers making it easy to describe/teach the way you should tell time.  The band looks to be very sturdy and the hearts and butterfly theme was an IMMEDIATE hit with my granddaughter.  So far I am really impressed!

Daughter loves it.  The clear face came off in about a week & we had to epoxy it back on.  The alarm woke her at midnight for some reason and she had not set it-perhaps did it without knowing.  She says it's comfortable.
Bought this for one of our grand-daughters - she loved it! Hoping it will help her learn to tell time correctly. She's in first grade and loves to learn!
My Granddaughter loved it----absolutely adorable for a nine year old!

review_title: A little crude. The clock has a scratch on ...
review_body: A little crude. The clock has a scratch on the glass. At least 7-8 years old children should wear much bigger in size.
perfect for her
My doughter really like color and dsign of thist swatch.
Very good!
Daughter loves it!
Bello watch my niece was happy
xmas gift
My cousin she love it.
Cool
Kid Loved It!

The shoes were pretty but I worried they would come small so I bought them a half size too big and guess what? They arrived a half size too big.  Within 15 minutes of my granddaughter twirling around they came off because they were rubbing the back of her heel and hurt.  The price wasn't bad but I have seen them cheaper at Target.

review_title: So far these have worked out great for my 3 yr old's once a week ballet ...
review_body: So far these have worked out great for my 3 yr old's once a week ballet class.  They tie in the front has a nice long string which can be easily tied and tucked into the shoe.

Very nice quality shoe.  Fits based on shoe size which is nice, no guessing and is accurate too.  The elastic strap is very heavy duty, will not stretch out like some versions we've purchased at Payless, etc and the shoe is well constructed.  Bows do not stay tied, but no ballet shoes we've purchased have.

For tots who are not used to snug fitting shoes these are tough to get on... Otherwise simple ballet slippers that won't be worn too long before they move on to a bigger size :-) or decide dancing isn't for them. Good enough for the investment.
Fit great
These were tiny, almost like doll shoes.  I wore this brand growing up, but my granddaughter couldn't get them on.
It's too big!

Ordered 2 sizes larger than her normal size per the reviews, she typically wears a 6, so I ordered an 8 narrow. They are a smidgen big, but they'll work out just fine. Good quality as far as I can tell, would recommend.
Good value.  Ballet shoes of this brand cost more on other sites.  The shoe was just as nice as the ones we purchased from the studio her first year... for much more $.

review_title: They are great quality and always fit beautifully
review_body: I have purchased these many times for my daughter!  They are great quality and always fit beautifully.

review_title: Could not get the right shoe shipped to us
review_body: We repeated this order two times but always got the wrong shoe shipped to us.  It was supposed to be a gift for our granddaughter but we ended up shipping them back and cancelling our order.  I don't know whose problem it was but we were assured the second time that we would get the right shoe - it didn't happen.
Seem to run about  a half-size small, if the shoes we received are representative. But well made and child likes them.

Good, light shoes.  Kids can put them on themselves.  Our 4 yr old loves bright colors and these should last a few months.  As others have noted, the top velcro strap is a bit short but it isn't a big deal as it closes sufficiently.

This shoe is completely flat across the bottom and very stiff.  My toddler, who loves anything pink, refuses to wear them because she says they are not comfortable.  I also noticed significant decreased mobility the one time I convinced her to try them. Do not buy.

review_title: Cute style and good price but no go
review_body: I actually need to request to return these. They were much smaller than anticipated. My 2.75 year old instantly told me they hurt him when we got his foot in.
Great quality, excellent grip on sole. Ankle opening does not appear to rub my son's ankle and the velcro has been helpful in teaching him how to put on and take off his shoes.
Nice retro look.  Easy to put on.  We bought two pairs.  : ]
Great item, fast shipping.

review_title: Perfect for you little girl. Highly recommended...
review_body: These shoes are adorable. May fit my little girl perfectly, they are not too heavy and easy to put on and take off! The glitter is fabulous and doesn't seem to come off. I'm very happy with this purchase and my little one loves the shoes.
Very cute, and nice quality, but they were too small.

review_title: My son loves his new rain boots. He is ...
review_body: My son loves his new rain boots. He is 4 and is a size 9 toddler shoe (like a 8.5). i bougt him 10 and  it fit a little bit bigger  (the size is a little smaller than regular shoes) but he can use it perfectly with socks.
These are great just beware if your kid has chubby legs they will be TIGHT!

Finding rain boots for a toddler ended up being quite a challenge.  I read the previous reviews on sizing and followed their advice, bought a size 7 for my son who is currently a 5.5/6 and they fit great.  He loves wearign these because they are so incredibly lightwegiht he has no problem running and climbing.  I can't speak to their longterm durability since we have only had them a week, but so far we love them!

review_title: These are THE BEST boots for kids
review_body: These are THE BEST boots for kids... they are SO light and allow for hours of play. We live on a small homestead and these are great for running around in the dirt, chasing chickens and running through sprinklers!

review_title: My daughter seems to love this rain boots
review_body: My daughter seems to love this rain boots.  It's so lightweight and easy to put on/take off.  You need to order a size up though (that's also what the saleslady at the brick and mortar crocs store told me).  I'm glad I listened
I love these so much I bought a second pair for my little guy. They are nice and light. Great rain boots!
Kids love them - easy on, easy off, fun colors, and dry feet...what more can you want.

The kid loves these. It doesn't rain enough to wear them daily but he gets excited when he can. They are one solid piece so no leaks. They are also so light I don't see him clunking along. Highly recommend these boots.

I ordered up a size base on reviews but I don't think they run small at all (luckily they still stay in even though they are a size too big). These are too cute and the best feature to me vs other rain boots is how light they are. My 3 year old loves Peppa Pig so these are her "muddy puddle" boots.

These adorable boots just arrived in the mail today.  They fit true to size (my 2 year old wears size 7) and she was able to hold on to the handles and pull them right on!  They are really light compared to other rain boots and she's been wearing them in the house all day since they came.  Can't wait for it to rain!

review_title: This review is due to the confusing information on whether ...
review_body: This review is due to the confusing information on whether the watch has indiglo or not. The one I received most certainly does not have indiglo. The quality seems passable, worth about $15 at most. A very basic and simple watch.
Very cute!
very nice watch
My Granddaughter LOVES this watch.
Easy for children to read!
My daughter loves it and it fits her small wrist perfectly.
So cute and nice looking and the numbers are very clear.
I picked this watch up for my daughter, it is perfect. The size, water resistant and the color are all very nice features with this watch, plus it's a Timex so it has a good name.
It's good but smaller than I thought.
I liked this because the band is sturdy and will withstand being worn by active little girls. Timex is always a good buy.
Great learning watch. Just wished the minute numbers were larger or face was larger. Perfect band for kids...adjustable and comfortable!
Love this watch. I bought it for my granddaughter's 7th birthday. No buckling, just slips on and off!

The watch is very cute and my daughter loves it. However the strap which is fabric stated to fray on the first day of wearing. I would eventually replace it with a regular strap but other than that the watch is perfect. I especially love the glow in the dark feature and the very cute second hand.

this is a really cool watch and my youngest granddaughter was quite excited to receive it and needed to have it put on right away.  I would have preferred if the strap was a Velcro vs the buckle.  I just think it would be easier for a little kid to put the watch on and take it off.

Arrived on time and working well so far.  Kids like glow face so we'll see how long the battery lasts :).  Strap is nice as its a bit stretchy.  So even though it has a normal sizing buckle on it, it stretches enough for a kid to take it on and off.  Got one for each kid (ages 5 and 3) and they love them.  More like one of their accessories vs using it for it's intended purpose, but fun!

Arrived on time and working well so far.  Kids like glow face so we'll see how long the battery lasts :).  Strap is nice as its a bit stretchy.  So even though it has a normal sizing buckle on it, it stretches enough for a kid to take it on and off.  Got one for each kid (ages 5 and 3) and they love them.  More like one of their accessories vs using it for it's intended purpose, but fun!
my girl won't take it off... she loves it - would be better if it had full count on minutes... weird purple/pink thing doesn't make sense to daughter... did i say that she loves it?

I ordered this watch 2 months ago for my daughter's 8th birthday. She loves it and wears it constantly. It is working great and has survived being worn into the bath tub several times. I would recommend this watch.
Nice kids watch with a dead battery

review_title: The time piece was cute and great for young kids just learning to tell time
review_body: Had trouble with the band staying put.  it kept lengthening on her wrist and would get too loose.  The time piece was cute and great for young kids just learning to tell time, but she couldn't wear it.
Adorable, got a matching backpack
perfect for our young granddaughter
my little Angel is happy and I'm very satisfied

review_title: just in time for her birthday and it is nice and durable
review_body: I purchased this watch for my 4 year old niece and she absolutely loves it! It came in a timely manner, just in time for her birthday and it is nice and durable.
Broke within 2 weeks

review_title: Old daughter is in LOVE with
review_body: Works well 8 yr. Old daughter is in LOVE with watch
Great watch
The internal components became disengaged after wearing it three times. Junk!
like it.
Very happy with the looks of the watch.  Christmas present for grandchild.
Perfect
Good quality. Sizing is correct
Great product and speedy delivery
Loved the shoe but too small for her toot.
Right size fit

review_title: Great quality, but don't order up too much...
review_body: Ordered a 1.5 based on reviews,  but they were way large.  My daughter wears Street 13 but has a pretty narrow foot.  Her ballet teacher couldn't even fit them.  Back they go.  The four stars is for quality,  lovely soft leather, comfortable.

This is the second pair of Capezio Daisy 205 ballet shoes we've purchased for our little dancer.  In my opinion they are perfect for the beginning dancer.  I love the shade of pink, (doesn't have an orange or brown undertone like some ballet shoes), the strap is plenty sturdy, and our daughter likes the flower design on the inside.  There is also a name tag in the inside of the shoe where you can write your child's name.  The price is also reasonable.  Our local dance shop was charging $19.99 for the same shoe.  Capezio made a great beginner ballet shoe with this one!  Will purchase again.

Great shoes. But run small. My toddler wears 8/9  i bought these size 10 considering the reviews an theyre still small. She has wore them but will not last for another month. It is best to buy two sizes up.
I sized up and she is swimming in them. I'd recommend trying the true size or only half a size up if you must.

There were conflicting reviews about what size to purchase for a child. Some said street shoe size, others said 1 or 2 sizes larger.  I ended up ordering a size 12 for a size 11 foot.  The shoe is a little big, but I was able to pull in the elastic bow to make it fit better.  I'm pretty sure the 11 would've been a perfect fit, but I'm ok with room to grow. But the slipper itself is beautiful and so much softer than the Payless brand.  We'll be ordering more of these.
My son loves these shoes. The Velcro is strong and they seem really comfy!  Held up well for us.
The shoes are cute. But I'm sending them back. My son wears a 4.5 so I bought a 5 thinking he could grow into them. They were so tight on him I could even close the Velcro straps.

After six months of wear, these shoes have held up very well.  They're easy to get on and the Velcro straps keep the shoes in place. These have been worn almost daily by a very active four year old and they show very little wear and tear.  Will be ordering another pair as soon as he outgrows these

review_title: I completed the process to return these shoes before the ...
review_body: I completed the process to return these shoes before the 30 day period; however, I didn't make it to UPS in time. My daughter isn't able to wear these shoes because they are TOO small...they run very small. I really need to return these shoes for a refund.
A very good shoe that fit as expected and in which my daughter enjoys running around.
We are on our fourth or fifth pair, these are fantastic for kids who are learning to dress themselves and we love all the colors to choose from.

This is our second pair of Saucony sneakers for our little guy.  The first pair has worn very well, so we bought the next size up for the Winter.  His normal size is a 7, and he can wear both 7 and 7 1/2 in these.  The velcro is very strong and makes these so easy to wear.  So cute too!

review_title: I bought these for my grandson and they fit him ...
review_body: I bought these for my grandson and they fit him very well. He is also able to walk very well while wearing them! I would definitely purchase again! We have also received a lot of compliments on his cute little shoes.

review_title: Great price for one of our staples
review_body: Great price for one of our staples. Our daughter needs arch support especially since she is not a great walker at 3yrs old. Therapist recommended stride rites and stride rite store said this was one of their better shoes for arch support. Love all the color choices.  Thx Amazon
But not because they've ever worn out!

review_title: He wears them pretty much everyday to school
review_body: My 3.5 yo son absolutely loves these. He wears them pretty much everyday to school. I got them a size bigger (10) but he doesn't seem to have an issue with it. They're great for any wet weather.
Wonderful quality!

Second time ordering these boots! We just love them so much. So many other rain boots are very heavy (average I've seen has been around a pound and a half) having a small child every time I needed to pick her up or she would get in the car seat the boots were so heavy they just slid off her feet or she would get tired from walking in them due to the weight, these boots are so lightweight and durable, they don't bother her feet at all and loves to wear them all day long! The handles make it extra easy for her to do them herself which, being miss independent, is perfect! they fit well although they are a little big, I buy them her usually size and there is always a little extra room to grow. I ordered her a size 8 the first time and she wore them until she was a true size 9, now that she is a size 10 she will definitely have room in this new pair to last her a while! Highly recommend.

We live on 10 acres in SWFL and it these are the best shoes for my boys to avoid the attack of stickers, cow poop, and small ant piles. Not to mention they are great for when our property floods. Easy to clean, easy to wear. Just don’t leave them in your car for too long or they will shrink!
I was loving these boots for my one year old, until they ripped while pulling them on. They are only 6 months old and have not been worn very many times. Very Disappointed.
My niece loves these! I guess she will be splashing in lots of puddles.

review_title: Not sure these would be good for every day all day wear as they are ...
review_body: Not sure these would be good for every day all day wear as they are a sort of plastic, but for outdoors, mud etc, they are great. Mud clears easily from tread A+++!

These require the correct position to get onto tiny feet, but are worth it. They are significantly lighter than regular rubber boots which makes moving for my little guy much easier. Definitely recommend for kids, especially clumsy toddlers.
These are super light which is great, makes them easy to walk in.
My two year d is obsessed with the.  He wants to wear them all the he time.  The are perfect.  Keep him dry in the playground and in super rainy days.

I bought this watch for my daughter, to replace a watch of the same brand and make which lasted just over a year before the hands stopped moving. I brought the old watch to a jeweler/watch store to have it fixed or have the battery replaced, and was told the battery was fine but that this kind of watch couldn't be fixed - Timex didn't make any replacement parts available. So I went ahead and purchased the new watch, and right out of the box it wasn't working properly - hands would be slow or stop altogether. I guess you get what you pay for. Avoid, avoid, avoid.
love it great gift

I bought this for my great niece as a "big girl" kindergarten gift. She loved it, it is very sturdy and "fancy" (her word). I love the idea of her learning to tell time on a actual watch instead of a digital one. It has a nice leather band that will last and grow with her through the years. High recommend!
my daughter loves her watch. it is a perfect starter watch to help learn to read time and continue with her
I purchased 2 watches for my 5 and 6 yr old Granddaughters. They look and work great! Delivered in days! They are everything I was looking for!

review_title: This is a great size and large enough to not only look good ...
review_body: Bought this for my granddaughter. Today's digital watches and clocks does not give children the opportunity to learn the clock face time. This is a great size and large enough to not only look good as she wears it, it also gives her the incentive to learn. As always Timex  is timeless in their workings.
Great watch for my 9 year old.  East to read and put on as well as stylish.  She feels like a "big girl".
Great watch for a 7 year old .
My daughter loves her new watch.  The dial is easy to read, and even lights up when you push the setting knob.  Very happy with this purchase
pretty and my girl loves it very much
Loved the watch; very well made and works perfectly.
This watch is cute. But, I bought it to  help a disabled adult learn to tell time. The words, hour and minute, on the hands are way to small to be read without a magnifying glass.
My daughter loves it and it fits her tiny five year old wrist with plenty of room to grow. I love the material the band is made of.

I was satisfied. The watch came on time! My niece is a tiny 10 year old, so the eleastic band was perfect...especially because of the velcro. She wears it more as a fashion statement, but she certainly knows how to read the time now.
Perfect for our 5 year old
Perfect for kindergarteners who are beginning to tell time!

review_title: the eyes are the first thing to go!

review_title: These boots are great, but I wish I had bought them in ...
review_body: These boots are great, but I wish I had bought them in a larger size.  The size of the space for the foot is spot on, but the upper portion of the boot is VERY narrow.  I truly have to jam my toddlers legs into these boots to get his feet inside.  My son wears a 7 in regular shoes and I ordered him an 8. I wish I had ordered a 9!
Very cute rain boots, the lack of a liner is helpful and the handles are so nice for helping toddlers get their boots on! My girls didn't want to take them off when I had them try the boots on.

I really wish I could give these boots 5 stars: they are adorable, lightweight, a great color, and not clunky like other boots which is awesome for little ones just learning to walk.  The problem is that they are way too narrow through the ankle and calf for my 15 month old.  He isn't a chunky guy, but we couldn't get his leg to fit comfortably in these boots without worrying about his circulation.  I hope Crocs will come out with rain boots with more room in this area because all other aspects of the boot are great! Had to send them back...

I bought these as a gift for my 18 month old niece. They are so cute!  I sized up so she can use them in the spring, and they fit well, with room to grow.  For the price and how long she'll be able to wear them, they're great.

Because my toddlers feet are wide I had to get a size bigger than his normal shoe size. They fit great and he enjoys wearing them. We have had a lot of rain this winter and these boots are going to work out great.
These rain boot are so cute. My son loves wearing them. He could not wait to put them on and splash in the puddles.

My young toddler couldn't walk in some rain boots she was given for her birthday so I looked for lightweight snug fitting ones. These are perfect--SUPER light and fight snugly (but comfortably) around the ankle so they stay on.

My son's shoes are a size 7, and his snow boots a size 8, so I bought these in a size 9. They're big on his feet, but he doesn't mind at all, he LOVES them! They're light weight, and easy for him to pull on and off all by himself which is a big deal for him these days. They're tall enough to keep the water out when he splashes in the puddles and they dry quickly. We'll keep buying these for as long as they have sizes that fits him. Well worth the money.

My son chose these. They fit well and have held up for a long time (well, longer than I expected!) The price is amazing for the quality of shoe you receive!

review_title: Daughter wears 10EE so I purchased the 11W.  They are big by 1/2-3/4" but that will do I guess.  She will grow into them.
review_body: "The product fit" chart is relative to what size the customer is purchasing and the size their child actually wears at the time.  Some people purchase a size bigger or purchase the actual size and choose from the fit chart "Somewhat large, small, fits as expected, etc" for others to reference.  So I disregarded that chart and just read through a slew of reviews for this product.  Sooo... My daughter wears 10EE and I purchased size 11W in this shoe.  I purchased big so that she will grow into them.  The cinch at the top of the foot helps with the adjustment/width of the shoes for my daughter's feet.  She does have about 1/4 inch of room both at the ankle and her toes.  Her teacher mentioned that the cinch at the top is really what matters, so tighten the top or loosen the top for the feet and she will grow into the rest.  As I tighten the shoe with the strings at the top, it then becomes tight around her ankle so I have to loosen it there for her comfort.  She says it doesn't bother her, but for a child who is just passionate about ballet, she will comply to make her "dreams" come true.  So if a child says they fit fine and smiles, double check for your own peace of mind.  She is running around in them and dancing on our hardwood floors now, and the fit seems comfy for her.  She doesn't look like she's a duck with big feet either lol they don't flop.  hahahahahaha ok have a good day and happy hunting :)

Adorable but so small. My daughter is a size 5 toddler shoe. I ordered her a 7 and they were way too small. I will say she is on the edge of the 5s being too small but they still fit her comfortably. The 7s has to be stretched to even get on and they were way too tight.

The shoes were beautiful and great quality. I followed the size chart and ordered a 12 but it was to big. I ordered an 11 (street shoe size) and it fit her with enough room for her growing feet. I would def order again when she grows out of the shoes.

I love that they don't fall off easily, she can run and jump with them, but the the tightness makes it hard to tuck her pants inside the boots to protect them from mud/water. review_body: I got this watch for my first grader. The layout helped her catch on to telling time very quickly. The watch ran slow, though. She loves the colors, and the fact that it lights up if you push in the winder. Overall though its a great little first watch.

I bought this watch for my 7 yr old granddaughter for Christmas.  I would have thought that with all the other high-tech toys she received, that a watch from Grandma would have been ignored.  But she opened it and was truly excited about it--she had to put it on right then, she loved the colors/design, and patiently listened while I explained how she could tell time with it.  Her mother said they are learning how to tell time in school, so this gift came at just the right time.  Yeah Grandma!!  I would definitely recommend this watch to others with a little girl in this age range.

This watch is perfect for younger kids learning to tell time. My 7 yr old went from struggling to "get" how to read time to being completely competent in just a day. The watch is cute, and perfectly sized for a kids wrist. The adjustable strap is great even for super skinny wrists like my daughter has. Definitely a good buy and well worth it.
good fit, good price

review_title: ... year old has slight narrow foot and these fit perfect.

review_title: Great quality and fit is just right!
review_body: After reading the reviews I ordered a size and a half bigger. My two year old is a size 7 snug and I ordered her a 8.5 toddler it's a little loose, but with the strings in front you can def tighten to fit perfectly. Very happy with my purchase. The quality is great and I love the inner lining.

I bought these for my daughter to wear with her ballerina Halloween costume. They ran small and while she didn't complain, they were very snug on her feet.  She usually wears a 7, so I bought a 7.5 so that she could continue to play with them past Halloween, but she doesn't even try to put them on anymore.

review_title: I bought these in my daughters shoe size and the ...
review_body: I bought these in my daughters shoe size and the were a little snug.  She can still wear them, but I wish I would have gotten them a half size or a whole size up.  I'm sure I'll be buying the next size up in the next month, if not sooner.

review_title: The shoes are just a touch large, but the ...
review_body: The shoes are just a touch large, but the ties tighten so well that it isn’t an issue and she has room to grow!
Happy with these.

Really good quality, but sizing is SO off. I bought Capezio taps following advice on reviews and the Capezio site to size and ended up with shoes that were just right to just too small. I can chalk that up to her growing while waiting for them to arrive. So I decided to order one size up on these as advised by reviewers and researched the measurements on the Capezio websites to ensure they would fit snuggly (as is neccesary with ballet slippers) and for longer than just a few weeks (kids grow like weeds at this age!). Yeeeeeeeeeeeh - they are literally an inch too long. I'm keeping them because she will inevitably grow into them and the quality is worth the money, but they are useless until then because ballet slippers must fit snugly to avoid injury & it's only the sizing that just blows. Not sure how to fix that other than more clear or specific sizing guidelines that match from either the manufacturer or diligently gathered by the seller. It's a shame.
good

had to return and get two sizes bigger from her normal shoe size. from what I've learned this is normal for ballet shoes, but didn't say in the description, only from reading other reviews. that would have been helpful to know right away. great quality shoe, not many options for the 2 year Olds with smaller feet!

review_title: Really disappointed it came not working
review_body: Really disappointed it came not working.  Returned it, and gave it 2 stars, because the gave me a refund without making me bother to send it back.  It went straight to the trash.  Inexpensive doesn't mean it shouldn't keep time.  Ordered this one instead: Disney Kids' FZN3588 Frozen Anna and Elsa Digital-Display Blue Watch and it also came not working - NOT KIDDING - two in a row!  They had us send that one back, and we ordered a new one of that design.  Third time's the charm.  It worked.  That one actually plays music, so it was MUCH more acceptable to my 8 year old Frozen lover.

it is actually sort of sturdy for a children's watch

He has had this pair for about six weeks and hasn't worn them that much yet, but the leather is separating from the backing on the Velcro top. I am going to see if amazon will exchange for a new pair.
Great quality and perfect fit. Would definitely buy again. My daughter loves them.

I had to find a replacement strap...that did not match as well in order to fnd a child's size band. As far as the watch, being that it is a Timex I am sure we will have no problem there....the band was the issue.

had for about a month.  Didn't break, didn't wear out, hasn't lost color and is easy for daughter to read.  Helped her understand 15 till and quarter after as well.  Don't know why everyone was righting bad reviews

bought this for my 4 year old daughter...she loves it...we are slowly teaching how to tell time...it is rugged enough for her to play and no issues...love it

(Capezios was the brand to have!!!!)I  still love the quality, and if it was good enough for them then what else can I say???????

I would just stick to the size you would buy for dress shoes.  Good quality and fast service as usual through Amazon.

The upper part of the boot was a little more narrow than I expected so it's hard to keep his pants tucked in but I think it's also what keeps them from sliding off his feet so it is worth the tradeoff.

My kid's school is in the mountain. They go to a creek every time when they are at the school ( the school is three times a week). So I either needed to buy few pair of boots or something to dry quick to have boots all the time. We bought the same boots before and loved the facts that are easy to clean and dry in seconds. So this was our second pair. If we have complaint, wish the bottom is a bit softer so he can feel the ground better when he climb rocks in the creek. Otherwise, it is great!
Have purchased these for all three of my boys! Great fit and arch support! Cute style and durable for active tots. Easy on and off the Velcro fastener!

I will probably get her some of the other colors!!

review_title: Very disappointed. The watch stopped working after 2 months
review_body: Very disappointed. The watch stopped working after 2 months. Bought a new battery; the watch stopped working after a month. Total waste of money.

After completly opening the package and extracting the watch (difficult to say the least), I saw the tag on the watch that said "Synthetic Leather".  The Amazon product description says "Leather Strap Watch", but it is NOT a leather strap!  The whole reason I bought this watch instead of others is that it was advertised as leather.  Turns out, I should have gotten a different watch.
AAA+++  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED SELLER.

review_title: ATTN: Customer Service Team Management for IMMEDIATE Timex Watch Exchange
review_body: This watch was purchased for our grand-daughter and only given to her for her birthday party tonight. I could NOT be more disappointed in Timex, amazon.com Prime, etc. because after the excitement and appreciation of the idea of the 'first watch', when it DID NOT WORK, the gift and the gesture were ruined. I am beyond disappointed. It's one thing to have a problem with a product for an adult, but when an 8 year old is involved, it's rather disheartening. Moreover, I am an extremely busy person, about to leave for an international trip in one week, and I DO NOT have time to oversee consumer-based complaints, returns, negotiations, etc. I do however expect to have a full refund, and an exchange and whatever else to which I am entitled expediently managed. My continuing rapport with amazon.com will rest upon the manner in which this most unfortunate 'bad product' situation is handled. Take one quick look into my purchase history over the last 12 months to understand and agree why I know I am a valued, high paying customer.

review_title: They have updated their description to "faux leather" from "real leather"
review_body: Edit:

review_title: Does NOT have INDIGLO feature that's advertised
review_body: The description of this watch conflicts with the product.  It says in the ad that it's not water resistant but it IS, according to the writing on the face of the watch.  One of the primary features that we were looking for in this watch for our daughter was the Indiglo feature and the ad says that it has it but it does NOT (the face of the actual watch didn't say Indiglo but another Timex that we bought for our son does say it.)  We sent it back for a refund because it was missing this key feature and Amazon handled the return perfectly (emailed a UPS label to us/free shipping on the return & immediately credited the watch cost even before we dropped it off @ The UPS Store.  Now THAT's customer service!  Now they just need to get the ad copy right on this one!)

I'm 19 years old and have had this watch for about a year now. I LOVE IT. I got it because I have a very small wrist and can't fit into most adult watches. It doesn't look incredibly childish, and if you prefer, you could always try to change the wristbands. It lights up in the dark too, which is handy at times. The second hand is great for me as well because I need it for nursing school. I highly recommend it :) It's also cheap hehe

review_body: Really junky quality for Timex. I could not get the band set up so that it could even keep the watch on an arm. So the watch is not useable.

I got a call from their Mom that they were arguing over this watch, both claiming that I had given this watch to them. The older one loved the color and pattern the younger loved the fact that she could push the stem and it lights up. Ordered this one so both girls had their own, argument settled.

What a great preschooler watch. Durable and cute.  Daughter loves pink and purple.  A great teaching watch too.  Also adjusts to just the right size, easy off and off and washable band.

My two year old Grand Daughter Olivia (she turns three April 2nd.) has been asking for a watch for many months now. Most of the kids watches have plastic bands you buckle. Further, most bands are  too big, as she has the tiniest of arms. This watch has a stretchable cloth band that fits her perfectly and is easy to take on and off. All in all I am quite pleased with the product. It is a little pricey for a three year old, but if yours is as responsible as mine it is worth it. We created a treasure box in her dresser, where she keeps precious things that need to be safeguarded. So when she gets this watch it already has a safe home, when not on her wrist.

review_body: This is our second pair of this style of shoe. We were so happy with the ease of the Velcro for putting on shoes for a baby/toddler, when it was time to get a bigger shoe, we went with the same shoe.
