review_body: My daughter wears a 7, but she is growing so fast we got her an 8.5 so she can wear these all winter. They were quite too big right now but she just loved them, so I went ahead and bought a second pair in purple.

review_title: Great Watch For Kids or Even Adults - Beautiful Feminine Watch
review_body: This Timex watch was made for a young girl, yet it is also wonderful for a woman. And since I am both a tech and girly girl, this is the perfect watch for me as I have very small wrists.

I'm an adult and bought this watch for myself.  I have rather thin wrists, so it fit perfectly.  After less than a month the watchband tore right off at the point where the watchpin is located.  I believe there are two other reviews mentioning the same issue.  I thought it was odd because I have never had a watchband just rip like this did, so I contacted Timex and they sent a replacement band.  I was pleased with their customer service.  I was NOT pleased when less than a month later the same thing happened again, with the new band!  Love the watch, wish the watchband was higher quality.

review_title: My 7 year-old daughter received this watch for her birthday ...
review_body: My 7 year-old daughter received this watch for her birthday.  After one day, the pin fell out of the watch band and couldn't be fixed.  We returned this watch and received a replacement.  The same thing happened on the first day she wore it.  Definitely disappointing for a little girl's birthday.

review_title: Have you seen my new watch?
review_body: Our granddaughter is proud to wear this her very first watch and is quickly getting used to telling the time of day or night.

Although I am a "not-so-young" adult, I love wearing this youth sized watch. My wrist is medium-small sized and I am still able to fit the child length strap comfortably. Plus, the strap is soft and pliable and a nice, pale pink color. No fluorescent colors for me! I have also liked the indiglo function on Timex watches and this is no exception. The numbers are readable too. I would recommend this style for pre-teen, tween, and even teenage girls who want an "adult style" watch and not a kid style. Lastly, the cost of the watch is very affordable and readily available at stores like Target and Walmart.

review_title: Watch Lasted A While But Eventually Started Falling Apart
review_body: I had this watch for a few years, but after a while the face got all foggy and the hands and numbers where all blurry. After a few years a little part of it ripped and fell off. However, it lasted a pretty long time before then, and the band is very comfortable.

I purchased this watch for myself because women's watches have never fit me. Although I am in my mid-twenties, my wrist only measures 6.25in. in circumference. If you have as small of a wrist as I do, this watch could be a good fit for you. The face is 23mm in diameter, so it is not too small, or too large for a small wrist. The fact that it is synthetic leather has not bothered me yet, either. Overall, I think this is cute, I love the indiglo and the price, and most of my friends were surprised when I said it was a children's watch! My only concern or dislike about this watch is that the band is still quite large on me. I wear this watch on the third most inner notch, and when originally expected to wear it on one of the most outer notches, being a children's watch. When I wear it, the tail end comes all the way up to the side of my wrist, but it is much better than being up by the face of the watch the way women's watches were fitting. Final note- if you have small wrists and like pink, this watch is the one for you!

review_title: Frankly I was happy with the watch
review_body: I purchased the watch for myself as I have tiny wrists and find it difficult to find something to fit my small wrists. Frankly I was happy with the watch. Came with an extra battery. Good quality. Not something I would buy for a very young child. May not be durable enough but fine for nine and older.

I purchased this as a Christmas present for my 8-year-old.  After being worn for about 2 weeks, the clear plastic is already horribly scratched and cloudy.  I'm not sure exactly what is scratching against the face (perhaps it rubs her school desk when she writes?), but in my opinion a kids' watch should be made of something more durable.  I regret the purchase and feel I've wasted my money.
Gift for my daughter, very nice watch!

This was for our 4 year old who really wanted a watch like her older siblings.  This stays on her wrist with no problems and the band feels very comfortable.  She loves it.  I like the fact that it is not digital so we can help her to learn to tell time.  I don't mind the minutes starting over from the 1/2 way mark as some reviewers have commented on, but it will be a little bit before we try to teach that to her.  I sort of like how they did it - 30 minutes past/30 minutes to - as that makes sense to me.  Would definitely recommend for looks and comfort!
Really easy to adjust the size, comfortable fit, and really cute.

review_title: Timex Kids T89022 Time Teacher Purple/Pink...
review_body: perfect watch to teach telling time.
As they say in Brooklyn.."Poifect"....Nick Paola
Comfortable,pretty, easily to adjust, tells the right time and survives abuse

review_title: This was a gift for my great granddaughter. She liked it
review_body: This was  a gift for my great granddaughter.  She liked it, but I don't know if she is still wearing it.  You know how kids are.....they like something one day then forget about it later..

review_title: Elastic band makes putting it on and off easy.
review_body: Just right for my seven year old granddaughter. Elastic band makes putting it on and off easy.
A very cute and functional toddler watch. Also helps the little ones with their time skills.
My daughter loves the butterfly second hand
So far so good! Bought this for my daughter's birthday to help her work on telling time and she loves it!
I tried the 9.5 on my daughter in store and they were way to big so I purchased a 9 on here and they are super tight on her. She can wear them for now but these run rather small.

review_title: My daughter has very slim feet so they look funny on the sides since they don't hug her feet ...
review_body: We went up a full size as normal with ballet shoes so they fit perfectly lengthwise. My daughter has very slim feet so they look funny on the sides since they don't hug her feet well on the sides. She loves them so thats all that matters

review_title: That might be good for serious ballet danders
review_body: My daughter couldn't get these shoes on by herself because they are so tight fitting. That might be good for serious ballet danders, but for 3 year olds and their parents it frustrating. Also the ties just don't stay tied. We ended up cutting them off.

review_title: It may seem silly, but I ordered these ballet ...
review_body: It may seem silly, but I ordered these ballet shoes for my daughter over another pair that I was thinking about buying for her based on the cute little daisies on the inside of the shoe.  The shoe is even called the "Capezio Daisy 205 Ballet Shoe".  However, when I received the shoes, they have no daisies as shown in the picture. Why did I not receive the shoes that are pictured and described?
I don't like it
Sized up a full size and could have gone another 1/2 size. Well made.

review_title: Perfect. Fits well with room to grow
review_body: Perfect.  Fits well with room to grow.

review_title: Follow the size chart when ordering, TTS
review_body: Ordered this for my daughter.  Followed the size chart when ordering and the shoes turned out to be TTS.  Arrived in a week.  Definitely recommend if you are not in a hurry!
Very cute shoe. My daughter wears these to her ballet class and wore them to her recital. The only negative comment is that the tie in front doesnt stay tied and comes loose frequently.
Great product.  The only ballet shoes my grand daughter wears. Will be back for more when needed.
The kids were over the moon with these watches.  They loved them.  They were solidly constructed and looked fabulous.
This made a great gift.

review_title: It was easy to set the time and date
review_body: I bought this as a gift for my 5-year-old daughter.  She loves frozen.  It was easy to set the time and date.  There are only 2 buttons so it's not overly complicated.  The watch seems well made for the price point, and for being a children's watch.  It does come with a warranty and a form to request service if it does break which I wasn't expecting.
Nice product 4 year old loves.arrived promptly
good
Not bad at all. Looks good and nice on my daughter.
My granddaughter would love it.
excelente
Cute watch for my granddaughter.
it is cheaply made

review_title: Not for kids with XW feet
review_body: Fits fine new out of the box (my son is 20 months) when the boot is stiff and we could pull them on easily. But after we wore them a few days, seems like the rubber loosens up and we have a heck of a time getting them on his extra wide feet now. Feels like we are going to rip the handles right off as they stretch and stretch and nothing moves.

review_title: Very cute boots. A little too narrow, which ...
review_body: Very cute boots. A little too narrow, which makes putting them on difficult for my 14 mos. He is 50%, so doesn't have chubby legs/ankles.
Best boots ever for kids that love being outdoors!

My daughter love her boots because they are pink. I like them because they are light weight like crocs naturally are and the length of the boot that wraps your leg is not too wide. No rain getting into these boots. We are very pleased.

review_title: These are perfect for an active 2-year-old who loves to stomp through ...
review_body: These are perfect for an active 2-year-old who loves to stomp through everything. He loves them and unlike some of his other shoes, these seem to be indestructible.

review_title: Wanted to like them but was disappointed
review_body: Too stiff and ankle/leg area is too narrow for toddler legs to get through. Wanted to like them but was disappointed. Daughter 1.5 yo could not wear and had to send back.

The neck of this boot is very narrow.  It is difficult for my toddler to get his foot into it.  We had to put a plastic bag on his foot to ease the foot into the lower part of the boot.  Once the foot is in, the boot fits fine.  I would not buy this product again.

review_title: easy to put on due to the 'handle' design
review_body: Pros: easy to put on due to the 'handle' design, very light weight, holds up great in rain and mud

I love these rain boots and so does our 18 month old. I bought a size larger so she can use them for a longer period. She does trip in them if she tries to run but I can solve that by stuffing something in the toe. It rained right after we got them so she went puddle jumping and her feet were warm and dry the whole time. She is in a size 6 but I ordered a 7. Definitely recommend.

A little hard for a 2-year-old to get her foot into (sticks a bit up top), but after a brief adjustment she was running around in them comfortably *without* socks, even if they do run a bit big (which means they will last longer). All one piece of molded rubber/plastic and just adorable and sturdy.

review_title: Super cute and stylish run a little small
review_body: Wish I'd have gone up in size. Hoping he can make it through the school year!  It seems they run about half a size smaller than what you would expect.  They are adorable and they seem durable and he loves them.

review_title: They are super cute but I had to return
review_body: My daughter hates these shoes. They are very stiff and I guess it takes a while to break them in. She screamed when she had these on and said they hurt. They are super cute but I had to return.

review_title: They look good, he doesn't trip in them
review_body: My 3 yr old loves them. They look good, he doesn't trip in them, and the price is great. I'm guessing they'll not last long, but neither do our shoes that cost twice as much. Will likely order again.

review_title: These shoes are absolutely adorable. My five year old loves them and says ...
review_body: These shoes are absolutely adorable. My five year old loves them and says that they make him run so fast. The only reason I gave four stars instead of five, is that the Velcro strap could be a little bit longer. As they are, the exposed portion of Velcro picks up pieces of pieces of dirt, grass, fiber, etc.
These are great shoes for a busy toddler, and the wide size fits great on chubby feet.

I recently purchased these for my 2 year old son.  Not only do I think they are absolutely adorable, he likes them too.  Although they do have a velcro closure, they do not look cheap or cheesy.  They provide good stability for him, and are great for daily use.  If a wide size had been offered I would have ordered it, but a medium seems to fit him fine.  Because he does have a bit of a wider foot, I usually just put thinner socks on him when he wears these shoes.  Great buy!  When he outgrows these, I'm sure I'll buy him another pair!
Fits pretty true to size. Well made shoes!

I don't know who is boxing these shows but twice I have gotten size 8 (I ordered a size 9.5) in a 9.5 marked box. I have sent back twice and am waiting for next one to arrive--hopefully it is not a continuous defect. The shoes looked quite nice when we took them out.

I bought these in the camo print for my almost 4 year old son to wear to daycare, and so far they've held up well. Since there's no white on them, they stay clean looking longer too, so that's a big plus! He's had them a month and they still look great, so that's a good sign! :)
Bought these for my two year old. They fit great and are easy for mom and dad to get on and off. The velcro is strong and secure. The soles are thick and provide great traction. Love these!

There are so few analog watches for kids out there that are not gimmicky and I chose this for its simplicity. The strap is a bit long for her (age 6 so room to grow) but otherwise just perfect!  My daughter loves it, and loves to tell everyone the time! Can't go wrong with this watch.

review_title: Bought it for my daughter and she loves it will ...
review_body: Bought it for my daughter and she loves it will not take it off. Band seemed a bit flimsy to me but seems to be strong.
The light did not work out of the box.
Great present for kids. Very durable.
very cute, works perfect, fast arrival, Granddaughter loves it!  Can't beat the price.

I am 24 and was having a hard time finding an woman's watch that did not have a cartoon character on it, a bunch of jewels, or a huge watch face. This is a great simple watch. The watch is 8 inches/20 centimeters long (not including the buckle) so it isn't too small for many adult wrists. The backlight is a great feature as well.
A good starter watch for grade school student like my goddaughter...I'm sure she'll definitely love it! Timely delivery and on nice packaging.

This watch was purchased for my 8 year old daughter.  It has served her well.  I would rate it at five stars but as other people mentioned, the strap tends to come off.  This has not been a major problem with our daughter, it has come off about 3 times in 3 months and I have been able to pop it back in.
Purchased this watch when my granddaughter was 6, she is just beginning to appreciate it at age 7 and a half.  It still runs and it still lights up.
Cute for a 6 year old. Keeps time but the face was easily scratched and already looks tired :/
I love this watch, my daughter loves the color.
It's a cute watch, and my daughter loved it, but we've only had it three months before the knob to set the time broke off. It was a cheap watch, easily replaceable, but I wish it had lasted longer.

review_title: I love that the band is velcro adjustable
review_body: I love that the band is velcro adjustable.  The face is easy to read for my kiddo learning time. And, the design is nice. I was really happy to find it!

Actually this product is excellent. It's the only one I found with the 5 min increments all around the face, the others went from 5-30, and then 5-30, but this one goes from 5-55, which makes it much easier to understand the time. And the flexible band for any size wrist is also great for little kids. We lost one of these after only one day of wear, and I specifically shopped around for this exact one as a replacement.

review_title: I don't like the clasp on the band other than that I ...
review_body: I don't like the clasp on the band other than that I love it and it was exactly what I expected.
Velcro band didn't hold to well.

review_title: Perfect for our 7 yr old to learn how to read analog time.
review_body: Perfect watch for a young girl to wear and learn how to read analog time. We especially like the indiglo lighting on the watch. Though the watchband feels cheap and probably won't stand up to wear and tear from a child if worn every day. But for the price it's a great watch for our daughter.

Got this for my daughters birthday - will be purchasing another for my other daughter - cute little butterfly ticker for the seconds and the strap is very comfortable and the face lights up - which is a bonus.

review_title: Great gift for teaching young people to tell time
review_body: Analog ...real numbers with tiny assists next to them.  5,10,15, etc. painless way to learn real time instead of digital numbers which have no relevance for a child who can't yet tell time.
Perfect for a child just learning to tell time!
These are perfect for a beginning ballerina.  My daughter loves them and they are perfect with her outfit!
fits perfect! good quality def recommend!

review_title: my daughter's dance school requires these white slippers for class ...
review_body: my daughter's dance school requires these white slippers for class.  The are made of real leather and seem to be high quality.
The ballet shoes are the color we ordered and fit fairly well!
Beautiful ballet shoes excellent stitching and good sole.

review_title: MUCH cheaper than at dance boutique
review_body: These are the required shoes for little ballerinas at many studios. Quality is great, and price is about half of what you’ll pay at a dance boutique store for the same brand.

Perfect. My daughter is seven and this is her first year in dance. When the paperwork came out that she needed dance shoes, a certain color and appearance.. I had no idea where to look or where to go. So to Amazon I went. There happens to be alot of dance shoes and alot of comments about how good and bad they are and I was lost in a sea of "oh my god.. which shoes do I get? What size? Will they fit? Will they look weird? SEND HELP"

review_title: good for kids who out grow them fast
review_body: They are for my daughter and they fit about a half size small.  They are leather and did stretch out after wearing them for a bit, which may be how they are designed due.
Too Small, gave them to my younger neice
I listened to other reviewers who advised to size up a full size.  Glad I did.  My girl is in a toddler 7 shoe, and the size 8s fit perfectly.  Would definitely order again.
Looks good on the kid.
It was perfect for my 5 yr old granddaughter.
I love this watch and it is perfect for my grand-daughter.
My granddaughter loved this watch.
great product. fast delivery.
Either the battery is almost dead or there is something wrong with the watch itself. Time does not worl.
My granddaughter will love it.
My niece loved the watch and I loved the price!!! I picked the wrong shipping so they upgraded right away!  Thank you!

review_title: Be Frozen and bold and cool at the same time.
review_body: I got this watch for a 9-year old who loves the movie. She enjoys it and wears it a lot! Truly is was not my style or color, however one little "kinder" is happy as a clam. That must be another movie!

review_title: Workes like charm! Totally worth 10$ I spent on it
review_body: Lovely looking watch. Workes like charm! Totally worth 10$ I spent on it! My daughter loves it!
Perfect for our twin toddlers.  I love how lightweight they are.  Most kid's boots are heavy and clunky.  We will definitely be buying more when they outgrow these.

review_title: Easy to get on and off
review_body: Boots seem well made. Easy to get on and off, which is important for my toddler who has to do it by himself at school. Buy with confidence.

review_title: a boot for every kind of weather
review_body: absolutely perfect and incredibly useful.  These boots are light but sturdy-- as expected from Crocs.  My daughter has worn them to school, in the rain, in the snow.... I imagine they will be an every season boot.  I highly recommend these.
I really love these shoes. This is the second pair I've ordered for my son. He can splash about and not get wet. And they are super cute! Finally the handles allow him to help me put the shoes on.
The handles make them so much easier to put on.

review_title: I bought them a little big on purpose and they are still snug around the ankles so they stay on just fine. He is not even 2 yet
review_body: My son loves these boots.  I bought them a little big on purpose and they are still snug around the ankles so they stay on just fine.  He is not even 2 yet and he can get them on and off himself without any help from me.  He gets compliments on his boots ALOT!
My daughter wears these to swim practice in the winter months. In the summer regular crocs. If anyone owns crocs you know they are big sloppy shoes. They serve the purpose for what we need them for.
Best boots for toddlers. Our daughter loves these boots whenever we go out she always wants to wear them. She is 18 months and can put them on and take them of by herself.

Bought these after reading reviews that said they were easy to clean, dried quickly and were lighter than other boots.  Very happy - 2 yr old is able to pull them right on and loves running around in them!  I also don't expect them to be good winter boots - will buy separate pair for snowy/cold weather -
My son will not take these stupid things off. He's not quite 2 and insists on wearing them all day, even when he's just in a diaper.

review_title: She says it isnt very comfortable, and I think it's because of being on ...
review_body: I bought this for my 5 year old to help her learn how to tell time. It fits her wrist but on the tightest setting.  She says it isnt very comfortable, and I think it's because of being on the tightest setting, there's a lot of extra strap irritating her.  It's adorable and well made though!!
looks and works great!!
I love this little pink watch - it is actually a child's watch, but since I have very small wrists, it fits me perfectly..
I am the kind of person who losses watches every five minutes. This is the only watch I have have for 3 years. It's water proof, durable and light weight.
good

This watch is advertised as having an indiglo feature, which is why I bought it.  My daughter specifically wanted one that glows at night.  While it is a nice watch, it does not have the indiglo function.
watch works great. perfect for my daughter learning to read non-digital format. from my past experience with Timex they are very durable.

review_title: Its a very nice classy water resistant watch
review_body: Its a very nice classy water resistant watch.  Unfortunately the watch isn't indiglo as it clearly states in the product description below.  What is the point of buying TImex for a kid without their trademark Indiglo?  Please Timex make more classy water resistant watches for kids with Indiglo!  Thanks : )
too small for me.
Timex is always a priceless gift. You can expect it to be exactly what your ordered. It was a perfect girl for a girl who asked for a watch.
Great quality. Comfortable shoe per our 4 year old.
Perfect for my toddler and better made than the shoes you find at babies r us or target. I like that there is arch support and they are easy to put on and off.
They must feel fast, my boy started running immediately upon wearing them!
It runs small. I bought them in 8.5 form my girl, but they are like 8.

review_title: She loves the colors and easy Velcro closure
review_body: My four-year-old is very rough on shoes, and these are holding up well.  She loves the colors and easy Velcro closure.  I would buy these again.

review_title: Great shoe for kiddos on the run
review_body: Great sturdy shoe for our son. Comfortable show for him and easy for him to put on and take off. The shoe is pretty stiff, which is fine for our super active little boy.

review_title: My toddler is a 4. 5 in Stride Rite ...
review_body: My toddler is a 4.5 in Stride Rite and so I ordered the same and they were too narrow so I ordered a wide. The wide only we're able to velcro half way across foot.

review_title: I expect them to last the school year and survive the summer
review_body: Great little shoe, my daughter really likes them. They are good quality and expect them to last the school year.

review_title: Not true to size - run small. These shoes ...
review_body: Not true to size - run small.  These shoes are cute and well- made, but I ordered my son toddler size 8 and they are almost a full size smaller than his other size 8 shoes.  The Velcro strap barely reaches the other size to fasten.  Order a size up.
Arrived on time. Great sneakers for my 4 year old. Love the fact that there are Velcro straps.

Perfect first timepiece for my 7 yo granddaughter.  The butterflies and hearts are perfect and you can't go wrong with a Timex.  I have also used these elastic band watches for myself!  Terrific gift!
A gift for 7 yr old with her most favorite colors ever!  An absolute HIT double plus a teaching tool for telling time.
Great way to help teach our granddaughter to tell time. Digital clocks are okay.. Moving mechanism allows them to learn the correct way to tell,time using a 12 hour clock.
The face was very easily scratched.  Other than that though I love the idea. My daughter has been obsessed with reading the time since getting it.

The watch is great, the watch band is a little iffy.  Hard for an 8 year old to tighten and very short, so it is easy to pop out when she puts it on her wrist.  Love the watch, the watch band - not so much.
My granddaughter has always loved my Timex watch with the light up face. Giving her one of her own for her birthday was a big hit. It is easy to read and has a wonderful adjustable band.
Exactly as described - my goddaughter loved it!!

review_title: Its an elastic band that doesn't seem like it will last very long
review_body: This watch did not have a pink CANVAS band as was advertised!!  Its an elastic band that doesn't seem like it will last very long.  I deliberately chose this one because it said CANVAS.  Now I will have to buy another watch for my daughter.
my granddaughter loves it and was surprised.  She even sleeps with it.  She is 8.  It has a stretch watchband that fits perfect.
Give this to my niece as a birthday gift and she loved it. It's also water resistance
My toddler has fat, square hobbit feet and these fit him well.
Fit perfect, cute shoes.
PERFECT! Super fast amazon prime shipping! I double tied the bow and then cut the excess string - this will keep them from untying.  My daughter loves these! Little (4 year old)  Ballerina approved!

Our six year old has been dancing for three years now so we're on our 3rd or 4th pair of these ballet shoes because she keeps outgrowing them. We've never had to replace them due to quality concerns. Our daughter likes them a lot and says they're very comfortable.

review_title: Don't trust the sizing chart offered
review_body: I used the sizing chart offered and measured my daughters foot and ordered accordingly. When the shoe arrived it was at least one if not 2 sizes too small.

review_title: they are too big compared to other companies ballet shoes ...
review_body: they are too big compared to other companies ballet shoes in the same size. i am saving them for my daughter to grow into which will probably be before the end of this ballet year.

review_title: Good shoes for a good price
review_body: This is the third pair of Capezio Daisys I have bought.  My daughter has outgrown them pretty quickly but we pass them down to her sister.  These are comfy and well-made and have served us well for their Irish Dance classes.  It's hard to find black ballet shoes so these are great!

review_title: will fit perfect! Item did not arrive in 2 days like ...
review_body: Order 1 whole size larger than their shoe size, will fit perfect!
Love them!  Perfect!

Awesome little shoes! My daughter has wide feet so I ordered the wide size. It was actually a little too wide (using the stretchy string to cinch them in helped a lot.) Unless your child has Flintstone feet, just order medium instead of wide BUT REMEMBER that you need to order one size up from her regular shoe size.
Works Great!
Exactly what I ordered. Daughter loved it
granddaughter was thrilled
Exactly as described. Perfect for our 6 year old.
Cute watch for kids.
Beautiful. Perfect gift
It was nice for the price. My niece loved it.
ALSO PURCHASED ELSA - ANNA SHIRT WENT PERFECT WITH IT
It is nice but the color is not glow as the picture

review_title: I'm sure she'll love. We'll see how well it stands up and ...
review_body: It's a gift for granddaughter. I'm sure she'll love. We'll see how well it stands up and works.
great quality

I LOVE pink, and I have an issue with batteries in watches stopping on me for some reason.... this particular watch ALWAYS runs on me and I love the pink band. ANd... when I wake up in the middle of the night I can always tell what time it is cause it's an Indiglo.
Looks cute and simple. i like the color as well as the cute design of this one. so grateful to have this one for my daughter
My daughter loves to wear a pink watch, and that's what I got for her this Christmas.
It is suitable for small children wearing casual play. Strap hard.
The watch would be perfect for my daughter if it was Genuine Calfskin Leather, as advertised, and not synthetic leather - as the tag on the watch says.
Granddaughter loves it. Wears it all the time.

review_title: Thiswatch did not have a light as claimed
review_body: This watch did not have a light as claimed, which is the only reason I bought it!

My daughter is 10 and this is a great watch for her.  She loves the color and light up feature.  I love the classic look of it and that it has worked perfectly.  I bought this one for one daughter and the one in blue for my 11 year old, last Christmas.  They wear them nonstop.
My daughter loves this watch.  It is comfortably priced and stylish enough that pre-teens who have outgrown the 'kiddie' watches will wear it.

review_title: Finally a boot designed for toddlers and little kids!
review_body: I must admit, I've never liked crocs but their signature foam material is a really good match for a rain boot and especially for a toddler/little kid boot.
This is our second pair of Croc rain boots.  My daughter loves being able to put these on herself.  Super easy.  We receive so many compliments on them.

review_title: very disappointed I cannot return these though the two crock don't match in size
review_body: I am very disappointed in this product.  Maybe not the product itself but the crock sizes that were not consistent. I sent back the first pair because they were too small for my grandchild.  So I ordered another pair.  When they were finally able to try on the new pair, the two crocks didn't even match in size even though they said the same size.  Because the family didn't come down till last weekend, I found that even though the sizes were defective, I can not return them after 30 days!  Very disappointed.
Nice boots
Much less clunky than other rain boots. Excellent for a wide foot. Easy to get on and off.
But I ordered a size up
Rubbed/pressed uncomfortably into the ankle. Returning

The kids love these boots! Seamless design so no chance of springing a leak unless something weird happens. Super cushy for little feet and great color options. I also bought the yellow ones for the older kid. The quality will allow for hand-me-downs for younger family members or friends.
Good rain boots, easy to clean and quick to dry. Not much comfort, but that's to be expected as that would decrease the drying time.
These boots are very durable. They actually outlast my destructive 6 year old. He outgrows them before wearing them out. The best part is that they are 100% leakproof due to the seamless design.

My 2 year old loves these shoes. Getting her to put these shoes on isn't a struggle like it usually is with her other pairs.  She loves the sparkle and picks these out every time. Super fast shipping.

Love these baby jazz sneaks!  My baby girl look so stylin' in her new kicks.  They fit great, are sturdy, and high quality.  Parents love finding items that are made well, but are also cute and hip for their kids; these are both those things and we are very satisfied.
We all like this shoes (me my wife and my 3 yr old son), looks really cool and seems durable.

review_title: The most comfortable shoes for active little toddlers
review_body: Love these shoes and so does our 2 yo son! Really comfortable for runnign and playing and cool looking too. we had green shoes and then he outgrew then and we got some blues, shoes and will keep ordering them in the next size as he gets bigger. I like that they come in half sizes too as the size jump can be big in other brands! can't say enough how much we like these!
Well made. My son loves it.

review_title: Great shoes that are comfy and cool lookin'
review_body: This is the only brand of shoes my son has worn. We just keep buying bigger sizes each time he grows out of them. Love them! Plus, he always gets compliments on his "cool shoes".
Love these. My toddler has no issue putting them on, which is a plus!

review_title: This is definitely the style to go to for kids ...
review_body: This is definitely the style to go to for kids Saucony shoes-- I tried the kind where the whole tongue velcros but my 3 year old kept stepping out of them- will definitely be buying these again!
The look great & work great. Easy to get on & off, but run a bit too small.

Lovely color and easy for my 2.5 year old to put on and off her nice new shoes. The suede part seems little tough to clean but as far as they fit in well and look cute i have no issues. Everyday fit, as my child uses them in her school  and she seems to like these a lot
Great to learn how to tell time. Pity it is not water resistant

I bought this watch as a Christmas present for my 6 year old daughter. It really is an adorable watch. I like that the band is elastic and not some cheapy uncomfortable plastic band. My daughter thought the watch was really cute and was excited to wear it. However she did get irritated quickly trying to read the tiny numbers along the dial of the watch. I am hoping that once she becomes more comfortable with telling time on a watch like this that the tiny numbers wont be such an issue.

review_title: excellent but worst clasp ever for a kid
review_body: My 7 year old daughter loves the watch.  Glow-in-the-dark, butterflies and hearts design and great function.  Granted we've only had it for a couple of weeks so I don't know much yet about the durability of it.  Huge issue: the clasp is the worst kind ever (loop back style).  For a kid's watch, someone should have used their noggin to put an actual clasp or even have the band be stretchy w/o a clasp.  Now when she wears it, it flops around on her wrist as you can't tighten it well once it's on (but you have to have it loose enough to get over her hand).

review_body: This is a very nice and comfortable sneaker overall. My 18 month old has chunky feet so the strap barley attaches. I would not recommend them if your child has chunky feet other then that they are a great purchase.

It is totally useless now and I have to run out an buy a new gift tonight as I am to embarrassed to even give this.  Looks like we picked up a toy out of our toy bin and tried to wrap it as a present.  Not cool.

The plastic is cheap, and probably would be better utilized elsewhere. It's too bad, because other than the poor plastic front, it really is a decent starter watch for the $. Oh well, u get what ya pay for more times than not. Buyers remorse really hits hard when it's a gift.

review_title: rather than glass - looks like it could crack fairly easily
review_body: A lovely little first watch. The only thing I wish was different is that it has a plastic covering, rather than glass - looks like it could crack fairly easily, but our second-grader loves it.

I ordered this for my niece and she loves it! The band is kind of stretchy cloth which is nice, and is adjustable to fit her small wrist. It has a function that lights up the face, and the hands say "hour" and "minute" on it which is cute.

They ran rather small. Ordered my 2 year old a size 6 and had to exchange for a size 8. Other than the size running small there are no issues. The ballet slipper is so cute and I’m excited to see my daughter use them!

review_title: It fits perfect and you can tight the ballet flat with the ...
review_body: My girl is 13 and that is what I bought. It fits perfect and you can tight the ballet flat with the strings at the front. There are some people that have said that the flat is too narrow or tight but that was not the case for my daughter.

review_title: Great quality. My son will outgrow these before long ...
review_body: Great quality. My son will outgrow these before long because he grows to fast but he says they are very comfortable. The are well made and will last for quite a long time.

I was worried after reading all the comments. They were so conflicting. I ordered the Ballet shoes 1/2 size bigger. They are perfect. Very well made. If you have just started a dance class the facility should warn you about shoe sizes. All dance shoe sizes run small. Ballet are the only dance shoe that is closest to the size you take.

review_title: Almost two sizes too small!! I bought a ...
review_body: Almost two sizes too small!!  I bought a size that I thought my daughter could grow into,  but they were still almost 2 sizes too small!

great shoe, lasted without tears/damage. KR

Great quality. Was wearing a 10 in little girl shoes and ordered a 10D. Fit perfectly! Will probably never go with another brand. If any doubts just Google ballet shoe sizes and youll find explanations of the letters :-)

review_title: I bought these for my 18 month old son. ...
review_body: I bought these for my 18 month old son. They are really cute and are true in size in terms of length. I wouldn't say his foot is particularly wide but the velcro strap doesn't go all the way across. It's still secure and not a deal breaker though.

review_title: Have a hard time getting these velcroed all the way ...
review_body: Have a hard time getting these velcroed all the way, run a bit small and hard for little one to get on by self.

review_title: Suede is not durable and looks bad within a week and a half of owning them
review_body: Six weeks after owning the shoes, there was a two inch hole in the side, where the shoe came apart from the sole of the foot. My son told me he had a hole in his shoe and I could see his entire foot. Suede is not durable and looks bad within a week and a half of owning them.
My great nephew loves them. His feet are a little wider and he is only 2 wearing a 9 1/2 but they fit perfectly. Great product.

This is the second pair of Saucony Baby Jazz sneakers I have bought for my daughter. She is a true girly girl & does not wish to ever wear tennis shoes anymore, but is willing to wear these. They hold up well & are easy to clean up when they get dirty.

We ordered these for our toddler last year and they were great! We live in Portland and it rains for much of the fall, winter, and spring. My favorite thing about these boots is that they are so lightweight while managing to be sturdy. So many rain boots are too heavy and cumbersome to walk around in. These were easy for our son to wear and walk in. We will be ordering another pair this year!
Light and comfy. Love the handdles it makes it so much easier to put them on. My kid loved them since the moment he saw them.
Wish these came in adult sizes! So cute and GREAT quality.  Easy to clean...perfect boots!

review_body: Nice and our toddler didn't want us to pack it back BUT one shoe is way bigger than the other!!! We'll be returning them. If we have a better experience with the replacement, I'll update this review.

great quality, will be back to purchase more as our child grows

review_title: Very cute. Perfect for wide-footed puddle-jumpers.
review_body: My 2 year old has wide feet and he LOVES playing in puddles. These boots are perfect for him. Great fit, easy to clean, and they keep his feet warm and dry after splashing about on rainy days.

review_body: Im not one to spend the money on brand name, but they fit great & are so light weight. Makes it easy for my little guy to run & splash. Grab handles for pulling on are a must on boots as well. This was my second purchase of croc boots for toddlers.
super cute! my niece will love it!

Perfect size for girls up about 11 years old. Great face on the watch and adorable little butterfly that keeps track of the seconds...so cute. The velcro strap is great too, well made and watch is a great price too! This is the good one you are searching for. Bought this for our 9 year old neice, she loves it.

review_title: Capezio quality but a store fitting would have been best
review_body: This shoe has all the qualities other reviwers described, however a 13.5M was way too wide for my daughter (I carefully measured her food, read all the other reviews and compared to other dance shoes before picking a size/fit). I should have ordered a 13N. I kept the shoes but I am disapppointed at the lack of reliable sizing for this particular model. It would save a lot of customers a good deal of hassle.
These shoes were WAY too small! They were supposed to be a size 8 narrow but were more like a 4 narrow.
Great lasting quality but were quite snug.
Every review - good and bad - has the same complaint: sizing is impossible to guess. This product is a headache to purchase. Just go to a store and get them to save yourself the hassle.

My daughter has been in dance for 4 years now.. I love the Capezio ballet shoes.. These are $10-$15 cheaper than the ones they sell at her dance studio and are the same quality. Perfect will continue to buy as she continues to get bigger feet :)

They definitely run small. My 2.5 yo daughter wears a 6 in carter's and a 7 in granimals... I got her an 8M as reviews said they run small. These fit nearly PERFECTLY with just the tiniest amount of room at the toe. The bows don't stay tied, but help the shoe stay on her foot, so I'll look into a way to prevent them from coming undone. Overall, good product for a young child just beginning to dance!

review_title: I like them but too small
review_body: My Almost 3 year old girl could not fit these on and she wears normally size 5. They were too small and also narrow. Had to return for a bigger size which now fit perfectly and she loves them. (Ordered 7Wide)

She thinks that they gap at the sides too much, but I did not want to go through another return.  We had the "M", but maybe the "N" would be better.

review_title: Shoes would have been perfect but...

I followed what everyone else said by ordering the bigger size and in all actuality i should have ordered her correct size or even a size smaller. Other than that they seem to have been great shoes.

review_title: Great shoes! They do beautifully in the washer and ...

I purchased these rain boots last year for my then 4 year old boy, and twin 2 1/2 year old girls. I bought the blue, pink and purple and they looked so cute. I had sized up one full size so now a year later they have finally outgrown them and I will be re-buying the same pairs, and passing the hand me downs to my youngest daughter (now 2). My kids have enjoyed puddle jumping & splashing in the mud all year long without ever getting their feet wet or complaining of their feet being uncomfortable. These boots come up mid-high calf and my kids have never had trouble getting them on or taking them off because of the handles. I find that to be very convenient with little ones who always seem to need so much assistance getting dressed! Another plus is that a year later, when washed with clorox wipes and a magic eraser, they look almost exactly like the new pair that came in. I just wish they had more colors available, I would have loved to get a pair in yellow for my youngest so that they all had different colors, but hand-me-down pink & purple boots will have to do until there are more color options!

These rain boots are perfect. They are very lightweight which is great for my 2.5 year old. I did order a size up only so I could put thick socks on her feet while she wears them. Great price and product.

review_title: These are great rain boots for kids
review_body: These are great rain boots for kids. This is our third pair, and I wouldn't change a thing. They are comfortable for my son and they never, ever leak.

review_title: Great buy easy for kids to put on and great fit
review_body: Can't get these off of my little one. He wears these everywhere very comfortable for him and easy for him to put on himself. Easy to clean off from mud dirt or water.
My 2.5 year old loves these boots and I do, too! They seem well made and sturdy and she is easily able to put them on by herself.

review_title: even now that the weather is nice. Very durable and easy to clean
review_body: My daughter gets complicated on her yellow boots all the time. They are her go to choice, even now that the weather is nice. Very durable and easy to clean.

review_title: Must have for kids.  Love these
review_body: These are awesome. I'll keep buying as daughter gets older.  I put in dishwasher to wash and they come out great.  Also great resale value when daughter grows out of them.  On Craigslist or neighborhood sale site
We've only wore them a few times, but so far they are great. I love how light weight they are and that my three year old can carry them in her back pack. I plan on buying a pair for my 6 year old.

review_title: Great Watch, but Way Too Lose
review_body: This is a very cute watch, but it doesn't strap on very tightly.  My daughter wore it to school one day and it fell off.  Haven't seen it since.

I sent this to my niece for Christmas and she loved it!! She actually received two watches for Christmas but likes this one better because it has a back light. She said she's already learned to tell time.
Scratched so bad day one I'm

is beautiful I like very much.

Love these watches! I buy them all!
Daughter got this from the Easter Bunny.  Wears it every day.  It is durable and keeps correct time.  Words are a little small to actually teach her anything but that wasn't why I bought it.
I bought this for my friend's daughter and she loves it. It is a practical way of helping her read the time since in fact she is just learning to read time

review_title: Cute but small! Size up at least one whole size.
review_body: These shoes are very cute for ballet classes for your little one. However, they are WAY too small. Be sure to size up one to one and a half sizes!

review_title: Great shoes but make sure you order N size!
review_body: I ordered the M size for the width, but apparently that is too wide for my daughter. It seems N (narrow) is the normal size for regular feet. I trashed the box, so I don't think I can return it.

review_title: i am very pleased with my purchase, great price, fast shipping and the size is what I expected
review_body: I am very pleased with my purchase, I bought the black and white for my grandaughter who is part of the chidlren's dnce ministry and I got them jsut on time..recommend this seller. If you need fast shipping this is the seller. and theprices are affordable. great shoes thanks!
Beautiful good quality
Bought these for my toddler and turned out to be way too small.  The sizing is really off.

Shoes are perfect for after school ballet class. They are a good price but my daughter complains they are uncomfortable. The teacher explained they fit appropriately for ballet and that comfort is not the goal.

review_title: Great ballet shoe for young girl
review_body: We have been using this style of ballet shoe for my daughter for several years.  If we veer off to another brand or style, we have not been able to find as good a fit!

review_title: Shoe fits is way off - you probably need 3 ...
review_body: Shoe fits is way off - you probably need 3 or 4 sizes smaller than a street shoe.  Tried to return them but the seller wanted to charge me for shipping, which was almost the cost of the shoe so very unfair.

As a dancer, I love Capezio shoes for myself and my daughter as they run true to street size so I can order them on line.  Ballet shoes are meant to fit like socks, so keep that in mind if you're a non-dancer mom.
Its American its accurate.. I hate getting the size she wears only to find that its too SMALL .. not with Capezio they know how to size up a foot and more.. so well tell them i sent you ;;)

review_title: Great sneaker. Runs a half size small
review_body: Great sneaker.  Runs a half size small.
These shoes are awesome, very well made and can handle the use from a 2 year old!!
My son loved these, but Saucony seems to make their shoes slightly smaller than other brands.

review_title: Other than that the durability is great. Kiddos been rocking them since August and it's ...
review_body: The Velcro straps to not Velcro all the way. And I bought two pair for two kids with different sized feet. Neither velcros all the way and it looks tacky to me. Other than that the durability is great. Kiddos been rocking them since August and it's December. Kindergarten approved!

review_title: ... reviews I got a number bigger And they where super big Didn't return them They are
